24a6(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang me yi dug /bad kan khris pa rlung dang ni/ ldan pa bzhi sbyor po la mig dang/ g.yan pa me dbal sha bkra dang/ shu ba mdze dang 'brum bu dang/ mig nad sna nad kha nad dang/ rna ba sna dang gag pa dang/ sman nang glang pa 'bras rnams dang/
24a7(rgyud 'grel): spos shing skam pa chu ser dang/ /smu chu skran dang rgyu nang dang/ glo nad dbugs dang snying nad dang/ /mtsher pa mkhal ma bu snod la/ /bud med bu yang chags mi ster/ /skyes nas 'od 'phrog mngal nas skam/ /mer mer po yang mi ster ro/ /nur nur po la ca le
24b1(rgyud 'grel): chags grangs zhing grong med lus pa yin/ /klu rnams 'dab bzangs bdag dang/ /sa srin bsen mo klu btsan dang/ /klu yi pho mo klu rgyal dang/ sa la rgyu ba mthong mi 'gyur/ /rmi lam mthong zhing 'dar bar byed/ rmi lam mtsho dang chu rnams 'gyu/ /ba lang
24b2(rgyud 'grel): byis pa bud med 'gyur/ /phag dang ra lug rta dang ni/ /rang gi ma mo nye bar bsdu/ /sdig pa sprul dang nya rnams dang/ /chu la gnas pa'i sems can 'gyu/ /dngos po sprul dag mthong ba ni/ /sa bdag dngos pa yin par shes/ /mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyi
24b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ mgo gsum pa dang mgo lnga pa/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang/ dmang rigs dang ni gdol pa'i rigs/ /la las khro ba phyed khro ba/ /gzugs bzang zhi ba sprul 'jug can/ /de dag ni klu yi gdon gyi chu 'phrul lo/ /stan las langs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
24b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang dgra bcom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa la/ skor ba lan gsum byas nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom
24b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi mdun du ste/ yang na ni dge slong gi phyag ces bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/ /thal mo sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gus pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhes bya ba ni/
24b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dang/ stobs dang gzi brjid dang byin gyis brlabs kyis so/ /gsol to zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das la mig mi bzang gis gsol ba
24b7(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor zhes bya ba ni/ /rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi 'khor ro/ /klu 'dab bzangs kyi gdon gyi btab pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni/ mi yi lus la sprul gyi mgo /la la mi yi lus 'dra ba/ /la la bya yi gzugs su ston/ /mchan ma
25a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di lta bu'i lags te zhes bya ni/ nad pa'i mtshan ma nyid 'di lta ste/ 'og ma'i tshig go /skyigs bus 'debs shing zhes bya ba ni/ dgra rims nad kyis btab cing la bcol zer ba'o/ /dbugs kyang 'byin ces bya ba ni/ glo 'byin cing dbugs nang du
25a2(rgyud 'grel): sdud mi shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur zhes pa ni/ rims kyis btab cing lus grang zhing/ /lce lkugs rkang lag rengs pa'o/ /dul zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dper na nyin mtshan gyi rdul bzhin no/ /sbu ba kha chu 'byung ba ni/ /ra dug pa zos pas
25a3(rgyud 'grel): skyugs pa bzhin no/ /yang na chang 'thungs nas na zhing lkugs pa bzhin du'o/ /phyi phyir gnyid ni ldog par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang nas yang gnyid kyis log cing rgyu nad kyis btab pa'o/ /kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba zhes bya ba ni/ nad kyi mtshan nyid de lhog
25a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang 'brum bu dang sha re'o/ /de bzhin 'dar zhing zhes bya ba ni/ 'khod na tshad pa yod pa'o/ /skyug par 'gyur zhes pa ni/ smyo zhing phyi ru 'bros pa'o/ /sen mo dag kyang ston par bgyid ces pa ni/ khod cod nad kyi btab nas sen mo gzhan la ston pa'o/ /dogs par
25a5(rgyud 'grel): mchis shing zhes pa ni/ sa gzhi lta zhing snying mi dga' ba'o/ /du bar bgyid pa ni snyod cing snying du 'dre 'jug cing lceb 'dod pa'o/ /de la zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i gdon tshar gcod pa'o/ /gang gis tshar gcod ce na/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyis gcod pa'o//
25a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi tshigs mchis zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi tshig go /'jig rten mgon po zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /bdag ces bya ba ni rgyal po spyan mi bzang ngo/ /gson ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid
25a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs dang/ zhu ba phul ba'o/ /syat+the daM zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags so/ /krag med zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i gdon gyi
25b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ming dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang ngo/ /stobs zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i mthu'o/ /dbang phyug dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi dbang phyug brgyad kyi phyir ro/ /byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba ni/ sems can
25b2(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /bdag gi gdon gnod pa ni klu'i gdon no/ /gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ nad pa la sogs pa ste/ rgyal po spyan mi bzang gis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bshad pa de nas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
25b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis de'i tshe zhes pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang rgyal po bzhi dang lha ru bcas pa'i mdun du'o/ /seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba ni/ bdag med pa la gsum ste/ de yang
25b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid med pas/ med ni kun tu brtags te/ de ltar brtag pa'i dus nyid na/ des stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de na mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bdag med pa ni gzhan gyi dbang ste/ /de ltar brtags pa dang mi mthun pa ste/ rkyen gzhan la rag las shing skye ba'o/ /rang?
25b5(rgyud 'grel): dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis bdag med pa ni yongs su grub pa ste/ /thog ma nyid nas brtags pa des gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar bdag med pa gsum po de nyid kyis/ kun sgrag par byed pa bdag nyid dam/ nyam mi nga ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra'o/ /bsgrags pa ni 'khor
25b6(rgyud 'grel): la bshad pa'o/ /nga ni stobs bcu zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs mi/ dge ba spyad pas mtho ris kyi gnas yin la/ ngan song rnams min pa ni/ 'dod pa gzhan gyi dbang ngo/ /log par spyad pa ni ngan song gi gnas yin gyi
25b7(rgyud 'grel): mtho ris kyi gnas ma yin pa ni/ mi 'dod pa gzhan gyi dbang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di ni dbang po rnon po de'i rigs can yin/ 'di ni rtul po nyan thos kyi rigs can
26a1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa ni sa bon gyi don ste/ 'di ni nyan thos kyi rigs sam skal pa 'am bag chags can no/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa chen po la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /mos pa sna tshogs pa
26a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa ni gang zag gi nyan thos la mos pa/ 'di ni theg pa chen po la mos pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni/
26a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ 'khor ba'i chos dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la ma lus par mkhyen pa ste/ go rims ltar sbyar
26a4(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa ni/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las dang mi g.yo ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu thob pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa ni 'dis? ni
26a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par mtho? ba thob pas thams cad kyi lam mo/ /'di ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par thob pa legs par thob cing bgrod par byed pa'i lam la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni sngon gyi yul 'dir las 'di lta bur blangs te/
26a6(rgyud 'grel): pha ni 'di la ma ni 'di/ /'di lta bu la sogs pa bzhin du mkhyen pa'o/ /'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang mkhyen pa ni gang zag 'di dus 'di mi tshe rgyu 'di lta bu cig gi shi 'phos nas yul 'di'i rigs 'di lta bu zhig tu skyes so/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
26a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mkhyen pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa ni bdag gis sdug bsngal lo zhes so/ /kun 'byung ba spangs so/ /'gog pa mngon du byas so/ /lam rgyud las skyes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa zhes
26b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes dam bcas nas de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar bdag la dge slong ngam/ bram ze ngam lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye
26b2(rgyud 'grel): dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang/ bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par
26b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dang/ khyu mchog brlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan su yang rung ste chos dang ldan pa skor bar
26b4(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su
26b5(rgyud 'grel): yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa skor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams 'di yongs su zad par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ skye dgu'i
26b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste rgyu yang dag par rjes su na/ mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par
26b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod do/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o/ /'khor gyi nad na seng ge sgra sgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa
27a1(rgyud 'grel): skor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos yongs su bstan pa de dag la rten nas bar chad kyi chos yongs su 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i
27a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan pa rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde bar thob pas/ bag tsha ba med pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob  
27a3(rgyud 'grel): par rnam par spyod do/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos
27a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa skor mi nus pa dag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa byung ba rtogs pa gyur pa de byed ba'i sdug bsngal yang dag par gyur pa de dag la nan byas nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par
27a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo/ /zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su
27a6(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang/ bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang/ mi 'jig pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ /khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo/ /'jig rten na dge
27a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ngam bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bar du bskor bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ste bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o/ /'khor gyi zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o//
27b1(rgyud 'grel): nang du seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni/ bdag nyid kyis stong pa'i sgra'o/ /khyu mchog lta bu ni/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o/ /rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni/ nam khas? ji ltar khyab par stong pa'i sgras khyab pa'o/ /stong pa'i sgra des ci'i don byed ce na/ sems can thams cad grol bar byed
27b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /yang dag par zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma logs pa ste chos kyi sku'o/ /chos kyi sku de dper na ci dang 'dra na/ ri bong gis rwa bzhin no/ /brjod du mi rung dngos por ni med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni chos kyi sku'i dpe'o/ /bsgrags so zhes bya ba ni dngos su ste/ gzugs sku gnyis
27b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis don byed pa'o/ /gzugs sku gnyis ni dper na g.yag gi rwa bzhin no/ /g.yag gi rwas ni dngos por yang snang la 'bigs par byed pa'i don gyi phyir ro/ /de'i phyir na gzugs sku rnams gnyis kyis ni yod pa'i don byas so/ /chos skus ni med pa'i don byas/ yod
27b4(rgyud 'grel): dang med pa'i don byas pa'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyi sgra bsgrags pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ /'od srungs kyis spyo ba brgyad kun dga' bo la byas bas tshangs pa'i phyir na tshang ba'o/ /'khor lo bskor zhes bya ba ni/ bka' i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ sde zhes bya ba ni/ bdud
27b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs bzhi'o/ /mthu dang zhes bya ba ni so so'i nus pa'o/ /gzhon pa la ni lha mi'i bu'i cha byad do/ /bcas pa ni bdud kyi rigs bye ba dung phyur phrag bco lnga'o/ /bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /de la dang
27b6(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi la lha'i bdud ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas na/ bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rabs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang/ bdud mo padmo gzi ldan ma/ 'khor 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi/ bdud kyi rigs byed pa dung phyur phrag bco lnga yod de/ de la lha'i rigs su
27b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes pas lha'i bu yin la zhi ba de thar pa'i srog gcod pa 'phags pas ni nor 'phrog pas kyang bdud yin no/ /de ltar na bdud kyi rigs bye ba phrag dung phyur bco lnga yod pas bar du gcod do/ /des chos na 'khor 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis bar du gcod do/ /de yang
28a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig sbyin pa'i bar/ gcig gis bzod pa'o/ /gcig gis brtson 'grus kyi bar du gcod pa'o/ /des kyang mchod na bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug dang/ bdud mo pad+ma gzi ldan ma chags pa'i mda' lnga 'phen te/ gdung skem ra ro myos dang smyo/ /mda' lnga
28a2(rgyud 'grel): yin par shes par bya/ /de lta bu'i tshul gyis bar du gcod pa'i phyir na bdud do/ /nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa ste/ de rnams ma zhi ba'i rnam pa bskyed pa nyon mongs pa yin la/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i dgegs byed pas 'phags
28a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nor 'phrog pas bdud kyang yin no/ /phung po'i bdud ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bya ste/ de nyid spungs pas na phung po'o/ /de nyid na ba dang rgas pa 'khogs pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcad pas bdud do/ /'chi bdag gi bdud ni dngos su rang gi tshe 'di'i 'phen
28a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zad nas 'chi ba yin pa la de'i phyag rgya ma 'am rtags su 'gro ba rnams kyi bdud rang gi lhag pa'i phyogs na gnas pa shes pa ste/ gshin rje'i rgyal po be ba swa ta zhes bya ba/ lus po mi'i lus po la mgo bo seng ge'i mgo bo can/ mig rtsa dmar po gcig gnas
28a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ de 'chi ba la dbang byed pas 'chi bdag kyang yin la der Arya'i nor 'phrog pa thar pa la bgegs byed pas bdud kyang yin no/ /de ltar yang 'gro ba rnams ni do nub 'di bya nang bar 'di byed las gzhan yang 'di byas sems dpas na/ gshin rje'i rgyal po mig rtsa
28a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar bas mdangs snyams pa dgod par byed ces pas so/ /de rnams btul ba dang ldan pa ste/ de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste/ de yang dang po ni rdo rje gdan gyi spol sangs rgyas pa'i tshe bdud dga' rab dbang phyug gi rigs nas bdud mo pad+ma gzi ldan ma dang
28a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs/ de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyis smras pa gtso bo ci'i phyir na mya ngan gyi khang par bzhugs mya ngan byed ces pa dang/ gtso bos smras pa 'jig rten 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/ gzhon nu don grub mngon par rdzogs pas sangs
28b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pas/ de sangs rgyas nas 'dod pa'i khams stong par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag mnga' ris gang la bya ste/ de'i phyir na mya ngan byed zer ste/ 'khor rnams kyis smras pa/ mya ngan ma byed de bas bar du gcod ces smras so/ /dang po bdud kyi bu mo shin tu mdzes pa bzhi sprul te/ b+ha
28b2(rgyud 'grel): ga bAn la chags pa skye ba'i phyir na gtang bas/ lha b+ha ga bAn mi sdug pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ rgan po mi sdug pa sprang mo zhar ma lta bu bzhi ru gyur to/ /de nas 'khor 'jig rten pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mtshon cha'i char phab
28b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ b+ha gas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ me tog gi char du gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i tshogs khro bo dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes brjod pas/ 'tshe ba rtogs shig pa'i sgra nam mkha' khyab par bsgrags? pas bdud
28b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor thams cad dbang du bsdus so/ /mthong tsam zhig gnas bdud dga' rab dbang phyug dang pad+ma gzi ldan shor ro/ /de nas lha'i bu'i bdud btul bar gyur to/ /de nas tho rangs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa rkang la gnas pa dang/ spyi la gnas pa
28b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spangs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas nyon mongs pa'i bdud btul bar gyur te/ de nas chu bo nai rany+dza ra'i 'gram du dka' thub lo drug mdzad pas rdzud cing h+rid par gyur ba la tshong dpon gyi bu mo legs skyes mas ba lnga brgya'i 'o ma
28b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa drangs pas/ sku gser gyi brtan pa phyis pa ltar sor/ sha med khrag med rgas pa med par gyur to/ /de ltar na phung po'i bdud btul/ de nas lo brgyad cu na sku mya ngan las 'das pa la bram zes su gtos gsol ba btab sku tshe rang dbang mnga' 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): brnyed pa'i rtags su lo gnyis bzhugs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud btul lo/ /de nas don dam par btul ba ni/ de ltar na bdud bzhi snang ba nyid rang gi ye shes de lta bur snang ste/ sna tshogs su snang ba sprul pa'i sku/ de lta bur de yang rang rig par 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa longs sku/ de nyid btsal na gang du yang ma rnyed pas/ stong pa 'od gsal ba chos kyi sku'o/ /sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ snying rje'i sgo nas so/ /rig sngags zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid do/ de yang kun gzhi rnam par
29a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pas nye bar len pa'i rgyu byas/ stobs rnam pa lngas lhan cig skyes pa'i rkyen byas/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas 'gyur ba me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ stong pa mdza' dag dang bral ba'i don rtogs pas/ rig sngags mtshan nyid pa ste/ de'i mtshon
29a3(rgyud 'grel): cha me long lta bu'i ye shes/ mtshon pa stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ste/ sku mdog dang zhal phyag gi rnam par 'byung ba'o/ /de sku mdog ni mthing ka zhal gsum pa ste g.yas kyi zhal zhi ba dkar mo dregs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yon
29a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo rgod pa dbang gi tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /dang po'i zhal mthing ka khro bo ste/ drag po'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /zhal gsum pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag drug zhabs gnyis na gnod sbyin po mo mnan pa'o/ /gnod
29a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pho ni srid pa'i ngo bo'o/ /mo ni 'das pa yin te srid pa dang 'das pa rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /phyag drug pa zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ bar ma na ral gri tha ma na dgra
29a6(rgyud 'grel): sta'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po ni sdig mdzub zhags pa bar ma na rtse gsum tha ma na lcags kyu'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ye shes rnam par dag pa'o/ /ral gri zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab yin te nyon mongs pa gcod pa'o/ /sku gsung
29a7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi nyes pa rnams thub pa'i phyir dgra sta'o/ /rdo rje zhags pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis bcings pa'o/ /sdigs mdzub ni ma lus sems can sdang ba rnams la sdigs mdzub bo/ /srid pa gsum du song ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jigs
29b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pas na mdung rtse gsum mo/ /mche ba gtsigs pa kha gdangs pa dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba/ spyan gsum pa dbu la thod pa lnga yis brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad ni rin po che dang sprul gyis brgyan pa/ stong g.yogs dang smad g.yogs su bcas pa/ smad
29b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yog ni stag gi sham thabs can/ nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /thams cad ces bya ba ni rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /nga la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /nyon zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig go /syat+the daM zhes bya
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni rig sngags ston pa'i tshig go /rig sngags zhes bya ba ni a sam ge la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ de
29b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid ni stong pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste/ de yang dang po byung yang de'i ngang las byung la/ bar du gnas kyang der gnas tha mar 'gag pa 'am thim pa yang de'i ngang las thim pa'i phyir ste chos kyi sku'o/ /yang de bzhin rtogs pa ste stong pa
29b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid spros bral rtogs shing rigs pa'i phyir te longs sku'o/ /yang de bzhin du gshegs pa ste/ mar me mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don la gshegs
29b6(rgyud 'grel): pas de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ sprul pa'i sku'o/ /mtshan dang zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /stobs dang ni stobs bcu'o/ /dbang phyug dang zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa brgyad dam gsum la dbang thob pa ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang
29b7(rgyud 'grel): lha 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro/ /byin gyis zhes bya ba ni stong chen mos byin gyis brlabs so/ /bdag la zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad phun sum
30a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i cho ga'i skabs te gsum pa'o// //sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas zhes bya ba ni/ seng ge'i sgra yin te/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags 'di'i
30a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra'o/ /thos zhes bya ba ni 'byung po thams cad kyis so/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag ces pa ni/ brgya byin dang dri za dang me lha dang gshin rje dang srin po dang chu lha dang rlung lha dang gnod sbyin dang/ dbang ldan dang tshangs pa dang sa'i lha mo'o//
30a3(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gdon dang/ klu'i gdon dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ rlung lha'i gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ mi 'am ci'i gdon dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ srin po'i gdon dang/ yi dags kyi gdon dang/ sha za'i
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ srul po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'i gdon dang/ skem byed kyi don dang/ rjed byed kyi gdon dang/ smyo byad kyi gdon dang/ grib gnon gyi gdon dang/ gnon po'i gdon dang/ ma mo'i
30a5(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang/ tsha mi ka'i gdon dang/ nam gru'i gdon dang/ me lha'i gdon dang/ nag po'i gdon dang/ nag po chen po'i gdon dang/ ri khrod kyi gdon dang/ zas su za ba'i gdon rnams so/ /de dag ni gtso bor gyur pa rnams so/ /bgegs rigs stong
30a6(rgyud 'grel): phrag brgyad cu'o/ /'jigs dang skrag dang dangs gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi byas pa'i phyir ro/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'khod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/
30a7(rgyud 'grel): skrag par 'gyur bas na thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni lhag ma rnams/ sngags 'khrugs rod rod por gyur nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ /stong phrag dang ni brgyad cu dang/ /de tsham dag ni nyi shu brgyad/ /sngags zhes bya ba ni/ dbugs ma thon
30b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ni dran pa stor ba'o/ /rod rod por gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rengs pa'o/ /rab tu 'byer byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ khros pa'o/ /phyogs bcur zhes bya ba ni so sor gcig la mi sdod par 'bros pa'o/ /sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed ces bya ba ni/ bred pa'i
30b2(rgyud 'grel): skad chen po 'don par byed pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'o/ /de shes na zhes pa ni mngon par shes pas 'byung po bred pa mthong ba'o/ /gsang ba gsum ni dam tshig ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i dam tshig chen po'o/ /yang dag par smra zhes bya ba ni/
30b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci ma log par 'byung po la smra ba'o/ /kye ma zhes bya ba ni/ ngo mtshar ba'o/ /ma ni rgyu ba'o/ /rig sngags zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /rig sngags che zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i lam ting nge 'dzin rdo rje lta bu'i thob pas che ba'o/ /stong chen zhes bya ba ni/
30b4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bskyed par byed pa'i yum chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /rab tu 'joms byed ces pa ni/ 'byung po la sogs pa bar du gcod pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsung thos pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba brgya phrag stong gis gsungs pa'o/ /thos nas 'byung po skrag par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i rig sngags kyi sgra thos
30b6(rgyud 'grel): na skrag pa'o/ /dper na rab tu 'bar ba'i me zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa chen po dus kyi me/ yang na ni me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du til gyi mar blugs pa lta bu'o/ /til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin zhes bya ba ni dper na nyin mtshan la
30b7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri sno mo nyi ma la bsregs nas til mar byug nas brgyab pas thams cad gcod pa bzhin du/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis kyang/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sdug bsngal gcod pa'i phyir ro/ /rig sngags spu gri'i so 'dra ba zhes pa
31a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dper na spu gris skra rnams rtsa ba nas 'dar? ba bzhin du bgegs thams cad phyir bud pa'i phyir ro/ /yang na ni rig sngags 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'gro ba ris drug gi rgyun bcad nas byang chub la dgang ba'i phyir ro/ /gau ta
31a2(rgyud 'grel): mas zhes bya ba ni drang srong go'u ta ma'i tsha bo yin pa'i phyir gau ta mar btags so/ /rab bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba'o/ /drang srong gis ni legs bshad pa zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma logs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa la zhes
31a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ bden pa'i tshig gis brgyan pa'o/ /de la gang zhig ma dad pa zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mi 'gro zhing lta ba log pa'o/ /de'i bu thu bo zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pa gang yin de'u bu thu bo
31a4(rgyud 'grel): che'o/ /tshangs pa'i zhags pa zhes bya ba ni dus kyi zhags pa'o/ /med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ dus kyi zhag pas bzung nas mchi ba'o/ /me ni rab tu 'bar byas la/ zhes bya ba ni/ dper na sbyin sreg mkhan pos me spar ba bzhin/ bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhi
31a5(rgyud 'grel): yang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rig drug gi gnas so/ /sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te zhes bya ba ni/ /sbyin sreg gi chus zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi chus ris drug gi tsha ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gtor te zhes bya
31a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni rim drug gi sems can la ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /nas dang yungs kar blangs nas su/ /mar gyi snying po dang spyar nas/ /me yi nang du blug par bya zhes bya ba ni/ dper na nas dang yungs kar dang 'dra ba gnod par
31a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i gdon rnams so/ /blangs pas su ni sbyin sreg mkhan pos lag par rdzas blangs pa dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis gnod byed kyi mi rnams bkug pa'o/ /mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ mar gyi snying po ni stong
31b1(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'i rig sngags so/ /sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu'o/ /me'i nang du blugs par bya zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa'i gdon rnams ting nge 'dzin gyis mes blangs nas/ ye shes kyi mes bsregs pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par gsungs
31b2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o/ /'di zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo'i rig sngags so/ /thos nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba rnams so/ /gal te myur du mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni/ chad pa dag gis gcod par byed/ /chang pa gang yin zhe na/ nar
31b3(rgyud 'grel): med par skye ba'o/ /thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' las 'das pa gang yin pa de lus la me 'bar ba'o/ /dper na mar dang yungs kar me blugs bzhin zhes bya ba ni dpe'o/ /de dag bde ba mi rnyed de zhes bya ba ni/ de dag
31b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bka' las 'das pa'o/ /bde ba mi rnyed ces bya ba ni/ mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal lo/ /gnod sbyin chad pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ nad chen po sna tshogs so/ /sdig pa ni sems can thams cad la'o/ /de yi rtsibs logs g.yas par ni/ 'bras chen nad kyang
31b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ bka' las 'das pa de la'o/ /yang na na gang gis gnod par byed pa de la'o/ /gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa ni sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pa'i gang zag de la
31b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa byas pas/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ gnod sbyin ku bai ras chad pa chen po bzhi bcad pa'i phyir ro/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/ gzhar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i bka' las 'gal byung na/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
31b7(rgyud 'grel): pho brang du 'ong mi ster ste/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis chad pas gcod par 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan dregs dang ldan pa yi/ /khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ zhes pa ni/ 'gro ba dang ci smos te/ mthong bar yang mi ster cing/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang ring po
32a1(rgyud 'grel): nas bkag pa'o/ /'byung po mang po tshogs pa na/ stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa ni/ gal te pho brang du 'ong bar 'gyur na/ bsdad sa med par skyes te/ 'byung po rnams kyis brnyas par byed de/ sdug bsngal mang po myong ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dag
32a2(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor du/ zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni 'ongs par gyur kyang mi ster te/ gal te sbyin yang lcags kyi rdog po dang/ me'i phung por mthong ba'o/ /de bas na lha dang mi dang yi dags
32a3(rgyud 'grel): pho la sogs pa yang/ rig sngags 'di'i bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /stong chen rab mjoms mdo sde la zhes bya ba ni/ sgrub pa po rten gyi gang zag la la zhig dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bar stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma/ rdo rje'i rig sngags 'di 'chang
32a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yid la byed pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ bshad pa de la/ gnod sbyin 'byung po'i bar chad byed pa de la/ spyi bo dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar na chad pa chen po
32a5(rgyud 'grel): bdun gcod pa'o/ /su yis gcod ce na rdo rje 'chang gis gcod pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'byung pos bar chad byed pa de la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i bka' las 'da' ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba rnams la bar chad byas na sdug
32a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad de'i lus la 'byung ngo/ /de la rdo rje 'chang khros te/ spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje 'khrugs te/ de'i stobs kyis 'byung po rnams la chad pa gcad pa'o/ /ci'i phyir chad pa gcod ce na/
32a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i rnam par smin pas a rdza ga'i dog pa bzhin du/ tshal? pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /spu gri so ni rtsub mo yis/ de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' las 'das pa dang/ lag na rdo rje'i ye shes kyi spu gris
32b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i lce gcod pa'o/ /mtshon cha shin tu rnon po yis/ /de yi sna dang rna ba gcod ces bya ba ni/ gong ma bzhin du/ de'i rnam smin gyis sna dang lce gcod pa'o/ /'khor lo spu gri mo 'dra bas/ glang pa rab tu gshegs par byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ nam mkha' nas las kyi 'khor lo 'byung
32b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ spyi bo nas lte ba'i bar du gcod pa'o/ /tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis/ /de yi snying la 'joms par byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ bar snang nas lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis/ bka' las 'das pas de'i snying ni 'joms pa'o/ /rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag/ de yi
32b3(rgyud 'grel): kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ don snying lnga la nad zhugs shing/ rnag dang khrag rtag tu 'dzag pa'o/ /rig sngags zhags pas 'ching ba yis/ /rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang nas yang du/ rig sngags kyi smod pa'i zhags pa
32b4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /las des rtag tu 'khor bar 'khyam pa'o/ /'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du/ /de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ de bas na 'di'i bka' las 'da' bar mi bya zhing/ /sems can la gnod pa mi bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas//
32b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di la gus pa'i gang zag skyong ba ste/ /rgyal po bzhi po dag gis ni/ /phyogs phyogs nas srung ba'o/ /chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te/ bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni/ /zhes pa ni/ byams dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms
32b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi go cha gyon pa/ seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs nas sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba ni/ /dri za'i ded dpon nyi shu brgyad dang ldan pa/ shar phyogs nas skyong ba'o/ /lho phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes po
32b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi ded dpon nyi shu brgyad dang ldan pa/ lho phyogs skyong ba'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni/ /klu'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pas/ nub phyogs skyong ba'o/ /byang phyogs nas ni lus ngan po zhes bya
33a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu brgyad dang bcas pas/ byang phyogs skyong ba'o/ /dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/ /rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten du dpal dang ldan zhing/ sde bo che spung bzhi'i bdag po ste/ de'i gzi
33a2(rgyud 'grel): brjid kyis gling bzhi khyab pa'o/ /phyin pa ni khyab pa'o/ /de'i tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen/ /bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang/ sems can gyi don la gnas pa ste/ nor bu rin po che dang 'dra
33a3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi lag mthil du shes pa/ sems can rnams la 'phags pa'o/ /tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang/ /de na rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs/ zhes bya ba ni/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pas tshangs pa ste/ gzhal med khang ni
33a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin/ lha'i sku'o/ /yang na gzhal med khang ni ri rab chen por snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/ /de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang gi nang na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin snang ba'o/ /de nas
33a5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar 'khor phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs chen rnams kyis gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /dpal
33a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyi nang med par gser gyi yon tan dang ldan te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe 'byed bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra zhing/ yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o//
33a7(rgyud 'grel): me tog pad+ma bzhin du brgyas/ /sa la'i pad+ma bzhin du rgyas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ zhal pad+ma bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan pa/ shing sa la bzhin du zil gyis non pa'o/ /nyi ma dang 'dra zla nya la/ /skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor zhing/ /zhes
33b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ dreg pa nyi ma lta bu ste/ 'jam pa ni zla ba nya'i 'od zer lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'khor rnam bzhi ni/ skar ma lta bu'o/ /thub sku gser gyi kha dog la/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sku gsung thub cing/ 'dzam
33b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe 'byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o/ /'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis/ /'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas ste zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs pas kyang//
33b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba nas sgrol ba/ stong gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal zhing bstod do/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/ zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum
33b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gtso bo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ phyogs skyong bcus kyang zhus pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis/ /rjes su brten pa ma thob ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
33b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi chos 'di/ yid bzhin nor bu rin po che 'dra ba ste/ 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis kyang 'di dang gzhan du mtshungs pa med pa'o/ /gang phyir 'di la sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing/ zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms
33b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lam 'di nas/ rin po che shel dang 'dra ba ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa gang yang 'byung ba'o/ /'di las nyan thos rnams kyang skye/ lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur/ zhes pa ni/ nam mkha' la char byung ba bzhin du/ 'di'i sgo nas gang
33b7(rgyud 'grel): yang 'byung ba'o/ /rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin/ /bram ze rnams kyang skye par 'gyur zhes bya ni/ rtag pa'i chos drug yin te/ de yang sngar bshad pa bzhin du lta ba drug go/ de rnams mthar phyin cing grol ba ste/ 'di'i sgo nas skye gnas bzang
34a1(rgyud 'grel): po bram ze'i rigs thob pa'o/ /drang srong skal pa chen po dang/ dge spyod bram ze 'di las skye zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgo nas lta ba thams cad 'byung pa'o/ /khyed cag snying las chud byed pa/ /mi yi skye dgu gdon par 'gyur/
34a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams/ /'jigs skrag byed pa/ mi rnams la byams pa dang/ snying rjer ldan pa'o/ /tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas/ 'jig rten skyong gis tshig smras pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i tshig thos nas/
34a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rnams la phyogs skyong ba bcu yis smras pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang ni thub chen po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang/ sems can thams cad bskyed pa'i ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i
34a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags 'di yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag gis ri rab bsgul byas shing/ zhes bya ba ni phung po'i gnas skabs so/ /ri rab de yi rgya dang ni/ 'phang dang grwa bzhi'i zur rnams dang/ zheng la khru bzhi 'phang la bzhi/ /mu khyud zur brgyad sho 'dra ba/ steng
34a5(rgyud 'grel): du dkyil 'khor legs par bris/ /sa tshon lngas ni yang dag tu/ /stong chen rab 'joms dkyil 'khor yang/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ /twa ra rnams bzhi rta babs rgyan/ dra byed ra ni chen la sogs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan
34a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo dang/ mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya/ /'bras sam bag phye la sogs pas/ /mkhas pa dag gis yang dag bya/ /ri rab gzugs ni sho 'dra pa/ /lha dang lha min 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de lta bu yi gnas bcas la/ /lha
34a7(rgyud 'grel): dang lha min 'byung po dang/ /de rnams la ni 'bul bar bya/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal po'i 'khor/ /blon po dang ni blon mo dang/ /gang dag de rnams gnod pa dang/ /'byung po yi dags sogs gnod dang/ /byang sems dang ni 'thor ba dang/ /ro langs rbod stong
34b1(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba dang/ /zos pa dang ni skyug pa dang/ /grib ma ngan dang ltas ngan dang/ bri nyes dang ni sgom nyes dang/ /smad nad dang ni nyin gcig dang/ /nyin gnyis gsum pa bzhi pa dang/ /nyin bdun zla phyed zla ba gcig/ nyin mo ba dang lung tsam dang/ ldab ldub pa dang 'byung
34b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ /mi yi rims dang mi ma yin/ /rlung dang mkhris ba pad kan dang/ /'dus pa bzhi 'gyur dag dang ni/ /de yi cho ga yang dag yin/ /nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhir gyur pa las/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /sngags btang ba dang bzlog pa dang/ /ma mo zor kha
34b3(rgyud 'grel): phur kha dang/ /gshin rje la sogs gang yang rung/ /de bzlog cho ga yang dag yin/ /shu ba g.yan pa mdze dang ni/ /phol mig gzhad nad 'bras dang ni/ /dong dang me dpal bzlog pa dang/ /sha bkra rmu chu khong nad dang/ /glad pa na ba la sogs dang/ /de yi cho ga yang
34b4(rgyud 'grel): dag yin/ /gtso bor gyur pa nyi shu brgyad/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag/ 'byung po rnams kyi cho ga yang dag bshad/ /ri rab la sogs bzhi dag la'ang/ dkar po dang ni mthing ka dang/ /dmar po dang ni ser po rnams/ /shar phyogs ngos nas
34b5(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin du/ /yang dag gis ni shes par bya/ /shar phyogs lha dang drang srong dang/ /dri za'i gdon rnams gza' dang bcas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag/ de rnams shar phyogs gdon rnams so/ /grul buM la sogs ma mo dang/ /srin po yi
34b6(rgyud 'grel): dags gdon rnams dang/ /lho phyogs la ni yang dag shes/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag/ de dag lho phyogs gdon rnams so/ /klu dang 'dab bzangs sa bdag dang/ /nub phyogs dag ni yang dag shes/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu
34b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad phrag/ de dag nub phyogs gdon rnams so/ /gnod sbyin pho mo la sogs dang/ /klu btsan la sogs gzhan rnams dang/ /byang phyogs dag ni yang dag shes/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag/ de dag byang phyogs gdon
35a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /shar lho lho nub nub byang dang/ /byang shar steng dang 'og dang ni/ /me yi don dang bden bral dang/ /rlung lha'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon/ tshangs pa la sogs pa bdag dang/ stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag/
35a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan drug la ni yang dag shes/ /stong dang 'og dang zur rnams su/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni shes par bya/ /bag phye dang ni 'bras phye 'am/ /gzugs ni sna tshogs mkhas par bya/ /ba dan dang ni rgyal mtshan dang gdugs dang me tog 'phreng ba dang//
35a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ /bu ram zho dang sgrang rtsi dang/ /me tog dkar po la sogs dang/ /sha dang khrag dang chang dang ni/ /nya sha sgog pa la sogs dang/ /me tog ser mo'i phreng ba rnams/ /'o ma kar mngar gsum dang/ /mar
35a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sman rnams dang/ /me tog dmar po dur ba'i phreng ba dang/ /chang dang sha dang khrag rnams dang/ /la phug la sogs me tog ljang khu'i phreng ba dang/ /dmar po nag po mthing ka dang/ /sna tshogs me tog phreng ba dang/ /me
35a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan tshangs pas bdag dang/ /sngon gyi rdzas la cha drug tu/ /yang dag gis ni shes rab la/ /mkhas pa'i sems la shes par bya/ /a kargu gul la sogs dang/ /sbrul gyi lpags pa nya mgo dang/ /yungs kar sgo
35a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bsres pa dang/ /ga pur bla rtse spang spos dang/ /tsan dan la sogs sbyar ba dang/ /tshil bu yungs kar bsres pa dang/ /de dag la ni spos phor ro/ /khu ba chan dang thug pa dang/ /de dag kun la shes par bya/ /rgya phibs bla res gdugs pa bcas/ /rgyal
35a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang/ /spos sbyar yang dag me tog dang/ /bu ram zhal zas sna tshogs dang/ /lhan cig sbyar ba'i dri rnams dang/ /de rnams la ni yang dag mchod/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms ma yang/ /pad+ma'i lte bar
35b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzhugs/ /de yi phyi rol ra ba la/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad zhes par bya/ /rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong dang/ /bza' dang skar ma la sogs la/ /'khor lo lha snaM sgo rnams la/ /mkhas pas yang dag shes par bya/ /lnga 'am gcig gam gang 'byor yang/ /gang ba'i
35b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bkra shis pa/ /lnga pa'i dbus su bzhag par bya/ /gser ram dngul la byas pa yi/ /'jim sogs rab gnas byas pa yis/ /mchod rten la ni mchod par bya/ /mtshams gcod yul 'khor srung ba dang/ /bkra shis la sogs gang yang rung/ /de bzhin
35b3(rgyud 'grel): du ni byas nas ni/ /the tshom med de yang dag yin/ /slob dpon lnga 'am gcig kyang rung/ /yang dag gis ni rims pa bzhin/ /'byung po rnams ni dgug par bya/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yang/ /phyogs bzhi'i mtshams su rgyun mi 'chad/ /slob dpon dgongs
35b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum ldan pas/ /dag ma 'dres par bzlas par byas/ zhes bstan pa'o/ /sa yang rnam par bzlog byas la/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs skyong ba bcus tshangs pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'o/ /stobs dang ldan zhing ri rab
35b5(rgyud 'grel): thogs par nus te/ sa gzhi yang 'khrugs par nus shing/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyang ldog par nus pa'o/ /rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams/ /rnam par sbyar ba nyid du bya/ zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs nas go rims bzhin du/ /phyi'i khor khor yug tsam bdag
35b6(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang du 'gyur te/ steng dang 'og tu yang de bzhin no/ /'jig rten khams de sbyong bar byed cing 'dul bas na sbyang ba'o/ /zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mdo sde zhags pas de dang de ldan pas yang 'dren pa'o//
35b7(rgyud 'grel): skar ma dang ni thams cad kyang/ /bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi smod mos zhags pas/ /smin drug la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams bcing ba'o/ /gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing/ 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu zhing/ /gnod pa skyel ba rnams la/ rig sngags kyi bcings pa lngas bcings pa'o/ /de dag la ni thams cad du/ phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i 'byung po rnams/ /phyogs bcu rnams
36a2(rgyud 'grel): su gnas pa'i sa med par/ /sdug bsngal drag po myong ba'o/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa te/ /'byung po rnams kyis phyir smod de/ zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po rnams/ /phyir 'gyed cing 'dor mi gtong
36a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'byung po mi yi skye dgu la/ gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ phung po lnga'i rang bzhin/ byang chub sems la gnod pa'o/ /gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang/ /rig sngags la ni 'da' byed pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la gus par byed
36a4(rgyud 'grel): cing dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed ces/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa rnams so/ /'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni/ pha rol gnon pa ston par byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
36a5(rgyud 'grel): mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'dis kyang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ston pa tsam gyis ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis stobs 'phrog pa'o/ /rig sngags la ni 'da' ba' i 'khor/ /kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te/ zhes pa ni phyag mtshan dang sku mdog
36a6(rgyud 'grel): ston pa ni/ ded dpon dag ni nyi shu brgyad/ /re re la yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o/ /'di dag gi ni sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ /dkar po dmar po ser po dang/ ljang khu dang ni mthing ka dang/ la la dkar ser dmar ser dang/ la la ser nag ljang
36a7(rgyud 'grel): nag dang/ mgo bo ser po mjug ma nag/ smad dkar stong gnag khra ba'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs gzugs te phyed gzugs so/ /lag na rdo rje 'khor lo sogs/ /gtun shing dang ni rtse gsum mo/ /la la ral gri lag na thogs/ /gtor ma ra dang mdung
36b1(rgyud 'grel): thung thogs/ /'phang mdung dang ni rar tsa dang/ /la la dbyug pa thogs pa dang/ /rtse gcig dang ni mdung rings thogs/ /mdung dang mda' gzhu lcags kyu dang/ /la la rda rings ga ge dang/ cha lar dang ni rol mo'i tshogs/ /pi wang gling bu glu len cing/ /gnod sbyin pho mo glu
36b2(rgyud 'grel): len cing/ /yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /rol mo'i tshogs ni la la byed/ /la la mi la blags gon pa dang/ /mi mgo lag na thogs pa dang/ /mi yi rgyu mas thod kyang byed/ /la la ni yi rus pa thogs/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang sna tshogs phyag mtshan dang/ /'byung po'i tshogs
36b3(rgyud 'grel): su shes par bya/ /sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i gnas ston pa'o/ /skya mnar bu ni ka ba na/ /grong khyer bzang na byang phyogs na/ bya rgod phung
36b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i rgyal po'i khab/ /rgya mtsho mdza' yi bar gyi sar/ /lan gsum bar du 'gro byed grong/ /mkha' lding rgyas pa sbed pa nas/ /rgyal khab dang ni ser skya'i gnas/ /shAkya'i tog na gar bltams par/ /sgra can dang ni tsinda na/ /gnyan yod dang ni gnas
36b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /rgya mtsho'i gnas dang yangs pa can/ /gyad yul dang ni g.yor 'dor dang/ /tsam pa yul dang 'jug go can/ /sgo drug dang ni zangs kyi 'dab ma can/ /brang gi 'gro na 'grog gnas dang/ /'bru mangs na ni mchog tu srung/ /srungs pa can dang gso
36b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mdza' / /snyen dga' grong khyer gnas dang ni/ /chu mchog na ni 'chi med zhag /rnga bzangs dang ni gci can dang/ /ri ldan grong khyer phyogs mtshams dang/ /'od ma'i 'gram dang ka lim ka/ 'gro 'joms dang ni mi thub gnas/ /mdun khab gnas dang
36b7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba brtsigs/ /rta dmar na dang ma rdzogs pa/ /snyems pa can dang ma rgyal gnas/ /gnas bcas dang ni zhi ba'i grong khyer dang/ /'jigs byed dang ni dbang 'gro dang/ /rdo grong dang ni shing gi grong khyer na/ /kha dog can dang tshangs par ldan/ /ba lang 'dzin
37a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo 'jog dang/ /'od srungs sel dang ri la gnas/ /ldan grogs dang ni hwo? nu'i dang/ /dga' ba dga' byed grong khyer na/ /rlung gi sa dang 'phyang 'gyur na/ /bcom rlag na dang lam ka dang/ /rab nyams dang ni mdzod 'dzin dang/ /rnam rgyal ldan dang bcom
37a2(rgyud 'grel): rlags na yang gnas/ /ma la ya dang rtse 'dzin dang/ /po 'dra na dang rab tu gnas /pi ta ma ka le dang ni rlabs ldan dang/ /sna nas thung dang gso ba'i mdza' / /dga' byed dang ni lag pa dang/ /pu mtshan dang ni mdzod 'dzin dang/ /pho brang ngan dang g.yog 'khor
37a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'gram ldan phung po grong khyer drug /mdza' ma na dang srung ba can/ /ba lang 'jog dang phyogs mtshams na/ /gdugs 'dra na dang grong khyer gsum/ /tshang tshing gcig dang u dum 'bar/ /ku'u sham b+hi zhi ldan na/ /sbrul gyi gdugs dang g.yo 'dzin
37a4(rgyud 'grel): na/ gyen du 'gro dang thob byed na/ /grong ldan tshol ba lang chen mdzod/ /lha yi g.yul dang g.yul 'phyed? ldan/ /dgra ngan zhing dang rgyal gnyis na/ /de nyid dang ni rab can dang/ /don grub grub dang don gnas dang/ /'gro 'joms dang ni sbom po nyid//
37a5(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i stobs dang sde po che/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi grong dang ni/ /tsam pa dang ni ri mangs dang/ /ba lang 'byor dang grong khyer dang/ /gnas dang khwa la ko sham b+hi/ /bzang po can dang dam pa can/ /'ching bu dang ni ma la ya/ /tshangs tshing gnas dang ma rgyal
37a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /chu mchog dang ni sem d+ha ba/ /'gro ldan dag dang ser skya'i gnas/ /gzhan snyas dang ni sgo gnas dang/ /dbu ma'i sde dang bzang mdzes dang/ /grong khyer snying dang mya ngan sa/ /khyus 'gro dang ni nga rgyal brag/ 'jig byed dang ni kha che'i yul/ /ral
37a7(rgyud 'grel): ba can dang grong dang ni/ /kha che'i yul gyi sa mtshams na/ /sa la gnas dang spu yi mtshan/ /dkyil 'khor bstan dang ka bu sha/ dga' ba'i tshad dang ni nam bsrung/ /ngan pa dang ni tho gar yul/ /grong bcas pa dang rgya mtsho gnas/ /grong khyer
37b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni spu yi gnas/ /gra mi ngar dang sid ga la/ ne btso bzhin dang 'og na gnas/ /punb+ha gar dang grong khyer che/ /'jigs pa bzhin dang chu dang ldan/ /rtogs po'i yul dang ka ta ka/ /'phral ring 'phral dang u rgyan yul/ /thong shong ngan dang mya ngan na/ /yo ga na dang
37b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' dang ldan/ /phung po'i dbang dang chung ma can/ /rgyal po'i khab dang yangs pa ni gnas te/ /dug sbrul dang ga lcang lo'i grong/ /dga' ba'i grong dang lha las babs pa dang/ /de dag ni 'byung po'i gnas bstan pa'o/ /sbrul gyi gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor
37b3(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyu ba'i 'byung bo rnams/ /nga'i bka' las ma 'das na/ /pho brang lcang lo can du skye ba thob pa'o/ /'di bshad pa 'di mi nyan pa/ /de dag 'chad bar bshad bya ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/
37b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' / /rig sngags kyi bden pa'i dmod mos rlag bar byed pa'o/ /tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde ste/ /sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas gnas pa/ /byang chub kyi sems
37b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /phan tshun du ni bltas byas na/ baiDUrya dang gser dngul dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ /'byung po rnams kyi gzhal yas khang/ /lta na sdug cing rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mu tig rnams
37b6(rgyud 'grel): dang shel dag dang/ /spug dang rdo yi snying po dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ mu tig dmar po dkar po 'dra ba byas pa/ sa gzhi dang rtsig pa shel las byas pa/ spug dang rdo'i snying pos ka? rten dang ka ba byas pa'o/ /rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /rtsibs stong kha
37b7(rgyud 'grel): dog gser 'dra ba'i/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ twa ra rnam bzhi ni gzhi gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis 'phra byas pa'o/ /shing rta rnam pa bzhis byas pa/ bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs seng
38a1(rgyud 'grel): ge'i shing rta dang/ /rta ra rnams bzhis mdzes pa'o/ /de bzhin du go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /glang po che dang/ rta dang/ ri dags shardu la'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mkha' la 'gro/ rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang na
38a2(rgyud 'grel): shing rta de dang ldan zhing/ nam mkha' la rgyu'o/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong/ /sa ni gser gyi phye ma la/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems kyis sprul pa'i gzhal yas khang dang 'dra ba na/ lta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang pa'o/ /me tog dag gis
38a3(rgyud 'grel): bkang byas nas/ /mgul bar ltung dang skur pa dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sa gzhi yang me tog gis bkang ba/ pho brang yang me tog gis snang ba ste/ 'byung po dang 'byung mo rnams/ me tog gi mgo la brgyan pa ste/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod pa'o//
38a4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dag kyang gdags byas la/ /phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pa'i/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang/ tshangs pa'i thag pas bcings te/ /sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba rnams la'o/ /'byung bo thams cad khrid shog ces/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni ded
38a5(rgyud 'grel): dbon kun/ /ces bya ba ni/ gnod pa byed pa'i 'byung po rnams/ /kun kyang zhags pas drang ba'o/ /phyogs bcu dag tu dgye bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'byung po rnams dgye ba'o/ /stong
38a6(rgyud 'grel): chen rab tu 'joms pa yi/ /mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di/ /zhes bya ba ni/ /seng ge'i sgra lta bus dam pa rnams kyi dam pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rab tu 'byung/ /lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsam/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos sku'i rang bzhin nam mkha' i 
38a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin thams cad khyab pa/ /sems can rnams kyi yum lta bu'o/ /stong chen mo'i lus kyis so/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyis kyang/ /ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /lus
38b1(rgyud 'grel): ngan po yi tshig thos nas/ gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon stong/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po sku bai ra'i tshig thos nas/ /gnod sbyin ded dpon stong phrag gnas pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su/ /gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo/ zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams
38b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /bka' stsal pa'i tshig snang ba'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /dri za las byung gdon gyi tshogs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa'o/ /dri za'i ded dpon gyi gdon phyogs der 'khod pa dag go/ shar phyogs cha na 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i
38b3(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas de dag kun/ /ces bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na gnod par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yis/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes lnga'i zhags pas
38b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdams pa ste/ /dri za'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rnams/ /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bka' stsal pa'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /grul bum las 'byung gdon gyi rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ thub pa ni yang dag par rdzogs
38b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'o/ /grul bum gyi ded dpon la sogs pa/ rig sngags dmod pa'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /lho phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde zhags pas de dag kun/ /ces bya ba ni/ lho phyogs nas glags
38b6(rgyud 'grel): tshol zhing sems can la gnod pa byed pa rnams/ /rig sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcings pa lnga yi bsdam pa yis/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gti mug la sogs pa de de'i bsdams
38b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bcings pa ste/ ma rungs pa'i gdon la sogs pa/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos 'dul ba'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni thub pas ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa/ klu'i ded dpon
39a1(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa/ nub des nas 'khod pa'o/ /nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i klu dang sa bdag la sogs pa/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcings pa lnga
39a2(rgyud 'grel): yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nub ngos nas glags tshol zhing/ sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis bcings pa bsdams nas/ /rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis klu'i gdon la sogs
39a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la chad pa bcod pa'o/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /gnod sbyin las ni gdon gyur pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pas ste/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams byang ngos na gnas pa'o/ /byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i
39a4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas de dag kun/ /ces bya ba ni/ byang ngos nas glags tshol zhing sems can la gnod par byed de/ /de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /
39a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon la sogs pa/ /ye shes lnga'i bcing bas bsdams te/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus chang pas gcod pa'o/ /lus ngan gyi ni bu thu po/ /kun tu rgyal pa mi la zhon/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded
39a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon sde po che rnams yin te/ 'dir yang gnod pa byed pa rnams so/ /de'i drung na 'khod pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag /ces bya ba ni rnam thos kyi bu che shos la 'khod pa'o/ /bcing pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas
39a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i bcings pas bsdams pas/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bsdams pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa/ /skyed pa po zhes rnam grags pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos kyi bu che shos
39b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'og mo'o/ /de'i drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ pu de'i 'khor ded dpon sde po che rnams so/ /bcings pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis sdams shing/
39b2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa/ /de yi ming ni gdon po che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos kyi bu mdza' ltag go /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sde po che/
39b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /bcings pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bsdams pa/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mos bcings pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa/ /de yi ming ni bum bu'i lto/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rnam
39b4(rgyud 'grel): thos sras kyi bu tha ma'o de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bu de'i 'khor ded dpon sde po che snams so/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang
39b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lngas bsdams shing/ rig sngags kyi zhags pas bsdams pa'o/ /dbang phyug chen po lha chen po/ /lag bzhi pa la stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ g.yas gnyis na tri shul dang/ bum pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis na phreng pa dang
39b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin mdzad pa/ /stobs dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa khams gsum la dbang byed pa'o/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ded dpon du gnas shing/ sde che
39b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /bcings pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsdams shing/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bsdams pa'o/ /'byung po 'joms pa'i ri la ni/ /'byung po
40a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lha gnas su/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ris mi gcig pa'i gdon thams cad gnas pa'o/ /'joms pa ni rig sngags kyis 'joms pa'o/ /rig sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rig sngags 'di ni kun tu bsam/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin thams cad la khyab pa/ /sems can dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed pa'i yul lta bu'o/ /chad pa mi bzang drag po ste/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa ma 'ongs pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs
40a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa/ dmod mo'i chad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus par ni/ thams cad 'di la skyabs su 'dod/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'dod zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dam pa'i chos rig sngags
40a4(rgyud 'grel): la gus pa'o/ /g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shing/ /thams cad med par gyur ta re/ zhes bya ba ni/ rdzun mi smra bar sems can mi slu bas te/ stong pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'o/ /de nas thod cig tsam gyi ni/ 'byung po mang po thams cad lhags/ /zhes bya ba ni/
40a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sna tshogs su snang ba'i 'byung po rnams kyang/ rig sngags kyi ye shes zhags pas drangs nas/ phyogs bzhir snang ba'o/ /ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang/ /rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i gnas ni de rnams dang
40a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o /rlung dang 'bab chu lu ma dang/ rba klong dag dang gang 'khod dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dang ldan pa'i gnas su bsdad cing/ /sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /skyes mes tshal dang gzhal med khang/ /kun dga' dang ni nags rnams
40a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams dang gnas gcig tu mi gnas te/ gzug sna tshogs su snang ba'o/ /mchod rten gnas dang grang gis gnas/ /shing ljon drung na gang gnas dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dang de la gnas shing/ /'jig rten
40b1(rgyud 'grel): khams su rgyu ba'o/ /grong khyer sgo dang grong rnams dang/ grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po chen gcig ni grong dang grong khyer rnams su rgyu zhing/ sems can rnams la glags tshol ba'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang/ gzhal med khang dang gnas pa dang/
40b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ tshan gcig yang rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa rnams/ /gnas der bsdad cing glags tshol ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang/ de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ tshan gcig ni lha khang snying pa la chags shing dge ba la bar
40b3(rgyud 'grel): chod byed pa'o/ /mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang/ /khang stong dang ni gram sa dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i gnas su bsdad cing/ /gzugs mi gcig par snang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang/ /phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams
40b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams nas/ zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de dang ldan pa ni/ phyogs mtshams brgyad du gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni/ /rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong phrag de dang de yod pa/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung
40b5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su/ /la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs/ zhes bya ba ni/ sgra la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin rnams bsam gyi mi khyab par snang ba'o/ /pi wang gling bu khar ba'i rnga//
40b6(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen dag ni sgra 'byin te/ /zhes bya ba ni/ tshan cig yang rol mo la dga' zhing/ /sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang/ glu dang gar rnams byas nas su/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams slu ba'o/ /dbang po
40b7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba chu lha dang/ ba ra d+har? dza skye dgu'i bdag ces pa ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sum cu rtsa gnyis su gnas shing/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung bdag go/ ma ldan pa dang kun tu ldan/ /mngon shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams yang 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i ster bcas shing/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba'o/ /tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang/ /ma gul ba mdzes dang mgul mdzes dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don byas shing/ rig sngags la gus pa'o//
41a2(rgyud 'grel): skye dgu'i bla mar 'gyur ba dang/ lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi tshan de dang der ldan zhing/ /nam mkha' dang sa steng 'og tu rgyu ba'o/ /dri za sna tshogs de dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sde bo cher
41a3(rgyud 'grel): grags shing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin phung po lnga zhes bya/ /g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ /yud tsam gyis stong gsum khyab pa'o/ /nya lcibs dang ral gri bu/ /kun gnyis bshes dang grags 'dzin dang//
41a4(rgyud 'grel): //zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po sde tshan de dang ldan pa/ /ral gri bzhin du rno ba'o/ /'brog gnas dang ni yid bzangs dang/ /khab sna dang ni ri sul dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sde bo che nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ de rnams yang gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o//
41a5(rgyud 'grel): rnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzangs dag /sde dang dpung dang bzhon pas byas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan pa sde bo cher grags pa'o/ /lha dang klu dang dri za dang/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po lha ma yin/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gdon rigs mi cig pa lha'i gdon la
41a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /nyin gsum pa'i smyo byed dang/ de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad sna tshogs gtong zhing smyo bar byed pa rnams yin te/ /de rnams yang gzhan gyis mi thub pa stobs dang ldan pa'o//
41a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'tsho ba gang yin pa/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis rgyu ba/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi
41b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni bkug nas su/ /bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams la/ /ye shes lnga'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon pa'i spyan mnga' ru/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad smras/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po
41b2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs sa'i sangs rgyas kyis spyan sngar/ /gus par byas nas zhus pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi 'joms pa la/ /dpa' ba/ skyes bu mtshan
41b3(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang pos sku la brgyan pa/ sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba/ snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung
41b4(rgyud 'grel): po de rnams kyi zhabs la gus par phyag 'tshal te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/ chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gi mdun du rgyug pa/ 'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che/ zhes bya ba ni/ che ba ri rab dang mnyam pa/ chung
41b5(rgyud 'grel): ba bas sdu'i rtse mo tsam/ /de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams rgyu ba'o/ /lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/ /rkang mngas dang ni rkang gcig dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mnga' dang gzhu dang ral gri mdud rnams thogs pa/ stong tsho gcig gi rkang pa yod pa/ rkang
41b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig ni gnyis sprel nas rgyu ba'o/ /rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang rkang pa bsgreng la spyi gtsug dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po yang spyi bo'i gtsug gis 'gro zhing/ sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du rkang pa ni
41b7(rgyud 'grel): rkang gnyis kyang 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /lus mngas mgo bo gcig pa dang/ lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs che zhing 'jigs su rung ba bzhin mi sdug pa rnams so/ /mig mngas po la lus phyed dang/ /mig gcig lto ni
42a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rkang gcig lag gcig lus su snang zhing/ lus de la mig mang po yod pa ste/ 'byung po gzhan yang lto ba ri bo lta bur gnas pa/ mang po bsdebs pa mig gcig tu snang ba'o/ /bod bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/
42a2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa bsgreng la mgo sdud dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs mi'i gzugs la mgo bo sna tshogs su snang ba/ /rkang pa dang lag pa bsgreng bar byed pa'o/ /mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag /mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de kun gyi yan lag
42a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri dang/ mnga' gzhu dang mdud la sogs par snang ba'o/ /zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyis so/ /zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag ces bya ba ni/ shin tu dmar ba 'jigs su rung ba ste/ mtshon cha bzhin du snang ba'o/ /zangs kyi thob
42a4(rgyud 'grel): brkang pa dang/ zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon cha mi 'jigs pa 'dzin pa/ rkang pa yang tho ba'i tshul tu gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du kha la sogs pa yang/ /zangs kyi skra bzhin du snang ba'o/ /rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba
42a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ me bzhin du 'bar te/ des kyang mi la zhe sdang la sogs pa 'bar bar byed pa'o/ /sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa/ mig mi sdug pa kha glel ba zhes bya ba ni/ bong thung zhing lus po sgur
42a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ de'i ske la lba ba gsum yod pa/ /lus po zha zhing kha gdang pa/ mchu sngon por snang ba 'jigs pa'o/ /chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/ /gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i lus la mgo brnyan du yod pa/ kha gdangs
42a7(rgyud 'grel): shing mi sdug pa'o/ /mchu 'phyang po dang so yon po/ /rab tu sdug pa'i khro nyer can/ /gdong pa ya ba/ de bzhin du mchu dang so yo ba'o/ /khro bar gnas shing sems can la 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /gsus po che dang bum sna bo/ /rna 'phyangs po dang
42b1(rgyud 'grel): rna ba med ces bya ba ni/ gsus pa ri tsam snang/ rna ba gos su gon pa/ rna ba bcas pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /lag rings dang ni rna ba ring/ /sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring zhes bya ba ni/ /lag pa brkyang pas dpag tshad brgyar slebs te/ snas lus khebs te glang
42b2(rgyud 'grel): po che'i sna dang 'dra ba/ /de bzhin du sor mo yang ring pa'o/ /lus bskams lus ni ring ba dang/ /skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu nag pa/ shing lpags gyon pa 'dra/ ring ba ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring ba lus rnams kyang skra ring ba
42b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'o/ /rkang pa ming pa phra ba dang/ dri nga ba dang bum lto'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yan lag gi tshigs rdog por yod pa/ rkang pa phra bas te/ dri mi zhim pa rnam pa/ gsus pa ri bo tsam yod pa'o/ /yan lag tu srin 'dra ba dang/ gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i
42b4(rgyud 'grel): lto zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa dang rkang pa yang chu srin 'dra ste/ gzugs ring pa/ rked pa nyag pa/ nar por snang pa'o/ /gnam lto ba dang rna bo che/ /gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar zhes bya ba ni/ sna yar 'khyil pa glang po che'i sna 'dra ba/ /khab kyi rtse mo dang 'dra
42b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skra dmar bzhing 'bar ba'o/ /mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po/ /rked pa sgur po bum lto bo zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po la la ni gzhu bzhin du rked pa sgur bas te/ de bzhin du yan lag dang lus po rnams kyang sgur pa'o/ /ri rab rtse mo brgul
42b6(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /me 'dag gi ni char ba 'bebs zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid dang/ /stobs dang ldan zhing/ ri rab dang sa g.yo bar byed pa ma rungs pa'i char 'bebs pa'o/ /ljon shing ri dang stong pa dang/ /sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni//
42b7(rgyud 'grel): la la gzugs bzang bar gnas pa/ gzhan rnams yang bzhin mi sdug pa'o/ /dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang/ /grul bum rnga bran rnams kyi sgra/ /zhes bya ba ni/ skra dang rol mo la dga' ba gar sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu
43a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byin/ /ming po che la bung bu'i sgra zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gling bzhir thos pa'i sgra/ sgra des sems can 'jigs pa'o/ /nag po sngon po ser po dang/ /dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa gzugs sna tshogs su
43a2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba/ bskal pa'i me'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer snang ba'o/ /khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri skra/ /dmar po'i khrag gis bskus pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu rno ba lus dang mgo rnams la khyab pa/ kha yang khrag gis bskus pa'o/ /mi ro dag ni khyer
43a3(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /za bzhin tu ni rnam par rgyug ces bya ba ni/ mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa rnams yin te/ glags tshol zhing 'phrang kha sgrugs pa rnams yin no/ /so rnon lag pa dmar po dang/ mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang zhes bya ba ni//
43a4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba ring ba/ mtshon 'dra ba ste/ sems can rnams kyis lag pa dmar por snang ba/ khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba'o/ /lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang/ /mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed
43a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ sha dang khrag la dga' ba dang/ don snying lnga la dga' ba'o/ /snying pa shin tu bkang ba dang/ /byin pa dag ni za bzhin du/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi rnams kyis ni srog phrogs nas don snying rnams pa lnga phyung nas za bar byed pa'o/ /mer mer po dang srog chags kyi
43a6(rgyud 'grel): rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems chags su mi ster bar za ba/ ma'i mngal nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su skye bo mang po skrag par byed ces bya ba ni/ lpags pa dang sha med pa dang rus par?
43a7(rgyud 'grel): snang te/ de lta bu'i gzugs kyis kyang 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi/ mi'i pags pa thogs nas su/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams kyi khrag 'jib cing/ /mi'i pags pa gon pa'o/ /mi zad dug gis kun bkus te/ phyogs
43b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyugs ces bya ba ni/ bsam pa dang/ mthong ba dang regs pa dang/ mtshe ba'i dug rnams bskus pa/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyug pa'o/ /grong khyer rnams kyi sgo rnams dang/ /khyim nas khyim du rnam par mthong
43b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la glags 'tshol ba/ grong dang grong khyer grong rngal tu rgyu ba'o/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/ phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi mdze dang phol mig la sogs pa nad bzhi
43b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa bzhi gtong ba'i bdag po'o/ /de ltar de la rgyal po yi/ /gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po gnas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'byung po'i gdon de rnams 'dul ba'o/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang/ /rig sngags zhags pas rab
43b4(rgyud 'grel): tu bdams zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyis/ 'byung po rnams rang dbang med par bkug pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma rigs pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa
43b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba la dpa' ba' o/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang pos sku la brgyan pa/ 'jig rten khams kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du byed pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod
43b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gsungs par phyag 'tshal te/ /stong gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o/ /grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang/ /pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus
43b7(rgyud 'grel): tshod ni/ snga dro shar gyi phyogs na rgyu/ /nyi ma phyed na lho na rgyu/ /nyi ma smyur nas nub kyi phyogs su rgyu/ /nyi ma smyur nas ma nub par du byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/ nyi ma nub nas sa sros bar du shar lho mtshams su rgyu/ srong 'khor nam byed bar du srin po'i phyogs
44a1(rgyud 'grel): nas rgyu/ nam phyed skya rengs tshun chad nub byang phyogs nas rgyu/ skya rengs shar nas nam langs tshun chad byang shar mtshams nas rgyu/ de dag dus rgyu ba ni mchod phyir ltags kyang 'tshe ba med/ tshes grangs dag la rgyu ba rnams/ /de dag mi la 'tshe bar byed/
44a2(rgyud 'grel): tshes gcig dang ni bcu gcig la/ shar gyi phyogs nas chu tshod bzhi'i bar du rgyu/ tshe gnyis dang bcu gsum la lho'i phyogs nas chu tshod brgyad rgyu/ tshes gsum dang bcu gnyis la chu tshod bcu'i bar du rgyu/ srod 'khor tsam/ tshes bzhi dang bcu bzhi la nam
44a3(rgyud 'grel): phyed nas chu tshod drug byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/ tshes lnga dang bcu drug la ni nyi ma dros nas shar lho mtshams nas chu tshod bdun rgyu ba'o/ /tshes drug dang dgu la chu tshod sum cu tham pa lho nub mtshams nas snga dro nas rgyu'o/ /tshes bdun dang bcu tham pa'i
44a4(rgyud 'grel): dus su nub byang mtshams nas snga dro nas chu tshod bco lnga la rgyu'o/ /tshes brgyad dang gnam stong la byang shar nas snga dro nas chu tshod bcu gnyis bar du rgyu'o/ /de dag ni 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'o/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ snying
44a5(rgyud 'grel): rje med cing khrag 'thung ba zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa ste/ 'byung po de rnams sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o/ /lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/ stobs po che la sgra yang che zhes bya ba ni/ lus ni ri rab dang mnyam
44a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ stobs kyis ni ri rab sgul ba/ skad yang drag po'i tshul du snang ba'o/ /mgrin bcu po la mig stong por/ gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mgo re re la mig brgya brgya yod pa ste/ mig de yang dmar por snang zhing 'jigs su rung
44a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa mang por snang zhing/ ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha mang po thogs pa'o/ /sprul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang/ lag bzhi lag
44b1(rgyud 'grel): na sgron me thogs zhes bya ba ni/ dug sgrul gyi pags pa gon pa/ mi gsal bar byed pa kha nas me 'bar zhing 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /lag na mtshon thogs dbyig pa thogs/ /rdo rje'i mdud rtse lag na thogs zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang/ lag na
44b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon sna tshogs thogs shing/ 'jigs su rungs pa'o/ rab tu drag pa'i dmag rgal nas/ /phyogs bcu kun tu skrag par byed ces bya ba ni/ dpung mang po dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu dag tu 'khod pa ste/ /de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang
44b3(rgyud 'grel): skrag par byed pa'o/ /sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ gsang ba po ni dang kun yang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la sdang ba/ rgya cher gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes ba bud med gzhan yang 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi mi rnams la
44b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po de rnams kyis 'tshe bar byas pa'o/ /sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/ rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ mi rnams kyis srog gcod cing sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/ /ma he ba glang bong bu rnga zhes bya ba ni/
44b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mi gcig pa byol song rnams kyi gzugs su sprul pa'o/ /glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang/ /dom dang gzig dang spyang gi dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i gzugs su snang zhing/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /khyi dang wa dang
44b6(rgyud 'grel): ra dag dang/ byi la byi ba spri'u gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i dus su gcan gzan gyi gzugs su sprul pa'o/ /bse dang phag dang bsre mong dang/ nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyang sna tshogs su snang ba/ rmi lam
44b7(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin du snang ba'o/ /kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/ /khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i gzugs su snang zhing gnod pa cher skyel ba'o/ /bya rgod khra dang nya ming bcas/ /rma bya dang pa thi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i gzugs 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): su ston cing/ skad mi gcig pa mang po 'don pa'o/ /khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang/ /kha gcig bya gag gzugs rnams su/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ ltas dang rmi lam ngan par byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis
45a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /'dab bzang bya yi tshul gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs ston pa/ sems can rnams la skrag par byed pa'o/ /skye bo mang po skrag par byed cing bya ba ni/ skyes pa bud med byis pa rnams la skrag par byed pa'o/ /kha cig ni mi yi
45a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo can la/ /lus ni bya gag bung po 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po rnams kyang/ mi'i mgo can la byol song gi lus so/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang bral ba nyid du snang zhes bya ba ni/ sna tshogs mtshon gyis 'tshe zhing/
45a4(rgyud 'grel): khrag khrug la dga' ba'o/ /rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas rab tu dkris zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing sems 'khrugs par byed pa ste/ yan lag mi'i rgyu ma'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /rtse gsum
45a5(rgyud 'grel): mdud gis rab 'debs shing/ /srog chags rnams la gnod par byed ces bya ba ni/ /'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po de dag yang snying rje dang bral ba'o/ /mi zad pa'i dbugs 'byin cing/ /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed ces bya ba ni/ ske ba che zhing skad
45a6(rgyud 'grel): che ba ste/ sgra des sems can rnams krag pa'o/ /srog chags rgyud rnams ji snyed par/ /sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang zhes bya ba ni/ nya la sogs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su snang zhing/ gzugs mi gcig pa mang po snang ba'o/ /kha cig dag
45a7(rgyud 'grel): ni ri yang thogs/ /la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing ri rab thegs par nus pa/ mtshon rnon pos 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te/ dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha dog drag po zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung
45b1(rgyud 'grel): po rnams sde chen por gnas shing sems can rnams la chad pa chen po gcod pa'o/ /mig chung ba la bzhin mi sdug /srin po'i so ni rno ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa kha dang so rnams yod pa'o/ /sna dang rna ba gcad pa dang/ lce gcad gdong ni gnyer
