45b2(rgyud 'grel): ma can zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs ngan par snang zhing/ dbang po rnams ma tshang ba'o/ /rkang lag dang ni tubs pa dang/ /mgo bo gcad pa'i srin bu rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mgo bo med par brang nas gdong pa snang bas te/ tshigs rnams la yang gdong pa snang ba'o//
45b3(rgyud 'grel): skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/ sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog ces bya ba ni sems can rnams la glags tshol zhing/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi dpal 'phrog pa'o/ /mi yi lus rnams dag la ni/ rab tu phra ba'i gdon du
45b4(rgyud 'grel): snang zhes bya ba ni/ /mi yi lus la zhugs nas mi dga' i sems dang/ lceb pa'i sems dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /spu yi bar dang nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su zhes bya ba ni/ ba spu'i bar du 'dzin cing/ rma med pa rma yod par byas te/ rma'i
45b5(rgyud 'grel): nang rul bar byas nas/ phyi sums nas nang na/ tsha chen po dang ldan par byed do/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang/ /rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o/ /phyag
45b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/
45b7(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten khams chos srid du mdzad cing/ stong gsum gyi chos kyis rgyal por snang ba'o/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams na 'dod yon lnga la spyod pa bzhin/ 'byung po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas spyod do//
46a1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar spyod ce na/ gzugs mthong bas mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ sgra snyan po thos nas 'dzin pa dang/ dri zhim po tshor nas 'dzin pa dang ro zhim po myangs nas 'dzin pa dang/ lus rig pas 'dzin pa dang/ de dag kyang gang na gnas she na/ ri rab 'khor
46a2(rgyud 'grel): yug la gnas nas 'dzin pa'o/ /de bzhin 'khor ra 'khor yug dang/ bya rgod phung po gshol 'da' 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab nas/ phyi'i 'khor ra 'khor yug la thug pa'i ri bo chen po la gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /de bzhin du
46a3(rgyud 'grel): bya rgod phung po dang/ ri bdun la sogs pa'o/ /spos dang ldan dang gangs kyi ri/ /sna tshogs sde dang paN+Da ba zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i ri rnams so/ /na la da yi ri gnyis dang/ dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i
46a4(rgyud 'grel): gling gi lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /gang dag shin tu mthong 'phags dang/ /ri bo de dag kun la yang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin rnams tshogs shing/ 'byung po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'o/ /lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa/ /de dag thams cad
46a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dga' zhing zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms ma'i gzi brjid kyis/ ri rab de rnams na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams yid mi dga' ba'o/ /'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed/ /bye ba stong gi lha dag dang/ bye ba phrag brgya'i lha
46a6(rgyud 'grel): dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'dar zhing gyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa'o/ /lha yi bu mo skal chen dang/ thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'jigs pas gus par sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//
46a7(rgyud 'grel): thad bzangs ris dang sgra gcan dang/ /tshim par byed pa 'ang der phyin to zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po la sogs pa yang/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos bkug ste/ gus par sangs rgyas la 'dud pa'o/ /lha min bye ba phrag stong dang/ lha min
46b1(rgyud 'grel): bye ba phrag brgya dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang lha ma yin gyi grangs/ 'byung po la gtogs pa rnams so/ /de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa/ /mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyar zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bu mo la sogs pa yang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ sangs rgyas
46b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o/ /rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang/ sa 'og dang nam mkha' la rgyu zhing/ /ma rungs pa'i klung dang sa bdag rnams dang/ rigs bzhir gnas shing phyogs bcu dag tu 'khod pa'o/ /klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang
46b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og na gnas pa ste/ de'i 'khor sha za dang 'byung po rnams yod de/ mi'i dri tshor ba tsam yis mdangs 'phrog pa'o/ /klu'i gnod pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /klu yi rgyal po ma gros pa dang/ dga' bo snyan dga' gnyis po dang zhes
46b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'khod pa'o/ /rdo rje blo gros bag shu dang/ /gang dag dga' bo sin du mtsho zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang mtsho ma gros pa la gnas shing/ gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par rgyu ba'o//
46b5(rgyud 'grel): bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzangs dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i rgya mtsho gting na gnas pa rnams yin te/ /de rnams sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'khod pa'o/ /stong phrag bye ba'i klu rnams dang/ /bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang zhes bya ba
46b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de rnams kyi 'khor du bcas pa sa bdag klu dang bcas pa rnams so/ /de dag bu mo skal chen rnams/ /thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed ces bya ba ni/ klu'i bu mo de yang grangs de dang ldan par gnas shing/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o//
46b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma zla ba gnyi ga yang/ /skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bar snang du rgyu zhing/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'khod pa'o/ /gser gyi me tog yan lag na/ /ma ga d+ha na 'jigs byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnod sbyin
47a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rnams/ /'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing/ rig sngas kyi dmod mos 'khod pa'o/ /gsol ba'i tha na mi thod can/ /ko sa la na rab tu dkar zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha na gnas shing/ stong gsum rgyu ba'o/ bzang po'i yul na kha
47a2(rgyud 'grel): spu can/ /gyang kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin/ ces bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam+bu'i gling gi nub phyogs su gnas shing/ sems can rnams la 'tsho bar byed pa'o/ /rnga 'dzin pa dang skrag byed pa/ d+ha skye ba na mig dmar gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i gnas de dang ldan
47a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ sems can la gnod par byed par grags pa'o/ /srung byed pa na ser skya ste/ sems dpa' na ni mig ser po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon gnas de na gnas shing/ skad gcig mas thams cad rgyu ba'o/ /pe'u pan na bum pa'i lto/ /dga' 
47a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yul na ring por skyes zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dang ldan zhing gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa la rgyu ba'o/ /ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms/ /dud yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o/ /ljongs chen rnams kyi
47a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin ni/ /brjod pa bcu drug de dag la zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po gnas can du gnas pa/ /grags pa dang ldan pa/ /rig sngags kyi zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje gnad sbyin che/ /chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab rtse mo la gnas
47a6(rgyud 'grel): shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o/ /ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug dang/ /bum lto gsus pa gsum po dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams yang ri rab kyi khod song lto ngas na gnas shing/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnod par byed pa'o/ /chu srin bden
47a7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'chang ba dang/ ? ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang lto'i 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing/ gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par rgyu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che/ /lag pa bzhin can stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ ti se'i
47b1(rgyud 'grel): gang la gnas shing/ sems can rnams la mchod par 'os pa'o/ sde ba rab tu 'du ba ni/ mthu bo che la stobs po cha zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de dang der ldan pa ni/ stong gsum rgyud de rig sngags kyi zhags pas 'dren pa'o/ /gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang/ bdud rnams
47b2(rgyud 'grel): sde dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang/ bdud kyi lha rnams yang 'dren pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba/ /gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi mi rnams la gnod pa skyal zhing gzi brjid dang
47b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phrog pa'o/ /shA ri ta ni sder bcas dang/ ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma zhes bya ba ni/ /de yang gzi brjid che zhing sa la gnas pa'o/ /gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ /gnod sbyin srin mor grags pa dang/ ma'i
47b4(rgyud 'grel): mngal nas bu 'phrog pa'o/ /gdol pa mo ni gtum mo yang/ /bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa'o/ /mi sdug nag po karka te/ /pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mo de rnams yang/ rig
47b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dmod mos sdod par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khong pa'o/ /me tog so dang sa ga dang/ /srin mo bong bu'i sna can dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo de rnams lho phyogs na gnas shing sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /tsan dan dang ni khyab
47b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug len/ seng ge ser skya dmar ser po zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du gnas pa/ byis pa'i gdon bco lnga'i gtso bo rnams so/ /glang po klu yi so can dang/ /ri shes drag po'i mche ba can zhes bya ba ni/ de dang de ldan zhing sems can
47b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /srin mo so bzangs yod pa dang/ tshangs pas len dang khyab 'jug len zhes bya ba ni/ ming der grags pa sems can la gnod pa/ skad gcig mas gling bzhir rgyu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang/ /gnod sbyin rnam
48a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchu can dag ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'di dag yang/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang du gnas shing/ /rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing/ /mi rta ba lang ri dags zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs
48a2(rgyud 'grel): shing/ sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dod zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la glags tshol zhing srog 'phrog pa rnams so/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed/ /nags tshal rnams kyang
48a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu skems zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab 'bul bar byed cing/ rgya mtsho yang skems par byed pa'o/ /ri rnams kun yang g.yo bar byed/ /skye dgu 'di dag 'che byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ che'i bar chod byed sems can rnams la 'jigs skrag byed pa'o/ /phan
48a4(rgyud 'grel): tshun nas ni 'du ba dag /rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags zhes bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams la/ rig sngags kyi bcing ba lnga dmod mo'i zhags pas bsdams pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu
48a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog khyod la zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ gus pas phyag 'tshal nas bstod pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi
48a6(rgyud 'grel): ? chen po'i chos srid mdzad cing/ dam pa'i chos kyis rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi so so rang rang gi sgo nas/ chos  
48a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung pos smras pa'i don de gnas so/ /rgyal po chen po rnams thos bus/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/ /rgyal po
48b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnam thos sras kyis zhus pa'o/ /bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su/ /rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi byang phyogs na mnga' mdzad cing/ byang phyogs skyong bar byed pa'o/ /lcang lo ldan pa yid du mchi/ de bas bdag gi lcang lo'i bdag ces bya ba ni/ lta na
48b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug cing mdzes par snang ba'o/ /yid du 'ong bar gnas so/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/ /lha rnams kun gyis bsam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ las kyis lhas byin gyis brlabs pa/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du snang ba'o/ /phyir shin tu mthon po can
48b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa lags zhes bya ba ni/ rin po che bdun las byas pa/ rgya phibs dang ldan pa/ bdun thog yod pa'o/ /'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste/ gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags zhes bya ba ni thog re re la dpag tshad bcu drug bcu drug ste/
48b4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna bdun gyi 'phra byas pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi lcog ni re re la'ang/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dag ces bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa phyogs re re nas srung mar snang ba'o/ /kun nas kun tu rnam par 'gyur/ lag na mtshon cha lags par sprul zhes
48b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang po gnas shing/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo/ bzhi pa bstod pa bgyis pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes pa/ rgyan rnams bzhis lta na sdug pa'o/ /gcig ni gser las bgyis
48b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo/ gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ thog re re la yang sgo bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags/ /bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa bzhin du rin po che rnams kyis byas pa'o/ /grong
48b7(rgyud 'grel): khyer de yi nad dag na/ /skyes mos tshal gyi me tog rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ rdzing bu dang/ me tog gi ra ba chu las skyes pa dang/ thang las skyes pas brgyan pa'o/ /de yi nad na gzhal med khang/ /rin chen sna bdun sna tshogs mchis zhes bya ba ni/ gnod
49a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin po rnams spyod pa byed pa'i gzhal yas khang snang ba'o/ /rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing dang/ bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin ces bya ba ni/ de'i skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bur/ khrung khrung dang khu byug la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyi skad kyis
49a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'o/ /me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram/ /sna tshogs spos kyi byug pas legs zhes bya ba ni/ chu dang thang las skyes pa'i me tog ku mu ta dang paN+Da ri ka la sogs pas brgyan pa/ /yan lag brgyad dang sbyar ba'i pog phor dang
49a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mo ni 'joms ma dang/ /klu dang rol mos rab tu brgyan ces bya ba ni/ lta na sdug pa rgyags ma dang ldan pa sha stag rnams kyis/ /rol mo sna tshogs la spyod pa'o/ /dpal gyi dam pa nyams su myong/ /der ni
49a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor der zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phun sum tshogs pa de rnams la spyod pa'o/ /gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag /rnams pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du
49a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba'o/ /chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bka' nyan nas/ /mi la sogs pa sems can gang la yang gnod pa mi skyel cing sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'o/ /srogs chags
49a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid/ /zas dang skom gyis mi 'brel te zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la dga' zhing/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o/ /skye dgu mi zad gzhan dag ni/ /longs spyod chen por 'tshal bgyid cing
49a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i tshogs rnams la phrad par dga' zhing/ /phun gsum tshogs par byas nas skyong bar byed pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lta/ /grong khyer sgo gam g.yo ba dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi nas
49b1(rgyud 'grel): srung zhing/ de rnams mtho bar dga' ba'o/ /bzang shing ra ba nags tshal na/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ gang dang gang du gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams la rig sngags 'di'i dmod mos 'khod pa'o/ /bya ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa
49b2(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad mdo sde yi/ /zhags pas drangs te klag par bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang rung ba gnod pa rnams la/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni/ chos kyi rgyal po gnas 'gyur
49b3(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dbus su/ /dmigs pa med pa'i pho brang snang ba'o/ /bsil ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste/ tsan dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la bsil bar byed pa'i ye shes kyis bskor
49b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing byams pa dang snying rje'i nags tshal gyis bskor ba'o/ /kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa sprul pa dag ces bya ba ni/ sems kyi gzhal yas khang du snang zhing yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o/ /gcig ni gser las bgyis pa
49b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gnyis ni dngul las bgyis pa lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyi nang gnyis su med par/ rin po che gser dngul las byas pa'o/ /gsum pa baiDUrya las bgyid/ /bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni/ chom mi 'gyur bar
49b6(rgyud 'grel): snang bas baiDUrya ste/ phyi nang gnyis su med par gsal ba ni shel lta bu'o/ /lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste/ /drug pa rdo yi snying po lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje pha lam las byas pa'i seng ge'i khas mu tig gi dra ba'i phreng bas ste/ /de
49b7(rgyud 'grel): yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o/ /bdun pa spug las bgyis pas te/ /brgyad pa rin chen bdun las bgyis zhes bya ba ni/ rin chen dra ba dang dra ba'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /bud med stong
50a1(rgyud 'grel): phrag brgya dag dang/ /de dag re re kun na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ /lhab lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang/ /cha byang sna tshogs mang pos brgyan ces bya ba ni/ tshad med
50a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi'i rgyan gyis brgyan cing mdzes pa'o/ /glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang/ /bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing/ sems can rnams kyi las 'joms par byed pa la mkhas pa'o/ /de lta'i
50a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' ba yis/ /bde zhing tshim pa'i yid du 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de na bdag gi rgun skyems dang/ /'dod pa bdag gis rab myong bas zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'byung po la sogs
50a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod cing/ 'dod pa'i zhags pas bcings pa'o/ /bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed ces bya ba ni/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor tshan cig yang/ sdig la dga' 
50a5(rgyud 'grel): bas sems can la 'jigs skrag byed pa'o/ /bud med dag dang skyes pa dang/ de bzhin khye'u pu mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa she dag go /mngal na gnas pa 'jigs par bgyid/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa la
50a6(rgyud 'grel): yang 'tshe zhes bya ba ni/ mer mer po dang nur nur po rnams 'phrog cing/ dud 'gro rnams kyi srog 'phrog pa'o/ /skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang/ /gtun pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ zla ba nyi ma mi snang bar byas shing/ bza' 
50a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang btung ba rnams 'phrog pa'o/ /lo thog sa bon 'bras bu dang/ me tog sman dang skom dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang ser ba gtong ba'o/ /mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing/ /mthon po
50b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ gzi brjid phun sum tshogs pa 'phrog par byed pa/ phyug po ltogs por gtong ba dag go/ 'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams/ dmag dang thab mo sha nyer dang zhes bya ba ni/ khrag khrug la dga' bar byed
50b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi sems rnam par byed pa'o/ /tshig gam zhig gam bsad bya ba/ /de kun 'byung po rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ khrag khrug la sman ma byas shing/ /mi rnams kyi srog 'phrog pa'o/ /sbed cing stor bar bgyid pa
50b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bzlog par bgyid cing rgod par byed ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams bzung nas/ zas dang skom yang mi 'ju cing bzlog te/ sped pa ni nad sna tshogs gtong zhing sems yang stor bar byed pa'o/ /res 'ga' yang sems smyong bar byed
50b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /byed pa rgod pa'o/ /'jigs par byed cing lta bar bgyid/ /dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ skyes pa bud med khye'u bu mo rnams la/ rims dang yams nad kyis btab cing/ 'jigs slag byed cing slab 'tshol smras
50b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lta ba ni dran pa stor zhing nam mkha' dang sa gzhi la lta ba rnams te/ sems mi dga' bar byas nas du ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i rmi
50b6(rgyud 'grel): lam dang/ mi dge ba'i ltas ston te/ skyes pa la mor sgyur cing gnod la/ bud med la phor sgyur cing gnod pa'o/ /sgo nas se sgol sgra 'byung zhing/ /mi dran rjed de za bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ grong dang grong khyer du rgyu zhing/ se gol tsam gyis khrag
50b7(rgyud 'grel): khrug byed do/ /khrag khrug gi sman mas za ba dang 'thung bar byed pa'o/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/ /dga' zhing skam mchid smra bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ tshe 'di dang phyi ma yang/ mdza bo dang gnyis shes su skyes shing
51a1(rgyud 'grel): mi de la gnod par byed pa'o/ /bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod la spyod pa dga' bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ mdzes sdug bu mo'i gzugs su byas nas/ byang chub sems dang tsha 'phrog ma'o/ /nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/ zla ba'i
51a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su gda' bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ rmi lam dang ltas la yang de lta bu'i rmi ba'o/ /rlung dang skar mda'i rtse gzugs su/ de la gnod par de dag gda' zhes bya ba ni/ phyugs chen por gyur cing/ nam mkha' nas 'brug sgra dang glog babs
51a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ bar snang la 'od chen po snang ba'o/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyi zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po dang rmi lam la yang/ gcan gzan gyi gzugs su sprul nas gnod pa'o/ /rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang/ mchod
51a4(rgyud 'grel): rten dag gi gnas na gda' zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dag tu gnas shing/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas/ /'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis khye'u dang
51a5(rgyud 'grel): bu mor skyes nas/ pham dag la gnod par byed pa'o/ /shing rta'i sgra ni skad sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o/ /gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston ces bya ba ni/ gzugs dang 'od dang rdzu 'phrul ston pa'o/ /grong khyer dag
51a6(rgyud 'grel): dang khyim rnams kyi/ sgo yang gdon de dag kyang 'byed ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi phyir 'brang zhing/ grong dang grong khyer rnams la gnod par byed de/ /sgo phug dang 'phrang kar bsdang cing 'dzin pa'o/ /srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid
51a7(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /lam na kun tu bskor bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ lus la na tsha drag por byas shing/ srog 'bral bar bgyid pa'o/ /bskal pa bdun gyi bar du yang rjes rnyag pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams
51b1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur zhing/ kha dog sna tshogs sprul pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams/ /lus la na bar gnas par ston ces bya ba ni/ mdze dang lhog pa phol mig la sogs pa'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi ston pa dag
51b2(rgyud 'grel): go/ nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang/ /phyin ci log tu brtson par byed ces bya ba ni/ rlung bad kan mkhris par ston cing/ bad kan rlung dang mkhris par ston te rtsa 'khrug par snang ba'o/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag/ thams cad log
51b3(rgyud 'grel): pas de dag ston ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig yud tsam gyi rgyu zhing/ sems can rnams la 'tshe ba phyin ci log par ston pa'o/ /rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na/ /de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis
51b4(rgyud 'grel): so zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i dmod mo'i zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po bshad pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu zhes bya ba ni/ byang phyogs kyi gdon gnod
51b5(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa rnams la chad pa gcod pa'o/ /langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor gyi nang nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar langs so/ /zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba/ /gser gyi mchod stong dag 'bar zhing zhes bya ba ni/
51b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ chos kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku'o/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /thub pa chen po me dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten
51b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams na chos kyi rgyal por snang ba bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od do/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi zad can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong chen mo'i rig sngags zhal nas /
52a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams rlag par byed pa'o/ /byang phyogs cha yi phyogs cha gnas/ /byang phyogs dag tu gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams so/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ de
52a2(rgyud 'grel): dag 'chad pa bdag gis bcad ces bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyi chad pa gcod pa'o/ /syat+theM dam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ gang la zhe na rig sngags 'di 'o/ /byang phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/
52a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /bde legs ni sems can thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur gcig pa'o/ /de dag ni rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bcu'i chad pa sgres pa ste/ tshangs pa dang mi brgya byin dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba
52a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs khams kyi lha rnams dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa khams kyi lha rnams dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang/ gnas gtsang ma dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams
52a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gnod sbyin ded dpon thams cad dang/ 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lnga rtse na dang/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'o/ /
52a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi me tog spos dag dang/ sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen rnam thos kyi bus/ sems can gyi don du de dag 'bul ba'o/ /de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang/ /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang zhes bya
52a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ lha de dag gi mthu'i nus pa'o/ /nad thams cad bcom par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rlung khris bad kan la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi 'joms pa'o/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ zhes
52b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gang zag yang 'di la gus par byed pa nad dang 'jigs pa las thar ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku la brgyan pa'i sprul
52b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad cing/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab ste/ de la sku gsung thugs
52b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang/ /langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar gus pas 'dud pa'o/ /me tog lta bur rgyas gyur cig /ka la piM ka'i sgra dbyangs can zhes
52b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ zhal pad+ma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba/ /dbyangs gsal la phra ba'o/ /khu byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra/ /rnga dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gsal ba yid du 'ongs ba/ /rol mo'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /thub chen gnod sbyin gyi srin po
52b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dri za stong phrag drug cu bzhi zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na 'khod pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ shar phyogs pa la gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa de rnams la rig sngags kyi dmod mos cha dang
52b6(rgyud 'grel): gcad pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ de dag thams cad bdag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis zhus pa'o/ /gang
52b7(rgyud 'grel): zhus na drin la sogs pa'i srog snying rig sngags snying pos zhus pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ d+ha ra Ni la sogs pa'o/ /shar phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur swAhA zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag 'di la shar phyogs su gnod pa dang/
53a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /'di yang yul 'khor srung gis gsungs pa ste/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi gzi brjid dang mthu'i dbang gis/ gang zag nad dang 'jigs
53a2(rgyud 'grel): pa las thar pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni gong du bshad pa bzhin bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes kyang/ thal mo sbyar te de nas langs zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar gus pas thal mo sbyar
53a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ smras pas thams cad rab 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rin po che rang gi lag mthil du snang ba dang 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams thugs rjes lta ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo bdud bzhi 'joms
53a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mthad pa/ /'jig rten thams cad rnam 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni/ ma rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o/ /ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/ mtho
53a5(rgyud 'grel): ris su 'dren pa'o/ /grul bum yi dags srul po dag /stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i grul bum la sogs pa/ /rig sngags kyi chad pas gcod pa'o/ /lho phyogs cha yi phyogs na gnas/ /de
53a6(rgyud 'grel): dag bya la gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ lho phyogs na 'khod cing gnod par byed pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de dag 'chad pa dag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sngar sngar rgyal
53a7(rgyud 'grel): po chen po 'phags skyes pos zhus pa'o/ /gang zhus she na/ grul bum la sogs pa'i srog gi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /gsang sngags ni lta ste/ shAn+ti shAn+ti la sogs pa'o/ /lho phyogs su bdag
53b1(rgyud 'grel): bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa la lho phyogs kyi nad 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /tshangs pa la sogs pas zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi gzi brjid dang dbang phyug gis gang
53b2(rgyud 'grel): zag gi nad dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar
53b3(rgyud 'grel): gus par 'dud pa'o/ /sprin chen seng ge chen po la/ che ba'i chen po rgya mtsho che zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa med pa seng ge bzhin du spyod pa/ sems can sprin gyi char bzhin don byed pa'o/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//
53b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po/ /g.yul chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni/ smra ba'i seng ge stobs dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa'i g.yul chen po 'joms pa'o/ /klu dang 'dab bzang gsang ba'o/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
53b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa klu'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i chad pas gcod pa'o/ /nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ /de nas byung nas gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ nub ngos nas 'khod nas de dag nas byung
53b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ de dag 'chad pa dag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis zhus pa'o/ /gang zhus she na/ klu rnams kyi snying po'o//
53b7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi lam gyi snying po'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ ba Ti ba ra twi la sogs pa'o/ /nub phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag nub phyogs kyi 'jigs pa dang/ nad la sogs pa dang bral
54a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /de dag gi mthu dang gzi brjid kyis kyang/ gang zag gi nad dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni/ gong bzhin du shes par
54a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas ni tshig gi bar gyi de nas so/ /tshangs pa dang ni tshangs chen yang/ /thal mo sbyar ba bya snas langs zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngas 'dud pa'o/ /tshangs pa bkrus pas dag
54a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rig byed kun gyi pha rol zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu spangs shing dge ba bcu dang du blangs te/ tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo na sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje/ /'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa/
54a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mes por mdzad cing/ de'i don mdzad pas dbang du bsdus pa'o/ /gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu na bsdad pa'i
54a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rnams/ rig sngags kyi mod mos 'chad pa gcod pa'o/ /sa yi 'og dang sa yi steng/ /nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdan zhes par bya ba ni/ sa bdag tu gnas pa bar snang la rgyu ba/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po
54a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ de dag thams cad bdag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhus pa'o/ /gang zhus she na/ 'byung po
54a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gnyen po rig sngags kyi snying po'o/ /gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ b+hwa me bu ma go she la sogs pa'o/ /phyogs bcu dag tu bdag bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa la/ phyogs thams
54b1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de dag kun gyi mthu'i nus pas/ gang zag la 'jigs pa dang/ nad thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /rlung las gyur dang
54b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhros las gyur/ bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur ces bya ba ni/ 'o? de'i rkyen gyis mdze nad bco brgyad du 'byung ste/ de rnams kyis kyang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams
54b3(rgyud 'grel): cad las bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang yang 'di'i nus pas/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dang 'jigs pa brgyad dang bral ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de yan chad
54b4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'byung po'i gnas skabs bshad pa ste /bzhi pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po cho ga bshad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi sems
54b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi don la snyams par zhugs te/ yang na thugs rjes gzigs nas/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can la gdon bya sems pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes bya ba ni/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed tsam mo/ /yang 'di nas
54b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ log par dang sel dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs dang/ shAkya seng ge rnams zhes bya ni/ rgyal srid ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don
54b7(rgyud 'grel): la dgongs nas chos kyi rgyal srid byed ba'o/ /gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa las 'byung ba ni ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon du song ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byas pa'i phyir zhes
55a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa dang/ ma byon pa rnams so/ /grong khyer ni zhes bya ba ni/ sa gcig tu bshad pa la bya/ grong rdal ni che ba'i phyir ro/ /ljongs ni
55a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags ri dang bcas pa'o/ /grong dang zhes bya ba ni chung ba la sogs pa'o/ /khyim na zhes bya ba ni/ sems can no/ /sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir/ 'jig rten du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i/
55a3(rgyud 'grel): gang gi phyir byung zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi lha dang bcas pa nas byung ba'i phyir ro/ /bcas nas byung zhes pa ni/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can gyi don du byung ba'o/ /bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
55a4(rgyud 'grel): skye dgu dang/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mi la gang yang 'byung ba'i phyir/ de'i don du sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje'i spyan gyis lta ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
55a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed tsam mo/ /'jig rten du 'byung ste zhes pa ni/ gcig gi don du ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/ /dper na zhes bya ba ni/
55a6(rgyud 'grel): sman pa mkhas pa'i dpa' bo sman pa mkhas pa mchog tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ gcig gi don du ni ma yin no/ /gang gi phyir ro/ /zhen sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro/ gso ba la brtson pa zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /sman pas shes
55a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba bzhin du brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan ni rig pa bslabs pa'o/ /rgyal po gcig gi don du 'byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i don du ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ rgyal srid byed
55b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /yang na sems can gyi don byed do/ /yul gcig gi don du 'byung ba ma yin pas na zhes bya ba ni/ grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang/ ljongs rnams su rgyu ba'o/ /sems can gcig gis zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can no/ /rab tu byung
55b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'o/ /ma yin pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chung ngu ma yin pas/ theg pa chen po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyis 'khor ba la gnas pa'i sems
55b3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams 'don pa'o/ /phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /bzhugs pa'i phyogs de zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag tu zhes bya ba
55b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sems can gyi don na/ /mi rnams dang mi ma yin pa dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sems kyis dgongs nas/ grong khyer yangs pa can du sems can gyi don du bzhengs pa'o/ /
55b5(rgyud 'grel): gang gi phyir zhe na/ mun nag byung ba'i phyir ro/ /da yang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'o/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po zhes bya ba ni/ zheng dang chu ru dpag chad lnga bcu'o/ /rgya che ba yangs pa skye bo mang po'i cho gas 'dul ba/ 'bas?
55b6(rgyud 'grel): rims pa bdun gyis bskyor ba/ shing ljon pa rnams phyogs na yod pa/ skyed mos tshal na phyogs na brgyan pa/ skyed mos tshal re re yang rdzing bu re re dang bcas pa/ rdzing bu'i nang na me tog pad+ma dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ utpal dang/ ku mu
55b7(rgyud 'grel): da la sogs te/ dri zhim po'i me tog skye ba/ chu de yang tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim pa skye ba/ rdzing bu de rnams kyi nang na/ bya'i tshogs yod pa/ ngang pa dang dur pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ sa rwa swa la sogs pa yod pa/ skyes mos tshal de rnams
56a1(rgyud 'grel): thang las skyes pa'i me tog dri zhim ba dzA ti'i me tog dang ku mun dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ sngon po dang/ mthing ka dang/ le brgan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po skye pa/ skyed mos tshal gyi 'gram
56a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ 'bras bu can gyi shing skyes pa/ a 'bras kyi shing dang/ 'jam 'bras kyi shing dang rta ka dang u nu'i shing dang se ba dang rgya'i se ba dang shug ba dang rgya shug dang/ shing bal po se'u dang/ u duM ba ra dang/ n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i shing yod do/ /grong yangs
56a3(rgyud 'grel): pa can phyogs phyogs na mchod rten gyis bskor ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dar ba/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma ngam/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa de bzhin srung ba/ braM
56a4(rgyud 'grel): ze 'am bram ze mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am rgyal mo 'am/ btsad po 'am btsan mo 'am/ rje rigs sam dmad rigs la sogs pa 'am/ skye bo mang po 'dus pa 'am/ byol song ngam phyugs la sogs pa mang bo yod pa/ grong khyer chen
56a5(rgyud 'grel): po yangs pa can no/ /ga la ba der zhes bya ba ni grong gi nang du'o/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ li tsa byi la sogs pa'i bram ze'o/ /phal po che'i don yang byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ grags
56a6(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po byung ba'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ mun nag chen po byung ba dang/ /mu khe byung ba dang/ nad sna tshogs byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa yang byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi don yin no/ /mnyam du dgongs te zhes bya
56a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i gtang la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni nyi ma shar ba'i dus so/ /chos gos dang sham thabs dang lhung
56b1(rgyud 'grel): bzed bsnams te zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stan las langs te bsil byed dang lhung bzed thogs nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la babs nas grong khyer yangs pa can la kha ltas pa'o/ /dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu zhes
56b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las shod du gshegs pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa mchod pa byed pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te
56b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni lha'i rdzas dang/ me tog dang mchod pa la sogs pa 'bul te/ lha'i bu tshangs pa dang tshangs chen dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu la sogs pa la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas phul lo zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi
56b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gus pa byas nas 'bul ba'o/ /yang na ni bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sar/ lha'i za 'og dang/ dar dang/ sa gzhi la gting nas gshegs pa'o/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug
56b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang/ tshangs pa dang tshangs chen la sogs pas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang dri la sogs pa'i char 'bebs pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te zhes
56b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po 'am/ khyab 'jug gam 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sum cu
56b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gsum lha'i bu dang/ bu mo rnams kyis kyang phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i za 'og dang dar la sogs pa dog sa la gting ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis
57a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen gyi lha rnams dang lha'i bu mo re re blangs nas phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la rnam logs nas phul zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du yin te/
57a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi char phab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yo ba cing 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mos lha'i za 'og dang/ dar la sogs pa dog sa la bting pa'o/ /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po
57a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs so so nas lha'i gdugs dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha mo dang gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo la sogs pas so so'i lag nas phul ba'o/ /nyan thos rnams la phul nas zhes bya ba ni sngon du bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ nyan thos rnams
57a4(rgyud 'grel): la yang bkur sti byas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i grags pa dang bkur sti dang mnyes par bya ba mnyes nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bya
57a5(rgyud 'grel): rgod phung po'i ri las shod du babs te zhes bya ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi don du'o/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis mthong nas/
57a6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang rol mo'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnams la sngon du zhu ba'o/ /grong khyer yangs pa can gyi grong dang grong par dang grong gi phyi rol dang/ ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang me tog
57a7(rgyud 'grel): gi phreng ba dang mu tig dang mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang/ bsil yab dang rnga mang dang/ rnga mang dkar po dang/ dar dpyangs dang bla re dang dog sa la za 'og dang dar bting ba dang/ grong bar du zur rdzun? du bkra shis
57b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag pa'o/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu byon pa dga' nas li tsa 'am li tsa'i chung ma 'am li tsa'i bu 'am bu mo 'am/ li tsa'i 'khor po 'am 'khor mo 'am/ nye ba
57b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan no/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba ni/ dper na mi gcig btson du bzung ba dang brtson thon nas sdug bsngal dang bral ba lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ dper na bu mo gzhon nu
57b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bag mar 'gro ba bcas pa lta bu ste yang na dbyar ka'i nam mkha' la nyi zla shar ba lta bu'o/ /skar ma rnams ni nyan thos la sogs pa lta bu ste/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la mdzes pa'o/ /dang por 'os pa zhes bya ba ni/ dper na pu gces pa tshong
57b4(rgyud 'grel): la song nas/ yun ring por ? nas ma dang phrad pa lta bu'o/ /dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba ni/ mu stegs shin tu nga rgyal che ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong nas dang pa skyes pa dang 'dra ste/ yang na ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bral ba'o/ /thugs
57b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sems mi 'phro ba lta bu'o/ /dbang po dul ba zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang bral ba'o/ /thugs dul ba zhes bya ba ni/ brna ba sems gnod sems log par lta ba las bral ba'o/ /dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi
57b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos kyi tshul tu gnas pa'o/ /dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste de la sbyin pa ni sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ de la yang gsum/ zas skom dang nor bu dang/ 'bru la
57b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas sems can rnams tshim par byas te mgu bar byed pa dang/ phan skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyis sems can rnams 'jigs skrag las/ dbugs phyung ste mgu bar byed pa dang don dang yi ge dang brda'i sgo nas sems can rnams
58a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa las grol bar byas te/ mgu par byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims ni de dag la mi gnod cing phan par sems pa ste/ de la gsum bcas pa dang rang bzhin gtso bo'i sgo nas gzhan las gnod pa las ldog par dam bcas pa'i sems
58a2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa'i sgo nas dka' bar byed pa'i dam bcas pa'i sems bs? ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa yis sems can gyi don byed par dam bcas pa'i sems brtan pa'o/ /bzod pa ni sran bya'i dngos po la
58a3(rgyud 'grel): mi sgrag cing sran tshugs pa sems pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ chos la sems pa'i phyir rtag tu sdug bsngal ba la sran tshugs pa dang/ gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'i shes pa dang chos nyid stong pa nyid spros pa bral
58a4(rgyud 'grel): don la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'o/ /btsun 'grus ni dge ba la spro ba'i shes pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ bsgrub bya'i dngos po de ltar sgrub pa'i dam bcas pa'i sems dpa' dang/ de nyid nyams su len pa'i sems pa dang/ bsgrub
58a5(rgyud 'grel): bya de nyid mthar ma phyin par mi gtod ba'i sems pa'o/ /bsam gtan ni dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste mi mthun phyogs kyi bying rgod dngos por yang ma byung la dog pa yang yod pa'i tshe spong ba'i sems
58a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid la rgyun tu bzhag /blan te bzhag pa'i sgo nas mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan khyab par can sgrub pa dang/ bying rgod byung gis dogs pa yang yod kyang/ dngos su ma byung ba'i sems rnal tu zhugs pa'i skabs
58a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bying rgod sems byung yang ma byung gis dogs pa yang med pa'i sems lhun gyis grub pa'i skabs na lus kyi 'byor ba stod nas me byung smad nas chu grub pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don byed pa'o/ /shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam
58b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'byed pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ sgra thos nas rtogs pa dang/ rig pa nges pa'i shes rab kyis sgra don la spyad pas don rtogs pa dang de lta bu'i don bsgoms pas blo phul tu byung ba skyes pa'o/ /thabs ni dge ba chung du byas pa yang mi zad par
58b2(rgyud 'grel): chen por byed pa ste/ rang gi skyon dge ba chen po chung ngur 'gro ba dang/ mi zad pa zad par 'gyur ba spong ba dang rang gi dge ba la sems 'jug pa'i thabs shes pa dang/ rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bur myur du smin pa'i thabs shes pa'o/ /smon lam ni 'dod
58b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas su rang gi dge ba stobs pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste rang gi dge ba de phyi ma la sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par smon cing de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sngo ba dang/ bdag gang du skye ba der sems can rnams 'dod chags med pa
58b4(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang med par gyur cig ces sems sbyong ba dang bdag gang du skye ba der ma btab pa'i lo thog skye ba dang sman dang me tog phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab pa'o/ /stobs ni mi mthun pa'i
58b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang du mi 'gro zhing zil gyis gnon par mi nus shing phar la zil gyis gnon pa dang/ bdud dang rgol ba rnams kyis tshur zil gyis mnan par mi nus la par
58b6(rgyud 'grel): la zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /ye shes ni dngos po de shes pa'o/ /de la yang gsum ste/ gnyis su snang ba yang mi snang la zhen pa med pa dang snang ni snang la zhen pa med pa dang/ nyan thos la sogs pa gang gis 'dul ba dang/ /nga dang
58b7(rgyud 'grel): de ston pa'o/ /de ltar bcu po de rnams re re la yang gnyis gnyis te sbyin pa yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa dang sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o/ /de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang/ byams pa dang
59a1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zin pa dang/ bla na med pa'i rgyur bsngos pa des ni/ sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o/ /de las bzlog pa ni sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'o/ /de ltar tshul khrims
59a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa la gnyis te/ sbyin bya'i rdzas la sems pa mi dmigs pa dang/ sbyin bdag mi dmigs pa dang/ len pa mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis zin pa ni lo ka
59a3(rgyud 'grel): las 'das pa g.yeng ba las 'phags pa'i phyir 'das pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su ma dag pa ni lo ka las mi g.yo ba 'phags pa'i phyir na 'jig rten pa'i de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro/ /nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin
59a4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin par byed pa'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /ming gi rnam grangs pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ mchog tu byin pa zhes bya/ mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'o na 'bras bu
59a5(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum mam chos kyis dbyings ye shes dang/ rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis tha dad du mi 'gyur ram zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni chos can la chos dbyings ye shes sam sku gsum ni chos nyid kyi tshul tu gnas pa 'am/ chos
59a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ye shes ni rten la/ pha rol tu phyin pa ni brten pa'i tshul tu gnas pa tha mi dad pa'o/ /dbang po dben zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po ni mig gi dbang po'o/ /yang na ni gom pa bdun gyi bar du spyi lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
59a7(rgyud 'grel): par bzhugs pa'o/ /khug pa ni zhes bya ba ni sems yin te/ nyon mongs pa la sogs pa yang dag par spangs pa'o/ /glang po chen po ltar shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba ni/ glang po che ni dpe yin te glang po che dul ba ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzugs la sogs pa
59b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba'o/ /mtsho ltar dwang zhing zhes bya ba ni/ mtsho ni shin tu rgya che ba ting ring ba ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dpag tu med pa'o/ /rnyog pa ni dri mas te dri ma ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma dang
59b2(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'o/ /rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnam par gsal ba ste/ yang na ni ye shes lnga rnam par gsal ba dang ldan pa'o/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku legs par brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan sum
59b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa dang/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang/ bdun shin tu mtho ba dang/ sor mo ring ba dang/
59b4(rgyud 'grel): rting ba yangs pa dang/ sku che zhing drang ba dang/ zhabs legs par mtho ba dang/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang/ ri dags e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang/ /phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang/ gser
59b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi kha dog dang/ mdog dang shin tu 'jam pa dang/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang/ zhal mdzod pus brgyan pa dang seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes pa grub pa dang/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang/ ro bro ba'i
59b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang/ ljags shin tu yangs pa dang/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang tshems shin tu dkar ba dang/ tshems mnyam pa dang/ tshems thags bzang
59b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang/ spyan dkar nag phyed pa dang/ ba'i rdzim lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnams pa thams
60a1(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ltar/ rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med
60a2(rgyud 'grel): pas zhabs shin tu gnas so/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'drel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o/ /shing bal gyi g.yeng du ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/
60a3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs dang phyag dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba'o/ /rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/ /sku lag pa mdun du 'phags drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o/ /pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas
60a4(rgyud 'grel): zhabs legs par mtho ba'o/ /spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/ /ri dags e na ya'i byin pa dang/ smin ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyam pa la rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum?
60a5(rgyud 'grel): pas ri dags e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/ /brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo g.yas pa'i lta nga la reg pa'o/ /phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/ /glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin
60a6(rgyud 'grel): tu mdzes par spubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas spubs su nub pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go /gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i kha dog tu
60a7(rgyud 'grel): ?? pa sku la rdul gyis ma gos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o/ /shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re re skyes shing/ gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa'o/ /me tog kun dang zla ba dang 'o ma dang ba mo'i mdog
60b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba rgyas pas kyang 'phags pas 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu rgyas pas zhal mdzod pus brgyan pa'o/ /ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stong ngo/ /mgul pa rgyu legs par lhu 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/
60b2(rgyud 'grel): phrag pa'i lhun mdzes pa grub pa'o/ /gser gyi bstan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar shin tu phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gyis mnyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro
60b3(rgyud 'grel): bro ba'i mchog go /sku chu zhing 'dom du mnyam pas/ /shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu gab pa'o/ /spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs par g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldang zhing dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub pa la/ mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu'i spyi gtsug
60b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'o/ /me tog utpa la dmar po'i 'od mnga' ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pa ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang bya ka la piM ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/ /'gram ba me
60b5(rgyud 'grel): long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing/ /mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ /me tog kun d+ha dang dung gcig 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o/ /tshems la
60b6(rgyud 'grel): mtho dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o/ /tshems la bar mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o/ /bla 'og rgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/ /dkar nag cha ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mdog
60b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ma g.yogs pas/ spyan dkar nag phyed pa'o/ /rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/ /de la bla ma la bsu skyel dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa la sogs pa la phu dung du byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor lo shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /so yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu
61a2(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i snga ltas so/ /sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang/ don dpyod pa dang don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnams pa bzhi goms par byas pas zhab dang phyag dra bas 'brel ba ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i lnga ltas so/ /bza' ba dang bca' ba dang/
61a3(rgyud 'grel): brtung pa zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang/ bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bca' ba dang bza' ba dang/ btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba mthong ba'i snga ltas so/ /bcing ba bkrol
61a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang/ srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang/ rting pa yangs pa dang/ sku che zhing drangs pas te/ de ni tshes ring ba'i snga stas so/ /dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang/ gzung ba mngon par spel
61a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan 'byin pa dang/ bdag gis
61a6(rgyud 'grel): blangs pas ri dags e na'i byin pa lta bur ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/ /bdog cing yod pa'i nor blangs nas mi 'god par gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba
61a7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dul ba snga ltas so/ /grogs po dang/ mdzab shes dang gnyen pa ma phye ba dang bye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag pa bskul ba dang/ gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsungs pas gsang ba'i
61b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas sbubs su nub ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /stan dang gos dang khang pa dang gzhal med khangs dang/ gzhal med khang bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang/ mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni na bza' dang gdan dang/ khang pa
61b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhal med khang dang gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang pha ma dang phu nul sogs pa rnams la/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro byas pa dang/ btsun par byas pa dang bcol bar sna la ma
61b3(rgyud 'grel): gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang/ zhal mdzod pus brgyan pa ste/ de nas mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /mi snyan pa zer zhing mi smon pa dang/ snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro stong lta
61b4(rgyud 'grel): bu dang/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /na ba rnams la ci dang rim gro dang/ sman pa dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang/ rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang/ ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni
61b5(rgyud 'grel): nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/ /sgyed mos tshal dang 'khor dang ltung ba dang rdzing bu dang/ rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang/ kha zas dang 'phreng ba'i gnas dang/ stegs dang/ gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos? par bya ba sngon du stong
61b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pa ste shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang/ nyams su bde ba'i smra ba smras pas
61b7(rgyud 'grel): ljags shin tu srab pa dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs te de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes pa ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par gyur pa dang/ mnyan na
62a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang/ zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang/ gtad mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang/ ma 'khrugs shing btsal ba'o/ /yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing/ dus su smras pas seng ge'i 'graM
62a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rim gror bya ba dang snyam pa med pas gnyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring po nas bden zhing phra
62a3(rgyud 'grel): ma med pa'i tshig smra bas tshems thags bzang pa dang/ tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/ /pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nye bar bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang/ rmongs pa med pa'i
62a4(rgyud 'grel): mig gis blta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/ /de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// //dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni gang
62a5(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zad kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa'o/ /gnyen shes byams pa dang 'du bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog
62a6(rgyud 'grel): snum pa yin/ rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ tshul la kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rims kyis grub pa ste/ sor
62a7(rgyud 'grel): mo rim gyis grub pa bzhon pa yin no/ /thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang/ 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste rtsa mi mngon pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i mdun pa 'grol ba ste/ tsa bar mdud pa med pa yin no/ /shin tu dben pa'i chos
62b1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin no/ /mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin no/ /mi'i seng+ge ste seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no/ /mi'i glang po ste glang po che'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar
62b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin no/ /mi'i khyu mchog ste khyu mchog gi 'gros su bzhud pa yin no/ /mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin no/ /lta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par bzhud pa yin
62b3(rgyud 'grel): no/ /rtag tu thugs yon bo mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin no/ /tshul rnam par dag pa yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin no/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas te sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin no/ /chos rims
62b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis ston pas te sku rims kyis gzhol ba yin no/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste sku shin tu gtsang ba yin no/ /rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang/ ldan pas te sku shin tu 'jam pa yin no/ /rang bzhin
62b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par dag pa mnga' ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad bzang po shin tu rdzogs pa yin no/ /yon tan yangs shing zad pa ston pa ste sku che zhing mdzes pa yin no//
62b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin no/ /mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin no/ /rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ste/ sku la zhum pa med pa yin
62b7(rgyud 'grel): no/ /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin no/ /yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin no/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/
63a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dang nying lag gtsang mar mdzes pa yin no/ /gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin no/ /tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin no//
63a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i legs nyes thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhum pa yin no/ /chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pas te phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin no/ /chos
63a3(rgyud 'grel): zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste lte ba zab pa yin no/ /mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin no/ /slob ma kun la mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin
63a4(rgyud 'grel): no/ /thugs shin tu gtsang bas te/ sku spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin no/ /chos nag po stan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la rme ba med pa yin no/ /shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pas te
63a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin no/ /rang gi skye bo dang phal pa la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin no/ /shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no/ /bzod pa'i yangs pa ston pa
63a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin no/ /bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'chad ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin no/ /gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du dgye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan ma yin no/ /'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul
63a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin no/ /yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin no/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dga' ba ste/ ljags shin
63b1(rgyud 'grel): tu dmar ba yin no/ /glang po che chen po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus nyes pa mi mnga' ste/ glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'o/ /snyan cing 'jams pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ste/ snyan cing 'jam
63b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa'o/ /srid par kun tu sbyor ba las 'das te/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin no/ /skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul bas te/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /chos dang 'dul bar shin
63b3(rgyud 'grel): tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin no/ /sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis zhol ba yin no/ /shes
63b4(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos phul tu yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan
63b5(rgyud 'grel): ring ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin no/ /sems can gyis tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin no/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na chung mchog mig
63b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar nag phyed pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas to/ spyan dkar nag phyed cing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin no/ /rtag tu yangs pa'i gzigs pa ste spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin no//
63b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa rdul ba la mkhas pa ste smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snub par gyur pas skye bo 'dul ba ste smin ma snam pa
64a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yin no/ /chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ste snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin no nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las rnam par rgyal ba ste snyan mnyam pa yin no/ /sems can bsam pa ma mnyam pa 'bul
64a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ste snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /phas kyi rgol ba shin tu dul ste/ zhal phra ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /smon
64a3(rgyud 'grel): lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no/ /g.yul gyi bung ba rnams par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa yin no/ /mthong ba dang bsgom pa spangs pa'i bag la nyal zad par bya ba ste dbu stug pa
64a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin no/ /rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu mi rdzi ba yin no/ /rlang
64a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gsung yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu mi rtsug pa pa yin no/ /byang chub kyis yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu la dri zhim pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs
64a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin no zhes bya'o/ /shing sa la'i rgyal po ltar zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu skye legs pa yal ga mang ba lo ma rgyas pa/ dper na dbyar ka tshad pa tshe ba'i dus su
64a7(rgyud 'grel): tshad pa la 'jigs nas shing des kyang mi la phan thogs te/ de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni/
64b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ de bzhin nyid ni stong pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste/ de yang dang po byung yang de'i ngang las byung ba/ bar du gnas kyang der/ tha mar 'gag pa la ma thim yang de la thim pa'i phyir te chos sku'o//
64b2(rgyud 'grel): yang na de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ste/ stong nyis spros bral rtogs shing/ rig pa'i phyir longs sku'o/ /yang de bzhin du gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa ste mar me mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzad pa bcu
64b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don la gshegs pa ste/ spral ba'i sku'o/ /sku rnam par spras pa zhes bya ba ni/ shing sa la'i lo ma rgyas pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yon tan gyis spras pa'o/ /nyi ma ltar 'od
64b4(rgyud 'grel): gzer gyi dra bas kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'od gzer ni nyi ma bdun gyi 'od gzer dra ba ste/ nyi ma de bzhin du 'od gzer khyab pa bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis khyab pa'o/ /'od gzer ni dra ba kun tu 'gyed pa
64b5(rgyud 'grel): ci'i phyir zhe na don med par dra ba 'gyed pa ma yin no/ /'o na rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po sbyin pa sa ra ri rgyal khrims yin pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i dus na bai DUrya shel zhes bya ba'i lha khang na bzhugs te
64b6(rgyud 'grel): dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don byed la dgongs nas bsod snyoms mdzad de tshong dpon chen po bkra shis dpal dang/ yum dpal ldan grags ma zhes bya ba ste/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa me tog gi ra ba dang skyed
64b7(rgyud 'grel): mos tshal la sogs pa kho'i gnas ni shin tu yid du 'ongs pa dang/ sems dga' ba dang/ tshong dpon de'i slob dpon mu stegs gcer bu yin te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i khyim du bsod snyoms la
65a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs te/ de nas tshong dpon yab yum dad pa skyes nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa de ring 'dir byon pa shin tu legs so/ /chos ston grangs bkur sti byas yo byad la sogs pa phul nas/ de nas tshong dpon
65a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi chung ma nang ba de bcom ldan 'das la gzigs su phul lo/ /tshong dpon gyis de skad smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par shes pa mdzad de 'di'i lus la ci skye zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /tshong dpon
65a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i lus la skyes bu dam pa skye'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par myur du thob pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang tshong dpon dga' ba'i
65a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag lan gsum btsal nas yang bkur sti la sogs pa byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/ /gshegs pa'i dus su mu stegs gcer bu dang 'phrad do/ /gcer bu'i
65a5(rgyud 'grel): sems la nga'i yon bdag gau ta mas phrogs so snyam nas/ nang du phyin nas tshong dpon la smras so/ /kye tshong dpon gau ta mas ci la byon smras pas tshong dpon gyi zhal nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsod snyoms la byon pa lags
65a6(rgyud 'grel): dad pa skyes nas bkur sti byas pa yin pa'i 'di'i nad pa gzigs su phul ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'di'i lus la skyes bu dam pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ rdzu
65a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul gyi rkang pa myur du 'thob pa skyes gsungs so/ /gcer bu'i mtshan nyid ni mngon par shes pa gcer bu ra'i 'phongs la thal lcags brgyab pas gcer bu ra dang 'dra ba bzhi bzhi lnga lnga thon pa de bzhin du mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba'i gcer
65b1(rgyud 'grel): bus rdzun po smras so/ /kye tshong dpon go'u ta ma'i 'dod pa yin/ kye bu dang skye ste skyes ma thag nas ma gsod pa de'i ting la khyod kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad zad pa byed pa de'i gting la pha bsad nas/ bo rang rab tu byung ba yin/ de lta bu skye ba
65b2(rgyud 'grel): yin khyod kyis myur du ma bsad na de bzhin du khyod la de dag myur du 'ong ngo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis sa nub mo'i dus su chung ma'i gsus pa phyag gnyis kyis mnyes so mnyes pas mo ma bzos nas skad ngan chen po byung ngo/ /de nas khyim tshes
65b3(rgyud 'grel): dang nye ba la sogs pas thos nas/ ram 'da' byas pas de'i nub mo dbugs dang ma bral lo/ /yang phyi de nub mo'i dus su me tog gi ra ba yod pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su khang pa gcig gi nang du yang khrid nas chung ma'i gsus pa
65b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyes so/ /mnyes pa dang bud med de na tsha chen po byung bas dbugs chad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis kha skang brgyur nas smras so/ /nga'i chung ma de yang byis pa ma thon par gum mo zhes smras so/ /mya ngan gyi tshul yang byas de nas mu stegs gcer
65b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i tshogs rnams kyang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ srang ga 'am srang ga chen po 'am/ grong ngam grong khyer chen po 'am/ grong rngal la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal po skyes bu rnams gau ta ma'i rdzun po la tshong dpon de'i bud med
65b6(rgyud 'grel): la bu khye'u ga re mo yang shi gau ta ma'i rdzun po la sems can thams cad dad pa skyes de skad bzhin du gcer bu'i tshogs rnams yang nas yang du smras zhing dril bu dkrol zhing ba dan 'phyar zhing yar mar 'gro byas so/ /gcir bu'i tshogs rnams
65b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang rang dong skyes so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis baiDUrya'i ra shal gyi gtsug lag khang gi nang du seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje dkyil krung du bzhugs te byang chub sems dpa' dang dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos dang dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/
66a1(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ 'khor gyi dbus su ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi
66a2(rgyud 'grel): khams chen po khyab po/ /kun tu khyab po yang 'od zer gyi dra ba de ba spu re re la 'du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu re re 'am mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba nyi ma bdun shar ba dang 'dra ba nam mkha' la 'phro'o/ /de nas 'od zer de yang mi
66a3(rgyud 'grel): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa/ dga' ldan nam sum cu rtsa gsum mam rgyal chen gyi lha 'am/ 'od zer gyi dra bas kun tu khyab po 'od zer gyi dra ba de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu la 'du'o/
66a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la
66a5(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi lags gang gi sems can gyi don lags mtshan nyid gang lgags/ rgyu gang la lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin de las langs
66a6(rgyud 'grel): te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa nyan thos dang/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor
66a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal tu 'gro ba lags/ gzhon nu 'od zer skyes dgra bcom pa yang dag par byung bas gshegs par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i stan las langs te/ gtsug lag khang nas phyir gshegs
66b1(rgyud 'grel): so/ /de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang gshegs so/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshang chen gyi lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang rgyal chen gyi lha rnams dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
66b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ba dan dang lha'i rol mos bcom ldan 'das la sngon du bsus ste/ lha rdzas kyi dri bzang po dang me tog gi char phab po/ /de nas rgyal po chen po gzugs can snying pos thos nas rgyal po dang rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa yang gshegs so//
66b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i gting la gcer bu'i mtshan ma 'am tshong dpon gyi 'khor ram/ ro de'i bla ma gshegs so/ /de bzhin du rgyal po khab kyi skye dgu 'am skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs pa dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal tu gshegs so/ /bsil ba'i tshal du slebs
66b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ phyogs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos la sogs pa bzhugs so/ /phyogs gcig tu gcer bu dang mu stegs bsdad do/ /de nas ro sregs pa'i sa nas skad byung po/ /skad byung ba dang pad+ma skye'o/ /pad+ma'i steng na gzhon nu 'od zer skyes
66b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba skyes so /shin tu skyes legs pa dgra bcom pa'i byed dang ldan pa de me'i nang du de lta bur skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon la smras pa/ kye tshong dpon khyod kyi bu 'di lags so/ /zhes smras so/ /tshong dpon gyis
66b6(rgyud 'grel): gcer bu la kha bltas nas langs dogs byed do/ /de nas gcer bus tshong dpon la smras so/ /kye tshong dpon me'i nang du gang yang shi nas me la bsregs pa la/ khyod kyi bu ni gang la skyes/ me'i nang du 'gro na ni/ khyod ni nges par tshig par 'gyur
66b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas 'gro ma nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long la spyod cig ces brjod pa dang/ rgyal po chen pos blangs nas/ me'i nang na khyer nas 'ongs so//
67a1(rgyud 'grel): me de yang shin tu bsil ba'i kha tsha ba'i dngos po med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis blangs nas/ byin gyis brlabs nas/ dgra bcom pa gzhon nu 'od zer skyes zhes bya bar mtshan btags so/ /de nas gzugs can snying pos
67a2(rgyud 'grel): blangs te/ lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa kyang ltas so/ /ngo mtshar che'o/ /mi rnams kyis kyang ngo mtshar che'o zhes bltad mo ltas so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pas/ lha rdzas kyi me
67a3(rgyud 'grel): tog gi char phab po/ /lha'i rol mos mchod pa byas so/ /mu stegs gcer bu'i tshan pa de pham mo/ /bdud pham mo/ /'od zer gyi dra ba 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i nges tshig go/ /mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan mo ni dpe yin te/
67a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du mtshan mo'i me ni shin tu gsal bas mtshan mo zhes bya'o/ /ri bo'i spol me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dper na mi zhig gis ri bo chen po la 'bar ba mthong bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gser
67a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi ri bo nas gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ gser zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /ri bo chen po ltar zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o/ /lham me lhan ne zhes bya ba ni 'od zer sna tshogs so/ /rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa
67a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ mun nag gi nang nas me 'bar ba mthong ba bzhin du mthong ngo/ /gshegs pa ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su'o/ /mthong ba ni li tsa byi rnams kyis so/ /mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni gus pa'i sems
67a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas sems de 'khril
67b1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sems dad bar gyur pa de dag ces bya ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi mi rnams so/ /byi dor byed pa zhes bya ba ni dad pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por/ /lam gang
67b2(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs pa'i lam de 'phyag cing chag chag 'debs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i lam la gzhan rnams kyis kyang tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i chus sa gzhi rnam par dag par byas pa'o/ /byi dor byas me tog 'thor zhes
67b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sa gzhi mthon dman med par byas la me tog sna tshogs kyis sil mar bkram la me tog gi phreng ba'i dra bas brgyan pa'o/ /dar gyi lnga ldi dang dril bu dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te zhes bya ba ni/ grong
67b4(rgyud 'grel): khyer gyi phyogs bzhir yang bar snang gi phyogs su de rnams 'phyar ba'o/ /bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer gyi phyogs dang mtshams su bdag spos sna tshogs kyis pog por bzhag pa dang bum pa gang ba bzhag
67b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /ga la ga der song ste ga la ba der dong ste byin pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su'o/ /zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi mi rnams dang li tsa byi rnams kyis
