89b7(rgyud 'grel): gcad par 'tshal bar khrus bgyis pa zas dkar gsum 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na/ dkyil 'khor legs par byas pa/ sa gzhi 'jam po legs pa la/ rnam lnga dag gis phyug par bya/ /mkhas pa dag gis thig btab la/ sa
90a1(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna lngas bri bar bya/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ /ze 'bru'i steng du nyi ma yin/ /de steng rdo rje'i rigs su gnas/ /de bzhin pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ /shar phyogs lho dang nub phyogs byang/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rigs
90a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bzhugs/ /de dag stong chen rab 'joms ma/ /rigs ni lnga ru yang dag shes/ /shar lho lho nub nub byang shar yang dag tu/ /d+hu pe ma la sogs pa yin/ /mu khyud rdo rjes bskor ba yin/ /phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo
90a3(rgyud 'grel): de dag bzhin no/ /gza' rnams de la dgod par bya/ /de bzhin du ni mu khyud la/ /skar ma rnams ni yang dag shes/ gru bzhi lha rnams phyogs phyogs la/ /phyogs spyod bcu ni yang dag dgod/ /shar phyogs dang ni lho phyogs dang/ /nub phyogs byang dang
90a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo dag la/ /rgyal po bzhi ni yang dag bzhugs/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ /twa ra rnam bzhi sna tshogs brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma rgya gram dang/ /rdo rje ra ba me ris bskor/ /stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag/ bgegs rnams phyogs phyogs
90a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /gtor ma sna tshogs phyogs phyogs su/ /rigs ni lta zhing mkhas pas bgyis/ /mda' dang mdung dang ral gri dang/ phur pa dag la tshon skud bskor/ /lnga 'am gcig gam gang yang rung/ /bkra shis bum pa yang dag dgang//
90a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin chen byang chub shing/ /'bru dang snying po bdud rtsi dang/ /dri dang gos kyis legs par brgyan/ /bzhi po'i dbus su yang dag bzhag /lus khrus dag dang yid khrus dang/ dri ma med pa'i gos gon la/ /bsnyung par byas nas yang dag tu/
90a7(rgyud 'grel): yang na dkar gsum la ni brten/ /snying rje ldan zhing sems can la/ /tshul khrims de la yang dag bsrungs/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga yang dag bzhugs/ /de dag bstan pa'o// //zas sna spangs pa zhes bya ba
90b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sha ran? sgog pa bsres pa dang/ chang dang nya sha la sogs dang/ /de dag la ni spangs par bgyi/ /mi slob pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su gzung zhes bya ba ni/ /yang dag sems dang mtshungs pa dang/ /sdom pa gsum dang yang dag ldan/ /sdig pa thams cad spang bar
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /mi rnams thams cad grong pa dang/ /sdom pa la ni gnas pa bya/ /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na/ mi dge bcu ni spang byas pa/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom bya ba/ /grong dang grong la 'thab spangs pa/ /rang sems
90b3(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin gzhan dag dang/ /thabs rtsod thams cad spangs par bya/ /shin tu brgyan pa gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ bud med skyes pa de bzhin du/ /dri ma med pa legs par bgo/ /gser dang mu tig la sogs pa/ /lus la shin tu legs par
90b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ des grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dang sum mdo dang zhes bya ba ni/ cho ga gar byed pa'i sa ru/ ba'i rnam lnga dang/ tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri bzang po'i chus/ /thams cad byugs te/ mi gtsang ba rnam bor nas/ spos
90b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis bdugs te/ gos dang me tog gi 'phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /khyim rnams nyal nyil gyi phung po ma mchis par bgyis te zhes bya ba ni/ phyag dar bzang po byas nas su/ /sna lnga dri dang gtor bar bya/ /grong ngam grong khyer thams cad du/ /de bzhin
90b6(rgyud 'grel): la ni gtor bar bya/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi dbus kyi dgos rnams su me tog gi sil ma bkram pa zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer dbus dang gzhan dag dang/ gang yang rung ste khyim la sogs/ me tog chu skyes thad skyes dang/ dus las byung te gang yang rung//
90b7(rgyud 'grel): spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu gdug par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lhan cig sbyor dang gzhan dag dang/ /a ga ru sogs gang yang rung/ /phyogs bzhir bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis pa brgyan ces bya ba ni/ bram ze mo 'am rgyal rigs sam/ rjes rigs la
91a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs gang yang rung/ /bsnyung bar byas nas tshul khrims srung/ /skyes pa la sogs spangs byas pa/ yang na zas ni dkar gsum bsten/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis nyi shu gnyis/ /mtshan nyid legs pa byad mdzes pa/ /dri ma can gyi gos kyang spang/ /lag
91a2(rgyud 'grel): na mtshon thogs pa bzhi dang/ dril bu bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu de dag dang mtshan thogs nas/ ral gri la sogs g.yas na 'dzin/ /dril bu dkrol zhing bkra shis 'don/ /glu gar la sogs de bzhin no/ /rin po che snod bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o zhes bya ba
91a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ grong ngam grong khyer grong rdal du/ grong par de bzhin bzhag par bya/ yang na chos ga byed pa'i sa/ phyogs bzhi la ni yang dag bzhag/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe gdugs shar ba dang/ rig sngags klag par bgyi ste zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du phyogs bzhi phyogs
91a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams su/ /dag mi 'dre bar yang dag gdon/ /bsnyung bar bya zhing gtsang sbra bsten/ /yang na zas ni dkar gsum bsten/ /yi ge bris te mchod rten chen po zhes bya ba ni/ gser ram dngul las byas pa yi/ bum pa dang ni tsha tsha dang/ de la sogs pa gang yang
91a5(rgyud 'grel): rung/ yi ge bris te 'khor lo la/ de bzhin du ni rtse mo la/ /mchod rten la sogs yang dag bzhag/ bal srang drug cu tham pa la/ /bkal nas mchod pa bya ba'o/ /dar ram ras sam srin bal la/ /gang yang rung ste skud pa la/ tshon ni sna tshogs byas nas su//
91a6(rgyud 'grel): grong ngam grong khyer yang dag bskor/ /shing ljon pa chen po dang rgyal mtshan chen po'i rtse mo la stod de btags la/ me tog sna tshogs dang/ spos sna tshogs dag gis zhes bya ba ni/ de la sogs pa mthon po'i gnas su/ sngar bshad pa'i 'khor lo btags nas/ bal
91a7(rgyud 'grel): lam ras la byas pa'i skud pa srang drug cu tham pa byas pas shing la sogs pa la gdags par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du mchod pa yang bya'o/ dgung zla phyed kyi bar du mchod par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gcig
91b1(rgyud 'grel): gam gsum 'am lnga yang rung/ /de bzhin bdun dang dgu dang ni/ bcu gcig dang ni bco lnga'o/ /gdugs re re zhing rig sngags klag go zhes bya ba ni/ snga dro'i dus su bya'o/ /yang na rgyun mi 'chad pa klag go/ de ltar na yang yul 'khor yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro
91b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ dbang blangs ngo/ /khrus bya'o/ /bkra shis brjod/ /gdon no/ /rol ma sogs bya'o/ /bkra shis kyi rdzas gdon par bya'o/ /de dag ni grong khyer bsrung ba'i cho ga'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o// //de ltar grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa
91b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang rung ba/ /yang na nad pa'i khyim mo/ /phyugs lhas rnams nyal nyil ma mchis par bgyi ste zhes bya ba ni/ legs par phyag dang byas nas/ ba'i rnam lngas gtor te/ hom khung zlum por byas nas/ cho ga ji bzhin du gtor bar bya'o/ /rdzas ni
91b4(rgyud 'grel): til dang mar la sogs pa/ /ku sha la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /seng ldeng dang rgya shug la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhi ba'i shing gang yang rung ba/ dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste zhes bya ba ni/ hom khung la sogs pa la gtor bar bgyi'o/ /sgo
91b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon na dri sna tshogs la zhes bya ba ni/ gang ba'i bum pa yang g.yas g.yon du bzhag go/ dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul ba ste/ de bzhin du me lha la khrus bya'o/ /sa bon thams cad mar gyis bkus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o zhes
91b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sarba pA pa ni da ha na badzra shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ chab skor tshon skud sna tshogs bre bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mda' dang/ mdung dang/ ral gris bskor bar bya'o/ /dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su gyur pa dag ni bton la slar yang gzung bar bgyi'o zhes bya
91b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ dud 'gro rnams phyir btang ste/ yang bzhugs par bya'o/ /yang na bgegs gang gnod pa'i ming byang bcug la/ me la gtong bar bya'o/ /rig sngags kyang klag par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ gtsang sbrar la brten rgyun mi chad par klag par bgyi'o/ /yi ge bris saM
92a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo/ /'dud pa 'dud te zhes bya ba ni srung skud da/ /mthon po'i khar btags la mchod par bgyi zhing bya ba ni/ mchod rten chen po'i rtse mo 'am/ rang nyal ba'i steng ngam/ ya them la gdags pa 'am/ gdung gi log sa
92a2(rgyud 'grel): la gdags pa tsam gyis kyang/ gnod byed dang nad thams cad la sogs pa yang mi tshugs pa'o/ /nad pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam zhes bya ba ni gser ram dngul lam zangs saM/ rang ris la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel
92a3(rgyud 'grel): lam zhes bya ba ni zangs sam dngul la sogs pa la byas pa'i mchod rten nam/ rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/ bum pa zhabs phug la/ dri 'am sman la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ /khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor la
92a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni sngon du bshad pa bzhin no/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs sam zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor yang dag par bris la bgyi'o/ /yang na bag phye 'am 'bras phye la sogs pa la gzugs byas la/ dkyil 'khor la yang dag par
92a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ phyag rgya bzhi bgyis la bzhag par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ phyag rgya bzhi ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo yin te/ dar ram ras sam shing shun la sogs pa la cho ga bzhin du bris la/ nad pa la yang dag par gdags so/ /me tog
92a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang/ spos sna tshogs dang zhes bya ba ni/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis phyag rgya bzhi'i mchod par bya'o/ /tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin ded dbon dang/ 'phrog ma la sogs
92a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ming gis/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi ming dang gzugs byas nas/ mchod pa dang ming byas nas a rga bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ rig sngags
92b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang dag par mchod do/ /gzungs kyang dag ma 'dres par klag par bya'o/ de rnams kyang stobs dang dbang phyug dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa bdag la bde legs su gyur cig/ bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang rig
92b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams so/ /nad pa rnams nad thams cad las thar bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du byas na the tshom med do/ /nad pa'i zas dang skoM dang zhes bya ba ni
92b3(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i sngags bton nas/ byin gyis brlabs pa bya'o/ /sman rnams kyang rig sngags 'di btab ste/ stsal bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni phyi nas 'dod pa'i sngags rlabs nas/ bden pa yang dag par bdar bar bya'o/ /rdzogs sangs
92b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams sangs rgyas tshe/ /'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas zhes bya ba ni rdzogs sangs rgyas ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'jig rten skyong ba ni brgya byin la sogs pas te/ de rnams yang phyogs bcur skyong ba'o/ /snod bzhi
92b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni blabs nas su/ /bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ dang po bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul te/ gnyis pa phyogs skyong la sogs pa la sbyin pa'o/ /mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa/ /lha yi snod mchog de dag ni zhes
92b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing dag pa'i snod du'o/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /ston pa'i phyag na bsnams 'gyur ba/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas byung ba/ rig sngags kyi nus mthu'i bdud rtsi'o//
92b7(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur bar shog/ ces bya ba ni/ nad pa'i zas dang skom dang sman la sogs pa 'di'i byin brlabs kyi bdud rtsir 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis/ /lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/ /zhes bya ba
93a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nad pa rnams kyi ma lta bu/ /lha mos kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la a ru ra phul ba'o/ /blangs nas ston la rab phul ba/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams zhes bya ba ni/ /de phul ba'i bden pas kyang/ 'dir nad
93a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la bdud rtsir snang ba'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /nad pa rnams kyi nad sel cing zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi bden pas nad rnams sel bar byed pa'o/ /nyes pa thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir
93a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur par shog /ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi stobs dang gzi brjid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud rtsir snang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams gzigs gzi brjid dang/ /gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi dus su 'das
93a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs gzi brjid kyis/ /sems can gyi don byas pa de bzhin du gtsug tor can gyi stobs kyis sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang/ log dang sel gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ zhes bya ba ni/
93a5(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa gnyis pa'i dus su sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyi bden pas sems can gyi don bya ste/ de bzhin log dang sel gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang don sems can gyi byas pa'o/ /gser thub kyi ni ye shes dang/ 'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang zhes
93a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /skal pa gsum pa'i dus su/ /bder gshegs gser thub kyi ye shes kyis/ sems can gyi don byas pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can gyi don byas pa'o/ /shAkya seng ge thub rnams kyis/ /sman rnams
93a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsir gyur par shog /ces bya ba ni/ bskal pa thams cad snyigs ma lnga'i dus su/ /mthu'i stobs kyis sems can gyi don byas pas/ de rnams kyi bden pas 'dir yang sman rnams bdud rtsir snang ba'o/ /nad pa shar phyogs kha bstan pa/
93b1(rgyud 'grel): sman rnams nye bar stsal bar gyi zhes bya ba ni/ bden bden pas 'di'i tshig dang/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'dod du byas pas nad pa la bdud rtsi sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i tshe na rig sngags 'di zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar mo g.yas na rdo rje dang g.yon na rin
93b2(rgyud 'grel): po che 'dzin pa/ spyan gsum pa dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhi ba'i gzugs can zhabs phyed skyil tu bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gdan/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la don byed
93b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rdo rje rigs ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /lag thil bzhag ste klag par bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags rgyal mo de bzhin du bsgoms nas/ rig sngags kyi zhal nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /rig sngags gang zhe na/ sya t+the daM 'di lta ste/  
93b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni kha de kha de la sogs pa'o/ /rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur/ bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom pas ste zhes bya ba ni/ de gsum gyi gzhi blangs pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po rnams kyang/ /bden pa tshig
93b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rigs kyi gsang sngags kyis/ nad thams cad bcom zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag la rtag tu bde legs shog ces bya ba ni nad pa dang mdza' yas kyi sems can thams cad do/ /rims nad la sogs pa sel ba'i cho ga ste brgyad pa'o// //
93b6(rgyud 'grel): byad dang ro langs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la/ skyes pa'am bud med gdugs zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngags gtang ba dang rbod gtong gtang ba dang/ 'dze dang 'phol mig dang/ lhog pa dang/ dug dang dug sbyar ma dang sman dang/
93b7(rgyud 'grel): sman nyes pa dang/ sa bdag la sogs pa'i nad thams cad smyo ba dang/ 'bog pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rab tu bkrus pa shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ byad kyis phog pa dang/ slob dpon yid bzhin no/ /des dags sa la me tog sil
94a1(rgyud 'grel): ma bkram ste zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa la brten la/ slob dpon mkhas pas cho ga yang dag par bya ste/ de bzhin sta gon gyi cho ga'o/ /mchod pa rnams pa lnga la sogs pa byas nas/ ye shes sems dpa' 
94a2(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin no/ /a rga la sogs pas yang dag par mchod do/ /spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs la zhes bya ba ni/ byang kyis phog pa dang/ bum pa rnams la gdug pa dang/ de bzhin du lha rnams kyang yin no/ /seng ldeng dang rgya shug rigs gnyis
94a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhugs bus te zhes bya ba ni/ thabs khung zur gsum khru gang tshad du byas pa/ nag po'i sum brtsegs sor bzhi byas pa'o/ /pad+ma gsum pa phyi logs su byas pa/ nang du yang de bzhin du yin te/ /me lha nag po khro bor nag po la zhon pa/ g.yas
94a4(rgyud 'grel): na ral gri/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin pa/ kha gdangs pa/ me'i mdog kyang de bzhin no/ /sa bon thams cad phyogs bzhir gtor bar dgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzas ni til la sogs pa yin te/ sha sna tshogs dang/ 'bru sna
94a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang/ dus kyi me tog gang yang rung ste/ bag phye 'am 'bras la sogs pas gzugs byas la/ laM ga kha dog kyang de bzhin no/ /zhugs kyi nang du yang gtor bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ rdzas de rnams dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi
94a6(rgyud 'grel): re mos blug par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba thams cad dang me tog thams cad tshon skud 'tshol brgyus te zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi me tog sna tshogs dang byas gang gnod pa'i ming dus sam /mtshon cha la sogs pa'i rtse mo la btags la//
94a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhir gdags so/ /de bzhin du byas kyis phog pa'i mgul tu yang gdags so ral gri 'am mdung rtse gsum pa'am/ mdung ngam mda' la gdags par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ hom bung gi zur du bzhi bzhi btsugs la sngar
94b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i gdags pa'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs sbyangs te/ bum pa chen po'i nang du blug la/ gang byad kyis phog pa de'i mgul ba skud pa des bcings te bum pa chab kyis bkru bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i gzhung bzhin du bzlas pa byas nas mtshon cha
94b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam sna gcig btags la gcig byang phog pa'i ske la gdags so/ /de nas stong chen mo'i rang bzhin bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la sku gsung thugs dag par bya'o/ /skud pa yang mtshon gyis bcad de zhugs kyi nang du dor ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mor bsams
94b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ rig sngags kyi ral grir byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang dang ro langs sngags su bsams la/ sregs par bya'o/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ de'i dus su phyogs su ngag ma 'dres par gdon par bya'o//
94b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bden pa bdar la/ mched pa bgyi'o/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sku gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ lhag ma mthong nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pa ste/
94b5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don byed pa/ de bzhin du nyan thos rnams kyis kyang bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas don byed pa'o/ /tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong/ /gnod sbyin ded dpon dbang phyug dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa la sogs
94b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag mtshan dbyug gus gsum dang rdo rje dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba so so'i phyag mtshan gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon bzhin te/ dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum mo/ /de bzhin gnod sbyon stobs chen dang/ 'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams
94b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi so so rang rang gi stobs dang gzi brjid do/ /de dag mthu dang gzi brjid kyis/ ro langs las rnams 'chang gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ byad dang/ ro langs dang/ sngags dang/ spong gtong dang/ dug dang dug spyor dang de rnams chad par gcang par 'gyur ba'o//
95a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang/ me yis bung shing bsreg pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje pha lam gyi mu men la sogs pa phig ste/ de bzhin du mes kyang thams cad bsregs pa'o/ /rlung gis sprin ni 'thor ba dang/ /nyi mas nags tshal skems
95a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ bar snang gi sprin 'thug po yang rlung gis gtor nas/ mi snang bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du nyi mas kyang rgya mtsho skems pa'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /byad stems las rnams tshig par shig ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin
95a3(rgyud 'grel): du sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' yang bden ste/ de rnams kyi gzi brjid dang stobs rig sngags kyis gsang sngags kyis/ byang dang ro langs la sogs pa tshig pa'o/ /spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis/ sdig pa thams cad nges par bsal zhes
95a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ spos la sogs pa gsal te/ rig sngags 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed pa'o/ /sya t+the daM zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags yin te/ rig sngags ni gang zhe na/ zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag mo/ spyan
95a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dbu skra ser po/ /dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas na ral gri gdengs pa/ g.yon na lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa zhabs pus btsugs su bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa'i zhabs rkyang pa/ nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng na gnod byed mnan pa/
95a6(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rgyan sprul gyis brgyan pa/ zhal gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rigs ma dang/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /rig sngags ni rig sngags kyi zhal nas byung ngo/ /klag
95a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /gsang par bya'o/ /bcom par bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /sngags ni hu me hu me la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du byas na the tsom med do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /lha thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag
95b1(rgyud 'grel): gi byad dang/ ro langs dang sman dang sngags dang/ dug dang dug sbyar ma rnams gcad do/ /bshig go /pham par byas so/ /pha rol pham par byas so zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa'i tshig de dag dang rig sngags kyi gsang sngags dmod mos 'tshig par byed pa'o/ /byang dang
95b2(rgyud 'grel): ro langs la sogs pa'i cho ga'i gnas skabs te dgu pa'o// //wa pa dang shu ba dang/ smyo ba dang/ 'bras dang/ 'brum bu dang/ skong po dang/ dug 'thungs pa la sogs pa thar par 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dang por rang gis phyag gis bgyi'o//
95b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa chus gdab po/ /gsum pa dur bas bya'o/ /bzhi pa rtsa ku shas bya'o/ /lnga pa rma bya'i sgros sel lo/ /drug pa mtshon gyis brdeg go /bdun pa rang gis sos bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas nas the tshom med de/ des ma sos na las kyi rnam par smin
95b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yin te gang gis kyang mi sos so/ /lhog pa yang de bzhin bya'o/ /dug za bar 'gyur na chu la btab na 'thung du gzhug go /shin tu khrus bgyis pa brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags dang/ 'gog pa la sogs pa spangs par bgyi'o/ /stan bzang
95b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i steng du mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag gi nad kyis btab pa yin te/ lus bde ba dang/ ngag bde ba/ sems bde bar byas la/ bzlas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ngag ma 'dres par rig
95b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo gdon par bya'o/ /de bas bden pa brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang/ rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzi brjid
95b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis dug bcom ste dang sangs rgyas kyis kyang sku'i don byed pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa bdag gi mthu dag dang/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang/ nyon mongs pa bcom ste/ gsang sngags
96a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa yang dag gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang/ maung+gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos kyi tshogs su gyur pa la/ shes rab la grags pa dang rdzu 'phrul la grags pa'o/ /ma 'gags
96a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi mig dang ni/ 'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos de gnyis la yang mthong bar grags pa dang/ sems can la byams par grags pa'o/ /kauN+Di n+ya'i sngar thob dang/ /kun dga' bo yis thos pa dang zhes bya ba ni
96a3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos su gyur pa de gnyis kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' thob pa dang/ thos pa mang po byas pa'o/ /tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang/ /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhing/ sum bcu rtsa gsum la
96a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dbang du 'dus pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu skyong bar byed pa de'i bdag por gnas pa/ lha dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /ded dpon rnams
96a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi nus mthu dang/ 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten khams su mthu che bar grags pa/ 'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa yang/ 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzigs
96a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dug ni dug med shog /ces bya ba ni/ gang gis dug ni dug la sogs pa 'thung ba ni de rnams kyi mthu dang gzi brjid kyis dug gis mi tshugs shing/ nges par bcom mo/ /dug med dug rnams 'jigs byed pa/ /gsang
96a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshig rnams de lags so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags ni/ ha ri ke shi Ni la sogs pa'o/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i gsang sngags kyi tshig gis dug gsum nges par 'joms pa'o/ /gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags
96b1(rgyud 'grel): so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags ni gang zhe na/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu /spyan gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ cung zad khro mo g.yas na ral gri dang rma bya'i sgro 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa na rdo rje dang sprul 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad ni sprul
96b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa/ zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa'o/ /nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng na mdza' yas dang/ 'jog po mnan pa'o/ /'od nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /'bras dang rma dang shu ba dang/ g.yon
96b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni 'brum bu dang/ lhog pa dang ni g.ya' ba ni/ bdun pa las te rab tu bcom zhes bya ba ni/ /'jig rten nang gi dug gsum ma spongs pas phyi'i dug gsum pa de dag 'byung ste/ 'dir yang gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'di dag
96b4(rgyud 'grel): nges par bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste zhes bya ba ni/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan no/ /de dag ni dug chen po zhes bya'o/ /zhe sdang gis ni mi la phrag dog la sogs pa byas
96b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ de dag kyang dug chen po zhes bya'o/ /gti mug ni ma rig pa yin te/ de dag kyang dug chen po yin no/ /yang na sku'i dug /gsung gi dug thugs kyi dug dang gsum mo/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'am/ /'jig rten gyi dug gsum la/
96b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gis rang dug gtang ba'o/ /yang na ni rang gis rang sel du btub ste/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi sel lo/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga' / /zhes bya ba ni/ rang gis rang gi dug bcom ste/
96b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /de bas na dug mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ dug ni gsum yin te/ 'gro ba'i dug dang/ 'dug pa'i dug dang/ byas pa'i dug dang gsum mo/ /'gro
97a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dug la bzhi ste/ tshor ba mthong ba/ reg pa khas blangs pa bzhi'o/ /'dus pa'i dug ni sa la skyes pa ste/ sa ma ya 'bum sde'o/ /byed pa'i dug ni/ sbyor ba la sogs pa ste/ dper na kham phor gyi nang du mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam par byas
97a2(rgyud 'grel): nas zhag bdun bzhag ste/ mchod rten gyi mdun du mchod par bya ba dang/ /sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ mchod pa bya ba dang/ dus khyad par du 'phags pa ni/ rig sngags klag par gyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ de dag gi tshul khrims dang ldan par bgyis la/
97a3(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags gdon par bgyi'o/ /me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga dang ldan par bgyis la/ 'byung po dag la yang gtor ma sbyin no/ /tshes brgyad kyi tshe na ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag ces bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i gzugs su byas
97a4(rgyud 'grel): nas mchod par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems par zhes bya ba ni/ sngon du bshad pa bzhin du/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i mchod par bya'o/ /ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni yul 'khor srung dang/ 'phags
97a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes po dang/ spyan mi bzang dang rnam thos sras dang/ mchod pa yang dag par bya'o/ /tshes bcu bzhi'i che na rgyal po chen po bzhi dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ yang nas yang du mchod pa la sogs pa bgyid de/ nad pa la
97a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa 'tshe ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do/ /tshes bco lnga'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag nyid/ sems dpar bgyid cing ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gi de
97a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du byas par 'gyur na/ nad dang sdug bsngal gyis mi tshugs te/ dus dus su rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang 'khor bar 'gyur ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang zhes bya ba ni/ sems ma dad pa gang gis kyang/ 'di la gus
97b1(rgyud 'grel): par byas na tshugs par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'di zhes bya ba'i/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas gdab pa'o/ /len pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ ston pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub
97b2(rgyud 'grel): par bgyid pa de ni/ srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing/ phan par bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas lta ba/ gzhan yang 'di'i bslabs pas/ byams pa snying rjer ldan pas so//
97b3(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la zhes bya ba ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung zhing/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa rgyal po chen po dag la yang gus par byas nas/ don 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gos dang zas dang/
97b4(rgyud 'grel): mal cha dang stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis/ ming 'bril bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du byas par 'gyur na/ sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'gyur zhing/ nad rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sems can thams cad
97b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang/ sti stang bgyid par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams kyang gus par byas pa'o/ /rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis kyang/ bla mar bgyi ba dang/ rim gro ba gyi ba? dad mchod par bgyid par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/
97b6(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad pa bzhin du de dag gis kyang lus ngag yid kyis gus par byas pa'o/ /gzhan mu stegs can dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa can dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ mdza' ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur la/
97b7(rgyud 'grel): so zhes bya ba ni/ mu stegs kyi rigs lta ba mi cig pa sum brgya drug cu yod kyang drug cu bsdus te/ drug po gnyis su bsdud pa'i lta ba rnams kyis kyang 'dir gong du bshad pa bzhin tu gus par byas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des
98a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsang mar bgyis te zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su mi'i lus su skye ste/ rigs las 'phags pa rgyal po dang bram ze dang rje 'u'i rigs su skye'o/ /lus gtsang ba dang/ gos dang rgyan dang mal cha dang/ stan dang yo
98a2(rgyud 'grel): byad khyad par can dang gtsang mar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge pa bcu spangs shing phun gsum tshogs pa/ dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'o/ /yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyid yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang/ rten par mi bgyid/ yul ngan pa na
98a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/ mdza' 'khob tu ni mi skye zhing/ de dag gis mi rnams dang/ gnas pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde
98a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di dran par 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni/ rims nad dang/ yams nad dang de la sogs pa thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ smyo 'bog la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyal po chen po bdag nyid/ bsrung
98a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi po de dag kyang stong chen mo la gus par byed pa ni ma nus so/ /'khor de dag gis kyang byed mi nus so/ /skyob pa dang sped par byed par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/ gang gis gnod par byed par 'gyur na/ mthong
98a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mi nus so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ba zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po med pa dngos po dang bral ba rang bzhin du dag pa/ nam mkha' i ngo bo bzhin du yin te/ brjod pa yang
98a7(rgyud 'grel): med brjod du yang med do/ /gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/ nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di yi gzhung bzhin du bsgom pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin 'chang ba dang rgya cher 'phel ba'o/ /de la
98b1(rgyud 'grel): lo gcig bar du mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/ yud tsam du gus par byas nas yang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams so/ /'jig rten skyong dang zhes bya ba ni/ me lha dang srin po dang rlung lha dang/ dbang ldan dang gshin
98b2(rgyud 'grel): rje dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sa bdag rnams so/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni/ u ma de ba lha yin te/ yab yum gnyis dang ngo/ /gnod sbyin ded dpon thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ ded dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang mthu'bo che nyi shu rtsa brgyad do//
98b3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa ni gsum yin te/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang/ sa la rgyu ba dang/ sa 'og la rgyu ba dang/ gsum mo/ /nam mkha' la rgyu ba ni tshangs pa'o/ /sa la rgyu ba ni khyab 'jug chen po'o/ /sa 'og la rgyu ba ni dbang phyug chen
98b4(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /'phrog ma'i bu dang/ bcas pa yang zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog ma'i bu ni lnga brgya ste/ yab ni gnod sbyin pany+tsi ka'o/ /'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa la gnod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta bu yin te/ nyal nas rdul zhing skrag par 'gyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
98b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra yang 'byin/ /tshig pa za zhing rdul bar byed/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs bstan pa/ /'khru bar byed cing skyug par byed pa/ de dag 'phrog ma'i bu'i mtshan nyid do/ /de dag gi cho ga ni bshad par bya'o/ /sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la
98b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas nas/ rig sngags ni bklag par bya'o/ /yas rtags ni sha la nya sha bskal nas/ chan dang chang dang khur ba la sogs pa gtor ma la bzhag nas/ chang bu gsum yang mar gyis byugs la ha ri te zhes bya ba'i ming gton la
98b7(rgyud 'grel): gtang ngo/ /de nas byis pa khyi'u mang po bos la/ 'bru tshan nam sran ma'i chan bcos la/ byis pa la ston mo bya'o/ /de ltar byas na the tshom med do/ /thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ de dag rnams kyis thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs
99a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi mdun du'o/ /sgra skrad gcig tu 'di skad gsol zhes bya ba ni de dag rnams kyis skad cig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /nyi ma stong ltar bsal ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i
99a2(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid dang/ /mthu dang stobs de bzhin du yin no/ /zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba nya ba bzhin du 'od gsal ba de bzhin du/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms mas kyang/ sems can thams cad la 'od gsal ba'o/ /lha ming bcas
99a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'jig rten na zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bgegs rnams rjes su gcod pa la drag po ste/ yang na stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad skyob pa la drag po'o/ /khyod
99a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba yongs ma mchis zhes bya ba ni/ sngon du yang ma byung ste/ phyi nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin no/ /legs sam legs par sbyar na ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la dad pas 'dzin pa rnams la bkra shis pa'i rgyu yin no/ /gnod sbyin srin po rnams
99a5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /rgyal srid thar gyid ces bgyi ba zhes bya ba ni/ de la gus par byed pa thams cad la kho'i rgyal srid las thar ba'o/ /rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba
99a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni rtse mo ste/ bsrung ba gang gis khyad par du 'phags pa'o/ /de gang zhe na/ 'khor bar gnas med mya ngan 'das med do/ /gnyis ka med cing sdug bsngal 'joms byed pa/ rig sngags rgyal mo drags ma yin//
99a7(rgyud 'grel): stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten na/ srung pa'i mdo sde dam pa lags zhes bya ba ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par gsungs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams khyab pa/ 'dis srung pa dang skyobs pa dang skyobs pa
99b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa la'o/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mchog khyod la zhes bya ba ni/ skyes bu rnams kyi dam pa stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ chos spyod pa 'dud pa'i thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal nas
99b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ de nyid ni kho na nyid do/ /myong 'gyur snang na ni ming gi gtso bo ste/ de dag kyang mi'i nang nas byung ba'o/ /yon tan gyi gnas skabs ste/ bco lnga pa'o//
99b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas zhes bya ba ni/ phan yon bshad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das nub ka'i dus kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi 'khor dge slong la sogs pa la bka' stsal ba'o/ /nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul ba la sogs pa
99b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' yin te/ gsang ba la gnas bka' stsal ba'o/ /dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong lnga bcu la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong dag stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde la long zhig ces bya ba ni/ dad pa skyed la gus
99b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyis shig ces bya ba'o/ /tshangs shig /ltogs shig /ston cig/ kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gus par gzhan rnams kyis kyang rgya cher 'phel ba'o/ /de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la/ yun ring po'i don la phan pa dang/ ?
99b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la reg par gnas par 'gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma la yang bde bar gnas pa'o/ /dge slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni/
99b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang gzhan yang mtshungs pa med de/ /'di la gang gis kyang gus par 'dzin pa'o/ /mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pas dad pa skyes nas de bzhin du
100a1(rgyud 'grel): tshe thung ba rnams la tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa ni shis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba mi thob pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang/ bu med pa bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ gang gi sgo nas kyang 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
100a2(rgyud 'grel): las lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta ci smos te zhes bya ba ni/ gzhi bems po yang de bzhin du snang ste/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa mi la sogs pa'i sems can
100a3(rgyud 'grel): yang/ tshe thung ba rnams tshe ring bar byed pa/ longs spyod med pa rnams longs spyod dang ldan pa 'gro ba ris drug gi sdug bsngal yang 'joms par byed pa'o/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni/ da ltar byas pa da ltar 'byang pa'o//
100a4(rgyud 'grel): dge dang mi dge ba de bzhin de yin te/ dper na zhag tu lon pa'i 'o ma bskol tu mi btub pa bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin no/ /des na sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan
100a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi bka' stsal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis/ 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong rnams kyis zhu ba phul lo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa ni/ 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni
100a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams te/ de bzhin du ye shes rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas kyang yod de/ skye mched drug dang khams lnga'i sgo nas yang yin no/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang/ rma bya chen
100a7(rgyud 'grel): mo dang so sor 'brang ma dang/ bsil ba'i 'tshal dang/ gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs su zhugs so/ /yang na 'dul ba'i dbang du
100b1(rgyud 'grel): byas na phal chen pa dang/ thams cad smra ba dang/ gnas brtan pa dang/ mang pos bkur ba dang/ gcig ni rigs la mi gtogs te/ yang na rigs thams cad ngo bo nyid yin no/ /yang bstan pa'o/ /bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ dmar rigs
100b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gdol ba'i rigs so/ /de dag kyang kri ya'i dbang du 'gyur na/ bram ze'i rigs zhes bya'o/ /de dag ni sems can gyi don la byas te/ grong khyer yang pa can du gsungs pa dang/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba nas gsungs
100b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du gsungs pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i yul du gsungs pa dang/ bya rgod phung po'i ril gsungs pa dang/ de dag ni mdo chen mo lnga yin no/ /zas sna lnga ni zhes bya ba ni/ sha dang 'dres pa'i zas yin te/ de
100b4(rgyud 'grel): yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rnam pa lngas yongs su spongs la tshongs shing ces kyang bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga ni dug dang 'dres pa'i zas yin te/ de yang
100b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las byung/ de dang mi ldan pa ni zas myung ba'o/ /zas bsod snyoms la brten de/ rab tu byung zhing ces gsungs na zhes bya ba ni/ re re mi 'gro zhing rab tu byung ba zla dang 'grogs shing gnas pa bsod snyoms kyi zas kyang chags pa
100b6(rgyud 'grel): med par gsum du bgo ste/ rang za ba dang yi dags dang gzhan la dbul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das zas rnams lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms ni nyung/ 'di ltar zas rnam lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mad lags na zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang
100b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la zas kyi don du zhus pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag gis ji ltar nan tan bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ gal te zas rnam pa lnga lhung bzed du lhung par 'gyur na/ thabs ci bdog ces pa'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang/ 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de ga la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga'i don la dge slong rnams la phan pa'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la
101a2(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'chang pa des zhes bya ba ni/ sdig pa dag kyang mi tshugs te/ zas sna lnga dag kyang med do//
101a3(rgyud 'grel): rma med pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i don yin te/ yang dag pa'i don ni gang zhe na/ gnyis su yang med gnyis su brtags pa yang med do/ /so sor brtags pa yang med do/ /gzungs zhes bya ba bdag nyid srung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba
101a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di yang/ dge slong rnams la yang dag par gsungs te/ de yang zas rnam lnga srung bar byed pa'o/ /chongs shig des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe/ zas la mi mthun ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba
101a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'di la rnam par rtog pa med par/ rig sngags 'dis sel ba'o/ /zas rnam lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zas rnam lnga ma 'dres so snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ gal te rgyus med pa'i sems can rnams
101a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis dad pas bsod snyoms la byon par gyur na/ de'i don la mi dmigs par bsam pa'o/ /'dus byas thams cad ni rtag ba'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus byas ni byas pa'i chos yin te/ de yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur snang
101a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /mi rtags pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang zhes bya ba ni/ rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu de yang/ lus kyi sdug bsngal du shes par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten
101b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams kyi sna ba 'di sgyu ma lta bu yang dmigs pa stong pa nyid du snang ba'o/ /zas rnams lnga po ga la yod/ /zas rnams lnga po su yi yin zhes bya ba ni/ zas kyi gnas kyang med cing bdag 'dzin pa yang med pa'o/ /su zhig zas rnam lnga po zas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzin
101b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhan med cing gzung bya yang ma grub pa'o/ /de bas na zas kyi mang yang med/ /brjod du med do/ /sems can ga la yod/ sems can dmigs su med do zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba yang ma grub cing/ mi dge ba grub pa yang med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
101b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i ye shes su snang ba'o/ /de zas rnam lnga dang 'dres na/ tshes brgyad dang/ bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga bdag la srung ba bya ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ gal te rnam par rtog pa skye bar 'gyur na/ rig sngags 'di'i thabs kyi srung
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ gtsang sbra la brten la kha shar phyogs su ltas la mkhal du gzhug pa'o/ /legs par srung pa shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ lo brgyad lon pa/ gzhan
101b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ma 'grogs pa shin tu gtsang sbra la brten pa'o/ /nyin zhag gcig zas gcad pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba zhes bya ba ni/ bsnyung bar byas shing za ma srung ba'o/ /skud pa dmar po bzhi bsgril du mkhal du bcug la zhes bya ba ni/ ras dang
101b6(rgyud 'grel): shing bal gyi skud pa kha dog bsgyur ba la bu mo des 'khal ba'o/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa rig sngags dran par bya ste/ skud pa de la 'dud la zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gis gzhung bzhin du mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa
101b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o/ /skud pa de mtshon sar pas bcad de zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon gzhan ma gcad pa'i mtshon gyis dum bu bdun du byed pa'o/ /rin po che'i snod dam lcags kyi snod kyang rung ba chus bkang ste zhes bya ba ni/ gser
102a1(rgyud 'grel): ram dngul la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i snod du tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'o/ /me tog dag gis khyad par khrom la zhes bya ba ni snod kyi nang du me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kyis
102a2(rgyud 'grel): bdugs te zhes bya ba ni/ a ka ru la sogs pas bdug par bya'o/ /yang na sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du rig sngags yang dag par mchod la/ cho ga bzhin du klag par bgyi'o/ /snod kyi nang nas skud pa de slar 'byor te ma byung gi bar du rig sngags
102a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan dang dag ma 'dres par gsang sngags 'don par bya'o/ /de yang lag pa la bcings la zhes bya ba ni/ skud pa nam 'byor ba dang/ bsod snyoms pa'i dge slong rnams srung ba'o/ /tshig 'di skad du brjod
102a4(rgyud 'grel): do zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa bdar ba'o/ /bram ze rnams kyis bsdus nas/ shAkya seng ges skyob pa la zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa phrag dog gi dug can la/ mu stegs kyi rigs can gyis bslus pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa shAkya seng ges yang thams cad
102a5(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa'o/ /dpal sbas kyis ni dug can gyi/ /bsod snyoms dag ni phul ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi dus su ma ga ta'i bdag po dpal sbas kyis phul ba'o/ /de las ni de ni blangs nas su/ ston pas dug ni bsal nas gsol zhes bya ba ni
102a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi dus su yang dug dang 'dres pa'i zas de yang/ rnam par rtog pa med par rig sngags kyi yon tan gyis sel ba'o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su/ zas ni bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ ces bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): bden pa dang/ rig sngags kyi nus mthus/ zas la dug med par snang ba'o/ /rnam par gzigs la lha gang dang/ /gtsug tor can kun skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la byams pa dang snying rjes lta zhing/ sangs rgyas gtsug tor can  
102b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis kyang 'gro ba rigs drug la skyob pa'o/ /log par dang sel ba dang/ stobs chen lha gang dang pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas log dang sel gyis kyang stobs dang ldan zhing bdud rnams btul ba'o/ /gser dang dpal ldan 'od srung dang/ shAkya yi ni seng ge la
102b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas de rnams kyang dpal dang ldan te/ dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'o/ /rab dang lha yi dbang po dang/ tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang phyug dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs khams dang 'dod khams la dbang byed pa/ gzi brjid
102b3(rgyud 'grel): dang stobs kyis so/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang/ nor bu bzang dang dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bzhi skyong zhing phyogs la dbang byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon thams cad la dbang byed pa'o/ /srin mo nag mo chen po dang de bzhin gdol
102b4(rgyud 'grel): ba gtung mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing bzang la dga' ba rnams so/ /me tog dang ni bdug pa dang/ bdag gi sbyin sreg 'di bzhes shig ces bya ba ni 'dir yang gang gi sbyin pa'i mchod pa de rnams bzhes par zhu'o/ /de
102b5(rgyud 'grel): dag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas/ bdag gi za zas byang bar mdzod/ /ces bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi zhal du gsol te/ bdag gi bsod snyoms yang zas lnga dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /kha zas lnga dang 'dres par yang/ /bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol zhes  
102b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ de dag gi nus pas zas lnga dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang/ zas de kun gyi bza' bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin zas dkar po la brten pa'o/ /sa bon dag ni mchog kun la/ sa yi bcud
102b7(rgyud 'grel): ni zhugs pa yi/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sa nas skyes pa'i sdig pa'i zas? su? ma gyur pa'o/ /kha zas 'dres pa thams cad kyang/ bdag la? ma? 'dres mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni/ dug dang zas rnams lnga dang 'dres par gyur kyang/ rig sngags kyi nus mthus 'dres pa
103a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o/ /ji ltar skud pa bcad bsregs pa/ de lta bu yang slar 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bden pa des kyang/ zas rnams lnga dang 'dres par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de lngar zas rnams 'dres pa yang zhes bya ba ni/ bde gshegs
103a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi bden pas/ zas 'dres pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o/ /ma 'dres par ni bdag la mdzod ces bya ba dang/ rig sngags kyi bden pa yin te/ rig sngags ni sku gzugs ni gang zhe na/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar mo//
103a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas can/ g.yas na rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na rdo rje dang zhags pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyel du bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gdan nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ma
103a4(rgyud 'grel): stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /gsang sngags ni gang zhe na/ ysya t+the? daM 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags ni kha kha me zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang/ ji ltar ma 'dres zas bzhin du/ /gang gis ji ltar skud bsreg pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
103a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi nus mthus skud pa de yang 'byor ba/ zas rnam pa lnga yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o/ /de 'dra ba yi bden pa mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni/ gsang ba'i snying po ste/ yang rig sngags gdon par bya'o/ /sya t+the? daM 'di
103a6(rgyud 'grel): lta ste gsang sngags ni ka la le la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang gtsug tor can/ de gshegs kun skyob sangs rgyas log par dad sel dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bzhi po de dag kyang/ sems can gyi don byas nas thugs
103a7(rgyud 'grel): rjes spyan gyis gzigs pa'o/ /gser thugs 'od srung shAkya thub pa gau ta ma/ bsnyems ba mi mnga' ba la skyabs su nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gsum po de dag gis kyang/ sems can rnams kyi don byas nas thugs
103b1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'o/ /yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gang zag gi skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /mi mchog bdun po de rnams kyi ni sku rnams la/ /me tog dag dang spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin mi'i tshogs gsog
103b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dam pa de rnams yang mi'i tshogs rdzogs pas sangs rgyas pa/ de'i yon tan dang ldan pa mi'i mchog bdun po de 'dud pa'o/ /lus dang yid dang rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ de dag rnams kyis skyabs su nye bar mchi bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni/
103b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zag rab tu gus par byed pa'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas de rnams la skyabs su song zhing gus par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che dang ldan pa de dag la/ lha gang mngon par dad pa rab tu yod pa yin zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
103b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa zhing/ thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /lha de mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dga' 'gyur nas zhes bya ba ni/ dga' de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis thams cad dga' zhing bde bar gyur pa'o/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis bdag la
103b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung du gsol zhes bya ba'i/ /lus dang ngag dang sems kyis kyang/ sems can thams cad srung ba ste/ dam pa'i chos 'di gus par byas na ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir mi ldog pa dang/ 'jig
103b6(rgyud 'grel): rten na yang dag par song ba dang/ yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dang/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' i zhing khams thob pa ste/ de bzhin
103b7(rgyud 'grel): du nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang yin no/ /lha tshe ring po'i yul du mi skye ba dang/ mdza' 'khob dang rigs ngan gyi yul du mi skye ba dang/ chom rkun dang rkun ma dang/ ngan song gsum nas thar ba dang/ de dag kyang rig sngags
104a1(rgyud 'grel): la dang bskyes pa yin no/ /de'i tshe na lha dang mi'i yul dang/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi dbus bram ze 'am rgyal rigs sam/ gang gi rigs bzang ba la skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nam skyes pa'i dus su yang chos 'di dang 'grogs par 'gyur ro/ /da
104a2(rgyud 'grel): lta'i tshe na yang 'jigs pa las skyob pa dang/ sba ba dang srung ba dang/ mtshams gcod pa la sogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang/ byad dang ro langs dang dug dang dug sbyor ba dang/ spod gtong dang sngags
104a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'byung po rnams kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsod snyoms kyi cho ga'i gnas skabs te bcu drug pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu
104a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms ma 'di/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la btad pa'o/ /dge slong de dag yi rang ste zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos lnga brgya dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge
104a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen ma dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs chen gyi lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po brgya byin dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang/ gnod
104a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ded dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang/ /gnod sbyin mthu bo che nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa lnga brgya dang/ mi'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang mi rnams la sogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
104a7(rgyud 'grel): bstod do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi/ mdun du gsungs so/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'bum 'grel dag pa lnga ba/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'grel pa/ las kyi rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
104b1(rgyud 'grel): */ (/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ma yu ri bidya rA dz+nyi su tra ta TI ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
104b2(rgyud 'grel): bya chen mo'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel zhes bya ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i sku ni bde chen po/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi don mdzad pa/ dpal ldan ye shes rang bzhin can/ /thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes mun
104b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /nga yis yang dag don bsams la/ /rig sngags 'bum 'grel bshad par bya/ /'di skad ces bya ba ni chos sku ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' o/ /bka' de ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/ de yang sku gsum gyi rang
104b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /chos sku ni stong pa nyid de/ mi dmigs pa ni ye shes so/ /de ni chos sku'o/ /de'i rang bzhin gyi grib mas me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /de'i rang bzhin gyis stong gsum khyab ste/ sprul
104b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de yang shAkya seng ge'o/ /'di ltar ni shAkya seng ge'i bka' ste/ de bas na 'di skad ces bya ba ni/ bdag gis zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin te/ /kun rdzob kyi cho de ni yang dag par log pa'o//
104b6(rgyud 'grel): log pa ni sgyu ma dang/ chu shing dang/ chu zla dang/ smig rgyu dang/ chu'i chu bur dang/ chu'i sbu ba dang/ rmi lam dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ de brgyad ni log ba'i rkun rdzob kyi sgyu ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i kun rdzob ni don byed nus pa ste/ 'byung ba
104b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rang bzhin la sogs pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin ngo bo ni kun dga' o/ /thos pa zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di thos pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i ye shes rang bzhin med pa'o/ /yang na sems can gyi don mdzad cing ye shes
105a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga shar bar byed pa'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes ni sus thos she na/ kun dga' bos thos pa'o/ /dus gcig na zhes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ lha dang mi la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i dus
105a2(rgyud 'grel): so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /'di ni dang po 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom ste/ zhe sdang bcom pa'o/ /gnyis pa phung po'i bdud bcom ste/ 'dod chags bcom pa'o/ /gsum pa nyon mongs pa'i bdud
105a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ste/ gti mug bcom pa'o/ /bzhi pa lha'i bu'i bdud bcom ste/ phrag dog dang ser sna bcom pa'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dpal dang mtshan nyid dang/ gnas dang 'khor dang gdan dang yon tan dang drug go/ yang na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
105a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das te/ nyon mongs pa lnga las 'das pa'o/ /mnyan yod na zhes bya ba yul ma ga d+ha yin te/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i gnas so/ /yang dag pa'i gnas ma nor ba'o/ /mnyan
105a5(rgyud 'grel): yod kyi grong khyer tshang ni dpag tshad lnga dang ldan pa ste/ skyes bu mang po bde bar gnas pa/ shAkya thub pa'i chos 'dzin pa dus dus su char 'bab pa'o/ /de'i khor khor yug na skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu dang/ shing ljon pa rigs mi gcig
105a6(rgyud 'grel): pa mang po yod de/ rdzing bu dang skyed mos tshal de la yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod cing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /rdzing bu de'i gzhi ni rin po che sna bdun las grub pa ste/ gser dang dngul dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ ma ra ka ta dang/
105a7(rgyud 'grel): phu sA rA ga dang/ bdun no/ /rdzing bu de'i chu de yang dri zhim zhing tsan dang gyi chu dang 'dra ste/ blta na sdug pa/ dangs la yang rnyog pa med pa'o/ /chu de las skyes pa ni puN+Da ri ka dang/ utpa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ utpa la dmar po dag ku mu ta
105b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa me tog sna tshogs yod de/ kha dog dkar po dkar bos mdang phye ba/ kha dog mthing kha/ mthing khas mdangs phye ba/ kha dog dmar po dmar pos mdangs phye ba/ kha dog ser po/ /ser pos mdangs phye ba/ kha dog ljang gu/ ljang gus mdangs
105b2(rgyud 'grel): phye ba'o/ /chu de'i nang na bya sna tshogs yod de/ ngang ser dang/ ngang skya dang/ khrung khrung dang/ so bya rog po la sogs pa'i skad sna tshogs 'byin cing snyan ba'o/ /skyed mos tshal de la yang me tog sna tshogs yod de/ me tog kunda dang/ dzA ti dang/ ka ko la'i me tog dang/
105b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam pa ka'i me tog dang me tog dmar po dang/ ser po la sogs pa thang las skyes pa'o/ /yul de'i kho ra khor yug na/ shing sna tshogs yod de/ tsaM pa ka'i shing dang/ klu'i shing dang/ tsan dan dkar po'i shing dang/ tsan dan dmar po'i shing dang/ shing sa
105b4(rgyud 'grel): la dang/ shug pa dang/ rgya shug dang/ khan 'dzur la sogs pa'i shing/ sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /shing de'i grims sems can thams cad bde bar gnas pa'o/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel mgon med bas byin gyis kun dga' ra ba na zhes bya ba
105b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal po'i rgyal bu ste/ de'i skyed mos tshal ni me tog sna tshogs yod pa/ blta na sdug pa shin tu mtshar ba'o/ /dpag tshad gnyis yod pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'o/ /yul de'i sems can rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
105b6(rgyud 'grel): la spyod cing tshal de la rtse ba'o/ /de bzhin du rgyal bu yang yin no/ /tshong dpon mgon med kyis bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sbyin par 'dod pa/ bkra shis pa'i sa btsal te/ gzhan nas ma rnyed pas de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi skyed mos tshal
105b7(rgyud 'grel): na bzang po'i sems so/ /de nas tshong dpon mgon med kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ ngas ni dge ba byed pa'i sa ni khyod kyi tshal bkra shis pa nga nyo yis zhes pa'o/ /rgyal bus smras pa/ nga'i tshal 'di ni khyod kyis nyo nus sam/ gser pa gus brtsigs nas
106a1(rgyud 'grel): de khengs pa'i gser 'dod de khyod kyis 'jal bar nus sam/ de'i thog tu yang nga'i ming 'jug nus sam/ zhes smras pa'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis gser gyi phung po byas nas gzhal te/ rgyal bu gser gyi phung po ma 'dod de/ gser
106a2(rgyud 'grel): brdungs nas pha gu byas pa'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyis sa gzhi der gser gyi pha gus brtsigs te rgyal bu la bzhal ba'o/ /de'i gting la sa gzhi de ru rin po che sna bdun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas te/ sgo bzhi sum thog tu byas pa/ phyogs phyogs su ka bas
106a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par mdzes pa/ ka ba de yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ gdung dang phyam dang gser dang dngul las byas pas sum thog kyang de bzhin no/ /glo skar phyi nang yang rin po che sna bdun las byas shing mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa ste/ phyogs gzhan yang
106a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no/ /phyogs re re las yang dpag tshad re re yod cing/ /phyi nang gnyis ka yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri mos mdzes shing blta na sdug pa'o/ /kun dga' ra ba de la yang phyogs bzhin sgo re re yod de/ de yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub
106a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sgo re re la yang seng ge gnyis gnyis yod de/ seng ge de rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /de bzhin du ka ba gnyis gnyis kyis mdzes shing/ chu srin twa ra Na dang/ bya khyung ka ru Na dang/ ri dags sha ra Na dang/ shang shang sa ra na
106a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas mdzes shing rta babs bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mdzes pa'o/ /rta babs de yang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'o/ /kun dga' ra ba de'i thog na/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas/ brgyan pa'o//
106a7(rgyud 'grel): mu tig dang/ rin po che dang/ dril bu g.yer kha dang/ dril bu dang gser dang/ dngul las grub pa ste/ de rlung gis btab pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra'i rol mo mkhan mkhas pa rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs 'byin pa bzhin no/ /kun dga' ra
106b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rab rin po che bai DUrya las byas pa ste/ mtshams bzhi byu ru las byas pa'o/ /de'i phyi nang yang de bzhin no/ /kun dga' ra ba de'i phyi logs na skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ de bzhin du rdzing bu dang bcas pa'o/ /skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu la yang me tog chu skyes
106b2(rgyud 'grel): thar skyes sna tshogs yod de/ dri zhim zhing blta na sdug pa/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngon po la sogs pas mdzes pa'o/ /de bzhin du bya rnams kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pas mdzes shing/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs pa
106b3(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin no/ /tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba'i nges tshig ni/ rus las btags pa'o/ /yang na dge ba'i rtsa ba thogs pa med par sbyin pas na zas sbyin zhes bya'o/ /rgyal bu'i tshal las grub pas rgyal byed tshal zhes bya'o/ /tshong dpon
106b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bcom ldan 'das la phul bas mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya'o/ /de bas na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na zhes pa'o/ /bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang/ dge
106b5(rgyud 'grel): slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang mi la sogs pa dang/ thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhis thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa
106b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston
106b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sems can gyi skad cig yud tsam zhig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa/ sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang spobs pa dang/ cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
107a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po sprin gyis mchod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbang dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam
107a2(rgyud 'grel): dang sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ dben pa dang/ yongs su byang pa'i sems kyi rgyun dang/ ldan pa sha stag
107a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di lnga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ nyi ma grags pa dang/ snying rje
107a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang rdo rje grags pa dang/ 'jam dpal grags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang thabs gcig tu zhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po nyis brgya lnga
107a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes sems shin tu rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul stobs dang/ cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob
107a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ lta ba chags pa med pa thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsregs pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka bi
107a7(rgyud 'grel): na dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang/
107b1(rgyud 'grel): de dag la sogs pa nyan thos rab tu mang po dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang/ dri za la sogs pa mang po 'dus pa'o/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i
107b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su/ /rin po che rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ seng+ge'i khri la gang zhe na sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa'i sar 'byung ba'o/ /rin po che dang/ rdo rje pad+ma'i khris/ kun dga' ra ba mdzes pa dang/ rin po che dang/
107b3(rgyud 'grel): mu tig dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje rin po che du mas chu srin kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang/ 'dam pa'i rnam rten bcug pa/ rin
107b4(rgyud 'grel): po ched du ma'i snying po can/ chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang/ ke ke ru chen po dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ in+d+ra nI la chen po dang/ mdun nas 'od zer chen po bar snang la khyab pas kun nas mdzes pa dang/ rin po che rdo rje thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs
107b5(rgyud 'grel): yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mas bsgribs shing bskyebs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan par mdzes pa/ rdo rje rin po che pad+ma'i khri la kun dga' ra ba'i dbus na bzhugs te/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
107b6(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyogs ni rnam par brgyan zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge
107b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis lta bar mi mthong/ bdud kyi las thams cad
108a1(rgyud 'grel): las ni nges par rgyal/ de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud/ ye shes kyi spyan lnga ni mnga' / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang mi ldan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
108a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun nas bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
108a3(rgyud 'grel): khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dka' 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): ba spyod pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pas mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
108a5(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'i gnas dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas skabs te dang po'o// //de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi tshogs pa'i tshe na'o/ /mnyan
108a6(rgyud 'grel): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i dbus kyi grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni sngon 'das pa'i
108a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bzhugs gnas yin te/ de yang mar me mdzad dang/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ log par ngang sel dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs dang/ bdun la
108b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas so/ /de bzhin du nyan thos dgra bcom pa /rnams dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams gnas pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i
108b2(rgyud 'grel): byams pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /da ltar yang shAkya seng ge bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad cing chos ston pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang mi ma yin pas mchod par 'os pa'i gnas byang chub
108b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhing khams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang byang chub 'grub pa'i gnas so/ /dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas shing sar rab tu byung
108b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /gzhon nur thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul ba'i chos mnyan pas/ btsun pa'i spyod lam mi byed cing/ rtse ba la dga' ba'o/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu
108b5(rgyud 'grel): byung nas zhag bdun lon te/ bsnyen par rdzogs par shes pas gzhan dang spyod lam ma mthun pa'o/ /chos 'dul pa 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de zhes bya ba ni/ /rab tu byung nas zhag bdun lon te/ lo grangs bcu gnyis
108b6(rgyud 'grel): lon pa dang/ lus ngag yid gsum 'dul ba'i bya ba mi shes pas zag pa zad pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas su byon nas/ rang gi stan la mi 'dug cing rang dgar gnas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi sro khang bya ba'i phyir shing gshegs pa dang/ zhes
108b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba de cang mi shes pa'i phyir/ dge 'dun gyi sro khang rtsed mo rtser phyin no/ /shing rul pa'i ser ka zhig nas sprul nag po chen po zhig byung nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul khrims nyams pa de'i rnam par smin pas
109a1(rgyud 'grel): mche ba'i dug can/ klu gdol pa'i rigs dug rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ sprul nag po'i gzugs can/ mig na mthong ba'i dug yod pa/ bsam pa'i dug can reg pa'i dug yod pa dug rnam pa bzhi dang/ rigs rnam pa bzhi dang/ gang gi dus
109a2(rgyud 'grel): na zhe na/ nyams pa dang gang zag gi bya ba'i bsam pa gtang ba dang/ klu de'i rigs kyis kyang tshor te/ rigs ni bram ze yin te/ log pa'i 'dus kyang de'i dus na 'byung ste/ dug kyang de'i dus su chud do/ /de la bsam pa'i dug ces bya'o/ /mthong
109a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dug ni nyams pa dang/ gang zag dang/ gang zag gi rdzas rnams mthong ste/ de mthong ba tsam gyis khros shing mthong ba tsam gyis thal bar brlag ba'o/ /log pa'i dus kyang de yin te/ de'i rigs ni rgyal rigs so/ /reg pa'i dug ni de mthong ba tsi
109a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis reg ste/ de ni mche ba'i dug ces bya'o/ /rigs ni rje'u rigs so/ /kha blangs kyi dug ni/ bsam pa dang mthong ba dang/ reg pa'i sgo nas 'byung ste/ bsam pa btang ba tsam gyis kyang kha blangs kyi dug 'byung zhing/ mthong bas kyang de bzhin
109a5(rgyud 'grel): no/ /reg pa lta ci smos te/ kha blangs kyi dug ni gzhan dang mi 'dra'o/ /mi srin te gdol pa'i rigs can/ kha rlangs kyi dug de nag po'i dug ces bya ba/ /de'i rigs ni sprul nag po'o/ /shing gshegs nas byung zhing 'jigs su rung ba/ dug rnam pa
109a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rang bzhin dge slong sa ris mtshor bar byung ngo/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe 'ong la zin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi srung pa sprul nag pos kyang dge slong sa ris brtul zhugs nyams pa/ mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'o/ /de ni glo bur gyi nyams pa yin no//
109a7(rgyud 'grel): lus sbrid nas sa la 'gyel te zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi nus pas mdog shor zhing/ lus thams cad skrangs shing sems la dran pa med cing/ kha nas kyang dbugs ma thon no/ /dge slong sa ris de yang nad chen pos btab cing sdug bsngal chen pos nyen pa'o//
109b1(rgyud 'grel): spu? bar skyug cing ming kyang bsgyur nas nyal ba dang zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i dug gis btab pas/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab cing mig shor zhing lce yang rdog por song ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje che zhing thos pa che ba/ sems can thams
109b2(rgyud 'grel): cad la snying rje mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ 'dul ba'i sgo nas dgra bcom pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/ sdom pa la gnas shing/ snying rje dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ni/ dge slong sa ri nad kyis btab pa mthong ngo/ /mthong bas rings pa
109b3(rgyud 'grel): rings pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste zhes bya ba ni/ sprul nag pos zin pa mthong ste/ thabs mi rnyed cing thabs kyi don la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong
109b4(rgyud 'grel): sar snying rje zhing bcom ldan 'das la gus pas phyag 'tshal ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 
109b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nyan thos dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang mi la sogs pa'i dbus su'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri'i don du
109b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rang bzhin gyis btsun pa ste/ de yang sku gsum thugs thul zhing/ mi dge ba bcu spangs shing dge ba bcu dang du len pa ste/ sems can gyi don du rang bzhin gyis
109b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can la snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gti mug dang/ zhe sdang dang/ 'dod chags dang/ ser sna dang/ phrag dog dang/ de rnams bcom zhing 'khor
110a1(rgyud 'grel): ba la sa logs pa'o/ /yang na bag chags kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa bcom pa'o/ /ldan pa ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o/ /'das pa ni 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /mnyan yod na zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha'o/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed
110a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gi kun dga' ra ba 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i gnas yang na dngos grub
110a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gces pa'o/ /dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba ni/ sa ri ni bram ze'i rigs las bos ste/ dge slong yang rab tu byung ba'i ming grags pa'o/ /de gnyis 'joms pas na dge slong sa ri zhes bya'o/ /gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa zhes bya ba ni/ lo bcu gnyis
110a4(rgyud 'grel): lon pa ste/ gzhon nu'i dus su rab tu byung zhing 'dul ba ni mi shes pa'o/ /rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu byung nas zhag bdun lon pa/ dge slong gi spyod pa mi shes pa/ rtse ba la dga' ba'o/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas
110a5(rgyud 'grel): ring bos ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas zhag gcig lon pa'o/ /chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid gsum 'dul bas na 'dul ba ste/ chos kyang de nas gnas pa'o/
110a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir mchis nas ring por ma lon pa dge slong gi spyod pa mi shes shing/ /gzhon nu'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi bsro khang bgyi ba'i slad du shing bshags pa dang/ shing rul ba'i seng ka zhig nas sprul nag po chen po
110a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'byung nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong sa ri rtsed mo la phyin pa ste/ klu gdol pa'i rigs mche ba'i dug can 'jigs su rung ba/ dug rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ shing rul pa bshags pa'i nang nas byung ba'o//
110b1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa g.yas pa'i the bo la zin pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi rnam par smin pas bzung bas so/ /lus sgring nas dog sa la 'gyel te zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs rnams mi shes shing/ lus po thams cad skrangs shing 'gas par 'gyur ba'o/ sdu
110b2(rgyud 'grel): bar skyug cing lus kyang sgyur nas nyal zhing mchis na zhes bya ba ni/ mig 'dzums mi shes shing lus kyang rengs kha nas dbugs kyang mi thon pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis de la ji ltar nan tan bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang
110b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs ci yod ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos las/ dge slong sa ri sprul nag pos zin pa'i gnas skabs te gnyis pa'o// //de skad ces gsol pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri'i don la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pos
110b4(rgyud 'grel): smras pa'i gting la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /zhes bya ba ni mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
110b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don la/ kun dga' bo'i drung du 'khor bzhi dang bcas te khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khyod la song la zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
110b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang
110b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing gsungs pa ste/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /da ltar yang ngas kyang gsungs te/ khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la brten la mdzod cig ces pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
111a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ yang na ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing bde ba chen po thob pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
111a2(rgyud 'grel): bka' la nyon la gsungs shing ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags ni rnam pa gnyis te/ phyi'i rig pa dang/ nang gi rig pa'o/ /phyi'i rig pa ni/ rig pa rnams pa lnga mkhyen cing/ yang dag pa'i
111a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi lam nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad nas rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /nang? gi rig pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing shes rab kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i ye shes so/ /rgyal mo ni thams cad las
111a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal te/ de yang bdud rnams kyis mi tshugs shing 'khor ba bcom pa'o/ /chen mo ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab ste/ sems can gyi don la thugs rjes khyab pa'o/ /rma bya ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen mo
111a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams la sogs pa'i sems can la snying rjes khyab nas rig pa'i lam nas 'jug pa'o/ /yang na ni rma bya ni sku gsum gyi rang bzhin yin te/ nam mkha' lta bu mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'o/ /de'i sgrib ma ni sgyu ma lta
111a6(rgyud 'grel): bur longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /des sems can la don byed cing nam mkha' lta bur khyab ste sprul pa'i sku/ /yang na ni rma bya ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis phyir dug dang nang gi dug bcom zhing zas su dug za pa'o/ /'dis na sdug
111a7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad dang bral bas byed pa ste/ gzi brjid che ba dang/ mthu che ba dang/ stobs dang ldan zhing/ ngan song gsum 'joms pa ste// sems can bde ba la 'god pa'o/ /'di zhes pa rma bya chen mo'o/ /dge slong sa ri la
111b1(rgyud 'grel): srung bgyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gdon rigs mi cig pa stong phrag brgyad cu zhes pa dang/ de bzhin gdon re re la 'ang yin te/ nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi/ nad kyi rigs gcig pa la yang de bzhin no/ /dug rnams pa bzhi bsrung
111b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing ngo/ /dge slong sa ri la mche ba'i dug bcom zhing nyams pa thams cad skong ba'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan gyi dug kyang srung bar byed pa'o/ /srung ba gyis shig ces pa ni sems can thams cad dang dge slong sa ri la'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni rig sngags
111b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ dug dang 'byung po dang/ nad dang/ nyams pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ ngan song gsum na gnas pa sped pa'o/ /yang na sba ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar zhing gzhan rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab
111b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ? ? bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal las bskyab pa/ chad pa thams cad bcom zhing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skyob pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par byed cing/ 'jigs pa la ma btang ste/ mi dge ba
111b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing/ dge ba bzung ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad bcom zhing/ 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad las bsrung ba ste/ mi dge ba bcom zhing dge ba la brkyang pa'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur pa dang zhes
