133a6(rgyud 'grel): 'am cab cob kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'am/ 'byung po 'am/ gshin rje la sogs pa'i chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni dmag gam dgra la drug gam/
133a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang long med par 'byung ba'am/ de rnams thams cad spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang byas pa'i dug dang gsum zhi bar 'gyur/ dug
133b1(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pa'i dug gsum ste/ de yang nang gi dug dang phyi'i dug go /nang gi dug ni gti mug dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang gsum mo/ /phyi'i dug ni mche ba rtsa ba la spyod pa'o/ /mtshams bcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs mtshams
133b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang bcu bcad de/ de las bcad pas na mtshams bcad pa'o/ /sa bcing bgyis shig ces bya ba ni sa la rgyu ba'i 'byung po la sogs pa rnams la yang bcing ba'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang bral zhing phun sum tshogs
133b3(rgyud 'grel): pas lo brgyad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ nad med cing tshe ring ba ste/ bkra shis shing phongs pa med pa/ shi ba'i dus su yang rgas pa ma tshor bar 'chi ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bsrung ba'i don du sems
133b4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sdug bsngal la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas shing sbas pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni 'di la gus nas 'chad ba'i gang zag de klog pa dang/ sgom pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ rjes su
133b5(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ smon lam gdab pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la sogs pa byas nas yongs su sba ba la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thugs rje che zhing mthu che ba ste/ gzi brjid dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/
133b6(rgyud 'grel): grags pa dang ldan te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag rgya'i rgyas gdab cing sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di yi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dmyal ba'i gnas nas gzugs med pa'i khams
133b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /dmyal ba la tsha ba'i dmyal ba dang/ grang ba'i dmyal ba gnyis gcig tu brtsis te/ brgyad do/ /byol song dang/ yi dags gnyis te bcu'o/ /mi yul gling bzhi la sor sor grangs pas bzhi/ lha la drug go /de ni 'jig rten 'dod pa'i
134a1(rgyud 'grel): khams so/ /bsam gtan dang po nas bzung nas/ gtsang ma rigs kyi lha man chod ni gzugs khams kyi 'jig rten no/ /skye mched mu bzhi gzugs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams so/ /de bas na 'jig rten 'di'i lha rnams dang zhes
134a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bdud rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gar dbang phyug gi 'khor bdud kyi lha rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /tshangs pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bdag po tshangs pa nas gzugs khams kyi lha man chad do/ /dge slong dang zhes bya
134a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rab tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod pa'i gzugs snang ba'o/ /bram ze'i lus su skyes pa 'am zhes bya ba ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ rigs bzang por skyes nas gnas pa rnams so/ /skye dgu'i bdag po rnams zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang mi'i bye
134a4(rgyud 'grel): brag tu smra ba rnams so/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus par byas nas/ de rnams la yang bsrung ba dang/ spa ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ bya bar?  'gyur ro//
134a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bcing ba las rnam par 'tsho ba'i byir 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams dge ba la bar du gcod cing glags tshol ba rnams yin te/ de ni bdud kyi rang bzhin 'khor ba la gnas par byed pa'i rgyu nad rnam pa sna tshogs btang ba'i bdag po dang/
134a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la gnod pa skyel zhing sa dang sa'i bar snang sa 'og chu la rgyu ba rnams so/ /de rnams kyi stobs ni ri rab tsam sgul zhing sa g.yo bar byed do/ /de ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin can yin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin can no/ /de rnams kyi sems can rnams
134a7(rgyud 'grel): la glags tshol zhing/ 'tshe bar byas pa'o/ /lha 'am zhes bya ba ni lha'i 'byung po stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /lha mo 'am zhes bya ba ni/ lha mo'i gzugs stong phrag brgyad bcu'o/ /lha'i bu 'am zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /lha'i bu mo'am
134b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni lha'i bu mo'i gzugs stong phrag brgyad bcu'o/ /lha rgan mo 'am zhes bya ba ni lha rgan po'i gzugs stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /lha rgan po 'am zhes bya ba ni/ rgan mo'i gzugs stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /lha'i 'khor bo 'am zhes bya ba ni lha'i 'khor po'i gzugs?
134b2(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /lha'i 'khor mo nas rnon po'i 'khor mo 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rnams so/ /de rnams kyis glags tshol ba ni ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams gzugs sna tshogs su sprul cing glags tshol ba'o/ /de dag
134b3(rgyud 'grel): gi ni mdun rgyug pa/ 'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che/ /lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/ rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa/ /rkang bzhi pa la rkang gnyis pa/ /rkang pa bsgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang/ /lus mdas mgo bo gcig pa dang/ /lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi
134b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mig mangs po la lus gcig dang/ /mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang/ bung bu rnga mo glang chen mgo /lag pa bsgreng la mgo btung dang/ /mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag /mtshon cha'i rkang pa'i srin po rnams/ /zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyis so/ /zangs
134b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag /zangs kyi tho ba'i rkang ba dang/ zangs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha/ /rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang/ mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/ /sgur zhar lpa ba gsum yod pa/ /mig mi sdug la kha gle ba/ /chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/ /gzugs
134b6(rgyud 'grel): mi sdug dang kha ral lo/ /mchu 'phyang po dang so yon po/ /rab tu stug de khro gnyer can/ /gsus po che dang bu sna'o/ /sna 'phyang po dang rna ba med/ /lag rings po dang rna ba ring/ sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring/ /lus skams lus ni ring ba dang/ sgra ring rab tu brgyan
134b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rkang pa mid pa phra ba dang/ /dri nga ba dang bum lto bo/ /yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang/ /gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/ rnam lto bo la rna bo che/ /gyen du sla rdzes rab tu dmar/ /mgo bo che la gzhu 'grin po/ /sken po sgur bo bum lto ba/ ri rab rtse mo bsgul
135a1(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /me mdag gi ni char ba 'bebs/ /ljon shing ri yi rdo ba dang/ /sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /dung dang rnga chen rdza lnga dang/ /grul bum rnga chen rnams kyi sgra/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/ mig po che la bum bu'i sgra/ nag po sngon po ser
135a2(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dmar ser me dang dmar ser dang/ khyab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri sgra/ /dmar po'i khrag gis bskus pa rnams/ /me ro dag ni khyer nas su/ /za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug /so rnon lag pa dmar ba dang/ mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang/ /lus phyed dag
135a3(rgyud 'grel): ni zos pa dang/ /mkha' ma snying dang nang grol gyis /snyim pa bzhin du bkang ba dang/ /byis pa dag ni za bzhin du/ /mer mer po dang srog chags kyi/ rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ keng rus kyi naM lus kyis su/ /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /khrag gi
135a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bkang ba yi/ /mi yi pags pa thogs nas su/ /mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te/ /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug /grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang/ /khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/ /phyogs bzhi
135a5(rgyud 'grel): dag tu 'khrug par byed/ /de ltar de ni rgyal po yi/ /gdon dang 'jig pa chen po nas/ /lhags par de dag thams cad kyang/ /'byung po de dag rnams kyis kyang/ /glags tshol ba yi dus su yang/ /mi'i 'jig rten 'di la rmi lam dang rtags bstan
135a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed/ /bud med dag dang skyes pa dang/ /de bzhin khye'u bu mo dang/ /mngal na 'ang gnas pa 'ang 'jigs pa skyed/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rtogs pa'ang 'tshe/ /skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang/ /gtum pa'i gzang?
135a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnod par bgyid/ /lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang/ /me tog sman dang zas skom dang/ /mi rnams kyi ni dpa' 'phrog cing/ /mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid/ /'jig rten bdag na nod pa rnams/ /dmag dang thab mo sha gnyer dang/ tshig gam
135b1(rgyud 'grel): zhig gam gsang bya ba/ /de kun 'byung po'i rnam pas gyur ro/ /sped cing star bar bgyid pa dang/ /bzlog par bgyid cing god par bgyid/ /'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid/ /dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid/ /sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ /nyal
135b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gnod pa bgyid/ /sgo nas se gol sgra 'byung zhing/ /mi nyan brjod de za bar bgyid/ /mdza bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/ /gda' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid/ /bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod la spyod pa gda' bar bgyid/ /nyi ma skar
135b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gzugs dag tu/ /zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid/ /rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/ /de la gnod par de dag gda' / /skar ma'i tshegs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang byi/ /rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang/ /mchod
135b4(rgyud 'grel): rten dag gi gnas na gda' / /skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas/ /'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin/ /gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/ /grong khyer dag na khyim rnams kyi/ /sgo yang gdon chen de dag
135b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byad/ /srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyis shing/ /laM ngan kun tu bskor bar bgyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams/ /lus ni na bar gnas par ston/ /nad rnams kun gyi
135b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid kyang/ /phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag /thams cad log par de dag ston/ /yang na 'byung po de rnams mi'i 'jig rten la gnod par byas nas/ /klags tshel zhing grong ngam grong khyer du rgyu na/ /mtshan
135b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid de bzhin du yin te/ /grong khyer grong rdal yul 'khor dang/ /pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba ni/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ /snying rje med cing khrag 'thung pa/ /lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /stobs po che la sgra yang che/ /mgrin bcu po la
136a1(rgyud 'grel): mig stang po/ /gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams/ /'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ /lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/ /sbrul gyi pags pa shogs pa dang/ lag bzhi lag na sgron na thogs/ /lag na mchan dang dbyug pa thogs/ /rdo rje mdung rtse dbyug pa thogs//
136a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu drag pa'i dmag rgal nas/ /phyogs kun tu ni skrag par byed/ /sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ /gsang ba po ni ngad kun kyang/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin/ /sha khrag dron por bcas pa la/ /rnam par
136a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/ /ma he ba lang bong bu rnga/ /glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang/ /mdom dang gzig dang spyang khu dang/ /khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang/ /byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs/ /bse dang phag dang bsre mo
136a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /nya dang rul sbal dag gi gzugs/ /kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/ /khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang/ /bya rgod khra dang nya mi bcas/ /rma bya ngang pa thi ba dang/ /khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang/ /kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams so/ /gnod sbyin
136a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni mi yis mthong/ /'dab bzang bya yi tshul gyis kyang/ /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /kha cig mi yi mgo can la/ /lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang bya la ba ngag tu snang/ /rnam par
136a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas kun tu dkris/ /rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing/ /srog chags rnams la gnod par byed/ /mi zad pa yi gzugs 'byin cing/ /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed/ /srog
136a7(rgyud 'grel): chags rgyud ni ji snyed pa/ sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang/ /kha gcig dag ni ri yang thogs/ /la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/ /grangs ni brgya phrag stong gnas te/ /dbyug pas sdigs shing kha drag po/ /mig chung ba la bzhin mi
136b1(rgyud 'grel): sdug/ srin po'i gzugs ni sngo ba dang/ sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang/ /lce gcad gdong ni gnyer ma can// //rkang lag dang ni gtubs pa dang/ mgo bo bcang ba'i srin po rnams/ /skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byang/ /sdig pa
136b2(rgyud 'grel): can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog /mi dag gi ni lus rnams la/ /rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang/ /spu yi bar dang gang na rnams dang/ /de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang/ /de bzhin du lha pho mo dang klu pho mo dang/ gnod sbyin pho mo la sogs pas
136b3(rgyud 'grel): skad cig thang cig la/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa nad sna tshogs gtong zhing 'byung po rnams kyis kyang glags tshol ba'o/ /glags tshol bar 'dod cing glags ma rnyed de zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon dang bcas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gnod
136b4(rgyud 'grel): par byed mi nus shing/ /rtsar yang 'ong mi nus shing/ /glags tshol ba lta ci smos so/ /rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa/ gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan
136b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'byung po rnams kyi gnyen por gsungs pa'o/ /de bas na glags tshol bas mi rnyed pa'o/ /lha ni lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas/ /rnon po ni rnon po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin no zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags
136b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzi brjid kyis 'du bar mi nus shing 'byung po rnams so/ /sor 'khyams te/ gnod par mi nus shing/ rtsar nye bar mi nus pa'o/ /gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di las 'gal bar byed na/ zhes bya ba ni/ gal te glags tshol ba rnams rig sngags
136b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' las 'das par gyur na/ sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'thob ste/ dmyal ba mnar med du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba de las thon nas yang dug gzhan du dmyal bar 'pho 'o/ /de'i mgo bo ardza ka'i dge ba bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas
137a1(rgyud 'grel): so zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'dze'am phol mig gam/ ltog pa 'am 'bras la sogs pa rnams kyis btab nas/ shi ba'i dus su tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gsang sngags bzhi dag kyang yid la bya'o zhes bya ba ni/
137a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags kyi thabs bshad par bya'o/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /dang por dgug pa gnyis pa bsgrad pa/ gsum
137a3(rgyud 'grel): pa mnan pa/ bzhi pa bsreg pa'o/ /gang gnod pa'i 'byung po rnams/ /rig sngags kyi nga rgyal byas nas/ phyag g.yas g.yon dgug pa'i phyag rgya bya ste/ rdo rjes khu tshur yang dag par bcas la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis dgug pa'i tshul du'o//
137a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la/ oM badzra oM sha ku dza/ la rig sngags kyi gsang sngags btags la dgug par bya'o/ /ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams/ oM dang rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ /rig sngags smon gyis 'dug mi nus/ /ri rab dur khrod pho
137a5(rgyud 'grel): brang dang/ rgya mtsho rlung stong shing gcig dang/ /nags tshal dag dang rgya grams dang/ ri yi rtse mo mchod rten rtsa/ khron pa dag dang chu mig dang/ mtsho chen dang ni tshal gnas dang/ /de bzhin grong khyer grong gnas dang/ /grong rngal dang ni pho brang dang/ /ri yi rtse mo/
137a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dang/ /bar snang chu dang sa la gnas/ /de bzhin sa 'og lam la gnas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i phyag rgya yis/ /'byung po mang po rig sngags dkrugs/ /'byung po ma rungs pa rnams rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas dgugs pa'o/ /yang bskrad pa ni/ /yungs
137a7(rgyud 'grel): kar dang ske tshe dang bsres/ /ra bar tshe ma can gyi shing bu ste/ mdzod dang khyim gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sa blangs la ske tshe dang yungs kar bsres la yang bden pa'i tshigs bcad ston la/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /gtsug tor can gyi
137b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs rnams dang/ thams cad skyob pa'i bden tshig dang/ /log dang sel gyi ting 'dzin dang/ /gser thub kyi ni ye shes kyis/ /'od srungs kyi ni rdzu 'phrul lo/ /shAkya seng ge'i brtson 'grus so/ /'byung po de dag brlag par shog u tsa Ta ya phaT rnams kyis/ /rig
137b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags snying go de rtags la/ /rnga bo che dang khar rnga dang/ /de la sogs pa sgra yi tshogs/ /de brdungs 'byung po bskrad par bya/ /me tog sna tshogs gtor ma dang/ /rtsa ba sna tshogs lo ma dang/ /'bru sna chu dang/ bcas pa dang/ /'ongs pa'i phyogs su bskyal bar bya/
137b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bskrad nas mnan par bya'o/ /gro ga la sogs shing lo la/ 'byung po'i gzugs dang 'khor lo bcas/ /de'i nang du ming byang bri/ /yungs kar lan tsha ske tshe dang/ /shang tshe dug rdzas ro thang dang/ /de rnams chu la dril bar bya/ /rabs chad mdze thod nang du
137b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug /sngar bshad dgug gzhug 'byung po la/ /rig sngags la ni stan b+ha ya gdags/ /lam rgya gram mchod rten 'og /pho khrom sar ni mnan par bya/ /de bzhin du mnan la bsreg par bya/ tsan dan la sogs dri rnams kyis/ /de'i chus ni lus rnams
137b5(rgyud 'grel): bkru/ /bsnyung bar byas nas gos gtsang gyon/ /seng ldeng shing la zhugs phul la/ /gnod byed gang la ming brtags la/ /zhugs kyi nang du gtor bar bgyi/ /gsang sngags la ni me sngags gdags/ /'byung po'i rnam pa ma lus bsregs/ /gtor ma me tog
137b6(rgyud 'grel): lo ma dang/ /chos skyong la ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas bden pa'i tshigs bshad 'di/ /yang dag gis ni brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid kyis/ /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang/ /dgra bcom pa yi mthu dag gis/ /gsang sngags 'dzin
137b7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang/ /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang/ /maung+gal gyi rdzu 'phrul dang/ /ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang/ /ku'u di na'i sngar thog dang/ kun dga' bo yis thos pa dang/ /tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang//
138a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams thob/ /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang/ /ded dpon rnams kyi mthu dag gis/ /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /de dag rnams kyi mthu dag gis//
138a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi gnod byed bsreg par shog /'byung po dug dang dgra bo dang/ /bdag gi 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ /sangs rgyas bden pa de rnams kyis/ /sems can dag dang bdag rnams dang/ /sdig pa thams cad bsreg par shog /gsang sngags
138a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnams bden par shog /de bzhin du yang nas yang du gsang sngags la me'i sngags btabs la bsreg par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags ni/ /gang zhe na kun gzhi rnam par dag pa ste/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /
138a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /nam mkha' i khams/ yid kyi skye mched/ zhe sdang gi rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan no/ /spyan
138a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ khro gnyer can kha gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ /'jigs su rung ba/ sku mdog nag mo/ /yan lag thams cad rin po che dang/ /sbrul gyis rgyan pa/ sham thabs stags gis byas pa/ g.yas dang po ni rdo rje rtse lnga gdengs
138a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de'i 'og man ni ral gri/ g.yon dang po na sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa/ de'i 'og ma na lcags kyu/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba gnyis na/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po thams cad mnan pa'o/ /nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od/ skra
138a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi nang du ser po'o me ltar 'bar ba rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan de ni thod pas brgyan pa'o/ /dbu'i spyi bo'i gtsug na rma bya'i sgro lngas brgyan pa/ de ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing/ khro mo bsam mo/ /de bzhin du rig sngags
138b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsang sngags yid la bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i li mi li ki li la sogs pa'o/ /gsang sngags 'di'i tshig 'gal na/ /shi ba'i dus su mgo tshal bar 'gas shing/ /shi ma thag mnar med par 'gro ba'o//
138b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag sems can rnams la'o/ /sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum na rgyu ba'i 'byung po thams cad sba ba'o/ /de bzhin du bskyab pa yang yin no/ /yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhes
138b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ dper na rang gi nor gzhan du mi ster ba bzhin no/ /'byung bo de rnams la yang mi ster ba'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ /glang chen smyon pa bzhin du thub pa med pa'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/
138b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po thams cad dang nad zhi bar byed pa'o/ /bde legs su gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bkra shis shing nad rnams bcom pa'o/ /chad pa spangs pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis glags tshol bar 'dod pas glags mi snyed pa'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba
138b5(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'byung po de rnams la nus pa med cing/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi kha blangs kyi dug reg pa dang mthong ba rnams so/ /dug gsang pa dang zhes bya 
138b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ de'i rang bzhin gyis dug byung ste/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos yis dug gsang pa'o/ /mtshams bcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams la bcad de/ /rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis dpag tshad gcig gi bar du 'ong
138b7(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pa'o/ /sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sa 'og tu mnan cing dpag tshad gcig tu 'ong mi nus pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyi sdug bsngal bral zhing/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba med pa'o//
139a1(rgyud 'grel): ston brgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ yang nas yang du mtsho mnan cing nad rnams kyi mi tshugs te/ bkra shis shing tshe ring ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i 'byung po glags tshol 'dod pa ma steng ba'i skabs
139a2(rgyud 'grel): de drug pa'o// //'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ 'og tu lta ste/ 'og tu gang ltas she na/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/ dgra bcom nyan thos rnams kyis kyang
139a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi lha dang bcas pa yang/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis dang mthu chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ 'jig rten skyong pa bcu dang/ gnod sbyin
139a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sde dpon chen po sor mo lnga pa dang/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa yang lha'i gdon la sogs pa/ bgegs dang 'byung bo'i rigs su gyur pa stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /gzhan yang de lta bu rnams kyi rjes su yi rang zhing gnyen
139a5(rgyud 'grel): por gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyis gsang sngags kyis gso ba'i sman dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'dir ni dug gis rang bzhin gyis zas ma legs pa 'byung ba ste/ zas ma legs pa ni rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'o/ /rnam
139a6(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa ni dug lnga'o/ /dug lnga ni gti mug yin te/ gti mug gi rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang byung ngo/ /zhe sdang las 'dod chags 'byung ngo/ /'dod chags las nga rgyal byung ngo/ /nga rgyal las phrag dog byung ngo/ /de lnga 'dus pas 'jig rten gyi
139a7(rgyud 'grel): dug gsum la 'dus te/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang gsum mo/ /de'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba'i rgyu ste/ 'khor ba'i las phyi'i dug gsum byung ngo/ /phyi'i dug gsum ni 'jig rten pa'i
139b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'o/ /de yang 'gro ba dang bsdad pa byed pa'o/ /'gro ba'i dug ni bsam pa dang/ mthong ba dang reg pa dang kha rlangs so/ /bsam pa la yang gnyis te/ rigs pas bsam pa dang/ /mthong nas bsam pa'o/ /reg pa la yang gnyis te/ nga rgyal gyis
139b2(rgyud 'grel): reg tu 'gro ba dang/ rang bzhin dbang med par reg tu 'jug pa'o/ /mthong ba la yang gnyis ta/ rang dang pas mthong ba dang/ reg nas mthong ba'o/ /kha rlangs la yang gnyis te/ mche ba dang/ dbugs rang bzhin gyis dpag tshad gnyis gnyis la slebs
139b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ de'i rim pa bzhin du rigs la yang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal po dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmang rigs so/ /de bzhin du bram ze dang/ rgyal po'i rgyal po dang/ rje'u yi rje'u dang/ dmang rigs kyi dmang rigs ni gdol ba'o/ /dus ni snga dro dang/ nyi ma
139b4(rgyud 'grel): phyed dang/ sum cha gcig dang dgongs mo'o/ /srong dang nam phyed dang/ sum cha gcig dang tho rangs so/ /rim pa bzhin klu rnams rgyu ba'o/ /bram ze'i rigs kyi snga dro zin na ni/ /nad bad kan gyi dus yin te/ gcod dang tshigs rnams na zhing mig ser
139b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ skyug par 'dod cing dang ka mi bde'o/ /rgyal po'i dus ni nyi ma phyed yin te/ mkhris pa'i dus so/ /mchin pa la nad 'babs shing mig dmar ba'o/ /de stong mi bde zhing mgon pa ste/ lhog pa dang 'bras dang tshad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma sum cha ni rje'u
139b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dus yin te/ nad chu ser gyi dus so/ /grang shum byed cing lus po thams cad 'dar ba'o/ /srang lo phol mig dang/ sha bkra dang tshigs na zhing mkhal ma skrad pa'o/ /rmangs rigs kyi dus ni dgongs ma ste/ mgo 'jing rengs shing na ba ste/
139b7(rgyud 'grel): rkan 'khal zhing skad 'gag ste/ rna ba 'on zhing mig dmar/ kha dog skya ba/ mig 'gul zhing lus po thams cad 'gul ba'o/ /lus po skabs skabs su sbrid cing/ rkang lag lji ba ste/ snying mi dga' zhing lus po grangs/ sha ror song zhing shu ba
140a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ste/ skra rnams 'byi zhing lus po skrangs pa'o/ /rus pa dang skang las byung ba ni/ yang dmang rigs kyi nad yin te/ lus po skam zhing dang ka 'gag pa ste/ rme ba 'byung zhing g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs pa'o/ /de bzhin du rigs 
140a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la yang shes par bya'o/ /'gro ba'i dug ni klu'i rigs yin te/ mche ba'i dug kyang klu'i rigs shes te/ sems can las shes par bya'o/ /yang bsdad pa'i dug la rtsa ba dang lo ma las byung ba'o/ /rtsa ba las byung ba ni btsan dug dang/
140a3(rgyud 'grel): bong nga nag po dang/ ra dug dang/ thar nu dang/ ro'u 'jag dang/ thang phrong dang/ bong dug dang/ ri sho ma dang/ 'ji dug la sogs pa'o/ /de la lo ma'i dug ni de rnams kyi lo ma'o/ /de thos pa'i nang ni shi ba dang/ grangs pa dang/ smyo ba dang/ brgyal ba dang/
140a4(rgyud 'grel): nang nus pas so/ /de ni bsdad pa'i dug ni nus pa'o/ /da byed pa'i dug ni/ rgya rtsa shing kun dang sum pa'i sha'o/ /de'i nang kyis snying mi dga' ste/ snying la byung ba'o/ /bong phrug gi sha dang 'ug pa'i sha shing kun dang ngo/ de yan lag la babs te zas?
140a5(rgyud 'grel): shum byed cing tsha ba skye ste/ rta'i mchin pa dang chu bya'i sha dang/ thar chu rnams so/ /de lus la babs te rus pa 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /yang na zas mi legs pa yang sbyor ba'i dug yin te/ sbrang rtsi dang mar gnyis mnyam pa'i byed ??
140a6(rgyud 'grel): por gyi nang du zhag bdun bzhag ste/ de yang byed pa'i dug go /mkhris pa la tsha ba btang na de yang dug yin te/ rlung la grang ba gtang ba yang dug go /'jig rten pa'i dug ni rang bzhin las byung ste/ mi dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang la rang?
140a7(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa'o/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ gti mug dang ni 'dod chags dang/ /zhe sdang rang bzhin rang dug ste/ 'jig rten pa yi dug gsum 'di/ /phyi yi dug kyang de las byung/ 'gro dang bsdad dang sbyor ba
140b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyis/ /phyi'i dug 'joms nus/ /rig sngags gzi brjid de 'joms nus/ /gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang/ rang gi sems kyis bcom pa la/ gzhan gyis de ni mi choms so/ /bdag gis de ni bong bu bgyi/ /de
140b2(rgyud 'grel): skad ces gsungs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dug gi gnyen po 'di/ /dug gsum gso ba la yang dag par nus pa'o/ /gsang sngags dang sman dang ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gis gso bar bya'o/ /'gro ba'i dug gso ba ni/ nad pa la rig sngags
140b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la 'jug pa'o/ /ltor bltang ba'i sman ni/ mu zi dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ ram nye ba'i rtsa ba'i khu ba dang/ de rnams ltor btang ba'o/ /grang ba chen tsha ba gsum dang/ tsha dang bsres
140b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sbrang rtsis sbyar la btang ngo/ /chu ser babs na/ thal ka rdo rje dang/ ba ku la dang/ se 'brum gyi phyi skogs dang/ bsres la btang ngo/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags zhag bdun bsgrub par bya'o/ /phol mig dang lus po gas par gyur na mu cing dmar
140b5(rgyud 'grel): nag bskol la dug dang 'bras bu gsum dang bsres la ser ka rnams la byug go /byed par 'dod na dang po phyag bgyis ste/ gnyis pas rtsa dur bas bya'o/ /gsum pa rtsa ku shas te/ bzhi pa rma bya'i sgro'o/ /lnga pa rang gi sos dug dbyung ngo/ /rig sngags
140b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i nga rgyal gyis byas la/ shu ba dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ mdze dang phol mig dang/ g.yan pa dang/ me dbal dang/ ltog pa dang 'bras dang/ sha skra dang/ rmu chu dang/ 'brum bu dang/ sha ro la sogs pa'i mdze'i rigs thams
140b7(rgyud 'grel): cad la de bzhin du bya'o/ /byug pa dang/ bdug pa 'dod na/ sngar bshad pa'i nag po'i sbyor ba la bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin mnyam par bzlas pa drag po la 'jug go /de bzhin du 'gro ba'i dug gso ba'i bya thabs so/ /bsdad pa'i dug gso ba ni/
141a1(rgyud 'grel): sngo ma hA ra tsa dang/ chu drang mo la sbyar nas/ sngags lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad btab la 'thung du gzhug go/ 'di ni btsan dug dang po ra? nag po'i gnyen po'o/ /ra dug la 'bras bu gsum dang lcags phye
141a2(rgyud 'grel): btab la/ bu chur? 'o ma 'thung ba'i chu 'am/ rang gi chu la btab la 'thung du gzhug go/ des ni btsan dug kyang thub po/ /sribs shing gi 'bru bu la 'bras bu gsum gyis bya'o/ /smyo bar gyur na kyur chu ca mo'i khu ba blud do/ /de ni thang phrom gyi gnyen po'o//
141a3(rgyud 'grel): gas par gyur na mar nag dang/ gu gul dkar po dang/ spyang la byug go /skrangs par gyur na thang phrom gyis rtsa ba dang/ ri sho ba'i rtsa ba dang/ dug dang sbyar la mnan no/ /gzhan yang thams cad chu grang la btab la btung bar bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
141a4(rgyud 'grel): bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bston la bya'o/ /de ni bsdang ba'i dug gso ba'i bcos thabs so/ /da ni byed pa'i dug gso ba ste/ byed pa'i dug ni sbyar ba'i dug go/ yungs kar ma chig par bsngos la/ /gdung byas la lto stong la btang ngo//
141a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du zhag gsum bzhi btang bar gyur na/ lo gcig bar du thub pa'o/ /sha tshan gsum dang skyer pa dang/ se rgol ma'i bar shun dang/ a ru ra dang/ ra dmar mo'i khrag dang/ ril bu byas la btang ngo/ /'dis ni lo gsum gi bar du thub ste/ ?
141a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig the tshom mi za bar thub po/ /sha dug byung na rga chung dang tsha la chu grang mo la btab la btung ngo/ /rin po che'i dug byung na cags phye dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ ldum bu re ral dang rtog gcig ma dang/ d+ha du ras la sbyar bya'o/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i
141a7(rgyud 'grel): dug gso ba'o/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo ni 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /da ltar gyi shAkya thub pas gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /thabs shes rab dbyer med pa'o/ /kun
141b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo pad+ma'i rigs so/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste/ khams ni ma'i khams so/ /skye mched ni lce'i skye mched do//
141b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar ba/ cung zad khro ba/ yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis rgyan pa/ dang po'i phyag g.yas g.yon na mdza' yas
141b3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jog po'i ngo bor sprul bsnams pa/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin rma bya gser du snang ba gnyis phyag 'og ma gnyis na bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis pad+ma dang ka ru ratra mnan pa'o/ /pad+ma'i steng na nyi
141b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las spros pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ dug gi gnyen
141b5(rgyud 'grel): po klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po'o/ /dug gi gnyen po'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'di/ gzhan rnams kyis kyang mi thub cing/ 'byung po rnams kyi yang gnyen po'o/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di lta ste/ tsin+ta? tsin+ta? mu la pa
141b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o/ /rgyal ba rnams gzigs mya ngan chings la gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de yang 'khrungs pa'i dus su yang/ shing byang chub kyi shing mya ngan tshangs pa'i 'og tu'o/ /sems can gyi
141b7(rgyud 'grel): don la yul ma ga d+ha la rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub kyi 'og tu'o/ /srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs sangs rgyas pa'i dus su/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dran par rnyed pa'o/ /de'i bden? pas 'gro ba'i dug dang/ bsdad
142a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dug dang/ byed pa'i dug nges bcom mo/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung zhes bya ba ni// //yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can ni/ byang chub kyi shing pad+ma dkar po'i tshal gyis
142a2(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu 'khrungs te/ de bzhin du rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub kyi shing pad+ma dkar po'i 'og tu srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i dus su rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di yid
142a3(rgyud 'grel): la byas te/ de'i bden pas 'gro ba'i dus dang/ bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug rnams nges par bcom mo/ /thams cad skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa de yang 'khrungs
142a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus su yang shing sa la'i 'og tu 'khrungs te/ sems can gyi don la yul ma ga d+ha ra/ rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub kyi shing sa la'i 'og tu srod la bdud btul te/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/
142a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i tshe de'i dus su chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dran pa nye bar bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pas kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing de'i dus su 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang/ byed
142a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dug nges par bcom mo/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shing rta'i drung zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha'i chu bo gaM gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na bram ze mo 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba ni yum yin te/ de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
142a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub kyi shing shi ri Sha'i 'og tu sku 'khrungs/ rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su yang byang chub kyi shing shi ri Sha'i 'og tu'o?/ /sems can gyi don du srong la bdud btul te/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/
142b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i dus su yang skad cig mas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la rjes su yi rang ste/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig sems can gyi don la 'gro ba'i dug dang/ bsdad pa'i dug byed pa'i dug nges par bcom mo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub u duM ba ra'i
142b2(rgyud 'grel): drung zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha'i drang srong gi rigs su skyes nas/ byang chub kyi shing u duM ba ra'i 'og tu 'khrungs te/ de bzhin du rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su yang srod la bdud btul zhing tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
142b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ de'i dus su yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la rjes su yi rang zhing bden pa'i tshig gis kyang 'gro ba'i dug dang/ bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug nges par bcom mo/ /'od srungs n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ /yang dag par
142b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'khrung pa'i dus su n+ya gro b+ha'i rtsa bar 'khrungs te/ rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su yang de bzhin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing rig pa'i nus pas sangs rgyas 'od srungs
142b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang 'gro ba'i ngang/ bsdad pa'i dang/ byed pa'i dug gsum nges par bcom mo/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer ser skya'i nang na rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras sems can gyi don la dga' ldan nas
142b6(rgyud 'grel): yum sgyu ma chen mo'i lhum su zhugs nas 'khrungs pa'i dus su byang chub kyi shing drung gi 'og tu 'khrungs te/ ? ma thag tu pad+ma bdun skyes so/ /de yang sems can gyi don la gom pa bdun por ste/ chu bo ne rany+dza ra'i drung du dka' thub lo drug
142b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /gnyis pa rdo rje gdan du byang chub kyi shing gnas kyi drung gi 'og tu/ rtswa ku sha'i gdan bting nas srod la bdud btul nas tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus su sngon gyi drin pa nye bar bzhag cing chos kyi phung po
143a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad khri bzhi stong nye bar bzhag nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gsum pa ba ra NA ser bden pa bzhi'i chos kyis 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /bzhi pa mu stegs rigs gcer bu dang rtsod pa'o/
143a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa lha'i yul nas 'dzam+bu'i gling du byon nas lha rnams dang spyod pa mdzad pa'o/ /drug pa spre'us sbrang rtsi phul ba'o/ /bdun pa sku mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /dang po dga' ldan nas byon nas yum sgyu ma lha mdzes kyi lhums su zhugs nas btsas
143a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni brgyad pa'o/ /de bas na 'khrungs ma thag tu me tog pad+ma brgyad dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i bden pa dang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /phyi nas byang chub mchog
143a4(rgyud 'grel): thob 'gyur/ /go'u tam zhes bya ba ni dus dang po na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs pa yis bstan pa ste/ de'i dus su sa gzhi shel las byas pa 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshe tshad kyang stong du gnas so/ /gnyis pa
143a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyi bstan pa la sa gzhi ni gser las byas pa'o/ /mi'i tshe lo ni lnga brgya thub bo/ /dus gsum pa la sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa'i bstan pa las gzhi ni dngul las byas pa ste/ mi lo ni phye dang sum brgya thub
143a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dus bzhi pa la sangs rgyas log por dad sel gyi bstan pa la/ sa gzhi ni in+d+ra nI la las byas pa'o/ /che lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /dus lnga pa sangs rgyas gser thub kyi bstan pa la/ smon lam stobs kyis gser gyi sa gzhi mi'i
143a7(rgyud 'grel): tsha lo yang stor tsho gcig go/ dus drug pa la sangs rgyas 'od srungs gi bstan pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi'i rin po che sna bdun la longs spyod do/ /mi lo lnga brgya'o/ /dus bdun pa ni tha ma'i dus yin te /sangs rgyas
143b1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa ste/ sngon gyi dus su sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la/ sangs rgyas nyid la dang po'i smon lam btab pa'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus su sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi/ /bstan pa la lha dang lha ma yin sde brgyad dang mi la sogs pa'i sems
143b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyis mchod pa'o/ /des dus su yang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bram ze'i lus su skyes nas ni nyi ma'i 'od ces pa'o/ /de'i bu phu zla ba'i 'od du mtshan btags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la dad pa skyes nas mchod pa byed du byin pa lha dang mi la
143b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mang pos bkag nas ma thar te/ sangs rgyas zhal yang mthong bar mi thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis de mngon par shes nas sems can don la char drag po 'bebs pa'o/ /sems can thams cad char la babs nas bram ze ngas sangs
143b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhal mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i phrug gu nyi ma'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nags gseb na bzhugs pa la dad pa skyes nas mgo bo'i steng du bzhag go /de'i tshe de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
143b5(rgyud 'grel): mar ma mdzad kyi bskal pa tha ma'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ger 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /da ltar yang sa gzhi ni sa'i sa gzhi ste/ sems can yang bcos dka' ba mtshon sna lnga'i dus/ chos 'dul ba
143b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon pa theg pa chen po'i dus/ pha rol tu phyin pa gsang sngags kyis 'dul ba'i dus so/ /mi'i tshe lo yang brgya nyi shu thams pa/ gzugs kyang khru phye dang bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i
143b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa dang zhing rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sems can thams cad rjes su yi rang zhing gus par bya ste/ de'i nus pas kyang dug thams cad bcom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnam
144a1(rgyud 'grel): par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob dang log par dad sel dang gser thub dang 'od srungs dang shAkya thub pa ste/ de'i bden pa dang stobs dang gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byas shing
144a2(rgyud 'grel): dug bcom mo/ /mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag ces bya ba ni/ de dag gi nus pas kyang lha rnams la sogs pas kyang 'di la dad pa bgyis pa gang yang tshe ring zhing nad thams cad dang bral te/ dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur
144a3(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa zhi po rnams kyang mgu bar gyur
144a4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ sems can de la grogs byed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos zhes bya ba ni thog ma tha ma bar du dge bar gyur cig /da ltar yang dug thams cad 'joms shing rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs
144a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dag nas byung ste/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ 'du shes kyi phung po mi'i khams mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes lce'i skye mched zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar mo spyan gsum pa/
144a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad sprul gyis brgyan pa/ na bza' la dug gis brgyan pa/ klu mdza' yas dang 'jog po mnan pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po phyag gis bzung ba/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od dang
144a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ cung zad khro ba'o/ /dug bcom pa'i rig sngags gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas spros pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ i li mi li ki li la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' 
144b1(rgyud 'grel): bo zhes bya ba ni dge slong sa ri dang sems can thams cad kyi don du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa'o/ /rma bya chen mo 'di dag ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa gzugs khams kyi lha rnams so/ /sman ni rig
144b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi gsang sngags so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
144b3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing/ sman chen por gsungs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang zhes pa ni/ ri bdun gyi lha rnams dang sman chen por byas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po
144b4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i ral pa can la sogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /gang sman chen mo'i 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la dga' 
144b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'od na zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las 'das pa/ gang sdug bsngal thams cad theb cing dmyal ba mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin
144b6(rgyud 'grel): du tshal? ba? bdun du 'gas so zhes bya ba ni de'i bka' las 'das pa de'i tshe 'di la mgo bo 'gas te/ lus kyang dum bu dum bur zhig go/ shi nas kyang skyes ma thag tu dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal thob cing/ de'i sdug bsngal
144b7(rgyud 'grel): las bral nas kyang/ dmyal ba pad+ma chen po ltar gas par skye'o/ /rig sngags ni gang zhe na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'phros pa/ sku'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ gzugs kyi phung po me'i
145a1(rgyud 'grel): khams/ mig gi skye mched ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin mtshon bya ni ye shes te/ de yang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no/ /mtshon par byed pa ni thabs so de gnyis su med pa'i sku ni zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar ba/ g.yas
145a2(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha/ g.yon ljang gu/ spyan gsum pa rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ lus thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ rma bya la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje/ 'og ma na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /tha ma na mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon gyi
145a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po na rin po che/ bar ma na zhags pa/ tha ma na gzhu bsnams ba'o/ /dug gi me tog gi na bza' gsol ba/ zhi ba'i tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta'o/ /bka' 'di ni ka'i rti mu le la sogs
145a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i dug bcom pa'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o/ /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rigs drug la lha'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa de yang bde legs su 'gyur te/
145a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du mi'i la sogs pa'i sems can rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog ces bya ba ni dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dang ste/ sdug bsngal ni gcig gis gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal rnams te/ de yang zhi bar byas shing yi dags
145a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bzhi pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang zhi bar byas so/ /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog ces bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa gang dang phyin pa der bde zhing/ slar log kyang bde ba'o/ /phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs
145a7(rgyud 'grel): shog ces bya ba ni/ rang bzhin du slobs nas kyang bde bar gyur cig/ lus thams cad kyang nad dang bral bar gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ nyi ma'i gud la bde legs shing/ /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog ces bya ba
145b1(rgyud 'grel): ni nyal ba'i dus su yang rmi lam dge bar rmi zhing/ mi dge ba rnams mi rmi ste/ de bzhin du nyin mo yang dge ba'i sems su gnas shing/ nyon mongs pa rnams mi skye ba'o/ /de bzhin du nyi ma phyed kyang yin no/ /de dag sdig
145b2(rgyud 'grel): par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gnas pa ni skye ba bdun du tshe rab dran zhing/ 'di'i nus pas sdig pas ma gos pa'o/ /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin zhes bya ni/ rig sngags kyi nus pas mi dge ba las skyes kyang dge bar
145b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin zhes bya ba ni/ mi bzad pa ni skag dang bra nye'o/ /'bring po ni mchu dang khrums so/ /de la skyes pas kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ rgyu skar thams cad bzang po'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che
145b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ma 'ongs pa da ltar yod pa'i gzi brjid kyi stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can thams cad bde ba'o/ /yang na nam mkha' i bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis khyab pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa thams cad zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi
145b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom zhing bag chags kyi sgrib pas ma gos pa ste/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o/ /bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun tu bde legs su gyur ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang/ rig sngags kyi gzi
145b6(rgyud 'grel): brjid kyi stobs kyis/ kun nas kun tu bde legs su 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rma bya chen mo 'dis zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ log par dang sel
145b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ gang+gA klung gi phye ma snyed bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyis kyang/ rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /da ltar shAkya thub
146a1(rgyud 'grel): pas gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /de rnams kyis bka' nas gsungs te/ gzi brjid che zhing 'byung po rnams kyi mnyen pa'o/ /bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gus par byed pa spa ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/
146a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad la 'gro 'dod pas spa ba'o/ /yongs su sbyar ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sdug bsngal las bskyob pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ni/ mi dge ba bcu bor nas/ dge ba 'dzin pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhes
146a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa rgya char 'phel ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bar chad med cing dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa gang yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing bsam pa 'grub pa'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe da ltar yang bde bas
146a4(rgyud 'grel): te de bzhin du phyi ma la yang bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang 'byung po yin te/ de la sogs pa'i chad pa thams cad spong ba yin no/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dper na g.yul tu zhugs pa'i dgra las rgyal
146a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /dug gzhi la ba dang zhes bya ba ni dug 'thungs pa dang dug zos pa dang/ phol mig dang g.yan pa dang me dbal la sogs pa'i dug thams cad 'byin pa'o/ /dug gsang pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug 'byed pa'i dug dang/
146a6(rgyud 'grel): gsuM gsal nas phyi nas dug nad mi ldang ba'o/ /mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad rig sngags kyi nus pas 'byung po rnams 'od mi nus pa'o/ /sa cing bgyis shig ces bya ba ni sa g.yo pa'i
146a7(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ gzhan yang ri dang khang pa la sogs pa yang mi rdib? pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tshe thung ba ring bar byed cing nad thams cad bral nas bde bar gnas pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig ces bya
146b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ bag? dang 'thung ba phun sum tshogs shing/ ma shi'i bar du g.yog dang ldan zhing tshu ba thams cad ldan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can gyis don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho
146b2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin chen po dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i 'byung po la sogs pa'o/ /gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rgyal po bzhi la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
146b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang/ dpal gyi ri dang/ ri nag po la sogs pa'o/ /yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab
146b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so/ /'brog rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams te/ yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong la gnas pa'o/ /'brog chen po dang zhes bya ba ni de
146b5(rgyud 'grel): bas kyang che bas na chen po ste/ 'byung po rnams kyang de bas kyang che ba'o/ /klu rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gaM gA dang/ sind+hu dang/ si ta dang/ puk+Shu dang/ chu bo chen po nai rany+dza ra la sogs pa de lta bu'i chu klung rnams la yod pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po
146b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /klu chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po ste/ de la gnas pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin dang sa bdag la sogs pa'o/ /sman ljongs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdzing bu rnams yin te de la gnas pa'i 'byung ba sa bdag dang sa
146b7(rgyud 'grel): srin la sogs pa stong gsum stong che po la gnas pa'i rdzing bu rnams so/ /sman ljongs chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bas kyang che bas na chen po'o/ /'bab chu rnams dang zhes bya ba ni ba lang spyod dang dbyangs ldan dang/ sbrang rtsi'i blo gros la
147a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i 'bab chu la gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so steng ka rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i khron pa rnams te de la sogs pa chu mig la gnas pa'i sa srin dang sa bdag 'byung po gnod sbyin rnams gnas pa'o/ /lu
147a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni de'i lteng ka na gnas pa'i mtsho chen po ste/ de klu la 'bab pas na lu ma'o/ /de la gnas pa'i 'byung bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnams so/ /ri'i phug rnams dang zhes bya ba ni stong par du gnas pa'i ri rnams la rgyu ba'i yi
147a3(rgyud 'grel): dags rnams so/ /yang na gdod pa lta bar mi nus pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /dur khrod rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod ni dad pa dang/ rma bya'i sgro dang/ rtsal shing dang/ ro langs dang/ mes bsregs pa la sogs pa'o/ /de la gnas pa ni
147a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyir dang 'byung po la sogs pa'o/ /dur khrod chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni bsil ba'i tshal dang/ ko la ha ra dang/ 'byung po ro langs la sogs pa'i dur khrod chen po rnams dang/ de bas kyang che zhing 'byung po rnams che ba'o/ /bzhi mod
147a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rgya gram na gnas pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i 'byung po'o/ /grong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ni chu la gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams te/ ma rungs pa thams cad byed pa/ sems can la gnod cing grong la rgyu ba'o/
147a6(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer rnams dang zhes bya ba ni de bas kyang che ba ste/ 'byung po yang de bas che ba'o/ /lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'brog gi 'brog gnas te/ de la ba lang gnas pa'i gnas so/ /de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so/ /sgyid
147a7(rgyud 'grel): mos tshal rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ pho dang mo rgyu ba'i gnas/ de bzhin du 'byung po yang pho mo sgyu ma'i gnas gzugs su byas nas rgyu bar byed pa'o/ /nags rnams dang zhes bya ba ni srin po yi dags rnams rgyu ba ste/ de la gnas pa'i ma
147b1(rgyud 'grel): rungs pa rnams so/ /nags tshal rnams dang zhes bya ba ni chu'i bar na gnas pa ste/ de'i nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams te/ yang na rgya mtsho'i bar na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams so/ /lam rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro 'dug byed pa la 'che bar byed cing ma
147b2(rgyud 'grel): rungs pa'i 'byung po ste/ de bzhin du rtag tu rgyu ba'o/ /lam gol bdag na gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la log par 'khrid cing lam log par ston pa rnams so/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo
147b3(rgyud 'grel): la yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gang dag lcang lo can gyi 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi de dpon rnam thos sras kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag/ pho brang de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'khor bcas
147b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ ces bya ba ni gang zag dang dad pa skyes pa rnams dang/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba dang/ 'chang du yod pa dang/ klong ba dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ sgom pa dang/ rgya chen
147b5(rgyud 'grel): spel ba dang/ de rnams la sogs pa yang dag par srung bar byed pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i nus pas lo brgya lon par gyur kyang/ gzhon nu'i tshul du zhugs shing nad rnams thams cad bral ba'o//
147b6(rgyud 'grel): ston pa rgya mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ dge ba'i dus su dge ba nus shing/ de bzhin du za ba dang 'thung ba yang nus pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di yang sems can thams cad la thugs rje che zhing/ gzugs skur snang ba'o/ /gzugs su
147b7(rgyud 'grel): de yang thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ zhal gsum phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing nag tu bzhugs pa/ g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ khro mor dbu skra ser po sprul gyis bcings pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan spyan gsum
148a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yan lag sprul gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon sdig mdzub dang zhags pa dril bu'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ zhabs kyis gnod sbyin po mo mnan pa/ pad+ma'i steng du nyi
148a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'di lta ste/ 'byung po rnams kyi snying po ni de ni la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni shAkya thub pas yang nas yang du gsung pa'o/ /shar phyogs na
148a3(rgyud 'grel): bri ze'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dri za thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi lcog shar na yod pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas na 'khor bsnams pa/ g.yon pa'i wang bsnams pa/ rin
148a4(rgyud 'grel): po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /'khor dri za stong phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor gyi mtshan
148a5(rgyud 'grel): ma ni glu len zhing bro brdungs te/ rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid/ /skam pa ma mchis mang bar smra/ rgod par bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/ /sgom par 'gyur la mig dmar te/ rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par bgyid/ /mig kyang 'byed
148a6(rgyud 'grel): par mi bgyid de/ rgyab kyi phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid/ 'khor 'bum phrag du ma de dag kyang sems can la de bzhin du gnod pa byas shing/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ de
148a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa dri za rnams la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dbang du 'dus shing/ gzhan sems can rnams la gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi rgyal po'am gdon rnams gnod par 'gyur na/ tshes bcu 'am nya 'am brgyad la
148b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la me tog gam spos sam mar me 'am dri 'am/ lha bshos sam mchod pa'i rdzas rang gis ci rigs pa la sogs la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'am/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal bo yul 'khor srung la sogs pa/ shar phyogs na gnas pa'i
148b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang gdon rnams mchod par bgyi'o/ /yang rol mo'i rdzas ni gdugs dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rol mo'i rdzogs so/ /gtor ma'i rdzas la ni/ bu ram dang bsreg pa'i zho dang/ zho zan dang/ 'bras gyi chan dang/ 'bras las ?
148b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khur ba dang/ de la sogs pa mi rigs pa pa sogs la dri sna tshogs zhim par mchod cing/ me tog dkar ba'i phreng ba dang/ dog sa la me tog dkar po bkram la/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o/ /gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su
148b4(rgyud 'grel): skyab par byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa de lta bu'i yul 'khor srung gi rgyal po/ /shar phyogs kyi sems can rnams skyong ba'o/ /bu dang bcas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen
148b5(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyi'o/ /tsha bo dang bcas spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ ded pon dang bcas/ mdag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni/ de dag rnams kyis sems
148b6(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don byas shing/ rgyal po dang 'khor rnams kyi tsha bo ba la sogs pa'i 'bum phrag du mar gnas pa'o/ /rig sngag kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
148b7(rgyud 'grel): chen mo ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yas na ral gri'o/ /g.yon sdig mdzub dang rma bya'i spo bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ lo bcu gnyis ma'i
149a1(rgyud 'grel): cha byed can/ zhi bar bzhugs shing pad+ma'i steng du zla pa'i gdan/ 'od kyang de bzhin te/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can/ mtshon byed pa'i shes rab ste/ mtshon pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bdag nyid ngo chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
149a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi phung po sa'i khams mig gi skye mched do/ /de lta bu'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo gang zag bdag gis 'chad bar 'gyur na/ yang dag par srung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa rnams kyis rlags
149a3(rgyud 'grel): tshol ba la spa ba'o/ /yongs su skyab pa dang zhe bya ba ni/ nang thams cad dang ma rungs pa rnams kyis bzung ba las bskyabs pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i sems can rnams kyis bzung par 'dod pa/ rig sngags
149a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzi brjid kyis gzung nas glags mi rnyed pa'o/ /yongs su bskyad ba dang zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gang gis 'jigs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing 'jigs pa thams cad bral ba ste/ rgya cher bskyad bas na yongs
149a5(rgyud 'grel): su bskur ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni zhi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba ste/ de nye bar bzhag pas na bde ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni bde ba phun sum tshogs shing sdug bsngal thams
149a6(rgyud 'grel): cad dang ?? ? ma skyes pa'i dus su yang bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang pa dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon gyis chad pa gcod par 'dod pa la/ de'i gzi brjid kyis spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis mtshon
149a7(rgyud 'grel): btang? nas/ ? bde ba dang mi phog pa'i phyir na spang ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze dang/ phol mig dang/ g.yan pa dang/ wa ba dang/ sha kra dang/ me dpal la sogs pa mdze rigs bcwo brgyad sel ba'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes
149b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni de rnams mi ldang bar bya ba'i phyir na bsad pa'o/ /mtshams bcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed de/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gar bzhag pa'i sar/ 'byung po rnams kyis 'ong mi nus pa'o/ /sa bcing
149b2(rgyud 'grel): ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyis sa la reg nas sa bcing bar 'gyur na rdo rje gzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ nang thams cad dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig ces bya
149b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ phun sum tshogs shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba'o/ /dri za'i snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ su ru su ru su ru la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni dge slong sa ri dang sems can
149b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bka' stsal pa'o/ /lho phyogs na grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi lho phyogs na gnas pa 'jig rten lho phyogs skyong ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ sa dang po thab pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis
149b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mthing kha/ g.yas dbyug to/ /g.yon rin po che bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la zhugs pa bzhin mi sdug pa khro bor gnas pa'o/ /grul bum thams cad kyi bdag po grul bum stong phrag du ma yod pa
149b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum yi dags kyi don rnams kyi bdag po ste/ de bzhin du ma mo rnams kyang yin no/ /de rnams kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ shin tu skom gis 'de bas par 'gyur/ /g.yengs pas btab cing lta bar 'gyur/ bzhin
149b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dmar por lta bar 'gyur/ skum nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur/ kha dog dan cing lus kyang skem/ skra dang sen mo ring ba ste/ dri ma can la dri mi 'dag /rdzun dang kyal ba smra bar bgyid/ grul bum gyi gdon 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa ni/ sems
150a1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la gnod par bgyid cing rgyal po'i 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni grul bum gyi gdon rnams dbang du sdud cing/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /de rnams
150a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnod pa'i rdzas ni gong dang mthun no/ /tshe grangs yang god dang mthun no/ /gtor ma'i rdzas la khrag gam chad dam/ sha 'am nya 'am sgog pa 'am la phug gam/ sran chan nam khur ba 'am bu ram gyi thug pa'am/ khrag gi gtor ma
150a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog ser po'i phreng pa dang/ dog sa la me tog bkram la/ lho phyogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams mchod par bya'o/ /gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyod bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po
150a4(rgyud 'grel): ri rab kyi lho phyogs yongs su srung zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la srung bar byed ba'o/ /de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ ded dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/
150a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa de rnams kyi bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig
150a6(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ni thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /ye shes mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa tshor ba'i phung po'o/ /rin chen gyis rigs chu'i khams sna'i skye mched ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin zhal gcig phyag gnyis
150a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog ser po/ phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad rin po che sa brgyan pa'o/ /spyan gsum pa zhabs phyed krud du bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od
150b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa de'i 'og na pad+ma'i gdan la khro mor bzhugs pa'o/ /gang zag gang gi 'di la mos par gyur na/ rgyal po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyis kyang de la srung zhing skyob par byed do/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du
150b2(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba ni gang zhe na/ grul bum gyi gdon gyi snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ me lu ke la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
150b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /nub phyogs na klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab gyi rtse mo'i nub phyogs kyi lcog la bzhugs te/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten skyong ba/ klu rnams kyi bdag po sa dang po thob pa/ byang
150b4(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams so/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar ba/ g.yas na sprul gyi zhags pa/ g.yon pad+ma bsnams pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ cung zad
150b5(rgyud 'grel): khro bor bzhugs so/ /klu thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor 'bum phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po de'i 'khor yang klu dang sa srin sa bdag rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyigs pus btab cing dbugs
150b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'byin?/ de bzhin dbugs kyang grad bar 'gyur/ /rdul zhing  kha chu sbu bar 'byung/ /phyir phyir gnyis kyis log par 'gyur/ /kha dog ldan zhing sba bas te/ de bzhin 'dar zhing skyug par 'gyur/ /sen mo dag kyang ston par byed/
150b7(rgyud 'grel): tog tog 'tshig cing rdul bar byed/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams la mtshan ma btab nas/ rang gi mtshan yang de dag dang 'dra pa'o/ /klu rnams la dbang byed du 'byung ba gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams dbang du 'dus shing
151a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten nub phyogs skyod ba de rnams mchod pa'i rdzas gong dang mthun te/ tshe grangs kyang god dang mthun no/ /gtor ma'i rdzas ni mngar gsum dang dkar gsum lo? thug dang gro chad dang gro'i khur ba 'o ma las byas ba'i gtor ma me tog dmar po'i phreng ba
151a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog nga/ sil ma dog sa la bkram la/ klu sman la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /gang nub phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po spyan mi bzang des kyang ri rab kyi nub phyogs na yongs su skyong zhing sems can rnams la
151a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /bu dang bcas pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi bu la sogs pa dang/ 'khor rnams kyi bu la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces
151a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar mo phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
151a5(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ pad+ma'i rigs 'du shes kyi phung po me'i khams/ lce'i skye mched/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ mtshon byed ni thabs/ mtshon bya ni shes dang/ de gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de lta bu'i lha mo la gus par
151a6(rgyud 'grel): byed gyur na/ gang zag de la srung bar byed cing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta'o/ /gang bltas she
151a7(rgyud 'grel): ma klu rnams kyi snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ bi du ri'i bi du ri zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams thos
151b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ byang phyogs kyi rgyal po lus ngan po yin te/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i byang phyogs kyi lcog la bzhugs te/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams skyong ba'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na ne'u
151b2(rgyud 'grel): le'i skyal ba bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gsus pa che zhing stod chung ba khro bor zhugs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma yod ba zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan bo?
151b3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin thams cad ded dpon gyi 'khor rnams so/ /'khor de dag gis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ phyir phyir ldog cing 'jigs par 'gyur/ /smra bar gyur cing khro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid kyang logs par 'gyur/ /yang na shin tu
151b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bar 'gyur/ /ltag tu gyen du lta bar 'gyur/ /skar ma dag la bsnyag? par bgyid/ /nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'dar zhing skra yang 'byin/ /gnod sbyin gyi yang rang bzhin no/ /gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 'jug
151b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa rnams la mnga' mdzad pa/ byang phyogs skyong ba'o/ /gang byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de la zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyi khams byang phyogs
151b6(rgyud 'grel): skyong bar byed pa/ sems can rnams la gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /bu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyal po lus ngan po bu la sogs pa dang/ 'khor rnams kyi bu la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag
151b7(rgyud 'grel): la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di yang/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /las kyi rigs bya ba nan tan grub
152a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes/ /'du byed kyi phung po rlung gi khams yid kyi skye mched ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum ba rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa nyid ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/
152a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og na pad+ma'o/ zhabs? phyed krung du bzhugs pa/ /khro bor bzhugs pa'o/ /gang zag 'di la dad par gyur na/ /srung bar 'gyur zhing mi shi bar bde bar gnas pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba
152a3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di lta ste/ gang lta ba zhe na 'og tu lta ba ni gnod sbyin gyi snying po ni/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ so ri so ri la sogs pa'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba ni/ 'bum phrag du ma dri za dang bcas shing/ shar phyogs skyong pa'o//
152a4(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas shing/ lho phyogs srung ba'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni klu'i 'khor rnams 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas shing/ nub phyogs
152a5(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba'o/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas nas byang phyogs srung ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus par byed cing srung ba btags na rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas
152a6(rgyud 'grel): nas bsrung ba dang sba la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag ces bya ba ni 'khor rgyal po chen po bzhis byas shing/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gtso bor byas pa'o/ /dog sa bzhi bzang po la/ me tog dbyibs bzhin
152a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas byas/ de steng tshon lngas bri ba la mdzes par byas nas yang dag bri/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi twa ra na bzhi/ dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yang dag bzhugs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ rgyal po bzhi yang
152b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin gser gyi pad+ma la/ mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi yang dgod/ /sgo bzhi dang ni zung rnams la/ phyogs skyong bcu yang dgod bar bya/ rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rim la/ rgyal chen bzhi yi 'khor rnams dgod/ de bzhin 'byung po la sogs dang/ mkhas
152b2(rgyud 'grel): pas yang dag bri bar bya/ /rgyal po bzhis dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs so/ /de nas bum pa'i bya thabs ni/ mtshan ma legs pa mgrin pa ring/ /nag por ri spangs pa dang/ mchu 'phyang lto ba che ba dang/ dar ram ras sam gang yang rung/ mgrin pa yang par bcing bar
152b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rin chen lnga dang 'bru lnga dang/ sman lnga dri lnga snying po lnga /chu gtsang gis ni legs par dgang/ gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan dang/ /lo ma lnga dang ldan pa dang/ bkra dshis brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /de rnams kyis ni brgyan nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor
152b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su yang dag bzhag /snying po 'am nye ba'i snying po 'am/ /de'i sngags kyis bum pa lhag par byed pa'i cho ga byas la/ dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yang phyis bshad pa bzhin bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i 'khor
152b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ nad? kyis btab pa de sngar bshad pa'i snying po'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bsrung ba byas na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'jig rten skyong zhing nad pa yang skyod bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten skyong bar grags dang ldan zhes bya ba
152b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gling bzhi'i ri rab dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos skyong ba byang chub sems dpa' i sa dang po thob nas sems
152b7(rgyud 'grel): can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /sde bo che la stobs po che zhes bya ba ni dri za dang/ grul bum dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ de rnams kyi ded dpon te/ de rnams la che bar mdzad cing 'jig rten la grags pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /pha rol dgra rnams
153a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'joms zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul la pha rol 'dul ba'o/ /gzhan gyis mi thub thul par dka' zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyis mi thub pa stobs che ba dang ldan pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan
153a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'od dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas khyab cing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de bzhin du kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ so sor rang rang gi kha dog ldan zhing
153a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin grags pa yang yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang/ lha yi yul yang myong par byed ces bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa la yang rtsod par nus shing/ pha rol gyi dgra rnams 'dul ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi
153a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bar gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor bcas dang gang zag bdag la srung bar byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ mtshon bya ni shes rab ste/ mtshon byed ni
153a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs so/ /rgyal mo bdag nyid do/ /rin po che'i rigs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ tshor ba'i phung po chu'i khams/ sna'i skye mched ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ g.yas mthing kha/ g.yon dmar
153a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ zhal dang po sgeg pa/ g.yas khro bo/ g.yon 'dzum pa/ zhal re re la spyan gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i bu rgyan /dbu la rin po che'i rdo rjes brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /phyag g.yas dang po ral gri/
153a7(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma na rdo rje rin po che/ g.yon dang po 'khor lo/ /'og ma na rma bya'i sgro tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'geng pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gdan/ nyi ma bdun dang ldan pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ bcu drug
153b1(rgyud 'grel): lon pa'i cha byad can thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa gang bdag gis gus par byed pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bskyabs pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba
153b2(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu spangs nas dge ba bcu la bzung ba'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa bcom nas yon tan bskyong ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar
153b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i don thob nas mtho ris kyi ngo bo nyid thob pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi rnams kyi chad pa spangs nas ye shes shar pa'o/ /mtshon cha spangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mtshon cha
153b4(rgyud 'grel): spang ba'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga shar ba la nges bsil bar byed pa'o/ /dug bsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis dug lnga bsad pa'o/ /mtshams bcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i ngo bo bsad
153b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ ye shes kyi ngo bo la 'jug pa'o/ /sa bcing bgyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dge ba la 'jug pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis nad med cing shi ba'i
153b6(rgyud 'grel): dus kyis mi dgos pa'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig ces bya ba ni/ ye shes des sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ gang blta ba zhe na/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab pa
153b7(rgyud 'grel): blta'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ a le me le la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i rgyal po bzhi'i cho ga'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
154a1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub bas kun dga' bo la yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ lus ngan po'i bu bzhi po'i ming brjod cing/ sems can rnams la yang
154a2(rgyud 'grel): dag par bsrung ste/ 'di'i nus pas gnod sbyin chen po de rnams kyis kyang gang dang gang du srung bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'og tu blta ba'o/ /'og tu gang blta zhe na/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po blta ba'o/ /lus ngan gyi bu thu bo zhes
154a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i bu chen po de dag de/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha min gyi yul yang skye ba'o/ /kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon/ phrugs su ldan na gnas pa ste/ lha yis bden pa
154a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ de'i kha dog ni dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ nag po dang/ de rnams ni zhal re re phyag gnyis gnyis so/ /phyag g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang mdung dang dgra sta dang/ rtse gcig dang lcags kyu
154a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon pa rnams na rin po che'i myu gu bsnams pa/ gnod sbyin de rnam ni sems can gyi don mdzad cing/ srog chags rnams la gnod pa mi byed pa'o/ /kun tu rgyal ba dang/ mi la zhon pa gnyis ni shar dang lho stong? pa'o//
154a6(rgyud 'grel): phrags? su ldan na gnas pa ste/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang na gnas pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bka' las mi 'da' ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ rjes su ? zhing
154a7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags la gus par byas pa'o/ /kun tu rgyal dang mi la zhon gnyis kyis kyang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs skyong ba'o/ /ser mo lnga pas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi pho brang skyong ba'o/ /des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
154b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ bsrung ba dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kha don byed pa dang/ rgya cher spel ba dang/ gus par byas nas 'chang ba dang/ bsgom pa dang/ tshig gcig kyang 'don par gyur na/ tshe 'di yang gnod sbyin de rnams
154b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe phyi ma la yang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di'i gnyen po'i rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang gu/ las kyi rigs bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes 'du byed kyi phung po rlung gi khams lus kyis skye mched/ ye shes
154b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i ngo bo nyid spyan gsum pa cung zad khro ba/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can yan lag thams cad sprul gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /rma bya la zhon pa/ de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag gi gus
154b4(rgyud 'grel): par byas na gnod sbyin de rnams kyis kyang skyong ba'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gnod sbyin gyi snying po ni/ tsa le ka tsa le la sogs pa'o/ /skya snar phun? 'khor
154b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jig ces bya ba ni gnas ni skya snar dbu/ gnod sbyin ni 'khor ba 'jig go /de yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na gnas so/ /phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po g.yas 'khor lo g.yon sdigs 'dzub bo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dkar ba na zhes bya
154b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ yul ni rgya gar gyi nub phyogs yin te/ gnod sbyin gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ser po/ g.yas ral gri g.yon thod pa'o/ /grong khyer bzang na gnod sbyin brag ces bya ba ni de ni gnas yin te/ gnod
154b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi sku mdog ni mthing nag/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ni gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /shed kyi bu ni byang phyogs na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi byang phyogs na sgra mi snyan na gnas pa stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che ba'o/ /de'i kha dog ni gser
155a1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba/ g.yas na dbyug to g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul grong khyer dbus na rgyal po'i khab kyi lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /sku mdog mthing kha/ g.yas na rdo rje g.yon
155a2(rgyud 'grel): sdig mdzub bo/ /bya rgod phung po'i gnas bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje ni/ pho brang bya rgod phung por byas nas khams gsum du skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /rgya mtsho'i mdza' i bar gyi sar/ /lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa zhes bya ba
155a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mtsho dang bya rgod phung po gnyis la/ lan gsum gsum rgyu ba'o/ /skad cig mas 'dzam+bu'i gling par gnas brgyu ba'o/ /stobs che zhing ni gzi brjid che/ dpag tshad bcu ni rnam par gnon zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi stobs dang 'gram par mi nus
