155a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gzi brjid kyang de bzhin no/ /lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad bcur sprul pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mkha' lding rgyas pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba ste/ gnas ni ma la'i rtse mo na'o/ /gzugs bya dang 'dra ba lus ser po gshog pa nag po/
155a5(rgyud 'grel): mjug ma yang nag po/ mchu sngon po ring ba/ lag pa dang rkang pa sder mo ring ba/ mig ser ba/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na sbrul za ba'o/ /skad cig ma dpag tshad lnga brgya lnga brgyar 'phur nus pa'o/ /sna tshogs sped pa gnas sgo na zhes bya ba ni/ de
155a6(rgyud 'grel): yang 'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs na gnas sgo zhes bya ba'i yul na'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni/ shin tu dmar ba/ khro bo'i tshul du yod pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin pa ku la rgyal khab na
155a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnas ni rgyal po'i khab kyi dbus na'o/ /sku mdog ni ljang gu'o/ /bzhin mi sdug pa/ gzugs thung pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na nor bu rkyal pa 'dzin pa'o/ /sde bo che la stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ ba ku la ni 'khor mang po
155b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa'o/ /gnod sbyin nag po nye nag bo/ /ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram shar phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin nag po nye nag po/ de bas kyang nag pas nye nag po/ gnod sbyin de gnyis
155b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang phyag gnyis gnyis/ g.yas pa na rin po che 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon ne'u le'i rkyal ba bsnams pa'o/ /thub pa chen po shAkya'i rtog/ sangs rgyas thub pa gar bstan par zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus chu bo gang+gA'i lho phyogs na/ der sangs rgyas gnas
155b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /phyag gnyis sku mdog gser gyi mdog can rab tu byung ba'i gzugs su bzhugs pa'o/ /rkang bkra bo ni dgra can la zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul gyi dbus/ lho nub kyi mtshams na'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ sku mdog
155b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha/ g.yas g.yon gnyis rtse gcig dang/ dung rnam pa'o/ /rtsir ta na dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi nub phyogs na gnas te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog sngo skya phyag g.yas pa gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa/ g.yon pa
155b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na tri shu la dang a 'bras bsnams pa'o/ /spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can no/ /mnyan yod na ni phur bu'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi grong khyer na/ rgyal pu mgon med sa bdun na'o/ /gnod sbyin phur bu ni/ sku
155b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar po/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na mda' gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /gnas ni rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin rgya mtsho ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ sku mdog dkar po/ sprul gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /yangs pa can
155b7(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje mtsho zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /spre'u ltar dmar ser gyad yul na zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi byang ngos na yin te/ gnod sbyin de ni sku
156a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar po/ /phyag na gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /bar na ser nag po che zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam bu gling gi dbus su chu bo gang gA'i 'gram na'o/ /gnod sbyin nag po chen po ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing nag
156a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa'o/ /g.yas pa gsum na ral gri gri gug rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon pa gsum na tsan dan gyi be con dang thod pa zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /blta na sdug pa tsam pa na/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul shar phyogs na/ shin tu byad mtshar
156a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gnod sbyin lta na sdug gi gnas so/ /ku mdog dkar po phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sgo can na zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo/ /sku mdog ljang nag phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na/ 'khor lo dang a 'bras/ g.yon
156a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis dbyug to dang dung bsnams pa'o/ /'dzin pa po sgo drug na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rgya mtsho'i 'gram na yin te/ sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na/ utpa la'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /'jigs byed zangs kyi 'dab ma na zhes
156a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ lho nub kyi mtshams rgya mtsho'i 'gram na'o/ /sku mdog dmar skya g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdigs mdzub bo/ /brang gi 'gro na 'joms pa po zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi byang ngos na'o/ /gnod sbyin dmar skya/ phyag na rtse gsum bsnams
156a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'phrog na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas so zhes bya ba ni 'dzam+bu gling gi thang stong rnams la gnas pa/ sku mdog nag po phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na zhags pa'o/ /ser skya ba ni 'bru mangs na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rgya gar yul gyi dbus
156a7(rgyud 'grel): su/ gnod sbyin mdog ser skya/ phyag na dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /'phags rgyal na ni nor srung ba zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi dbus su'o/ /gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa g.yas pa gsum ni phyag 'tshal ba dang/ nor gyi snye
156b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ mchod sbyin no/ /g.yon pa gsum na po ti dang 'bras gyi snye ma dang bum pa'o/ /srung byed na ni nor 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni/ yul de'i lho phyogs na'o/ /sku mdog ser po g.yas na rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon na gser gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o/
156b2(rgyud 'grel): gso ba'i mdza' na gso ba zhes bya ba ni/ nub kyi phyogs na gnas te/ gnod sbyin gso ba po ni/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag na ne'u le bsnams pa'o/ /dga' bo nye dga' grong khyer gnas zhes bya ba ni/ yul dbus na'o/ /de gnyis kyang sku mdog ser po sprul
156b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /phreng ba 'dzin pa chu mchog na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na gnas te/ gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni dmar po phyag na gser gyi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /kun dga' bo 'chi med sa bzhag ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i
156b4(rgyud 'grel): gling gi shar phyogs na'o/ /sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /mche ba dkar po ngos bzang na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi shar phyogs na gnod sbyin mche ba can gnas te/ sku mdog dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /ming bstan pa ni gzi brjid
156b5(rgyud 'grel): can zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho'i bar na gnas pa te/ gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni mthing nag tu yod pa/ phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /ri chen ri ldan grong khyer na/ zhes bya ba ni/ ri bo chen po'i bar na/ grong khyer lta na sdug gi dbus na/ rnam par rgyal ba'i
156b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi srung ma'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che ba'o/ /de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni sku mdog nag po/ /g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams rnams zhes bya ba ni gnod
156b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rnams thos kyi bu yin te ri rab kyi phyogs mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po/ /g.yas na rin po che'i myu gu/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes/ /'jig rten grags pa skye yod na zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de 
157a1(rgyud 'grel): ni sku mdog dmar po'o/ /g.yas na rtse gcig g.yon na phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma'i gnod sbyin ni thal ba'i mdog can lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /'og ma'i 'gram na lag brgya pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs
157a2(rgyud 'grel): nags gseb na'o/ /gnod sbyin shin tu 'jigs pa sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /ka liM ka na shing rta che zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi lho phyogs so/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni dkar po phyag na rtse gsum bsnams pa'o/ /thul
157a3(rgyud 'grel): bar dka' ni 'gro 'joms na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang dbus kyi nub phyogs su/ kha dog ser po phyag na bum pa bil ba bsnams pa'o/ /srid sgrub nags na srid sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nags na'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog
157a4(rgyud 'grel): ni sngo skya phyag na dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'joms pa'i mdun khang na zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi byang shar mtshams na gnas so/ /gnod sbyin gyi sku mdog ni ser skya ste/ gser gyi rkyal bu 'dzin pa'o/ /phreng ba bsrung ni ri rtsegs
157a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhes bya ba ni/ gser gyi ri rab kyi steng gi byang phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mdog ser po lag na phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rta dmar na ni bzang po pa zhes bya ba ni de yang dar cig gi yul yin te/ gnod sbyin sku mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu
157a6(rgyud 'grel): dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /ma rdzogs pa ni thams cad bzang zhes bya ba ni yul de yang rgya nag po'i byang phyogs na mi nyag ces bya ba'o/ /de na gnod sbyin de gnas te/ gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni g.yas na 'bras kyi snyem 'dzin
157a7(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon na nor gyi rkyal pa 'dzin pa'o/ /snyems pa can na skyong ba po zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin sde dpon ni rnams thos kyi sras yin te/ rgya nag po'i shar phyogs na gnas te/ de yang khri stan gyi yul na'o/ /de na/ gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi
157b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa/ g.yon na nor gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /ded dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon ni rnam thos kyis sras yin te/ nor gyi dbang gis rnam thos kyi yang ded dpon no ma rgyal rgyal na
157b2(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs zhes bya ba ni/ rgya nag po'i yul na gnas pa ste/ /de ni rgya nag po'i srung mar 'gyur zhing khrims rnams gnod sbyin des byas pa'o/ /de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas dbyug to/
157b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon zhags pa'o/ /kha dog ni dmar nag go /gnas bcas na ni nar bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ de yang lcang lo can gyi gnas na gnas la/ gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ sku mdog dkar po g.yas na rin po che'i snod/ g.yon na gser
157b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi myu gu'o/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i grong len na zhes bya ba ni/ de ni bal yul gyi gnas yin no/ /gnod sbyin ni zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa sku mdog dkar po dang sngo skya dang ljang gu dang/ mthing nag tu gnas pa'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na phreng
157b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang skyabs sbyin/ yang g.yas g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum dang phreng ba de'i 'og gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug to/ /tha ma gnyis na rtse gsum dang thod pa'o/ /zhi ba bzang po 'jigs byed ni zhes bya ba ni/ mtsho ma drod kyi byang ngos na'o/ /gangs kyi rin
157b6(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ste/ gnod sbyin de ni yab yum du bcas pa mdog ser po/ /g.yas kyi phyag na tri shu la/ g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /yum gyi phyag na utpa la bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dbang po dang grong na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo pho brang
157b7(rgyud 'grel): na sdug pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa/ sku mdog ser po'o/ /me tog tog ni rdo rje grong na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ de na dpal gyi ri na gnas te/ gnod sbyin de ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /phyag g.yas na phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon
158a1(rgyud 'grel): na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /kha dog dkar po'o/ /shing pa shing gi grong khyer na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rim la yan yod pa ste/ de ni tsan dan gyi shing gi srung ma'o/ /gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mdog sngo bsangs
158a2(rgyud 'grel): su yod pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri yod pa/ g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /kha dog can ni ser skyar gnas zhes bya ba ni/ yul bod yul na bzhugs pa'o/ /bod yul dbus na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni g.yas na 'khor lo g.yon na
158a3(rgyud 'grel): gshol mda''dzin pa'o/ /sku mdog ljang gur gnas pa'o/ /nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos sras kyi 'khor pho brang lcang lo can na gnas pa'o/ /de gnyis sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni kha dog ser po dang/ dkar po'o
158a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na rin po che'i myu gu dang nor gyis gang ba'i bum pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na nor gyi rkyal ba dang 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /spun gnyis tshangs pa ldan pa na zhes bya ba ni nor bu bzang po dang gang ba
158a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po gnyis te/ gzi brjid che zhing nor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /ba lang 'dzin na 'joms pa po zhes bya ba ni/ gnas bal yul gyi byang ngos yin te/ gnod sbyin de ni shin tu khro zhing gdugs pa'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis
158a6(rgyud 'grel): cha tri shul dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ kha dog nag po'o/ /rab tu 'joms na rdo 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni/ de'i lho phyogs na yod de/ shin tu stobs che zhing sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /de'i kha dog ni ljang gur yod pa/ bzhin
158a7(rgyud 'grel): mi sdug pa/ g.yas ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po 'od srungs sel zhes bya ba ni/ bod yul na gnas te/ gnod sbyin de yang srung ma la dga' zhing gnas pa g.yas na sgra sta g.yon zhags pa bsnams
158b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /kha dog thal ba'i mdog can no/ /skyugs pa yi ni ri la gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs na gnas pa/ stobs po che la gzi brjid ldan de'i kha dog phyag mtshan ni kha dog dmar po gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gsum sbas 'gram pa
158b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dog na zhes bya ba ni/ laM ka'i lho phyogs na rgya mtsho'i 'gram na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni gdong dmar po spre'u'i gzugs su yod pa'o/ /g.yas pa khu tshur g.yon sdigs mdzub bo/ /d+he nun ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ laM ka'i nub phyogs na rgya mtsho'i bar
158b3(rgyud 'grel): rga'o/ /gnod sbyin mdog ser po/ /g.yas na a so ka'i shing thogs pa/ g.yon na zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /dga' ba can dang 'phel byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha'i lho nub mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni rdo rje 'dzin cing kha dog
158b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing khar gnas pa'o/ /dga' ba 'phel byed grong khyer na zhes bya ba ni/ de'i shar phyogs na gnod sbyin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na nor gyi rkyal ba bsnams pa g.yon na sbrul gyi zhags pa/ kha dog ljang gu'o/ /rlung gis na rlung ldan pa
158b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi chu klung gang na yod pa'i sa na yod de/ skad cig mas khyab cing/ chu klung gang na yod par mnga' mdzad pa/ de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ phyag g.yas na dbyug to 'dzin pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub bo/ /kha dog khra bor yod
158b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ smad stsal du yod pa'o/ /'phyang bar 'gyur 'thab dga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rgya nag pa'i nub phyogs na grong khyer rtsong ka na'o/ /gnod sbyin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar po g.yas na ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o//
158b7(rgyud 'grel): 'og nang gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin des skad cig mas khyab nas/ rtsod pa'i sems dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /bcom brlag na ni bung bu zhes bya ba ni/ yul lam ka na rgya mtsho'i 'gram na yod pa/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i
159a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul can sems can la gnod bcing sha khrag za ba/ de'i kha dog ni dmar nag go /phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /laM ka na ni bum pa'i lto zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi lho nub mtshams yin te/ gzugs ni dpag tshad bcu yod
159a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ shin tu gnag la 'jigs pa laM ka'i bdag po'i nub po/ /phyag brgyad yod pa g.yas na ral gri bar pa gnyis 'khor lo dang shag ti/ tha ma na mda'/ g.yon dang po na zhags pa 'phang mdung dgra sta rtse gsum mo/ /gnod sbyin de ni stobs che ba ri rab
159a3(rgyud 'grel): tsam bsgul ba'o/ /gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyams na zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa gzi brjid che ba/ de'i kha dog ni dmar po/ phyag g.yas g.yon na dung dang pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ /skad cig mas 'jig
159a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams rgyu ba'o/ /ko sa la ni ri mgo bo zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs na gnod sbyin stobs ldan yod de/ 'od nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ shin tu dmar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas 'khor
159a5(rgyud 'grel): lo zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal dang rnam rgyal ldan zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de yang pham par mi 'gyur zhing/ gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa'o/ /dkar po bcom/ /brlag yul na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de ni spun lnga gnas te/ dpag
159a6(rgyud 'grel): tshad ring dang 'jigs pa dang rna ba can dang/ gzugs can dang/ bum sna'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /phyag mtshan ni 'khor lo dang/ dbyug to dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ 'phang mdung dang/
159a7(rgyud 'grel): mdung ri rnams so/ /gnod sbyin gang ba mal yar zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i 'gram na ri bo mal ya na de'i mnga' bdag tu mdzad pa kha dog dkar po/ phyag na tsan dan gyi be con 'dzin pa'o/ /ti se'i gangs na mi 'am ci zhes bya ba
159b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mnga' stong na gnas te/ gnod sbyin rta mgo can gnas pa/ kha dog dmar po/ dbyug to 'dzin pa/ sprin gyi phreng can spo 'dra na zhes bya ba ni/ li yul na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin sprin gyi mgo can/ phyag na nyi ma dang zla ba bsnams pa'o/ /rab tu gnas na du
159b2(rgyud 'grel): bu nga zhes bya ba ni/ de yang o rgyan na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de'i kha dog ni dkar po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /pi taM ka mar yang dag byed ces bya ba ni bod yul dbus su chu shar nas nub tu 'bab pa'i sa na gnas te/
159b3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin de ni kha dog dmar nag /lag pa gnyis na tsan dan gyi be con 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i sa phyogs kyi bsrung mar grags pa'o/ /rlabs dang ldan na bde byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de sems can rnams kyis bsgrubs par gyur na/ mthu dang ldan zhing dngos
159b4(rgyud 'grel): grub steng ba'o/ /sna nas byung nas gnod sbyin mdzes zhes bya ba ni/ bod yul dbus chu shar phyogs su 'bab pa'i sa/ chu klung byang nas lhor 'bab pa'o/ /de'i mdo na gnas pa'o/ /skad cig mas 'jig rten khams rgyu nus pa/ dang po shar phyogs na byung ?? rab

159b7(rgyud 'grel): grub par gyur na phyug por 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyi kha dog nag po dang ser po gnyis kas nor gyi rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /dpa' dang gser gyi lag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/ gzhan rnams kyis

160a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dge ba ni sems can rnams la gnod pa mi byed sdig pa mi byed cing dge ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni dge ba'i sems kyis me tog gi snod 'dzin pa kha dog dkar po ba ra NA sir skyong ba po zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi dbus ba ra NA si na
160a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin kha dog dmar po dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'gram ldan phung por rna ba bzang zhes bya ba ni/ bod yul gtsang na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de yang rna ba che ba bum pa lto kha dog nag po/ g.yas na nor gyi bum pa/ g.yon na ne'u le'i

160a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing yul de'i srung mar gyur pa/ (kha dog gser gyi) kha dog can g.yas na rin po che'i myu gu/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa ni gnod sbyin stobs can mdza' ma na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bal yul gyi mdza' 'khob na gnas te/ sems can la gnod pa byed pa kha dog

160b4(rgyud 'grel): na thod pa zhags pa dgra sta'o/ /de gsum gyi grong khyer srung ma'o/ /tshang tshing zhig na mig yangs pa zhes bya ba ni bal yul gyi mthil na/ gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin mig gcig tu gnas pas bdag gi rigs kha dog gnag po zhags pa nag po dang
160b5(rgyud 'grel): sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /mu duM ba ra sgo nga'i 'od ces bya ba ni/ rgya gar shar phyogs na'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni mdog dkar po me tog pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /kau sham+b+hin lhun gyis grub ces bya ba ni/ grong khyer chen po lho phyogs na gnod sbyin kha dog ser po/
160b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na shing tog g.yon ne'u la bsnams pa'o/ /rnam par agsnang byed zhing ldan na zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi gling na gnas pa gnod sbyin de mdog dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /sbrul gyi gdugs na dga' ba po zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar
160b7(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi nub pos na zhes sbrul yul na gnod sbyin de yang sbrul gyi gdong pa can yul de'i khrims mdzad pa'o/ /g.yo ba 'dzin na ser skya'o zhes bya ba ni/ yul de'i lto ngos na/ gnod sbyin kha dog ser skya gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyag na bum pa
161a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sprul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /gyen du 'gro na bku la zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs ko la ha ri'i dur khrod na/ gnod sbyin bku la ni sku mdog shin tu 'jigs pa'o/ /gnas der mtshan mo 'gror mi gtub/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas g.yon
161a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni mi'i pags pa 'phyar pa'o/ /de'i 'og gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /gang po snying po thod byed na zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod de'i phyogs na keng rus bya ba'i dur khrod do/ /gnod sbyin ha la ha la zhes pa gnas so/ /de'i sku mdog mthing ka be

162b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin de yang mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ sku mdog dmar nag/ g.yas na dbyug to g.yon zhags pa'o/ /ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ de'i lho phyogs kyi gnas na gnod sbyin ser skya'i mdog can/
163a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gnyis na nor gyi rkyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /ba lang 'dzin dang gzhan brnyas dang zhes bya ba ni gang+gA'i chu 'gram na/ gnod sbyin ba lang mgo can/ mdog nag po phyag g.yas na dgra sta g.yon sdig mdzub bsnams

163a3(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na gnas pa/ sems can rnams la gnod pa mi byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dga' ba/ gnod sbyin blta na sdug pa kha dog gser gyi mdog rtag tu chod byed rnams la'o/ /grags pa chen po bzang
163a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes na/ zhes bya ba ni ri bo rtse lnga na 'jam dpal gyi spyan snga ba/ gnod sbyin nyi ma grags pa de'i kha dog ser po/ /phyag na dbyug to dmigs can 'dzin pa/ 'jam dpal gyi srung ma'o/ /grong khyer snying por sgras 'dogs pa zhes bya ba ni rgya
163a5(rgyud 'grel): gar yul gyi shar phyogs na gnas te/ gnod sbyin baiDUrya'i mdog can/ phyag gnyis na me tog ku mu ta 'dzin pa'o/ /mya ngan sa na rmongs byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi ba len+d+ra na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni mdog sngo skya
163a6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /khyus 'gro na ni gnod sbyin grags zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro la dga' zhing skad cig mas khyab pa'o/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas po/ sku mdog sna tshogs can/ mtshon sna tshogs
163a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /ma rungs pa yang de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de yang snga ma bshad pa bzhin no/ /nga rgyal bral dang lha tse ba zhes bya ba ni 'dzam+bu gling na rgyu zhing/ sems can rnams la nga rgyal byed pa de gnyis kyi kha dog ni/ ser po dang
163b1(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'o/ phyag mtshan ni rin po che dang ral gri'o/ /'jigs sbyin na ni yid 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi zur gyi lho phyogs na/ gnod sbyin chen po stobs ldan pa de'i kha dog ni nag po ste/ ma rigs pa'i dbang gis gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni srid pa tsam  
163b2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ de ni srin po las kyi gshin rje zhes bya ba ni/ kha che'i yul na 'od byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ de ni gnod sbyin dbyangs ldan te/ de'i sku mdog ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa
163b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na pu ti dang mchod sbyin/ g.yon pa gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa spyi blugs so/ /blo dman pa rnams bstod par byed pa'o/ /gtum po ral pa can grong na zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram na laM ka mgrin bcu'i srung ma'i ral ba can zhes bya ba/ sku
163b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog mthing nag/ zhal gsum phyag brgyad pa g.yas rnams na ral gri gri gug /dgra sta rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon rnams na sdig mdzub thod pa/ zhags pa lcags kyu'o/ /skad cig mas dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam rgyu ba'o/ /kha che yul gyi so mtshams
163b5(rgyud 'grel): na zhes bya ba ni/ mnga' ris dang kha che'i yul gnyis kyi mtshams na'o/ /gnod sbyin dbang chen dbyangs ldan pa de'i sku mdog ni dmar ser/ phyag g.yas na pu ti/ g.yon phreng ba snams pa'o/ /lngas rtsen zhes ni bya ba gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog
163b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ru lnga brgya dang/ de'i yab ni pany+tsi ke'o/ /'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya ni dga' ba la sogs pa'o/ /de la bu ni lnga brgya ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ kha dog sna tshogs su gnas pa/ tshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o/ /sde bo che la stobs po che zhes bya
163b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi rdub gzi brjid ldan/ 'khor g.yog mang po dang ldan pa'o/ /lnga rtsen gyi bu tho bo che zhes bya ba ni/ bu chen po de ni rgya nag na gnas pa/ rgya nag po'i pho brang na gnas pa/ srungs ma der mdzad pa'o/ /sku mdog ser po/ g.yas
164a1(rgyud 'grel): na rin po che myu gu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na bum pa bkang ba bsnams pa'o/ /rgya yul gyi ni sa na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po de ni rgya nag po'i yul na gnas pa'o/ /phrag pa'i mig ces bya ba ni mdzod ldan na ni spun dang gnas zhes bya ba
164a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas pa spun gnyis sa bdag gi tshul du gnas pa'o/ /de gnyis kha dog ni nag po dang dmar po ste/ de gnyis kyi g.yas pa na 'khor lo dang/ dbyug to'o/ /g.yon na sprul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /ka liM kan mche ba rkang zhes bya ba ni/
164a3(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'bram lho phyogs na pho brang gser yul gyi dbus na/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gnod sbyin dmar skya'o/ /g.yas na ral gri g.yon na mi mgo bsnams pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bstan dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na gnod
164a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dkyil 'khor can gnas pa/ de yang sku mdog dkar po g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /ga pu sha na laM ka'i bdag ces bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho nub mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de ni mgrin pa bcu pa/ zhal gcig
164a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rta mchog gi dbu lta bu'o/ /phyag brgyad pa sku mdog mthing ka/ g.yas rnams na ral gri mda''khor lo/ /g.yon na zhags pa gzhu/ tha ma gnyis na pi wang sgyur ba'o/ /'od can dga' ba'i tshang tshing na zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi lho phyogs na
164a6(rgyud 'grel): ko'u ri Na ya ka'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal na gnod sbyin ma sku mdog dkar po/ /g.yas na utpal g.yon na nor gyi rgyal bu bsnams pa'o/ /nam mkha' srung na chos skyong ba zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi lho phyogs gser yul na phyi'i rgya mtsho'i
164a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gram na gnas pa/ g.yas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu ti/ g.yon na me tog pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /lag pa chen po dan pa na zhes bya ba ni de'i byang phyogs na gnod pa sbyin kha dog dmar po g.yas pad+ma dmar po g.yon bum pa gang? bsnams pa'o/
164b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam thos bu yi bu dpal ldan/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa gnod sbyin rnams kyi rgyal po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams skyong ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa pho brang lcang lo can la mnga' mdzad pa/ phyag gnyis pa sku
164b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog gser gyi mdog can/ g.yas na rin po che bdun gyi myu gu /g.yon na bum pa nor gyis gang pa rin po che sna bdun gyi khril bzhugs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye bas yang bskor cing/ tho gar gyi ni yul na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang na dpal ldan
164b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam thos sras ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs mi gcig pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing/ nam mkha' la nya'i zla skar mas bskor ba bzhin du'o/ /'gror bcas ri dang gangs can dag ces bya ba ni yul ba ra NA si'i nub phyogs na/ chu bo gang gA dang sind+hu
164b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'dus pa'i sa na/ gnod sbyin chen po de gnas so/ /de'i kha dog ni sngo skya/ zhal gcig phyag drug pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ de 'og gnyis na rtse gsum dang mchod sbyin/ g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams 
164b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /spyan gsum ba glang la zhon pa'o/ /sind+hu yi ni rgya mtshor gnas zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi phyi'i rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa gnod sbyin de'i kha dog ni dkar po sprul gyi zhags pa dang rin po che myu gu bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer gsum na rtse
164b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum lag ces bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla gsum na gnas pa gnod sbyin legs ldan thal ba'i mdog can phyag g.yas na rtse gsum g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /ka liM ka na rab 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni rgya gar dbus na gnod sbyin kha dog nag po
164b7(rgyud 'grel): gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /tshigs lnga ser po 'gro lding na zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs na gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag na bum pa gser gyis bkang ba bsnams pa'o/ /siM ka li na nor gyi bdag ces bya ba ni sing+gi'i gshol
165a1(rgyud 'grel): mda'i yul phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na gnod sbyin de gnas pa kha dog gur kum gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na rin po che'i snod dang/ gser gyi rgyal bu bsnams pa'o/ /ne tso bzhin ni 'brog gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i gdan
165a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi nags tshal chen po na gnod sbyin kha dog dmar nag phyag na ral gri zhags pa'o/ /'gro 'am ci ni 'og na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnas nas 'og 'gro 'am ci ni ming kha dog ni sngo bsangs phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags g.yon du bsnams pa'o//
165a3(rgyud 'grel): smad spul lo/ /pad+ma dkar po'i 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ de ni gzugs khams na gnas pa ste/ de'i kha dog ni dkar po/ g.yas na phreng ba/ g.yon na bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /grong khyer chen po brtse ba can zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa
165a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi gnas na gnod sbyin chen po gnas pa'o/ /kha dog ser po/ g.yas na skyabs sbyin g.yon rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /'jigs pa sbyin na rab 'jigs pa/ zhes bya ba ni lho nub kyi mtshams phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram laM ga pu ri nag gnod sbyin
165a5(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i mdog can g.yas ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /chu dang ldan na dmar ser gnas zhes bya ba ni/ ma dros kyi mtsho 'gran na gnod sbyin chen po gnas pa ni sku mdog dkar po phyag na sprul gyi zhags pa dang pad+ma bsnams
165a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /ba bang bskyod pa pa ta zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi byang phyogs na chu dag kyi nags gseb na gnod sbyin kha dog ljang nag phyag bzhi pa g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang a 'bras/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug to dang dung bsnams pa'o/ /'dod
165a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin na ma ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi byang phyogs na gnod sbyin 'dod pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ 'dad pa'i lha mo lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas na 'dod pa'i mda' lnga bsnams pa/ g.yon na me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o//
165b1(rgyud 'grel): nya'i rgyal mtshan dang chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /bu mo 'jug na rab bsad pa zhes bya ba ni/ ba ra NA si'i shar phyogs na seng ge lha'i yul du gnas pa'i gnod sbyin seng ge gnas pa'o/ /gzugs ni seng ge'i gzugs su snang ba'o/ /ga pu sha
165b2(rgyud 'grel): na nal ku bar zhes bya ba ni de'i shar phyogs bal yul dang/ rgya gar gyi so mtshams na/ gnod sbyin chen po khyi'i gzugs su snang ba'o/ /pha rol mnga' med rdul chu na zhes bya ba ni/ rgya nag po'i shar phyogs gshin rje'i ba la gseb na/ gnod
165b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin kha dog dmar po phyag na me sgron dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /nus pa'i gnas na zhi byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha'i byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gdong zhes bya ba'i gnas na gnod sbyin chen po kha dog nag po dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams
165b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /ba la ba na thang bzangs ris zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi byang phyogs na gnod sbyin lha ma yin bya ba gnas te kha dog dmar nag phyag na 'khor lo dang dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /ka ta ka na dmar ser po zhes bya ba ni/ sing+ga la'i shar phyogs na/ gnod
165b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin kha dog gur kum 'dra ba/ phyag na rtse gcig dang zhags pa rnams pa'o/ /'phral ris 'phel na bzhin rgyas pa zhes bya ni/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gran na gnod sbyin mgon po zhes bya ba gnas so/ /zhal bcu gcig pa thal ba'i mthol
165b6(rgyud 'grel): can phyag bcu gnyis pa/ dang po gnyis na mda' gzhu/ de 'og g.yas pa rnams na 'khor lo dang dbyug to dang thod pa dang dgra sta dang rtse gsum pa/ g.yon pa rnams na zhags pa dang rin po che dang/ utpa la dang dud bsnams pa'o/ /o rgyan yul na
165b7(rgyud 'grel): ma rungs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi dbus kyi nub phyogs na gnod sbyin chen po kha dog mthing nag/ gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /thod gshol ngan na bum lto bo zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha'i shar phyogs na/ gnod sbyin bum pa'i lto can bzhin mi
166a1(rgyud 'grel): */ ? /sdug pa/ dung ka'i mdog can phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mya ngan nad zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha'i sa mtshams na 'dod chen zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gnas te/ sku mdog thal ba'i mdog can/
166a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ni bo ga na zhes bya ba ni lho nub mtshams na gnod sbyin kha dog ljang gu/ phyag gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrogs bu zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul byang
166a3(rgyud 'grel): shar mtshams na/ gnod sbyin thos grags ni sku mdog ser po phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /phung po'i bdag bo dmar ser po zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs ka ma ru na gnas pa ste/ /gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po phyag g.yas na phreng ba bsnams
166a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /g.yon na bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /chung ma can na mthong dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yul ko ka na'i shar phyogs na gnod stobs ldan gnas pa ni/ kha dog dmar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal ba'i
166a5(rgyud 'grel): khab ces bya ba ni/ rgyal ba'i khab kyi lho ngos na/ gnod sbyin chu srin gyi mgo can gnas te/ sa bdag gi tshul du yod pa/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang/ sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o/ /yang pa na ni gnas pa ste/ 'bum phrag dag ni med pa'o/ /zhes
166a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'du ba mang po gnas pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams khyab pa'o/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos sras la gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ rgyal bo chen po'i bka' 
166a7(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da' ba' o/ /ba lang skyod ba sprul dug na/ zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi nub ngos na/ sbrul gyi yul na gnas pa/ gnod sbyin ba lang gi mgo can/ phyag na dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /lcang lo'i grong na lcang lo bzhes bya ba ni/
166b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam thos sras kyi gron na lus ngan po gnas te/ sku mdog ljang gu g.yas na ral gri g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /dga' ba'i grong na dga' ba can zhes bya ba ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa ni gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po
166b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams thos kyi bu gnod sbyin ma rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed ba'o/ /grong gi lha sa ni stobs can gnas bya ba ni/ lcang lo can gyi gnas na lha ji b+ha la gnas pa sku mdog ser po g.yas na a ri pu ra/ g.yon na ne'u lo'i rgyal pa bsnams pa'o/ /lha las
166b3(rgyud 'grel): babs na rnam thos bu/ rang gi sde ni yongs su skyong zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi khyim srung zhing gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du mar gnas pa/ de rnams skyong zhing dbang mdzad pa'o/ /lcang lo can na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin bye bas kun nas bskor zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po
166b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnams thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon po brang lcag lo can la gnod sbyin du ma bye ba mang pos bskor te/ rgyal po'i bka' las mi 'da' ba sngar bshad pa'i/ gnod sbyin rnams rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor du gnas pa'o//
166b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin de dag rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa stengs sa bla gsum du skad cig mas sgyu ma'o/ /sde che ba zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mi gcig pa mang po 'dus pas te/ de rnams kyang mi mthun pa med pa'o/ /stobs che ba zhes bya
166b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ri rab bdun kyang skul nus pa'o/ /pha rol gyi dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni stobs che ba dgra rnams kyis mi thub pa/ lha ma yin gyis grong khyer rlag par byed pa'o/ /thub par dka' zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul
166b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang ldan pa che bar sprul ba'i dus su ri rab bas che bar sbrul pa/ chung ba ni rdul phra rab tsam du sbrul nus ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te/ skad cig thang cig gis stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi
167a1(rgyud 'grel): khams khyab pa/ gnod byed dang phan byed byas pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so so'i kha dog gis 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ nag po dkar po dmar po ljang gu la sogs pa'o/ /rang rang gi
167a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi kha dog snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed de/ la la lha ma
167a3(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi ngos nas/ la la lha'i phyogs nas so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs su sbrul pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul na rtsod par byed pa/ mi'i yul na yang de bzhin no/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
167a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di la mos pa'i gang zag ni/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang skyob par byas shing phyi ma la yang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ mtshon cha dang mtshon byed
167a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ldan zhes mtshon pa ni shes rab ste mtshon byed pa ni rig sngags so/ /de gnyis med pa'i rig pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa stong bar snang ba'o/ /stong pa'i nang na me long gi gzugs brtan lta bu/ 'jig rten khams sgyu ma lta bu'o//
167a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'od kyis snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin rig sngags ni zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog mthing kha zhal dang po khro mo/ g.yas dkar ba ni zhi ba/ g.yon dmar ba 'dzum pa/ rgyab ser ba ni sgeg pa'i tshul lo//
167a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal re re la thod pa lnga lngas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ dbu la rdo rjes mtshon pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams ni/ ral gri dang rdo rje dang/ mdung shing dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rtse gsum dang/ 'khor lo
167b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ g.yon pa rnams ni/ zhags pa/ rma bya'i sgro/ dgra sta/ rin po che/ pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pas mnan pa ni/ gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya
167b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags de'i snying ka nas/ hUM gi yi ges 'od zer 'phros te/ de'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor ba'i sdug
167b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad bcom nas/ gnod byed rnams gsang sngags re res 'joms te/ sngags re re dang 'od zer re res khro bo bcur sprul pa'o/ /khro bo bcu ni hUM mdzad dang dbyug pa sngon po dang/ gshin rje bshed po/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ rta mgrin
167b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi g.yo mgon po/ dung rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang/ stobs po che'o/ /'di lta ste ni 'og ma bzhin du'o/ /'og ma'i sngags kyis khro bo dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ mthing
167b5(rgyud 'grel): nag dang/ dmar bo dang/ sngo skya dang/ ljang gu dang/ ljang nag dang/ mthing dkar gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas rdo rje tho ba g.yon phur bu bsnams pa'o/ /zhags phur pa'i rang bzhin du yod pa/ de bzhin du nam mkha' i khams su spros
167b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi khro bo'i sngags ni a ka te bi ka te la sogs pa'o/ /bdag ni mi mdza' ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor lo bcur bris la/ drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bsregs par bya'o/ /'khor lo'i nang du gang mi mdza' ba'i ming rus
167b7(rgyud 'grel): bris la/ ha na ha na bcu bo rtsigs la dgong la/ gzhan gsang sngags mu khyud la dgod par bya'o/ /'khor lo de dris la gnyan pa'i sar mnan no/ /des grub par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ ras sam shing
168a1(rgyud 'grel): shun nam/ ming rus bris la bsreg par bya'o/ /sngags ni da ha da ha la sogs pa gdol bar bya'o/ /'di ni shar phyogs kyi khro bo'i yin no/ /bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams zhes bya ba ni 'byung po 'am gang yang rung ba la 'khor
168a2(rgyud 'grel): lo rtsibs bcu tham pa bris la/ rtsibs re re la pa tsa pa tsa zhes bya ba bris la/ dbus su ming rus taM b+ha ya btags la bri'o/ /mu khyud la sngar bshad pa'i sngags bris la/ lam rgya gram mam mchod rten chen po 'am dur khrod du mnan par
168a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sngags kyang pa tsa pa tsa la sogs pa'o/ /de ni byang shar mtshams kyi khro bo'i sngags so/ /gzhan yang mi mthun pa 'byung po 'am skrad par 'dod pa snga ma bzhin du 'khor lo bris nas sgo rtsar mnan te 'byung po'i ser ro/ /'khor
168a4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i sngags skrar ba'i sngags ni u tsa ta ya d+hu d+hu la sogs pa'o/ /lho'i 'o/ /bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad drag po'i sbyin sreg byas la/ 'byung po dang dgra bo rnams la thun mong gi rdzas rnams gtor la
168a5(rgyud 'grel): bsregs par bya'o/ /sngags ni ha ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lho nub kyi'o/ /dza ti dza ti zhes bya ba ni nub kyi khro bo'o/ /bdag gi dgra bo rnams zhes bya ba ni dgra bo dang 'byung po rnams ling ga bris nas bsreg pa'o/ /nA sha ya zhes bya
168a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni drag po'i gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba ni nub byang gi'o/ /hi li hi li zhes bya ba ni byang gi'o/ /mi li mi la sogs pa ni byang shar gyi'o/ /phu ru phu ru la sogs pa ni 'og gi'o/ /tsi ti tsi ti la sogs pa ni steng
168a7(rgyud 'grel): gi ? bar bya'o/ /bdag gi dgra bo rnams nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang dgra bo rnams bsregs nas/ sngags de rnams kyis bskrad par byas nas ming rus btags nas brdungs pa'i gsang sngags so/ /'dis kyang nad thams
168b1(rgyud 'grel): cad sel ba'o/ /hig ge mi ge la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi snying po'o/ /gzhan thams cad la bsrung bar bya'o/ /bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gang zag 'di ma gus par byas na rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin
168b2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis kyang srung bar byed de/ dam nyams na grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gnod sbyin gyi gnas skabs dang 'byung po rnams 'dul ba'i gnas skabs te dag pa'o/ /kun dga' bo
168b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis gang dag phyogs bcu bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po nyi shu rta brgyad po dag gi ming zung zhig
168b4(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bsrung ba gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa grags pa dang kha dog tu ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun
168b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /shar phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag shar phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis gus par byed pa 'am/ yi ge gcig tsam yod par
168b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyur na/ shar phyogs kyi gnod sbyin de rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin rnams lta ba'o/ /ring po dang/ mig gi bzang dang/ ser skya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang/
168b7(rgyud 'grel): nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar bo'o/ /phyag mtshan ni rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma'o/ /g.yon na yang rim pa bzhin du mdungs dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum mo/ /gnod sbyin bzhi po de rnams ni/ zhi ba'i
169a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul du gnas pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rjes su yi rang zhing gton pa tsam gyis kyang/ nad thams cad bral
169a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la gsungs pa'o/ /lho phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po/ gang
169a3(rgyud 'grel): dag lho phyogs skyong zhing srung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po de dag kyang gzi brjid che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma
169a4(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po blta ba'o/ /seng ge dang nye ba'i seng ge dang/ dung can dang/ dga' bo zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po de ni/ mthu che ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' 
169a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /de'i phyag mtshan rin po che dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams ni/ mda' gzhu dang gtun shing dang lcags kyu dang/
169a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa'i gzugs su gnas pa/ khro bor snang ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag bdag
169a7(rgyud 'grel): gis rgya cher bstan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ yi ge gcig tsam klog par gyur pas kyang gnod sbyin bzhi pos lho phyogs su skyong ba dang/ bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes bar bya'o//
169b1(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri don dang sems can rnams kyis don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /nub phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/
169b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po nub kyi
169b3(rgyud 'grel): ngos kyi bzhi blta ba'o/ /seng ge dang/ seng ge'i ral pa dang/ bla ma dang ser skya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ dkar po
169b4(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na/ pad+ma dang/ rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams na rtse gcig dang/ to ma ra dang/ 'phang mdung dang mdung ring bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de rnams ni mthu che zhing cung zad khro bar gnas ba'o//
169b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis lus ngag yid kyi mos par byas nas bdag gi nad mdze la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bsgoms pa dang/ kha don byed pa la sogs?
169b6(rgyud 'grel): pa byas par gyur na/ nad de ltar yang mi 'byung ste/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang/ skyob bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bshad pa ni gong nas shes pa'o/ /kun dga' 
169b7(rgyud 'grel): po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don du gsungs pa'o/ /byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag byang phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni bzhi po de dag gis kyang sangs
170a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni bzhi po dag gis kyang gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa /'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha
170a2(rgyud 'grel): dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po dag byang ngos nas lta'o/ /'dzin pa dang/ 'dzin
170a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ brtson skyong dang/ khyab 'jug gi zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po de dag ni/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang nag dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po'o/ /g.yas rnams ni ral
170a4(rgyud 'grel): gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa rnams na/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum mo/ mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po de dag ni khro bor gnas pa gsus pa che ba sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o//
170a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig bya ba ni gang zag gis gus par byas na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ yi ge gcig tsam klog par byed na/ gus pa dang bcas pas
170a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nas brjod par bya ste/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang da ltar yang srung bar byed pa dang/ tshe phyi ma la yang srung bar byed pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o kun dga' bo zhes bya
170a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can gyi don du bka' stsal pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag phyogs mtshams na gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni shar lho dang /lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ byang shar mtshams
170b1(rgyud 'grel): na gnas pa'o/ /gang dag phyogs mtshams bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byad pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ gnod sbyin de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul
170b2(rgyud 'grel): che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyis g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag phyogs mtshams na lta'o/ /lnga spyod dang tshigs lnga ser po dang/ ri mnyam dang/
170b3(rgyud 'grel): gser can no zhes bya ba dang/ gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ dmar po dang ljang gu'o/ /phyag g.yas rnams na pad+ma dkar
170b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ utpa la ser po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ utpa la sngon po'o/ /g.yon rnams na 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ dbyug to dang/ ral gri rnams so/ /gnod sbyin bzhi po de yang rim bzhin du zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ drag po dang ldan pa/ khro bo dang
170b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag gang gis 'di la gus par byed na/ rjes su yi rang ba tsam dang/ lus ngag yid kyis gus pa tsam gyis kyang/ gnod
170b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi dad? dpon de rnams kyis/ yang dag par srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams kyis 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' 
170b7(rgyud 'grel): bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag sa la gnas te/ gang dag srung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
171a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag ni gzi brjid che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma
171a2(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi yul yang myong ba byed pa dag go/ 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnad sbyin bzhi po sa la gnas pa ltar ro/ /sa pa dang shin tu sa pa dang nag po dang nye nag po dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing 'og nas srung
171a3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser po dang dmar po dang nag po dang/ dmar nag gi mdog go /g.yas rnams na rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams na mdung dang/ zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo
171a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dgra sta rnams so/ /bzhi po 'di dag gis kyang sa yongs su bsrung zhing/ sems can rnams la don byed pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang
171a5(rgyud 'grel): dag gis rig la mos shing chos byed pa dang/ srung ba btags pa dang/ kha don byed pa dang/ yongs su bzung bar gyur na/ sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang/ sa bdag rnams kyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yang dag par
171a6(rgyud 'grel): srungs shig da ltar dang phye mar yang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gsang ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis srung bar 'gyur te/ de rnams kyi bshad pa ni gong ma bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi
171a7(rgyud 'grel): don la thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag par snang la gnas pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ steng gi ngos na gnas pa'o/ /gang dag
171b1(rgyud 'grel): bar snang bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che ba grags pa ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya
171b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po 'di dag par snang la blta'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dang me dang rlung ngo zhes bya ba ni mthu che ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ sngon po dang/
171b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar nag gi mdog go/ phyag g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po pad+ma dkar po ba dan dang me sbar ba bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na 'khor lo/ dgra sta rtse gsum pa rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag bar snang la yongs su bsrung zhing/
171b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis kyang bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la gus par byas na/ lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs
171b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ser ba la sogs pa yang yul der 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs pa gzhan yang mi 'byung ba'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa dang nad thams cad las thar bar byas pa'o/ /yongs su skyong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mngal nas
171b6(rgyud 'grel): btsas ka dang/ bcas ma thag tu skyes nas kyang ma shi bar du skyong ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang/ nad rnams dang/ sdug bsngal rnams las bskyabs pas so/ /yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya
171b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni ma rig pa'i mun pa spangs nas/ dge ba la sbyor ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul du gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde ba ste/ 'dis nus pas
172a1(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid bde bar byed pa'o/ /chad pa spang pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ yul gyi dbus sam/ rkun ma 'am/ chom rkun nam/ de rnams
172a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshon cha spang ba'o/ /dug gzhi la ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsdang ba'i dug dang/ 'gro ba'i dug dang/ byed pa'i dug gsum gzhil ba'o/ /dug gsum pa dang zhes bya ba ni dug gsum po de dag kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ lus la zhugs
172a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyang 'joms par byed pa'o/ /mtshams cad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis bcing ba'i sar/ gzhan rnams kyis brgal bar mi nus so/ /sa bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ des bcing
172a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sar sa g.yo ba drag po byung bas kyang 'gul mi nus te de na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gnod par mi nus so/ /lo brgya lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ nad thams cad dang dral zhing bcud len gyi rang bzhin du rgas pa med pa'o/ /ston ba rgya
172a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis tshe ring zhing nad rnams dang bral te/ za ba dang 'thung ba dang/ ldan pa'o/ kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i gnod
172a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sems can thams cad mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i don la'o/ /khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bo la'o/ /rgyal po rnams thos kyi chos kyi spun gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sde po che rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa
172a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba la gzi brjid che ba stobs che ba/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o/ gnod sbyin de rnams kyang bye ba 'bum phrag gnod
172b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin 'khor du ma dang ldan pa'o/ /gang dag sems can rnams bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mthong ba dang dga' bas te/ de la gnod par mi byed cing/ snying rje'i sems kyis khyab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi yams kyi nad dang/
172b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod par 'khrug pa rnams med par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas khyab ste/ gnod sbyin mthu che ba rnams kyis kyang nad thams cad bcom zhing/ sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis
172b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams skyong ba'o/ /'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten na rgyu pa rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ mthu chen gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten/ sems can
172b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa la phan par mdzad pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing gus par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis lta ba'o/ /dbang po dang/ zla ba dang/ chu lta dang/ skye dgu'i
172b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag po dang/ b+ha ra d+ha dza dang zhes bya ba ni/ stobs che la mthu che ba/ de rnams kyi mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser po dang dkar po dang dkar ser dang dmar po dang nag po dang g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang/ ri bong gi pags pa dang sprul gyi zhags pa dang/ pad+ma
172b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams na mdung dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rtse gcig dang/ dgra sta rnams so/ /dbang ldan dang/ tsan dan dang/ 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang/ mgrin ngan dang/ mgul nges dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon mthu
172b7(rgyud 'grel): chen de rnams rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ thal ba'i mdog dang/ mthing nag dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po'o/ /g.yas pa rnams na rtse gsum dang/ 
173a1(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan gyi be con dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ dbyug to mig can dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na phreng ba dang/ bum pa dang/ ne'u le'i skyal pa dang/ rin po che dang/ nor gyi rgyal po'o/ /sa Ti dang/ nor bu dang/ gnod sbyin
173a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sgra rab dang/ nye lnga po dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang gu dang/ sngo skya dang/ dmar ser dang/ mthing nag dang/ dkar po'o//
173a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na 'phang mdung dang/ chu gri dang/ to ra dang/ rtse gcig dang/ ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams me tog nag pus pa dang/ utpa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ puN+Da ri ga dang/ kun+ta bsnams pa'o/ /ri mnyam dang/ gser can dang/ gang po dang/ ser
173a4(rgyud 'grel): ldeng dang/ g.yon can dang zhes bya ba ni mthu chen po de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po dang/
173a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ ral gri dang/ rtse gcig bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na nor gyi rkyal pa dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ rin chen gyi snod dang/ 'bras kyi snye ma dang/ rin chen snye
173a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ gnod sbyin ba la bskyong dang/ 'brog gnas dang/ mi'i rgyal po dang/ rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang/ tshigs sdang po dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung ba/ sems can rnams la mi 'tshe pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog
173a7(rgyud 'grel): dar phyag mtshan ni/ mthing nag dang/ dmar nag dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ ljang nag dang/ dkar ser ro/ /g.yas rnams na mda' gzhu dang/ mdung dang/ zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na dung dang a
173b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dang/ bum pa spyi'u blugs dang/ bi dza pu ra ka dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ bzhin bzangs dang/ gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ dri sna tshogs dang/ 'bras bu gsum pa dang/ 'gul gsum pa dang lcags mdung ring po dang/ ma ldan pa ste
173b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngo skya
173b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar nag go /de rnams kyi g.yas na mdung ring dang/ ral gri dang/ 'phang mdung dang/ rtse gsum dang/ rtse gcig dang/ gtun shing dang/ to ma'o/ /g.yon rnams na nor bu'i rkyal ba dang/ rin chen myu gu dang/ 'bras kyi snye ma dang/ rin
173b4(rgyud 'grel): chen snye ma dang/ bum pa nor gyis gang ba dang/ ne'u le'i rgyal pa dang/ rin chen phreng pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag ni gnod sbyin chen po'i zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la 'tshe ba mi byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las
173b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' ba' o/ /de rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi rtsod pa las bye ba dung phyur rnams kyi sde bo che/ gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa/ rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso bor 'gyur ba'o/ /rdzu
173b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'khor ba'o/ /'od ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog gis rang gsal te/ 'jig rten khams gsal bar byed pa'o//
173b7(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa kha dog de bkrag dang ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis/ rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi
174a1(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las mi 'da' bar grags pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams dang/ rdo rje spyan du grangs pa/ de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las
174a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' ba' o/ /rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bus/ gnod sbyin 'di ni nga la rnam par 'tshe ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dri za'i gdon nam/ grul bum gyi gdon nam/ klu'i gdon nam/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon la sogs pas klags tshol
174a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba ni gang dag la go bar byed pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ /gzhan gnod par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams/ gnod pa mi gter bar/ rten gyi gang zag la bsrung ba grogs byed pa'o/ /rgyal po
174a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnams thos kyi bu'i spun te zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi sems pa/ mthu chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis/ sde chen po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos sras kyi rdo rje spun no/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi
174a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang nas gang du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus par byas na/ kha don byed pa dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ rgya cher
174a6(rgyud 'grel): spel ba dang/ cho ga byed pa dang/ srung ba byed pa dang 'chad ba dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ mchod par byed pa rnams gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis gang zag de las bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin
174a7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis sba ba la sogs pa byed pa'o/ /'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni dgra bo dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ gzhan yang sems mi bde ba dang/ the tshom med pa dang/ nad 'thab pa dang/ de rnams la yang/ gnod sbyin de rnams
174b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /'tshang 'bru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis sems mi bde zhing 'tshang 'bru bas te/ de rnams kyis 'tshang 'brur mi ster te/ bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur te/ 'thab pa la yang de bzhin
174b2(rgyud 'grel): du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi bgegs rnams dang/ bdud rnams kyi 'tshe bar byed pa la yang srung ba dang skyobs par byed pa'o/ /mi'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po 'am chom rkun
174b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o/ /mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams glags tshol ba'o/ /lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod lha ris drug gi lha rnams so/ /klu'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo
174b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rigs brgyad kyi sku rnams so/ /lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris bye ba 'bum phrag dung phyur tsam lha ma yin rnams so/ /rlung lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rlung lha'i rgyal po rnam par
174b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' byed la sogs pa rlung gi gdon bdun dang/ bye ba khrag khrig dung phyur tsam mo/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig la sogs pa bya khyung gi rigs lnga dang/ de la sogs pa'i bye ba dung phyur
174b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam mo/ /dri za'i gdon dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa la sogs pa de yang bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /mi 'am ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /lto 'phye 
174b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po bzang po la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin chen po lnga rtsen la sogs pa 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa'o/ /srin po'i
175a1(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang zhes bya ba ni srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba dung phyur tsam gnas pa'o/ /yi dags kyi gdan zhes bya ba ni yi dags 'gul 'joms la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /sha za'i
175a2(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za gang la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o/ /'byung po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po lnga ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /grul bum gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni grul bum 'dzin mig la sogs
175a3(rgyud 'grel): pa du mar gnas pa'o/ /srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ srul po rab bzang la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig tsam gnas pa'o/ /lus srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rab bzang chen po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /skem byed
175a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni skem byed mchu rings la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun bcur gnas pa'o/ /smyo byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ smyo byed nyi shu rtsa gnyis te /sba ba sum 'gyur la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
175a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /grib gnon gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni grib gnon 'bum la sogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong tsam mo/ /brjed byed gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i bum pa la sogs pa bye ba du mar gnas pa'o/ /gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba
175a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gdon po mig bzangs la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /rgyu skar gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de smin drug la sogs pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'o/ /byug pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni phyug pa dril dga' 
175a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ gser thub la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa'o/ /de yang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin/ rlung dang nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung
175b1(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ sha za dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ rjed byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ grib gnon dang/ skem byed dang/ gnon po dang/ skar ma dang/ dbyug pa'i gdon dang/ de rnams gtso bor gyur pa stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cur gnas te/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i dus
175b2(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin no/ /sa stengs la rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i rta bdun bzhin du/ skad cig mas gling bzhi khyab pa'o/ /sa 'og tu 'dzul ba ni byi ba bzhin du'o/ /de lta bu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa rgyu ba'i dus su sa bdag bzhin no/ /de bzhin
175b3(rgyud 'grel): du lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad sna tshogs kyi gzugs su bstan nas rgyu ba'o/ /yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang lha'i gdon la sogs pa
175b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dang/ skyob par byed pa'o/ /gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ gdon gzhan yang 'od 'phrog snga ma la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su mngal za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ser
175b5(rgyud 'grel): skya mo ste yi dags so/ /de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su sha za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo pad+ma ste/ de la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su khrag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za mo ma he mo la sogs pa te bsam gyis
175b6(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su zhag za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo sdang mo du mar gnas pa'o/ /zas su tshil za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo 'jigs can bye ba tsam du gnas pa'o/ /zas su rkang za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin me 'bar ma bsam gyis
175b7(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su btsas pa za ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni sha za gtum mo bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o/ /srog 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ brjed byed ma bum pa can la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur gnas pa'o/ /zas su gtor ma za ba dang zhes bya ba
176a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gnod sbyin dri med la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su phreng ba za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha mo nag mo bye ba dung phyur tsam mo/ /zas su dri za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za mo nag mo seng ge la sogs pa bye ba 'bum phrag
176a2(rgyud 'grel): du ma gnas pa'o/ /zas su bdug pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa sin mo nag mo snang zhes bya ba ni la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su me tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bum phrag khri tsam gnas
176a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /zas su 'bras bu za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag chu mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su lo tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo stobs can mo la sogs pa'o/ /zas su bsregs bya za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za
176a4(rgyud 'grel): nag mo la sogs pa 'bum phrag khrir gnas pa'o/ /zas su rnag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo glang chen mo la sogs pa brgya stong tsam gnas pa'o/ /zas su phyi sa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo srab mo la sogs pas te bsam
176a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su gcin 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po lag 'gro ma la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro langs mo gtang gi la sogs pa brgyad khri 'bum du gnas
176a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /zas su dar? snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro langs chen mo dmar ser mo la sogs pa 'bum du gnas pa'o/ /zas su snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum mo tshigs ba la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur gnas pa'o/ /zas su ?
176a7(rgyud 'grel): pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin mo gtun mo la sogs pa brgyad khrir gnas pa'o/ /zas su gtor khur nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnon po grul bum nag mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /za ba de rnams
176b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang stong phrag brgyad cur gnas pa/ chung ba ni yud tsam che ba ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar gzugs sprul pa'o/ /de rnams kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
176b2(rgyud 'grel): rma bya chen mo la gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /gshed
176b3(rgyud 'grel): byed dang bsgyur ba'i las dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi dbugs dang bral bar byed pa ste/ de gshed 'phrog pa'i 'jigs pa'o/ /lus ngag yid kyi las bsgyur ba ste/ de las bsgyur ba'i 'jigs pa lus mi bde ba/ ngag mi bde
176b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yid mi bde bo/ /byang dang g.yengs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las dang da ltar byas pa ste/ las kyi dbang gis ma rig pa'i sems kyis byas pa'i byad do/ /de'i dbang gis 'dar bar byed pa'i nad kyang 'byung po rnams kyis btang ba'o zhes
176b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni ma tshang ba dang/ lhag pa dang/ nor ba dang/ 'joms pa dang/ pho nya dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi nus pas btang ba'o/ /'joms pa ni de 'joms pa'o/ /ro langs dang sems bsgyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyis nus pas ro
176b6(rgyud 'grel): langs par 'gyur ba ste/ de ma thul ba'o/ /rig pa'i sems ma rig pas bsgyur ba'o/ /spong gdong dang/ bza' nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshin rje 'am/ ma mo 'am/ 'jig rten gzhan yang brten byas nas dmod mo byas pa'o/ /skar ma
176b7(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ gza''am/ tshe grangs sam/ skad cig ma 'am/ ma mthun pa dang/ chu tshod dang/ dbyug gu dang/ thun tshong ma 'dzom pa'o/ /gza' rang la sogs pa sems mi mthun pa'o/ /skyug nyes dang/ zhes bya ba ni bad kan dang mkhris pa dang/ 
177a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dbang gi ma zhu ba dang ma mthun pa ste/ de skyug na nyes pa'o/ /yang na 'byung po'i dbang gis sman ma zhu zhing skyug par byed pa ste/ skyug pa ma thon pa dang/ 'gags na skyug nyes pa'o/ /gnod sgrib dang/ zhes bya ba ni de ltar
177a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rig pa'i dbang gis sgrib par 'gyur te/ grib ma de gnod pas gnod sgrib po/ /de'i sdig mi mthong bar byed pa sgrib pa'o/ /gnod ltas dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma smin pa la smin par byas nas blta ba ste/ gnyan pa lta ba de gnod bltas so//
177a3(rgyud 'grel): bri nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgra ma mthun pa nyes pa'o/ /bsgom nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes bzhag nas ma rig pa bsgoms te/ yang na log men du go nas mchod par sgoms pa'o/ /smad pa dang zhes bya ba
177a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gzhan rnams kyis zhe sdang gi dbang gis smad pa'o/ /skrag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa sems bsgyur ba ste/ de yang g.yengs pa'o/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rang dbang med cing nor dang/ zhing la sogs pa
177a5(rgyud 'grel): 'brog pa'o/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang/ glang po che'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor dang grogs la 'jigs pa ste/ de bzhin du glang po che'i 'jigs pa'o/ /me'i 'jigs pa dang/ chu'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi
177a6(rgyud 'grel): khyim dang/ gzhan rnams kyis 'ongs pa ste/ gru log pa dang/ rab mthar ba dang/ de la sogs pa me dang chu'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang/ mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni rgyal
177a7(rgyud 'grel): po'am gzhan pha rol gyi dgra bos te/ de rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang/ de rnams kyi lo tog 'joms pa dang/ char mi 'bab pa che bar 'bab pa dang/ byi ba dang ne tso dang/ bung ba dang/ ri bong dang/ mchil ba dang/ ser ba dang/ lhags pa'i
177b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bcu drug go /seng ge dang/ glang po che dang/ rwa can la sogs pa dang/ mtshon dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rims dang/ 'byung po dang/ thog mdza' dang/ thibs
177b2(rgyud 'grel): 'og dang/ chom rkun dang/ klu dang/ btson dang/ dug dang/ gza' dang/ g.yengs pa'o/ /sa g.yo pas 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dus gcig tu sa g.yo ba ste/ de 'byung ba'i dbang gis sa g.yo
177b3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o/ /gcan gzan khro'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ chu srin la sogs pa'o/ /mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rogs shes dang/ grogs dang/ nye ba la sogs pa'o//
177b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad kyis thebs pa ste/ gshin rje'i thag pas bcings pa'i dus su'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi
177b5(rgyud 'grel): brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon dang/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsrungs pa dang/ skyob par 'gyur ro/ /shu ba dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ mdze dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ mtshan par rdol ba dang/ phol mig dang/ g.yon pa dang/ me
177b6(rgyud 'grel): dbal dang/ lhog pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de la sogs mdze rigs mi gcig pa bco brgyad de/ rlung dang bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ chu ser las byung ba'o/ /shu ba ni/ chu ser sha dang lpags pa la babs pa'o/ /mdze dang rlung dang
177b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhris pa dang bad kan la babs pa'o/ /'brum bu phra mo ni tshad pa nang du shor nas mkhris pa las 'byung ba'o/ /mtshams par rdol ba ni rlung dang chu ser las byung ba'o/ /phol mig ni grang ba bzhin du 'byung ste/ rlung dang chu ser mkhris pa las
178a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'o/ /g.yan pa ni/ bad kan dang rlung las byung ba'o/ /me dbal ni mkhris pa las byung ba'o/ /lhog pa ni khris pa dang chu ser dang rlung las byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang 'bras dang rmu chu dang sha bkra dang/ lba ba la sogs pa yod
178a2(rgyud 'grel): do/ /mkhris pa dang/ chu ser dang rlung las byung ba'o/ /'jigs pa las bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon de rnams las kyang/ srung ba dang
178a3(rgyud 'grel): skyob par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung bad kan mkhris pa gsum gyis na ba'o/ /mgo lji zhing na ba ni rlung yin te/ yang zhing g.yo ba ni bad kan yin no/ /tsha zhing na ba ni mkhris pa'o/ /yang zhing stong sob pa ni rlung ngo//
178a4(rgyud 'grel): ? zhing 'grib pa ni bad kan no/ /tsha zhing sto ba ni mkhris pa'o/ /de bzhin du nang gzhan la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o/ /rims nad med par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ tshad pa las byung ba ste/ tshad pa de yang rlung las byung
178a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bad kan las byung ba dang/ mkhris pa las byung ba'o/ /nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ nyin bdun pa dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ zla ba gcig pa dang/ zla ba gnyis pa dang
178a6(rgyud 'grel): yun tsam pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pas/ rig sngags de rnams kyi mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ded dpon de rnams kyang srung pa dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /rtag pa'i rims dang zhes bya ba ni bad kan
178a7(rgyud 'grel): dang rlung 'don pa'o/ /rims lngar dub pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshad pa dang rlung shas che ba'o/ /'byung po'i rims dang zhes bya ba ni/ tsha ba drag por byung zhing rtsa rtsub pa'o/ /rlung las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur ba dang/
178b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rlung ni g.yo bar byed pa'o/ /bad kan ni lci bar byed pa'o/ /mkhris pa ni tsha bar byed pa'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de gsum 'dus pa'o/ /ldan pa ni gnyis gnyis ldan pas na ldan pa'o/ /rims thams cad dang zhes bya ba
178b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ tshang pa'i rims mi gcig pa bcu gnyis so/ /nad ni nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /gdon thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nang gi dug sum
178b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i dug gsum mo/ /sdig pa thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ las dang bag chags shes bya'i sgrib pa'o/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'o//
178b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa thams cad bdag la med par gyis shig /ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung pa/ rig sngags
178b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ bsrung ba sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po rma bya chen mo'i gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nas skabs te bcu pa'o// //kun dga' 
178b6(rgyud 'grel): bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa'o/ /sha za chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang mdzad cing/ mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs
178b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung zhing rig sngags kyis bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' i ma'i dum? du zhugs pa na yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ mi chags pa chags
179a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa ste/ chags nas nyer nyer po'i dus su bsrung ba/ skyes ma thag tu yang bsrung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang bsrung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes pa'i gong dang skyes ma thag tu yin te/ rig sngags kyis
179a2(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid kyis sha za mo chen mo bcu gnyis kyis srung bar byed do/ /bcu gnyis ni gang zhes na/ zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las kyis 'phros sha za mor skyes shing/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni sha za mo chen mo bcu
179a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lta ba'o/ /phreng ma dang/ rnam par phreng ma dang/ rab tu phreng ba dang/ kun tu phreng ma dang/ 'phrog ma dang/ seng ge'i ral pa dang/ spre'u ltar dmar ser dang/ nag mo dang/ mi bzed ma dang/ dung mgrin ma dang/ bya rog ma dang/ bum pa'o
179a4(rgyud 'grel): lto ste zhes bya ba ni/ de bcu gnyis pa ni/ shin tu mthu che zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar mo dang/ nag mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ dkar ser dang/ dmar ser dang/ mthing kha
179a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar nag dang/ dkar mo dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ dmar ser ma'o/ /g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri dang/ me long dang/ utpa la ser po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ utpa la sngon po dang/ dung
179a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lhung bzed dang/ bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na zhags pa dang/ ba dan dang/ thod pa dang/ dril bu dang/ rtse gsum dang/ dgra sta dang/ lcags kyu dang/ thod ba dang/ ral gri dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ phreng ba dang/ dbyug pa gsum
179a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /sha za chen mo 'di dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ stobs chen mo bcu gnyis ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla rnams rgyu ba ni/ skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal ba'o/ /kha dog
179b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog dkar po la sogs pa mdzes par ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la bya bzhin du rgyu ste/ chul nya bzhin te/ sa la byi ba
179b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'dzul ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin 'thab rtsod la sde bo cher grags nas/ rang gi ngos nas grogs byas na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags
