179b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa sha za chen mo bcu gnyis kyis kyang srung bar byed pa dag go /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ g.yas
179b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha/ g.yon dmar ba/ spyan gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu la 'khor los mtshon pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na gshol dang/ sreg shang dang/ 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon rma bya'i sgro dang/ /lhung bzed dang/ zhags pa snams
179b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdo rje rigs ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ma'o/ /chos kyi ye shes kyi ye shes/ gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang pa/ g.yon bskum pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ thabs shes
179b6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /spa ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis glags tshol ba las spa ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung pos 'jigs pa rnams las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhes bya ba
179b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis bzung bar 'dod pa mi snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i phung po btags nas gzhan rnams kyis glags mi rnyed pa'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang
180a1(rgyud 'grel): yi dags rnams zhi bas dbang du bsdu ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang/
180a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ tshon sna tshogs kyi dbus nas kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'od du ma bcug par sngar nas bkag pa'o/ /dug bsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor na yod pa nus pas bsad pa'o/ /mtshams bcad pa dang
180a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar man chod bcang pa'o/ /sa bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor yan chad do/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni na tsha dang bral zhing gzhon nu'i tshul du gnas pa'o/ /ston
180a4(rgyud 'grel): ba rgya mthong bar shog ces bya ba na 'khor dang bu la sogs pa mang po mthong ba'o/ /de la sngags tshig ni 'di rnams yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni sha za bcu gnyis kyi srog snying rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i las kyi snying
180a5(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ tadya thA zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'og tu blta ba ste/ sngags ni/ ha de kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa'o/ /sha za chen mo brgyad po 'di dag ni
180a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ sems can rnams la phan par byed pa/ 'jig rten khams na grags pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i gzhung
180a7(rgyud 'grel): gis srung bar byed na sha za brgyad po bdag gis srung bar byed do/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa yang srung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams bya ba'i gdon gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis srung bar byed
180b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhen zhes bya ba ni/ brgyad po dag stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che ba dang ldan pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni brgyad po dag 'og tu blta ba'o/ /rgyags pa dang rgyags byed ma dang rgyags ma'i shes chen ma dang/ nye rgyags ma dang/ yi dags mo dang/
180b2(rgyud 'grel): gzi byin 'phrog ma dang/ za ba mo dang/ 'cha ba ba mo ste zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan bsrung ba la gnas pa rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' o/ /de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser mo dang dmar mo dang dkar ser dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ ljang
180b3(rgyud 'grel): ser dang/ dkar mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ nag mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na me long dang/ dri'i phor ba dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba dang/ pi wang dang/ gling pu dang/ rnga dang/ rnga rked nyag dang/ rnga rings so/ /g.yon rnams na lhung bzed bsnams pa'o/ /sha za mo
180b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'jig rten khams na rgyu ba'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi snang ba ste/ 'od des gzhan yang khyab pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog dang 'od
180b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum tsam yang grags pas khyab pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla skad cig mas rgyu ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag ?/
180b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po tha? ba zangs ris kyi 'thab rtsod dang/ grogs byed par snang ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag dag gis rig
180b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus pas byas shing/ rjes su yi rang te/ de'i yon tan gyis sha za chen mo brgyad po dag gis kyang bsrung bar bgyid pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ni/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog ser po/ /g.yas dkar
181a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dmar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan can spyan gsum pa dbu la rin po ches brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas pa gsum na/ rin po che dang/ gtun shing dang/ dgra sta bsnams pa'o//
181a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gsum na/ rma bya'i sgro/ rtse gsum dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin tshor ba'i phung po rin po che'i rigs thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa g.yas brkyang pa g.yon bskum pa'o/ /zla ba'i
181a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin no/ /tadya thA/ zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ sha za mo brgyad po'i srog snying dang rig sngags las kyi snying po blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags
181a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ ha re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' ba zhes bya ba ni thugs rje chen pos kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /sha za chen mo sha khrag za ba mi dga' la rnam par 'tshe ba bdun po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten khams rgyu zhing/ skyes
181a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bud med la gnod pa skyel ba ste/ 'thab rtsed la dga' bar byed pa ste/ pho mo lceb pa'i sems su byed pa 'am byis pa rnams la gnod pa ste/ de bzhin du sems can rnams la glags tshol ba'o/ /de bzhin du glag tshol zhing grag
181a6(rgyud 'grel): la dga' ba'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i dbang gis 'dus pa ste/ sha za bdun po de dag kyang de dag gi rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis srung bar byed
181a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /btsa' ba dang btsas pa na yang srung bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur par sha za mo de rnams kyis bsrung ba'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za mo bdun po mthu che zhes stobs dang ldan pa
181b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi sdug pa khro mo nang thams cad gtong ba/ sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'og tu blta'o/ /rab 'char ldan dang srung ba mo/ /sha za khra mo dang/ gang ba bzang po dang/ me srung ma dang/ mdza' mo nag mo dang/ drang srong
181b2(rgyud 'grel): srungs ma ste/ zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ rig sngags kyis bka' las 'da' mi nus pa'o/ /de rnams kyis sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dmar po dang/ ljang nag dang/ sngon mo dang/ dmar nag dang/ mthing
181b3(rgyud 'grel): nag dang/ nag mo dang/ thal ba'i mdog can no/ /g.yas rnams na gri gug dang/ rtse gsum dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu dang/ snying dang/ sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na thod pa khrag gis grub bsnams pa'o//
181b4(rgyud 'grel): sha za chen mo bdun po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams gnod bskyel ba'i phyir gzugs che bar bstan te/ ri rab tsam bstan no/ /chung ba ni ba spu'i rtse mo rtsam bstan te/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o/ /'od dang
181b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ de'i 'od kyis sems can gyis lta mi nus pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ /kha dog drag pos te/ me'i tshul du snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'jig rten gyi khams su grags
181b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas phyi'i rgya mtsho dang/ ri rab kyi rtse mo la rgyu ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go /zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul gyis lha dang lha ma yin la grogs byed ba dag go /bdag gis
181b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa dang srung bar byed na/ de rnams kyis gnod mi nus pa glag tshol bar mi nus pa'o/ /rig sngags ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/
182a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar mo cung zad khro ba/ g.yas bkar g.yon mthing kha dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can pad+mas dbu la mchan pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes pad+ma'i rigs g.yas brkyang
182a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bskum pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /spa ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gang blta zhes na/ sha za mo rnams kyi
182a3(rgyud 'grel): srog snying dang/ rig sngags kyis las kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni ha re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin po chen po sha dang khrag za ba mi dag la rnam
182a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'tsho ba lnga po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram du grong khyer lam ka na srin po lnga po stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che ba skad cig mas gling bzhi rgyu pa skyes pa pho mo la gnod pa/ sha khrag la dga' ba/ sems can thams cad la
182a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod par byed pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid dang/ stobs dang mthu'i nus pas srin po de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' pas 'da' bar mi grub?
182a6(rgyud 'grel): pa de'i nus pa dang po yang srung ba/ bar tu yang srung ba/ tha mar yang srung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung bar zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' i nus pas skye ba la yang dag par srung ste/ skyes nas kyang tshe ma zad kyis bar du srung ba'o//
182a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni gzugs che zhing bzhin mi sdug pa sems can la 'jigs pa dang/ skrag par byed pa/ rmi lam na yang sdig par rmi ba de dag lnga po'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin po lnga po lta ba'o/ /rtul po dang nges
182b1(rgyud 'grel): rtul bo dang/ dga' ba dang/ khyab 'jug len dang/ ser skya bo ste zhes bya ba ni gsus pa che ba/ mig dmar ba/ skra gzing ba/ de rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na
182b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul gyi zhags pa dang/ bdud kyi zhags pa dang/ gri khyer ro/ /lcags kyu dang/ ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na thod pa dang/ mig go dang/ thal ba'i snod dang/ snying dang/ mi'i lpags pa bsnams pa'o/ /srin po lnga po 'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul
182b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ zhes bya ba ni nye ba 'am buAM bu mo'aM/ gzugs su byas nas gnod pa skyel te la la bya'i gzugs sa ma rma bya dang khrung khrung gi gzugs su byas nas rdzu 'phrul du sprul ba'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis kyang 'od drag
182b4(rgyud 'grel): po mthong ste/ 'od de yang me lce 'bar ba'i 'od dang 'dra ba'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so sor rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes
182b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gling la rgyu nus pas so/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul gyis g.yul las bzlog nus te/ 'thab rtsod byed bal rim pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
182b6(rgyud 'grel): rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis 'di las gus par srung ba dang skyabs su gsol na/ srin po de dag gis kyang mi chugs pa/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid thob pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo gang zhe na/ thabs
182b7(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni/ sku mchog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa/ shes rab kyi ngo bo ni/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ spyan gsuM
183a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyi bo gtsug na sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan pa/ las kyi rigs/ 'du byed kyi phung po'o/ /g.yas rnams na/ ral gri dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ gtun shing bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams
183a2(rgyud 'grel): na rma bya'i sgro dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa zla ba'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs
183a3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis/ srung ba dang skyob pa dang skyong ba la sogs pa byed pa'o/ /tadya thA/ 'di lta ste/ de rnams kyi srog snying dang/ rig sngags kyis las kyi snying po blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re
183a4(rgyud 'grel): kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin po chen po sha za dang khrag za ba/ mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba brgyad po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu zhing glags
183a5(rgyud 'grel): tshol ba ste/ smyo ba dang/ lcebs pa dang/ khro ba dang/ gtun pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ g.yul du zhugs shing/ mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ rims nad dang khrag nad gtong bar byed pa dag go /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' 
183a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis 'di la gus par byed pa tsam la/ gnod pa bcings pa ste/ gang zag gi thog ma dang tha ma bar du srung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang bcas
183a7(rgyud 'grel): pa na yang srung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i bar nas rgas pa'i bar du bsrung ste/ glo bur gyi rkyen yang mi gtong ba'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni gzugs che zhing bzhin mi sdug pa gsus pa che ba/ mgo che ba/ mig kyang
183b1(rgyud 'grel): glog dang 'dra ba/ smin ma khro gnyer can sku khams nag gzings ba/ skad che ba sbom pa/ sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang/ skrag par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa dang skrag par byed pa brgyad pa'o/ /blta ba'o/ /glen pa dang/ mtshams
183b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang dang/ ku sha lta bu'i mig can dang/ sgra gcan dang/ skam po 'dzin dang/ rab mdzes dang/ mig dmar po dang/ mi bzang pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing stobs dang ldan pa ste/ mi rnams la 'tshe ba la dga' ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog
183b3(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag mtshan ni nag po dang/ sngo bsangs dang ljang nag dang/ mthing nag dang/ dmar nag dang/ thal ba'i mdog can dang/ sngo skya dang/ ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na mdung dang/ 'phang mdung dang/ rtse gcig dang/ gtor ma dang/ gtun shing/
183b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ rtse gsum rnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na zhags pa dang/ sbrul dang/ mi snying dang/ mi mgo dang/ mi'i lpags pa dang/ rgyu zhags dang/ thod pa dang/ mi ro bsnams pa'o/ /dri mi zhim pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o//
183b5(rgyud 'grel): gcer bur gnas pa/ mi'i zhing lpags gon pa'o/ /de dag ni sha dang khrag za ba zhes bya ba ni/ mdza' ba dang mi mdza' bar bya ste/ 'thab rtsod kyi sems bcu gnas/ mtshon gyis mtshon 'gyed par byed pa/ nye ba dang rme 'khrug par byad pa
183b6(rgyud 'grel): la dga' ba'o/ /skyes ba dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams dang phrad glags med pa/ gal te phrad par gyur na/ srog 'phrog pa grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ pho
183b7(rgyud 'grel): brang dag la rgyu ba sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing/ srog 'phrog pa/ khye'u bu mo mngal na yod pa yang 'phrog pa ste/ de sha khrag rnag la dga' ba'o/ /bar du zhugs pa'i khyim dag dang/ khang stong la brten pa zhes
184a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ shin tu rang gis rig bsrung ba la sdang ba/ stong pa'i nang du gzugs mi snang par 'dod pa/ yang na gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin du yod pa/ gzugs mi snang ba'o/ /mun pa'i 'od 'gro ba rjes su
184a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba/ sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod dam/ lam rgya gram mam/ sum 'do 'am/ pho brang ngam de rnams mun pa la rgyu zhing 'jigs pa dang/ skrag par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du mi rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /mi 'di rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog par byed pa
184a3(rgyud 'grel): che ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa/ sems can la 'tshe bar grags pa/ shu ba dang/ g.ya' dang/ mdze dang/ phol mig dang/ sha bkra dang/ 'bras dang/ g.yon pa dang/ rmu chu dang/ de la sogs pa'i nad rnams gtong bar byed pa
184a4(rgyud 'grel): dag go /de dag ni snying rje med cing/ mi skye dgu skrag par byed pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni srin po brgyad po de dag kyang sems can rnams la rtag tu 'tshe ba ste/ shan pa bzhin du sems can la byas pa ste/ sha khrag la de bzhin du dga' ba ste/ srin po de dag
184a5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'jigs par snang ngo/ /srin po chen po brgyad po de dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ tshan cig 'tshe ba'i dus su gzugs che bar bstan te/ tshan cig pa spu'i rtse mo nas bzung nas gnod par byed pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ me dpung 'bar ba'i
184a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang ldan pa/ de dag gis 'od zer kha dog drug dang ldan pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so sor rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa/ de'i kha dog gis mdzes par snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang na grags pa'o/ /rdzu
184a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gling bzhi rgyu ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go/ zhes bya ba ni/ de gnyis 'thab pa'i dus su yang de rnams kyi 'thab rtsod byed pa ste/ shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che bar grags pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags
184b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag pa srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis 'di la gus par byed pa'i sems can brgyad po/ /de dag gis srung bar byed de/ gnod pa drag pos gnod par mi nus pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' bar
184b2(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni mtshon bya ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ shes rab lta bu'o/ /mtshon byed ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bdag nyid do/ /de yang rdo rje'i rigs rnam par shes pa'i phung
184b3(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog mthing khar bzhugs pa'o/ /zhal gsum du snang ba ni sku gsum thugs kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /sku mdog mthing khar snang ba ni/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /spyan gsum
184b4(rgyud 'grel): du snang ba ni ye shes gsum du rnam par dag pa'o/ /khro bor snang ba ni ma lus sems can yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga por nas ye shes lnga shar ba'o/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du
184b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba ni/ theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /dbu la rdo rje mtshon pa ni/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /khro gnyer du bstan pa ni/ theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /mche ba gtsigs pa ni/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin
184b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /sbrul gyis yan lag brgyan pa ni/ nang gi dug dang phyi'i dug bcom pa'o/ /phyag drug dang ldan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa ni/ mya ngan dang srid pas ma gos pa'o/ /zla
184b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su mang ba'i brda bstan pa'o/ /pad+ma brgyad pa'i gdan ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag 
185a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de'i 'og rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin dag pa'o/ /tha ma gtun shing bsnams pa ni/ theg pa du ma rnam par dag pa'o/ /g.yon rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa ni/ dug gsum rnam par 'joms pa'o//
185a2(rgyud 'grel): bar man zhags pa bsnams pa ni/ bdud bzhi bcings pa'o/ /tha ma na rtse gsum bsnams pa ni/ srid gsum rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid du bstan pa'o//
185a3(rgyud 'grel): me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'jig rten gyi khams me long lta bu ste/ sgyu ma lta bur snang ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag dag gis mos par gyur na/ brgyad po de dag gis gnod par mi nus te/ de rnams kyis kyang
185a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod par 'os pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis sba ba la sogs pa'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ brgyad po'i srog snying dang rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi
185a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags ni he re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni gau ta mas bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/
185a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar byang chub sems dpa' i rgyu can sems can mi'i sa bon srung ba'o/ /btsa'
185a7(rgyud 'grel): kha dang btsas pa na yang bsrung bar dag go zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' phung po lnga'i rang bzhin rgyu'i sems dpas bsrung ba'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcu po srin mo'i rang bzhin rnam par smin pa'i las byung ba
185b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin po bcu po blta ba'o/ /srin mo 'phrog ma dang/ srin mo dga' mo dang/ srin mo dmar ser mo dang/ srin mo dung can dang/ /srin mo lus las byung ba ma
185b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ srin mo lha bshes mo dang/ srin mo bum pa ma dang/ srin mo me tog kun de'i mche ba can dang/ srin mo 'phyang ma dang/ srin mo me tog zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni stobs che zhing mthu che ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ sems
185b3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser mo dang/ nag mo dang/ dmar ser ma dang/ dkar mo dang/ sngo skya dang/ dmar mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ dkar ser dang/ mthing kha dang/ gser gyi mdog can ma'o/ /g.yas
185b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams na utpal dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ kunda dang/ me tog sund+ha dang puN+Da ri ka dang/ utpa la ser po bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams lhung bzed rnams pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di
185b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang nas gang du 'gro ba skad cig mas slebs te/ char dang me 'bar bar nus so/ /'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad lnga brgya yang gsal lo/ /de
185b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gzhan yang gsal lo/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog mdzes pa dang ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams su dge mar grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba
185b7(rgyud 'grel): ni khams gsum du skad cig mas rgyu ba ste/ sems can gyi don la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong par byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la stobs dang ldan zhing
186a1(rgyud 'grel): mthu dang ldan pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la gus par byas te/ de'i gzi brjid kyis srin mo
186a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis po ngag gis srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag gzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar mo sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin/ dbu la 'khor los brgyan pa spyan gsum pa rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ ye shes
186a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang ldan pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na 'khor lo dang me long bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang rin po che bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas pa brkyang ba g.yon pa bskum pa/ zla ba'i
186a4(rgyud 'grel): gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA/ zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste de rnams kyi srog snying dang rig sngags kyi snying po lta bu'o/ /rig sngags kyis bsang sngags ni/
186a5(rgyud 'grel): ha re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni shAkya seng ge'i thugs rjes dgongs nas bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba sems can gyi
186a6(rgyud 'grel): don mdzad pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' i ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i sems dpa' mngal na srung ste/ de yang bar du srung ste/ tha mar yang srung ba'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa yang na srung ba
186a7(rgyud 'grel): dag go zhes bya ba ni ma btsas pa nas bsrungs te/ skyes nas bar du lo brgya bcu gnyis rab tu bsrungs pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dang ldan pa/ srin mo bcu gnyis stobs dang ldan pa mthu
186b1(rgyud 'grel): che ba dag go/ 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin mo rnams blta ba'o/ srin mo mgon med pa dang/ srin mo rgya mtsho ma dang/ srin mo drag mo dang/ srin mo srog 'phrog ma dang/ srin mo rig ma dang/ srin mo gzhu 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo mnga' 'dzin ma dang/ srin
186b2(rgyud 'grel): mo ral gri 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo gshol 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo 'khor lo 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo khor yug dang/ srin mo 'jigs byed ma dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing sems can gyi don byed pa byang chub sems
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rang bzhin no/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mthing kha dang/ dkar mo dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ dmar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ sngon mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar ser dang/ dkar ser dang/ dung la dang/ ljang nag dang/ nag mo'o
186b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na bum pa dang/ ral gri dang/ bum pa'i spyi blugs dang/ phreng ba dang/ dung dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ ral gri dang/ gshol dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mdung rtse gsum dang/ dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na rin po che'i
186b5(rgyud 'grel): myu gu bsnams pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs sbrul zhing/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'od gyis gsal ba'o/ /kha dog dang
186b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang gis kha dog dang ldan pa'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gang du yang 'khor ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul
186b7(rgyud 'grel): yang myong bar byed pa dag go/ zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha ma yin 'thab ba'i dus su yang rdzu 'phrul snang ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag gis rig sngags
187a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gus par byas na/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams kyis srung ba dag go/ rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ chu'i khams/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad
187a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ dbu la rin po ches mtshan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang utpa la ser po bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang dung ser po bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ zla
187a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ srin mo bcu gnyis kyi srog sngags dang rig sngags kyi
187a4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /ma mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag khrug dus su phyung zhing/
187a5(rgyud 'grel): lha ma yin rnams 'dul bar byed pa/ da ltar mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod byed phan byed byed pa'o/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi mar grags shing dbang phyug mar
187a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ de rnams kyis kyang rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'o/ /btsa' ba dang btsas pa na yang srung zhing zhes bya ba ni/ dang po skye khar srung ste/ bar ma skyes nas srung ba'o/ /tha ma rgas kha na yang srung ba'o/ /gang dag sems can la gnod
187a7(rgyud 'grel): pa byed skrag par byed pa rnams par 'tshe ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ /bam gsum tsam la skad cig mas rgyu zhing bcu gnyis po de dag gis kyang/ sha khrag la dga' zhing 'jig rten tsam la gnod byed phan byed pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba
187b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo bcu gnyis mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni ma mo bcu gnyis po blta ba'o/ /tshangs pa'i chung ma dang/ drag po'i chung ma dang/ gzhun nu'i chung ma dang/ khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang/ phag gi chung ma dang/
187b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i chung ma dang/ lus ngan gyi chung ma dang/ rlung lha'i chung ma dang/ gshin rje'i chung ma dang/ rlung gi chung ma dang/ me'i chung ma dang/ ma mo chen mo ste zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ rig sngags kyi bka' las
187b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' ba' o/ /de rnams kyi phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/ /tshangs pa mo la sogs pa rim bzhin du g.yas rnams na phyag 'tshal ba dang bum pa dang/ rtse gsum dang/ bum pa dang/ a 'bras dang/ rtse
187b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang/ phreng ba dang/ 'khor lo dang/ a 'bras kyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje dang/ thod pa dang/ nya dang/ dgra sta dang/ rin po che dang/ nor gyi brkyal pa dang/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang/ dung dkar po dang/ be con dang/ gri gug dang/ rlung mkhris dang/
187b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum dang/ rtse gcig dang/ phreng ba dang/ gri gug dang/ rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon rnams na rim pa bzhin du/ dbyug gu gsum dang/ phreng ba dang/ thod pa'o/ /phreng ba dang/ rma bya'i sgro'o/ /dbyug to dang dung ngo/ /gri gug dang/ thod pa'i nang na sman phud
187b6(rgyud 'grel): do/ /gri gug dang thod pa'o/ /'bras kyi snye ma dang ne'u le'i rkyal pa'o/ /bum pa dang zhags pa'o/ /sdig mdzub dang mi mgo'o/ /ba dan dang zhags pa'o/ /phreng ba dang rtse gcig go/ zhags pa dang thod pa'o/ /sku mdog ni rim pa bzhin du/
187b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang/ sngo skya dang/ dmar mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ dmar ser dang/ dkar ser dang/ mthing kha dang/ dung kha dang/ dmar nag dang/ nag po'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
188a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ma bcu gnyis kyis kyang/ gang zag gis 'di la bus par gyur na ma mo bcu gnyis kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob pa byed pa'o/ /spa ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni
188a2(rgyud 'grel): gong ma bzhin no/ /ma mo de dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go /de dag dang ldan pa 'am ma mo bcu gnyis po
188a3(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar mo me'i khams/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa dbu la pad+mas mtshan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag
188a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gnyis na pad+ma dang 'khor lo/ g.yon gnyis na rma bya dang/ lhung bzed bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum ba/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab
188a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ ma mo'i srog snying dang rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po blta'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la
188a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin po'i chung ma sha za chen mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni/ srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcu'i chung ma chen mo ste/ de sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /rgya mtsho'i nges pa gnas
188a7(rgyud 'grel): pa gang dag khrag gi dri tshor na zhes bya ba ni/ lho'i 'dzam bu gling gi lho nub mtshams na/ phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na/ yul la ka grong khyer na/ sha za chen mos sha khrag gi dri tshor na mi srun pa'o/ /mtshan gcig la dpag tshad rgyad
188b1(rgyud 'grel): khrir 'gro bar yod de zhes bya ba ni sha khrag gi dri snam ba tshor na mtshan gcig la gang na yod pa yang len nus so/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes
188b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis srung bar byed pa'o/ /btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ thog ma bar dang tha ma gsum bsrung ste/ gzi brjid che ba/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang
188b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa dag go/ de kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog nag po'o/ /ral pa gcig tu yod pa/ bzhin mi
188b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa/ g.yas gnyis na gri gug dang rtse gsum/ g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag ni rig
188b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya mo la gus par byas na sha za chen mo des kyang srung ba dang skyob par bgyid pa'o/ /rig sngags ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog ljang gu/ rlung gi khams spyan gsum pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan
188b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rgyan pa/ dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas gnyis na yautpa la sngon po dang/ pad+ma'o/ g.yon gnyis na pad+ma'i sgro dang gos sna tshogs pa'o/ /g.yas
188b7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang dan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta
189a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ sha za chen mo'i sogs snying dang/ rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o/ /rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po lta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re kha re la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ thams
189a2(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pas sems can gyi don la yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis srin mo rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni sngon yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dus su/ zangs gling gi rgyal
189a3(rgyud 'grel): khams na srin mo lnga brgya yod de/ /de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zi ma tog las shes par bya'o/ /da ltar yang srin mo bdun cu tham pa mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas dang rig sngags kyi bka' las
189a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' ba' o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin mo bdun cu lta ba'o/ /srin mo ser skya ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo pad+ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo ma he mo zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo dkar mo zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo sdu bu can zhes
189a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ srin mo 'bar ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo gdung ma zhes bya ba dang srin mo bum pa can zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo dri med ces bya ba dang/ srin mo sa zhes bya dang zhes bya ba ni mthu dang ldan pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' 
189a6(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da' ba' o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar ser dang/ nag po dang/ thal ba'i mdog dang/ dmar mo dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ dmar ser dang/ mthing kha dang/ ljang gu'o//
189a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang/ rin po che dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ mdung dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum dang/ gtung shing ba rnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba

189b2(rgyud 'grel): chung ma dang/ srin mo nag mo dang srin mo glang chen mo dang/ srin mo stobs can ma dang/ srin mo za ba mo dang/ srin mo la 'gro ma dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da' zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed
189b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ dmar ser mo dang/ dmar nag gi mdog dang/ dkar mo dang/ nag mo dang/ sngo skya dang/ ljang gu dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar ser mo dang/ g.yas rnams su

189b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mthing kha dang/ dmar ser dang/ khro bo dang/ nag mo dang/ dkar mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ ljag nag dang/ g.yas rnams na mdung dag 'phang

190a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar gang zag srung bar byed pa'o/ /srin mo khrag za ma dang/ srin mo so to ma dang/ srin mo sdang byed ma dang/ srin mo tshangs pa ma dang/ srin mo stang ga smyon ma dang/ srin mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ srin mo skems byed

190a5(rgyud 'grel): rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mdung rtse gsum dang/ ral gri dang/ rtse gcig bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na thod ba khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing /gang zag dag la/
190a6(rgyud 'grel): srung par byed pa'o/ /srin mo 'gegs ma dang/ srin mo snang byed ma dang/ srin mo 'gro ma dang/ srin mo sgron ma kha dang/ srin mo nor 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo mtshan mo nag mo dang/ srin mo gshin rje pho nya mo dang/ srin mo dri med ma dang/
190a7(rgyud 'grel): srin mo stobs bzangs ma dang/ srin mo ral pa 'greng dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nam mkha' i mdog dang/ ser mo dang/
190b1(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dang/ dmar ser dang/ dkar ser dang/ nag mo dang/ mthing kha dang dmar mo dang/ sngo skya dang/ ljang nag go/ g.yas rnams na nor gyi rkyal bu dang/ me spar dang/ dbyug to dang/ thod pa dang/ rin po che'i snye ma dang/ gri gug dang/ be con dang/ mdung dang dgra sta dang/

190b4(rgyud 'grel): khra bor gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dkar mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ sngo skya mo dang/ dmar nag mo dang/ ljang gu'o/ /de bzhin du gsum po rnams dang/ sna tshogs kyi mtshon snams pa/

190b6(rgyud 'grel): khro mo dang/ srin mo rnam par 'tshe dang/ srin mo ral gri dang/ srin mo gtun shing 'dzin dang/ srin mo lag na rte gsum dang/ srin mo so brjod ma dang/ srin mo yid du 'ong ma dang/ srin mo des ma dang/ srin mo gtum mo dang/ srin mo so
190b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ srin mo 'gro 'khrug ma dang/ srin mo sngon mo dang/ srin mo khro mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ nag mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ sngo
191a1(rgyud 'grel): bsangs ma dang/ dkar ser dang/ dmar ser dang/ mthing kha dang/ dkar mo dang/ nag mo dang/ dkar mo dang/ dmar nag gi mdog dang/ sngon mo dang/ khra mo'o/ /g.yas rnams na dgra sta dang/ rtse gcig rnams dang/ rtse
191a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang/ mche ba dang/ utpal dang/ pad+ma dang/ gri gug dang/ ral gri dang/ dung dang/ mdung ring dang/ 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na gtun shing bsnams pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo de dag ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' 
191a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /gang zag dag la srung bar byed pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bdun cu po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ zangs gling gi rgyal khams na 'khyim zhing/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams la gnod par byed pa/ bdun bcu po de dag ni lnga brgya'i gtso mo'o/ /da
191a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar yang 'jig rten dbang phyug gis srin mo lnga brgya btul nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ba ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las 'da' mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ban/ rgya mtsho'i nang du me
191a5(rgyud 'grel): //dang rlung la sogs pa gtong bar nus pa/ bud med kyi gzugs sna tshogs sprul zhing sems can la gnod pa'o/ /'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal zhing/ gzhan yang gsal ba'o/ /yang na de'i gzi brjid kyis
191a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog gis bdud cu mdzes par snang ba'o/ /grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ zangs gling gi srin mo lnga brgya 'jig rten du grags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul
191a7(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba mi zangs gling gi rgyal khams na gling bzhir rab dang bcas pa rgyu ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag dog zhes bya ba ni/ lha min gnyis kyi 'thab rtsod la grogs byed nus pa'o/ /de
191b1(rgyud 'grel): dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la gus par byas na 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral zhing/ srin mo de rnams kyis bsrung
191b2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog nag mo/ /nam mkha' i khams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu la rdo rje mtshon pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang
191b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten/ g.yon gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang/ 'khor lo bsnams pa/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshin rje'i
191b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa las sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal gyis bzung ba las thar ba'o/ /yongs su bsgyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni
191b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal bor nas dge ba la bskyad ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs rnams las thar nas dge ba la gnas pa'o/ /bde legs su gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde ba ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/
191b6(rgyud 'grel): chad pa spang ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba dang mya ngan gyis chad pa spang ba ste/ de ltar yang mi gnas pa'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ /
191b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi dug gsum gyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /dug bsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi dug lnga bsad pa'o/ /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni tha ma thog ma da ltar med ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig
192a1(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ sems can rnams byang chub la 'god par lta ba'o/ /ta dyathA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung po 'am 'jig rten gyi phyogs skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po la sogs pa 'am/ rig sngags kyi snying po lta pa'o/ /rig
192a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi gsang sngags nai hi li hi li la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i mi mo rnams kyi ma gnas skabs te bcu gcig pa'o// //sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA zhes bya ba ni/
192a3(rgyud 'grel): bdas pa'i sangs rgyas rab bdun la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa ste/ da ltar bzhugs pa shAkya seng ge'o/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gang gis phyag 'tshal
192a4(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i gang zag gis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /swA hA ni gang gi rten cing 'brel ba'i dngos grub ni/ de la sogs pa gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags chen mo dang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i
192a5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang nang gi rig pa ste/ phyi'i rig pa ni rig pa rnam pa lnga'o/ de ni lha bsnyan dang/ dbyangs dang/ sman dang/ bzo dang/ sgra'o/ /lha bsnyan ni/ rgyud la sogs pa'i bye brag/ sngags dang/ rgyud dang/ 'khrul 'khor dang/ sbyin
192a6(rgyud 'grel): sreg dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ slob ma lhag par gnas par byed pa la sogs pa'o/ /dbyangs dang ni ring pa dang thung ba dang/ drag po dang/ mthug po dang/ sgra chung ngu dang/ de rnams byung ba ni rig byed bzhi las byung ba'o/ /de las ma las
192a7(rgyud 'grel): pas? na dbyangs so/ /sman ni kha dog brtag pa dang/ rtsa ba rtag pa dang/ 'byung ba brtag pa dang/ dus brtag pa dang/ nyi ma brtag pa dang/ de'i bye brag gis/ sems can rnams la gseb?  byed pa ste/ dus bzung nas sman la brtag pa ste/
192b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du rlung dang bad kan dang/ mkhris pa la sogs pa'o/ /zas kyi bye brag dang/ rtsa'i bye brag dang/ phyi'i kha dog gi bye brag dang/ chu dri ma mig/ dbugs lce la brtag pa'o/ /de la brtag pas na sman no/ /bzo ni
192b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la mkhas pa'o/ /sgra ni tshad ma'i rang bzhin gyis srang la bzhal ba dang/ gcig mthong bas mang po smra ba dang/ gcig gis gcig smra ba ste/ gcig gis gnyis smra ba dang/ gcig gis gsum
192b3(rgyud 'grel): smra ba dang/ gcig gis mang po smra ba'o/ /de yang mtshan brgyad du byung ba ste/ mtshan brgyad po de yang rig pa'i sgra bya ka ra NI sgra'i gnas brgyad do/ /de la mkhas pas na sgra'o/ /nang gi rig pa ni brjod du med pa kha dog
192b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba/ gzugs dang bral pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gzhi med cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ /sngags ni ma man ste/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa/ sngags de yang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin/ /phyogs rnams dang bral ba'o//
192b5(rgyud 'grel): chen mo ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rnams khyab ste/ de yang bsam gyis mi khab pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gsang sngags chen mo dang zhes bye ba ni/ tshig tu brjod pa'i gsang sngags dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gsang pa
192b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ting nge 'dzin rang yang dang po'i rnal 'byor tshogs gsog pa/ gnyis pa rnal 'byor chen po ste/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang/ ye shes sems dpa' i rang bzhin rtog pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes gtso bor bzung
192b7(rgyud 'grel): nas rtag chad dang/ bral ba de'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pas na gsang ba'o/ /sngags ni sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa'o/ /de nyid bzung bas na gzugs sngags so/ /chen mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /so sor 'brang ma chen mo
193a1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni thabs shes rab gnyis su med de/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med do/ /so so ni 'gro ba rigs drug/ 'brang ma ni chos sku/ chos sku la yang brjod bya'i rang bzhin dper na mda' la
193a2(rgyud 'grel): sgro btags pa lta bu'o/ /ma ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no/ /de bas na so sor 'brang ma'o chen mo de lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /srung ba chen mo 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so sor 'brang ma dang/ rdo rje'i rigs
193a3(rgyud 'grel): stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang/ rin po che'i rigs rma bya chen mo dang/ pad+ma'i rigs gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma dang/ las kyi rigs bsil ba'i tshal dang lnga'o/ /lnga po de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin zhal gcig phyag gnyis
193a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams so/ /sku mdog kyang dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /phyag mtshan yang rim pa bzhin du/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /g.yon rnams na rim pa bzhin
193a5(rgyud 'grel): du dung dang/ zhags pa dang/ rma bya'i sgro dang/ bum pa'i steng na rdo rje dang/ skyabs sbyin no/ gzugs kyang zhi ba dang/ khro bo dang/ rgyags pa dang/ cung zad khro ba dang/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ngo/ /de rnams la yang sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan
193a6(rgyud 'grel): can spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje rim pa bzhin du dbu la brgyan pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od
193a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'o/ /chen mo ni ye shes lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /'di dag gis ni srung ba lnga'i dam tshig go /bdag la srung ba gyis shig swAhA zhes bya ba ni/ rten gyi gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad do/ /swAhA ni de gyur cig
193b1(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'o/ /gshed phyed rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa'i las bcom pa'o/ /bsgyur ba'i las rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ltar rkyen gyis bsgyur ba'i las rnams so/ /byad dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon
193b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis las 'phro'o/ /g.yengs byed rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa g.yengs pa las byung ste/ de bzhin du rtsub par byed pa'o/ /ro langs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyis langs pa dang/ yi dags kyi rang bzhin gyis langs pa dang/ spod gtong gis
193b3(rgyud 'grel): nus pas langs pa'o/ /sems sgyur ba rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa'i sems bzhag nas ma rig pa'i sems su bsgyur ba rnams so/ /spod gtong rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dmod mo'i rang bzhin
193b4(rgyud 'grel): btang pa/ grang srong la sogs pa'o/ /de bcom pa ni rig sngags kyis bcom pa'o/ /skems byed rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags shing 'gyur bar byed pa'o/ /spyo? byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sngags dang/ sman dang
193b5(rgyud 'grel): yi dags rnams kyis smyo bar byed pa'o/ /grib gnon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ grib ma la bzung nas gzugs kyi phung po la gnod par byed pa'o/ /brjod byed rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur du byung zhing sems can rnams la gnod
193b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang rig pas bcom pa'o/ /skems byed rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni lcong gi nad bzhin du yun ring ba'o/ /sgrag pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig par byed cing sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /dby? dug rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/
193b7(rgyud 'grel): bu dang rin po che las byas pa'o/ /dug rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis phyi'i dug dang/ nang gi dug bcom pa'o/ /bza' nyes rnams dang zhes bya ba ni nye ba la sogs pa'o/ /skyug nyes rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/
194a1(rgyud 'grel): sman dug du song ba'o/ /gnod grib rnams dang zhes bya ba ni lta ba log par byed pa'o/ /gnod ltas rnams dang zhes bya ba ni lta ba log pa rnams kyis blta ba'o/ /bri nyes rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci log tu bris pa'o/ /sgom nyes
194a2(rgyud 'grel): ? dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa'o/ /smad pa rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i pho nya byed pa rnams rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bcom pa'o/ /rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyin gcig gis rdzogs pa long
194a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa rnams so/ /nyin gnyis pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de pas ring ba ste nyin gnyis kyis rdzogs pa rnams so/ /nyin gsum pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyin mo gsum pas rdzogs pa rnams te/ de bsod par byed pa'o/ /nyin bzhi pa rnams
194a4(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyin bzhi lon nas phan pa med pa'o/ /nyin bdun pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rims tshad ma ste drug ma zlog na/ bdun pa la 'chi'o/ /zla ba phyed ba rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan tshe grangs na ma zlog na/ dus der 'chi'o//
194a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gcig pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rims nar ma ste/ dus gzhan la ma zlog na/ zla ba gcig lon nas 'chi'o/ /nyin mo pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ snga dro nas dgongs ka la phan med par 'gro ba'o/ /yud tsam pa rnams dang zhes
194a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi nad gang gis kyang phan med pa'o/ /rtag pa'i rims rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ lo nas lor 'gor ba ste/ bzhi tshad pas ma btang ba'o/ /rims ldang dub pa rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gso ba dka' ba res 'byung zhing
194a7(rgyud 'grel): ras drag pa'o/ /rlung las gyur ba rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung las gyur ba bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba lrnams dang zhes bya ba ni mkhris pa las nad mi cig pa gzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang zhes
194b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni bad kan las gyur pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /'dus ba las gyur pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de gsum 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rigs mi gcig pa yang bzhi rgya rtsa bzhir gnas so/ /mi'i rigs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rkun ma
194b2(rgyud 'grel): 'am rgyal po 'am de la 'jigs skrag gi rkyen gyis byung bas na mi'i rigs so/ /mi ma yin pa'i rigs bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang rlung bad kan du bstan/ bad kan rlung du bstan mkhris pa bad kan
194b3(rgyud 'grel): du bstan te/ phyin ci log par bstan pa ni/ mi ma yin pa'i rims so/ /rims thams cad bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi nus pa de dag gi rims rnams ni 'byung bar mi nus pa'i/ shu pa dang/ g.yan pa dang/
194b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brum bu phra mo dang/ mdze dang/ phol mig dang/ g.yan ba dang/ me dpal dang/ lhog pa rnams bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i nad de rnams la sogs pa bco brgyad do/ /de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bcom pa'o/ /klang
194b5(rgyud 'grel): pa na ba dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa gsum de gsum gyis bsgyur nas yan lag na ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ de yang de la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bcom mo/ /gdon thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i
194b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon la sogs pa bgegs rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/ /dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dug gsum dang nang gi dug gsum phyi'i bsdad pa 'gro ba'i dang byed pa'o/ /bsdad pa ni btsan dug la sogs pa rtse dang
194b7(rgyud 'grel): lo ma'i dug go /'gro ba la yang bsam pa reg pa mthong ba kha rlangs so/ /byed pa yang dbyig dug la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni nad rigs mi gcig pa brgya rtsa bzhi/ rig sngags
195a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsang sngags kyis bcom pa'o/ /bdag la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag dag dang sems can rnams la bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs zhes bya ba ni rig
195a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ lus ngag yid mi bde'i rkyen byed pa mtshan mo dang nyin mo bde bar gyur to/ /nyi ma'i gung gis bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyi ma phyed na yang mi bde bar mi gnas pa'o nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag
195a3(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i bar nas rtag tu bde ba ste/ rgas nas ma shi bar du yang bde ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la rtsol zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag bdag gis 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar ba rnams la
195a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'tshal ba'o/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas ni snga ma bzhin du bshad pa rnams te/ bzhi ma grub rkyen gyis ma gos pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /byang chub ni sems can rnams
195a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi don byed pa/ sa bcu la ni 'thob pa ste/ de rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /grol 'gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ grol 'gyur ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ grol ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bden
195a6(rgyud 'grel): pas rig sngags kyi bka' las grol ba'o/ /zhi 'gyur phyag 'tshal lo zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni zhi 'gyur ni yang dag pa'i don mi 'gyur te/ 'khor pa'i sdug bsngal las grol nas nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /zhi la
195a7(rgyud 'grel): ni sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin/ shAkya thub pa lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen por snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /rnam grol phyag 'tshal rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ rnam grol ni 'grol byed de rnam par grol bar byed pa
195b1(rgyud 'grel): na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /'grol ba ni 'khor ba las 'grol ba'o/ /bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos brtsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bram ze dag yin te/ des sdig por nas dge ba la
195b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa de la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad sel ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag rig sngags la gus par byed pa dag la gang yang de rnams kyis srung bar byed pa dag
195b3(rgyud 'grel): go/ pha bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i sa bon gtor ba'i pha'o/ /ma bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ skyes ba'i ma lan gyis mi 'khor ba'o/ /ma la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ ma'i mngal na yod pa yang
195b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'o/ /kang gnyis pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sems can mi la sogs pa'o/ /rkang bzhi pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig ces pa ni/ stag dang seng ge la sogs pa'o/ /rkang med rnams bde legs su gyur cig ces
195b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sems can sbrul la sogs pa'o/ /srid pa gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla rnams kyi sems can thams cad bde legs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi
195b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i sngags bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bcu gnyis pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis klu'i rgyal
195b7(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyi ming zung zhig cas bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po rnams blta ba'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams
196a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang rig sngags bzhi dug bzhi dus bzhir gnas pa'o/ /rigs bzhi la yang bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dmar rigs so/ /rigs bzhi las byung ba de'i 'og ma ni/ bram ze'i bram ze rgyal po'i rgyal po rje'u yi
196a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'u/ dmar rigs kyis dmang rigs/ de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dug gzhi la bsams pa las tshor ba byung ngo/ /mthong ba las yang gnyis te/ mngon shes kyis mthong ba dang/ mig gis mthong ba'o/ /reg pa yang gnyis
196a3(rgyud 'grel): te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang/ bzung ba'o/ /kha rlangs la gnyis te/ kha rlangs dbugs las byung pa dang/ mche ba'i dug go /rigs kyang de bzhin du yin te/ 'phral yang sems can dug bzhi yod pa'o/ /dug bzhi la yang snga dro dang/
196a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma phyed dang/ phye dro dang/ dgongs mo'o/ /nub mo la srod dang nam phyed dang/ phyed yol dang/ tho rangs so/ /de bzhin du klu dang dus bzhi la rgyu ba'o/ /de dang ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnams la zung zhig go /klu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas
196a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dang/ klu'i rgyal po tshangs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po tshangs chen dang/ klu'i rgyal po dbang po dang/ klu'i rgyal po nye ba'i dbang po dang/ zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' i rigs sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge
196a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gis gser gyis mdog dang/ dkar po dang/ dkar ser dang/ dmar po dang/ dmar ser ro//
196a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ lta na sdug pa dang/ lha'i cha byad can/ dbu la sbrul gyis gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas rnams sa gnon gyis phyag rgya mdzad pa dang/ phreng ba dang/
196b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa sbyi blugs dang/ rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams ni sems can la 'tshe ba mi byed pa'o/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po dug med bcas dang/ klu'i rgyal po mtsho chen
196b2(rgyud 'grel): dang klu'i rgyal po mtsho chen bu dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la bskyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ dkar ser
196b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar ser dang/ dud gi mdog go /de rnams kyang zhi ba'i tshul du gnas pa/ dbu la sbrul gyis gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdung pa'i gdan la zhugs pa'o/ /g.yas rnams na rin po che dang/ bum pa dang/ rin po che myu gu dang rin po che
196b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang/ me tog ku mu ta'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams sems can la gnod pa mi byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po chu srin dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po mi zhu
196b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po nye bar mi zhum pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang/ ser
196b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na/ shing tog bi tsa pu ra ka dang/ utpa la dang/ nA ga puShpa dang/ rin chen 'phreng ba dang/ me tog mand+ha ra'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa dang/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs
196b7(rgyud 'grel): ka can/ sbrul gyi mdung pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /bltan sdug pa mi'i cha byad du yod pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po lta na mdzes dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang/
197a1(rgyud 'grel): klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po skya rengs dang/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po paN+Da ka dang/ klu'i rgyal po sor mo drug pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po snying por 'gro dang/ zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang sangs
197a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ gser mdog dang/ dkar po dang/ sngo skya dang/ sna tshogs mdog can/ dmar po dang/ dkar ser dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu'o//
197a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na/ me long dang/ utpa la ser po dang/ a so ka'i lo ma dang/ rin po che 'bar ba/ rin po che dang/ me tog utpa la sngon po dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' 
197a4(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /de rnams ni cung zad khro bor gnas pa'o/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi tshul du gnas pa/ bram ze'i rigs bsam pa'i dug
197a5(rgyud 'grel): can snga dro'i dus can no/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang sbrul gyi gdengs ka bco lnga bco lnga yod pa/ bram ze bram ze'i rigs la ni/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang/ g.yon rnams na gnas pa'i sbrul gyi zhags pa ni dkar po'o/ /klu'i rgyal po bram
197a6(rgyud 'grel): ze bram ze rigs nyi shu rtsa gsum po 'di dag ni/ gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus su 'brug sgrog pa/ dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa dang/ dus dus du lo tog sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong
197a7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa med pa/ me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa med pa/ rgyal po las kyi 'jigs pa las thar ba/ sa 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i gzhal med bde chen po na gnas pa/
197b1(rgyud 'grel): tshe ring ba bskal bar gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor dpal che ba/ dgra dpung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa grags pa dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul
197b2(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go /klu'i rgyal po de dag ni chung ma dang bcas pa/ bu dang bcas pa/ tsha bo dang bcas pa/ spun dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ ded dpon dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ mdag pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/
197b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal 'phel dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
197b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngon po'o/ /g.yas rnams na dpal be'u dang/ gdugs dang/ 'khor lo dang/
197b5(rgyud 'grel): dung dang bum pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na/ sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang lha'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi
197b6(rgyud 'grel): 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po chu skyes dang/ klu'i rgyal po rtag re dang/ klu'i rgyal po lag bzangs dang/ klu'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ klu'i rgyal po nyid 'od dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon
197b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar ser dang/ dmar po dang/ mthing kha'o/ /g.yas rnams na dgra sta dang/ lcags kyu dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtse gsum bsnams
198a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams ni dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ dri za'i cha byad du yod pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las
198a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po zla 'od dang/ klu'i rgyal po bzad sdug dang/ klu'i rgyal po ngar ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang/ klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung
198a3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar ser dang/ sprin gyi mdog dang sngo skya'o/ /g.yas rnams na pad+ma dkar po dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ tsan dan gyi be con dang/
198a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyug to dang/ me long ngo/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams ni dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ mi'i cha byad can no/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las
198a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rgyal byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po char 'bebs dang/ klu'i rgyal po dri med dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs can mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po lcang lo can gyi mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po stag
198a6(rgyud 'grel): mgo can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ nag po'o//
198a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ gos sna tshogs bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi
198b1(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa'o/ /mthong ba dug can/ rgyal po'i rgyal rigs/ dus nyi ma phyed na rgyu ba/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi steng na bzhugs pa/ sbrul de yang sbrul mgo bcu gsum bcu gsum du yod pa/ sbrul gyi kha dog ser por gnas pa/
198b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'i sbrul yang ser po'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa gcig lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/ dus dus su
198b3(rgyud 'grel): lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus dus su lo thog sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang/ me dang/ bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/
198b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po las kyi 'jigs pa las thar ba/ sa 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang chen por gnas pa/ tshe ring ba/ bskal par gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba longs spyod che ba/ 'khor phal che ba/ dgra dbang
198b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed ba dag go /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang chung ma dang bcas pa/ bu dang bcas pa/ tsha
198b6(rgyud 'grel): bo dang bcas pa/ spun dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ ded dpon dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ de dag ni lho phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal
198b7(rgyud 'grel): po ri dags mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po glang po che'i mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po klang stobs can dang/ klu'i rgyal po skye bo 'tshe dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi
199a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar ser dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na rdo rje dbyug to dang/ pad+ma'i dbyug to dang/ rdo rje'i tho ba dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje'i dgra sta'o/ /g.yon
199a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams na sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /lha'i cha byad du bzhugs so/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa'o/ /sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal
199a3(rgyud 'grel): po ris bkra dang/ klu'i rgyal po mig bkra dang/ klu'i rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang/ klu'i rgyal po mig stong ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po gtong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams
199a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar ser dang/ ljang gu dang/ ljang nag dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po'o/ /g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ utpa la dkar po dang/ utpa la ser po dang/ nA ga puShpu bsnams pa'o/
199a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon rnams na sprul zhags so/ /dri za'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sprul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sprul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i
199a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po btang bzung dang/ klu'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po rtogs pa'i bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal dang/ /klu'i rgyal po dpal can dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su
199a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngo skya dang/ dkar po'o/ /g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ rin po che dang/ utpa la dang/ me tog ku mu de rnams so/
199b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa'o/ /mi'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdung pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po 'phyang
199b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po srin bu dang/ /klu'i rgyal po mdza' yas dang/ klu'i rgyal po gser dang/ klu'i rgyal po glang po'i rtsal dang/ klu'i rgyal po dkar gsal dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon
199b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ nag po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dung gi kha dog go /g.yas rnams na utpa la/ pad+ma dkar po/ nA ga puShpa dang/ a so ka'i lo
199b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ tsam pa ka'i me tog dang/ me tog kunda bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi cha byad du bzhugs pa'o/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang ldan pa'o/ /sbrul gyi mdud pa'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /rig
199b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /sbrul bcu gcig bcu gcig du gnas pa/ sbrul dmar por gnas pa/ g.yon na bsnams pa yang dmar po'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams na rje'u rigs kyis rjes su rigs
199b6(rgyud 'grel): reg pa'i dug can/ dug phyi dro na rgyu ba'i/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan dag kyang sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/ dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus dus su lo tog
199b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang/ me dang phye ma'i 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal po las kyi 'jigs pa las thar ba'o/ /sa 'dzin pa rin po che'i gzhal
200a1(rgyud 'grel): yas khang chen po na gnas pa tshe ring ba bskal par gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba longs spyod che ba/ 'khor 'phel ba/ dgra'i dpung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog

200a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa de dag ni nub phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po ser skya dang/ klu'i rgyal po e le'i 'dab dang/ klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang/ klu'i rgyal po dud
200a4(rgyud 'grel): skyong dang/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang gu dang/ ser po dang/ mthing nag dang/ dmar
200a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ ljang nag go /g.yas rnams na ral gri dang/ sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang/ sna tshogs kyi gos dang/ rin po che dang/ 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sprul zhags so/ /lha'i cha byad du snang ba'o/ /sprul gyi gdengs ka
200a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ldan pa/ sbrul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po dang/ klu'i rgyal po nye nag po dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po
200a7(rgyud 'grel): sred med kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po la ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dag go /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang mthing kha dang/ ljang nag dang/
200b1(rgyud 'grel): sngo skya dang/ dmar nag gi mdog dang ngo/ /g.yas rnams na phreng ba dang/ bum pa spyi blug dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ rin po che dang/ dung bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags so/ /dri za'i tshul du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang
200b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ sbrul gyi mdung pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po srin po dang/ klu'i rgyal po brag lag dang/ klu'i rgyal po gang+gA dang/ klu'i rgyal po
200b3(rgyud 'grel): sind+hu dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar nag dang/ ljang nag dang/ mthing kha'o/ /g.yas rnams

200b5(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po pak+Shu dang/ klu'i rgyal po si ta dang/ klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rab brtan dang/ klu'i rgyal pos
200b6(rgyud 'grel): srung gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ sngo skya dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ sngon po dang/ nag po'o//
200b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rnams na rin po che dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ rin po che 'bar ba dang/ utpa la dang/ nA ga puShpa dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang ngo/ g.yon rnams na sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams gnod sbyin gyi cha byad can no/ /dbu la sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang ldan no/
201a1(rgyud 'grel): sprul gyi mdud? pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /dmar rigs kyi dmar rigs/ kha rlangs kyi dug dus dgongs ka rgyu ba/ sprul gyi gdengs ka ni dgu dgur gnas
201a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sprul de yang ljang gur gnas pa/ g.yon gyi sprul yang ljang gu'o/ /gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrog pa'o/ /dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus dus su lo

201a6(rgyud 'grel): ded dpon dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ mdag pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ de dag ni byang phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po
201a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po bzang po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rab tu bzang dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/
201b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na 'phreng ba dang/ bum pa spyi blugs dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ rtse gsum dang/ nor bu rin po che'o/ /g.yon rnams na sprul zhags bsnams pa'o/ /gzugs lha'i cha byad du bzhugs
201b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dbu la sprul gyi gdengs ka dang ldan pa/ sprul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nor bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu
201b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gul dang/ klu'i rgyal po nag po gnyis dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po
201b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nag po'o/ /g.yas rnams na nor bu rin po che dang/ a 'bras kyi snying po dang/ bum pa gang ba dang/ rin po che'i snod dang/ nor gyi rkyal? pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sprul gyi zhags pa'o/ /dri za'i cha byad dang/ sprul gyi/
201b5(rgyud 'grel): gdengs ka dang/ sprul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po ser po gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal po dmar po gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal po dkar po gnyis
201b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ klu'i rgyal po phreng ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po dmar 'phreng can dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang/ ser
201b7(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ mthing nag go /g.yas rnams na dgra sta dang/ rtse gcig dang/ rtse gsum dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sbrul gyi zhags pa'o/ /mi'i cha
202a1(rgyud 'grel): byang du gnas pa'o/ /dbu la sprul gyi gdengs ka dang ldan pa/ sprul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po be'u dang/ klu'i rgyal po khrums
202a2(rgyud 'grel): stong dang/ klu'i rgyal po lnga dang/ klu'i rgyal po nye rnga dang/ klu'i rgyal po a mra mu stegs dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu'i bu dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams kyi
202a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ dmar ser dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /g.yas rnams na phreng ba dang/ utpa la dmar po dang/ rin po che'i snod dang/ rnga rked nyag dang/ rked ring dang/ me tog tsam
202a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ka bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na sprul gyi zhags pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi tshul du bzhugs pa/ dbu la sprul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ sprul gyi mdud pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar
202a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /bram ze'i rigs tshor ba'i dug can/ srod la rgyu ba'o/ /sprul gyi gdengs ka dgu dgur gnas pa'o/ /mdog dmar por gnas pa/ g.yon gyi zhags pa yang dmar ro/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis/
202a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/ dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ dus dus su char 'beb pa/ dus dus su lo tog sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ gsum la
202a7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su 'gro ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang/ me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal po las kyi 'jigs pa las thar ro/ /sa 'dzin pa rin po che'i gzhal yas khang chen po na bzhugs pa/ tshe ring ba bskal bar gnas pa dbang
202b1(rgyud 'grel): che bar grags pa rdzu 'phrul che pa longs spyod che ba 'khor 'phel che ba/ dgra dpung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa dag

206a6(rgyud 'grel): dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen? po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sam/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir yang dus dus su 'brug sgra sgrog pa'o/ /dus dus su glog 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' ?
206a7(rgyud 'grel): la glog yang dag par 'byin pa'o/ /dus dus su char 'bebs pa zhes bya ba ni/ dbyar dgun yang char 'beb par byed pa'o/ /dus dus su me tog sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni ma smin pa smin par byed pa ste/ sems can gyi don la lo legs par
206b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs la sogs pa/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang zhal mjal te/ ma 'ongs pa byam pa la sogs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar shAkya
206b2(rgyud 'grel): thub ba dang zhal mjal nas skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba zhes bya ba ni/ tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'am/ nya la sogs pa'i sdom pa rtag tu yang dag par bzung ba'o/ /gsum la skyabs su song ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos
206b3(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog dang/ gsum la skyabs su song ba'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan klu rnams la nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yod de/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams la mi tshugs so/ /me dang bye ma'i

206b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ khrag la sogs pa 'am/ sman mi rnyed pa 'am/ de rnams kyi 'jigs pa las thar ba'o/ /sa 'dzin pa'am/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu de rnams gar bsdad pa'i sar lo legs pa'am/ char che ba 'am/ chu bzang ba'am/ mu ges tshugs
206b6(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la dpal 'phel ba'am/ klu'i 'jigs pas tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na gnas pa'i gzhan yas khang ni gzhi dngul las
206b7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas rin po che sna bdun la sogs par byas pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang ni gzhi gser las byas te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang ni gzhi pad+ma ma rA ga las byas pa ste/ rin po che sna
207a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang ni/ gzhi ma ra ka tas byas pa las rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi yang phyogs bzhi dang mthun pa'o/ /blta na sdug pa'i gzhal yas khang gi
