228b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'di na/ ri'i rgyal po 'di bdag dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po de rnams la sogs pas btso bo byas pa'o/ /gzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la gnas
229a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ri'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams so/ /lha la sogs pa'i 'byung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi/ bgegs rigs mi gcig pa ri de rnams la gnas so/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri de rnams
229a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa'o/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi yang ri de rnams la rgyu'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal po rnams
229a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ri de la rgyu ste/ de'i khor rnams kyang de la rgyu'o/ /ri de rnams la yang gzugs sna tshogs pa dang/ gzugs tha dad pa dang/ gzugs mang ba dang/ gzugs tha dad med pa dang/ 'dod pa'i gzugs dang/ gzugs mngon pa
229a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ri de rnams la gnas pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang yang rung ba 'di la gus par byas na/ ri'i rgyal po de rnams la yong
229a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha la sogs pa bsrung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma gong du song ba bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /sdig pa thams cad sol cig /dge ba rnams la snang bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sdig
229a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni mi dge ba bcu ste/ mi dge ba bcu ni/ lus la gsum ngag la bzhi/ yid la gsum mo/ /lus la gsum ni srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa'o/ /ngag gi bzhi ni/ rdzun dang/ ngag 'khyal
229a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tshig rtsub mo dang/ 'phra ma'o/ /yid kyi gsum ni/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba gsum mo/ /gzhan yang las dang bag chags dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa sel ba'o/ /yang na mtshams
229b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa lnga byas kyang sel ba'o/ /de rnams las log pas na sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /mi dge ba sol cig/ don rnams la snang bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis sdig pa de dag thams cad sol cig /don
229b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la snang bar gyur cig ni/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub snang ba'o/ /thun mong yang las bzhi la sogs pa 'am/ gzhan yang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub po/ /yang na srid pa gsum la spyod pa'i sa bcu'i
229b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i dngos grub bo/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob ba'o/ /gnod pa rnams sol cig ces bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis/ mi dge
229b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bcu la bdud bzhi byung ngo/ /bdud bzhi la yang lha'i gdon la sogs pa bgegs rnams byung ba/ lus kyi na tsha rims rnams la sogs pa dbyung ba'o/ /de rnams rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sel ba'o/ /mtshan mo bde legs
229b5(rgyud 'grel): nyin bde legs zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yum/ de'i gzi brjid kyis bde ba'o/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten
229b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams kyi lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa 'byung bo rnams kyi gnyen po/ /rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis bde ba'o/ /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag ces bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang/ rig sngags 'di'i
229b7(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang byin gyi brlabs kyis 'byung po la sogs pa de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /yang na bde bar 'gyur ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spangs nas rig sngags kyi ngo bo thob pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
230a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la stsol zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par gzigs dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ log par dang sel dang/ gser thub dang/ 'od srungs la sogs pa 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs

230a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dge ba dang mi dge ba byed pa/ bde ba dang mi bde bar byed pa/ lo legs pa dang lo nyes par byed pa/ tshe ring ba dang tshe thung bar byed pa/ spro ring ba dang spro thung bar byed pa/ phyug pa dang ltogs par byed pa/ na ba dang mi na bar byed pa/ bzhin
230a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa dang mi sdug par byed pa/ gzugs bzang ba dang ngan par byed pa/ de rnams ni nam mkha' la rgyu zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam gnas pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta

230b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma de yin no/ /snar ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang zhig brla yi sor gzhin/ sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba ste snar ma la ni skyes pa ste/ shes shing rtag tu chos la dga' / mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan/ dpa' zhing rgyal
230b2(rgyud 'grel): pa phun sum tshogs/ /dgra rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms/ /mgo dang zhes bya ba ni/ mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na/ gang la tshig pa 'dra ba yod/ /de ni mgo la skyes pa ste/ dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /lag dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdzub kyi
230b3(rgyud 'grel): phyed po gnyis pa la/ g.yon na sme ba gang yod pa/ /lag la skyes pa khro ba ste/ de ni blun zhing nabs so dang zhes bya ba ni/ mchan khu g.yon na sme nag yod/ nabs so la ni skyes pa ste/ nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor par 'gyur/ de rnams shes
230b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rgya yang chud/ /rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu dga' / /phyag gi mthil la 'khor lo ni/ nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes/ /dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang/ /gyen du g.yas mkhyil legs par yod/ sku
230b5(rgyud 'grel): ni chu zheng gab pa ste/ 'dren pas khyod kyi nyon mongs thul/ /de ni rgyal la skyes pa'o/ /de bzhin bkag ste bdun pa yin/ zhes bya ba ni/ tshig 'bra gang gi snying kha mchis/ /skag la skyes te 'thab la dga' / /tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs
230b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bde/ de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni shar phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ skar ma bdun po de dag ni chos kyi dbang du byas na/ sa'i khams su 'gyur ba ste/ lha mo'i gzugs su snang ba'o/ /smin drug ni
230b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo ste/ me'i dbyug to thogs pa/ me la zhon pa snar ma sngo skya lus thogs pa/ nya la zhon pa'o/ /mgo ljang gu lag na utpa la thogs pa/ kha sha la zhon pa'o/ /lag dkar po lag na sprul thogs pa/ sgrul la zhon pa'o/ /nabs so
231a1(rgyud 'grel): ser mo lag na rdo rje dril bu thogs pa/ lug la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal dmar po lag na dbyug pa thogs pa'o/ /gdan bum pa la 'dug pa'o/ /skag sngon mo lag la lcags skyu thogs pa/ bya rog la zhon pa'o/ /rgyan thams
231a2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa'o/ /gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing/ rig sngags kyi byin gyis
231a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyis khyab pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis de la gus par byed pa de la/ shar gyi skar ma bdun po dag gis kyang bsrung zhing skyob ste/ shar phyogs
231a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /mchu ni mi zad 'joms pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'og gam brang ngam rgyab cig na/ gang la byin sran 'dra ba yod/ /mchu la skyes
231a5(rgyud 'grel): te nor dang ldan/ /gtsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi/ de bzhin bre dang zhes bya ba ni/ lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyis ga na/ gang la rme 'dra yod pa de/ /de ni bre la skyes pa te/ /ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung/ /spo gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni/ lte ba man sngags
231a6(rgyud 'grel): sor bzhin/ /gang na rme ba rab yod pa/ spo la skyes te longs spyod che/ /khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris 'gro/ me bzhi zhes bya ba ni/ sme ba dmar po chu so na/ rku zhing g.yo dan sgyu ma ste/ bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhen/ me bzhi
231a7(rgyud 'grel): la ni skyes pa'o/ /nag pa zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma la ni sme ba yod/ /bda' bar gyur pa nges par yang/ /nag pa la ni de skyes te/ 'dod chags klu gar rtag tu dga' / /sa ri dang zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma'i 'og gam steng na ni/ /sme ba ser
231b1(rgyud 'grel): po rab tu gda' / /mi mkhas skam zhing mang po snang/ /sa ri la ni skyes pa'o/ /sa ga la ste bdun pa zhes bya ba ni/ brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na/ /rme ba dmar po de bzhin te/ sa ga la skyes shar pa mchog/ skyes pa bud med
231b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bskor/ /mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul/ /rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste/ ngo tsha shes shing bstan dang ldan/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ /lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ zhes
231b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ skar ma bdun po de dag ni chu'i khams su gnas pa'o/ /lha mo'i tshul du gnas pa ste/ lho ngos dag na gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mchu dkar po gri gug thogs pa'o/ /glang la zhon pa/ bre ser po pad+ma thogs pa gang na
231b4(rgyud 'grel): rngo/ spo dkar mo lag na rdo rje thogs pa/ glang po che la zhon pa/ me bzhi sngon mo/ lag na rma bya'i sgro thogs pa/ rma bya la zhon pa/ nag pa ser mo/ lag na rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa/ ba la zhon pa/ sa ri mdog dmar skya/ lag na 'phang mdung 'dzin
231b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thag pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ sa ga dud ka/ dgra sta thogs pa/ mi'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing/ sems can rnams kyi
231b6(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ lho phyogs yongs su skyong ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis kyang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
231b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gus shing 'chang ba de/ srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /lha mtshams gzi brjid chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ brla gnyis kyi mdzub
232a1(rgyud 'grel): don gang la byi sran 'dra ba yod/ /lha mtshams la skyes tshul khrims can/ /chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin son dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang ga brla 'og gnyis na ni/ sme ba yod pa snron la skyes/ /mi sdug tshe
232a2(rgyud 'grel): thung tshul khrims 'tshal/ /dbul zhing snying rjes ma mchis so/ /snubs dang zhes bya ba ni/ pus mo gnyis kyi gong na ni/ gang la sme chung yong ba ste/ snubs la skyes pa dbang thang can/ /myur du bdag khyim 'jigs par byed/ /chu stod?
232a3(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ sme ba pus mo'i lha ngan/ /sbyin pa bgyid cing chos lam shes/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris 'gro/ chu stong la ni skyes pa'o/ /chu smad zhes bya ba ni/ sku dol ni sme ba yong/ /de ltar 'dug shes dang ldan/
232a4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams/ /chu smad la ni skyes pa'o/ /de ltar byi zhun bya ba ni/ /srin po la ba ka mgrin bcu'i skar ma yin te/ lha rnams gnod pas/ spas nas 'dir ma bshad do/ /rtsis la ma bshad rgyu skar
232a5(rgyud 'grel): la bshad pa'o/ /gro zhun zhes bya ba ni/ gro zhun la skyes longs spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad med sems can byams/ /sme ba gnyis po yod pa ni/ shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris 'gro/ de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ nub
232a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi sgo gnas pa dag ces bya ba ni/ rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ nub phyogs na gnas pa/ lha mo'i tshul du snang ba/ me'i khams so/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ lha mtshams chen po mdog dkar mo/ /lag na
232a7(rgyud 'grel): ngang pa dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /ngad pa skya la zhon pa/ snron dmar mo lag na tri shul thogs pa/ ru sbal gyi gdan la yod pa/ sdubs dkar mo lag na la phug thogs pa/ gang na la phug la 'dug pa/ chu stong ljang gu lag na

232b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra yod pa khrums stong la/ blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa byed/ /de na dbul zhing kun mo byed/ khrums smad dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang la sme ba mdzub gang na zhes bya ba ni/ khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste/ sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang/ shes
232b7(rgyud 'grel): rab 'jigs med snying rje ldan/ nam gru dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang gi rkang pa gnyis ka la/ sme ba phra mo yong pa ni/ nam gru la skyes mar bas te/ 'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags/ tha skar dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang gi mthe 'ong bar

236b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa drug/ nub mo chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de bzhin du dus tshod bcu gnyis so/ /de yang dbyid zlar ba rgyal mtshan no/ /dpyid zla 'bring po la/ seng ge'o/ /dpyid zla tha chungs la khyi'o/ /dbyar zla ba la glang/ dbyar zla 'bring po ru sbal/ dbyar zla tha
236b2(rgyud 'grel): chungs la bung bu'o/ /ston zla ra ba chu srin/ ston zla ra 'bring po la dung/ ston zla tha chungs la rnga mo'o/ /dgun zla ra ba la gzhu/ dgun zla 'bring po la mda'/ dgun zla tha chungs la glang po che'o/ /dpyid zla ra ba la tshes gcig nas gnam stong
236b3(rgyud 'grel): ma? mchod du/ nyi ma re re la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi/ dus tshod bcu gnyis la/ nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis cha gcig la rgyal mtshan gyi dus so/ /cha gnyis pa seng ge'i dus so/ /cha gsum pa khyi'i dus/ cha bzhi pa glang gi dus/ cha lnga pa ru sbal
236b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi dus/ cha drug bung bu'i dus/ cha bdun pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha brgyad pa dung gi dus/ cha dgu pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha bcu pa gzhu'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa mnga' i dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa glang po che'o/ /la la lug zer ro/ /nyi ma gcig la chu tshod
236b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa la/ dus tshod re re chu tshod gnyis gnyis kun la shes par bya'o/ /dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes gcig yan chod nas gnam stong man chod kyi nub re re la/ dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa/ rgyal mtshan dang glang po che'i bar
236b6(rgyud 'grel): dus dus tshod kyi rgyu lugs ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dus tshod re re la chu tshod gsum gsum du shes par bya'o/ /dbyid zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong man chad du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma
236b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi bcu gnyis cha gcig la seng ge rgyu ba'i dus/ cha gnyis pa khyi'i dus/ cha gsum pa glang gi dus/ cha bzhi pa rus sbal dus/ cha lnga pa bung bu'i dus/ cha drug pa chu srin gyis dus/ cha bdun pa dung gi dus/ cha brgyad par rnga
237a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i dus/ cha dgu pa gzhu'i dus/ cha bcu pa mda'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa glang po che'i dus/ cha bcu gnyis la rgyal mtshan gyi dus so/ /de la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug yod pa la/ dus tshad re re la chu tshod gnyis
237a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang/ skad gcig ma brgya lnga bcu'o/ /seng ge la sogs pa'i dus tshod bcu gnyis ni nyin mo dang 'dra/ dus tshod dus bcu gnyis po de la/ chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gsum du skad cig mas
237a3(rgyud 'grel): brgya lnga bcur ma tshang bar dus bcu gnyis po kun la shes par bya'o/ /dpyid zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod de/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig la khyi'i
237a4(rgyud 'grel): dus/ cha gnyis la glang/ cha gsum la ru sbal/ cha bzhi la bung bu'i dus/ cha lnga la chu srin gyi dus/ cha drug la dung gi dus/ cha bdun la rnga mo'i dus/ cha brgyad la gzhu'i dus/ cha dgu la mda'i dus/ cha bcu pa la glang po
237a5(rgyud 'grel): che'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa la rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa la seng ge'i dus so/ /nyi ma re re la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis yod pa la/ skad gcig ma sum brgya sum brgya
237a6(rgyud 'grel): yod do/ /dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nub mo re re la khyi la sogs pa seng ge'i bar du/ dus tshod kyi grangs lnga ma bzhin no/ /chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gsum gsum du skad cig ma sum brgya sum
237a7(rgyud 'grel): brgya ma ldang? ba'o/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du nyi ma re re la/ dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod de/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig la glang gi dus cha gnyis la rus sbal dus/ cha gsum la bung bu'i
237b1(rgyud 'grel): dus/ cha bzhi la chu srin gyi dus/ cha lnga pa dung gi dus/ cha drug pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha bdun pa la gzhu'i dus/ cha brgyad pa la mda'i dus/ cha dgu pa la glang po che'i dus/ cha bcu pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bcu gcig pa la seng ge'i dus/
237b2(rgyud 'grel): cha bcu gnyis pa la khyi'i dus so/ /dus tshod bcu gnyis la/ chu tshod sum cu yod do/ /de la dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum yod do/ /nub mo la yang glang nas khyi'i bar du dus tshod bcu gnyis nyin mo bzhin du shes
237b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /chu tshod kyang phyed dang gsum gsum du shes par bya'o/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod de/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig la rus sbal gyi dus/ cha
237b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la bung bu'i dus/ cha gsum la chu srin gyi dus/ cha bzhi pa dung gi dus/ cha lnga pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha drug pa gzhu'i dus/ cha bdun pa mda'i dus/ cha brgyad pa glang po che'i dus/ cha dgu pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bcu pa seng ge'i
237b5(rgyud 'grel): dus/ cha bcu gcig pa khyi'i dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa glang gi dus so/ /dus bcu gnyis kyi nyi ma re re la/ chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum dang/ skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu
237b6(rgyud 'grel): yod do/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du nub re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod do/ /nyi ma nub nas cha dang po rus sbal gyi dus nas/ glang gi bar du bcu gnyis po'i nyin mo'i dus tshod bzhin
237b7(rgyud 'grel): du shes par bya'o/ /de'i dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis dang/ skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgya yod/ dbyar zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa
238a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig ni bung bu'i dus/ cha gnyis pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha gsum pa dung gi dus/ cha bzhi pa rnga rmo'i dus/ cha lnga pa gzhu'i dus/ cha drug pa mda'i dus/ cha bdun pa glang po che'i dus/ cha brgyad
238a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha dgu pa seng ge'i dus/ cha bcu pa khyi'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa glang gi dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa rus sbal gyi dus so/ /nyi ma re re la chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi prtsa bzhi yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod
238a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum du skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgyas ma ldang ngo/ /dbyar zla tha chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma nub nas bung bu'i nas ru sbal yan chad kyi dus bcu gnyis nyin mo bzhin shes par
238a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /nub re re la chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis gnyis dang/ skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu brgya lnga bcu yod do/ /ston zla ra ba'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus
238a5(rgyud 'grel): tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha gnyis pa dung gi dus/ cha gsum pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha bzhi pa gzhu'i dus/ cha lnga pa mda'i dus/ cha drug pa glang po'i dus/ cha bdun pa rgyal mtshan
238a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dus/ cha brgyad pa seng ge'i dus/ cha dgu pa khyi'i dus/ cha bcu pa glang gi dus/ cha bcu gcig pa rus sbal gyi dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa bung bu'i dus so/ /nyi ma re re la chu tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ dus tshod
238a7(rgyud 'grel): re re la chu tshod gsum gsum yod do/ /nub mo la yang nyi ma nub nas chu srin nas/ bong bu'i bar du dus tshod bcu gnyis nyin mo bzhin shes par bya'o/ /nub mo chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod la/ dus tshod re re la yang chu tshod bcu
238b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcu gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /ston zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma shar nas cha gcig la dung gi dus/ cha gnyis pa rnga mo'i dus/ cha gsum pa
238b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhu'i dus/ cha bzhi pa mda'i dus/ cha lnga pa glang po che'i dus/ cha drug pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bdun pa seng ge'i dus/ cha brgyad pa khyi'i dus/ cha dgu pa glang gi dus/ cha bcu pa rus sbal gyi dus/ cha bcu gcig pa bung bu'i dus/
238b3(rgyud 'grel): cha bcu gnyis pa chu srin gyi dus so/ /nyi ma re re la yang dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod de/ dus tshod re re la yang chu tshod gsum gsum du skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgya ma ldang ba'o/ /nub re re la yang dus tshod bcu
238b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma nub nas dung nas chu srin gyi bar du/ dus tshod bcu gnyis nyin mo gzhin du shes par bya'o/ /nub re re chu tshod nyi shu rtsa drug rtsa drug yod la/ dus tshod re re la yang chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum yod pa/ ston zla tha
238b5(rgyud 'grel): chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis kyi cha dang po rnga mo'i dus/ cha gnyis pa gzhu'i dus/ cha gsum pa mda'i dus/ cha bzhi pa glang po
238b6(rgyud 'grel): che'i dus/ cha lnga pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha drug pa seng ge'i dus/ cha bdun pa khyi'i dus/ cha brgyad pa glang gi dus/ cha dgu pa rus sbal gyi dus/ cha bcu pa bong bu'i dus/ cha bcu gcig pa chu srin gyi dus/ cha bcu gnyis pa dung gi dus so/
238b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma re re la chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa gnyis yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum dang/ skad cig ma brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu yod do/ /nyi ma nub nas rnga mo nas dung li bar du/ dus tshod nyin mo bzhin du shes par bya'o//
239a1(rgyud 'grel): dus tshod nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod gnyis dang/ skad cig ma sum brgya sum brgya yod do/ /dgun zla ra ba'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis yod pa
239a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis kyi cha gcig gzhu'i dus/ cha gnyis pa mda'i dus/ cha gsum pa glang po che'i dus/ cha bzhi pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha lnga pa seng ge'i dus/ cha drug pa khyi'i dus/ cha bdun pa glang gi dus/ cha brgyad pa rus sbal gyi dus/

239a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ra ba'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nub re re la dus tshod bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma nub nas cha gcig pa gzhu nas rnga mo'i bar du/ dus tshod ni nyin mo bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /nub re re la chu tshod sum cu sum
239a5(rgyud 'grel): cu yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la chu tshod dang gsum gsum yod do/ /dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyin ma re re la chu tshod bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa la/ nyi ma shar nas bcu gnyis
239a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha dang po mda' ba' i dus/ cha gnyis pa glang po che'i dus/ cha gsum pa rgyal mtshan gyi dus/ cha bzhi pa seng ge'i dus/ cha lnga pa khyi'i dus/ cha drug pa glang gi dus/ cha bdun pa rus sbal gyi dus/ cha brgyad pa bung bu'i dus

239b1(rgyud 'grel): cig ma brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu ma ldang ba yod do/ /dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma nub nas mda' nas gzhu'i bar du/ dus tshod bcu gnyis ni nyin mo bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /dus tshod re re la chu tshod phyed dang gsum

239b5(rgyud 'grel): tha chungs kyi tshes gcig nas gnam stong gi bar du/ nyi ma nub nas chu tshod bcu gnyis yod pa la/ glang po che nas mda'i bar du/ chu tshod sum cu rtsa bzhi yod pa la/ dus tshod re re la yang chu tshod phyed dang gsum gsum dang/ skad
239b6(rgyud 'grel): cig ma sum rgya sum rgya yod do/ /de bzhin du lo dang/ zla ba dang/ dus tshod kun la shes par bya'o/ /rgyal mtshan ni 'jig rten gyi khams su grags pa'o/ /seng ge ni gcan zan thams cad la mi 'jig pa'o/ /khyi ni snying nye ba'o//
239b7(rgyud 'grel): glang ni blun pa'o/ /rus sbal ni theg pa che ba'o/ /bong bu ni 'jig rten gyi khams su ngan par grags pa'o/ /chu srin ni nye bar grub pa'o/ /dung ni brtan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'o/ /rnga mo ni las la ngan pa'o/ /gzhu ni 'khrul la
240a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang ba'o/ /mda' ni 'bigs pa'o/ /glang po che ni 'dod chags la dga' ba'o/ /de bzhin du ri bcu gnyis brtsi bar bya'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
240a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khrod na rgyu zhing zhes bya ba ni/ byang shar mtshams na bra nye dang/ smin drug gnas ste/ shar drang por ni snar ma dang mgo dang lag nabs so dang rgyal gnas so/ /shar lho mtshams
240a3(rgyud 'grel): na skag dang mchu gnas pa'o/ /lho phyogs na bri? dang me bzhi dang sbo dang nag pa sa ri gnas pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams na sa ga dang/ lho mtshams gnas so/ /nub phyogs na snron dang snubs dang chu stod chu smad byi zhun gnas pa'o/ /nub byang
240a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams na gro zhun dang mon gru gnas so/ /byang phyogs na mon bre dang/ khrums stod dang khrums smad na ma gru dang/ tha skar gnas so/ /de bzhin du gza' bdun po yang gnas so/ /dpyid zlar ba'i tshes gcig la nyi ma'o/ /tshes

242b4(rgyud 'grel): la spen pa/ nyi shu dgu la lag pa/ gnam stong la nyi ma'o/ /dgun zla bas chungs kyi tshes gcig la zla ba/ gnyis la mig dmar/ gsum la pa ba sangs/ bzhi la phur bu/ lnga la spen pa/ drug la lag pa/ bdun la nyi ma/ brgyad la zla ba/

242b7(rgyud 'grel): la nyi ma/ nyi shu dgu la zla ba/ gnam stong la mig dmar ro/ /tshes grangs kyis zla ba mi thub ste/ zla bas skar ma mi thub de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang lhag ste/ de bas na lo lnga lnga na zla ba re re la bsnams pa'o/ /de'i khongs su
243a1(rgyud 'grel): brtsis na/ zla ba dang tshes grangs dang skar ma dang/ bza' tshang ba'o/ /'grib pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gza' dang/ skar ma tshes grangs la rgyu ste/ de gsum gyi bye brag gis/ bzang ba dang ngan pas 'grib pa'o/ /'phel ba
243a2(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du gza' dang skar ma gsum gyis bzang ngan gyis 'phel ba'o/ /bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la yang gsum ka 'dzoms pa'i dus su/ skyes par gyur na bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /sdug bsngal dang zhes
243a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ skyes pa'i tshes grangs kyi khyad par yin te/ de yang bza' skar ma'i khyad par ro/ /lo legs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bza' dang skar ma lo dang zla ba bzang po'i khyad par gyis so/ /lo nyes pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du
243a4(rgyud 'grel): gza' dang skar ma lo zla ba ste/ de ngan pa'i skyon gyis/ de bas lo nyes pa dang tshe thung ba dang/ ltogs pa dang/ nad mong ba dang/ 'gro mi shes pa dang/ de la sogs pa byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du bzang ba yang shes par bya'o/ /dag
243a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ gza' chen po dgu dang/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ lo bcu gnyis dang/ zla ba bcu gnyis dang/ dus drug dang/ ra shi bcu gnyis dang/ de rnams kyi khyad par gyis legs nyes
243a6(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ gza' dgu po lta ba'o/ /gza' nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ /ma'i khams yin te/ /de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar po/ g.yas na spa lcag/
243a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na pad+ma dmar po thogs pa'o/ /rta la zhon pa gon gon pa'o/ /gza' zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i khams te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar po/ go cha gon pa g.yas na pad+ma dkar po g.yon na ri bong gi rgyal
243b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'dzin pa/ ngang skya la zhon pa'o/ /gza' mig dmar zhes bya ba ni/ sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na dbyug to mig can/ g.yon mi mgo dang sdigs mdzub/ ra dmar po la zhon pa/ me'i khams so/ /gza'
243b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ba sangs zhes bya ba ni/ sa'i khams sku mdog ser po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na bum pa/ g.yon na rin po che'i phreng pa'o/ /pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o/ /gza' phur bu dang zhes bya ba ni/ shing gi khams sa/ /sku mdog
243b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas g.yon mda' gzhu thogs pa/ glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /gza' spen pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i khams so/ /sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na pu ti/ g.yon
243b4(rgyud 'grel): na bum pa/ rdo'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gza' lag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi khams so/ /sku mdog ljang nag zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdig mdzub/ rus sbal la zhon pa'o/ /rA hu la dang zhes
243b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni khams lnga ga'o/ /mdog nag po/ smad sprul du 'dug pa/ dbu skra ser po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba phyag gnyis na bsnams pa/ sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gza' du ba 'jug ring dang zhes bya
243b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ mthog? dung kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /khams lnga ga la gnas pa'o/ /gza' de rnams kyi dus su rig pa bslab par 'dod na/ bzang
243b7(rgyud 'grel): ngan gyi khyad par brtags la bya'o/ /chos dang bslob ma 'dzin pa'o/ /slob dpon 'dzin pa de bzhin no/ /gza' chen phur bu'i dus su ni/ dbu 'dzugs de ni bzang ba yin/ /de bzhin rig pa gzhan la yang/ /de yi dus su bzang bar
244a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /skra mdud gos ni sar pa 'am/ /zas dang gsar pa gang byed pa/ /de yi dus su bzang bar bshad/ /skra bzhar sen mo 'breg pa dang/ /de bzhin gos bzo byed pa dang/ /rta dang glang po sogs pa'i nor//
244a2(rgyud 'grel): de yi dus su phyir mi btang/ /gal te btang bar gyur na ni/ /khar ce log par 'gyur ba'o/ /nyi ma spen pa'i gza' gnyis la/ /mgo 'dzugs de ni 'bring por bshad/ /dmag dang 'khrug pa gang byed pa/ /de'i dus su 'dren pa
244a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ rab tu yang dag bshad par bya/ /skra dang sen mo gos la sogs/ /de'i dus su byas na ni/ nad dang rims la sogs pa 'byung/ shi ba'i dus la 'bab pa'o/ /lam 'gro dbang bskur la sogs dang/ /nyi ma'i dus su
244a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang bar bshad/ /spen pa'i dus su de byas na/ /shin tu ngan par de bshad do/ /gal te de dus byas na ni/ /nad 'byung khar ce log par 'gyur/ /mig dmar dang ni lag pa la/ /rig pa gang gi mgo 'dzugs pa/ /slob ma slob
244a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon 'brel byed pa/ /lam 'gro nye chod byed pa dang/ /dbang bskur la sogs gang byed pa/ /de ni 'chi bdag thebs par 'gyur/ /ngan pa'i las ni gang byed pa/ /de yi dus su bzang bar 'gyur zla ba dang ni pa ba sangs/ /de
244a6(rgyud 'grel): dus rig pa bslabs gyur na/ /go ba ma snyed gti mug nas/ /las ni gang dag byed pa na/ de'i dus su 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de ltar gza' bdun po'i dus su/ khrus la sogs pa byed pa ni/ /gza' lhag pa la bya'o/ /gos gsang?
244a7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'grub pa dang gcod pa ni/ zla ba dang pa ba sangs la bya'o/ /chos la sogs pa'i rig pa ni/ /bza' phur bu la bya'o/ /khang pa rtsig pa 'am bag ma len pa'am/ bza' gsar ba byed pa ni/ nyi ma dang spen pa la bya'o/ /nyi ma
244b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i bu ni/ shin tu grags pa mis mi thub pa'o/ /zla ba la skyes pa'i bu ni/ /'jam zhing dbang po zhan pa'o/ /mig dmar la skye ba'i bu ni/ sdig pa la dga' zhing drag por skyes pa'o/ /pa ba sangs la skyes pa ni/ ser sna che zhing 'dod chags la
244b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'o/ /phur bu la skyes pa ni/ shin tu grags pa la yon tan ldan pa'o/ /spen pa la skyes pa ni/ 'bring du shes par bya'o/ /gza' lag pa la skyes pa ni/ ltogs par 'gyur zhing sdig pa la dga' ba'o/ /nad thams cad 'byung
244b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de rnams ni gza' brtags pa'o/ /gza'i la nye brtag pa ni/ nyi ma'i dus su ni/ 'dze? bo dang nad 'dog pa'i mi dang/ 'phrad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na btsun pa dang phrad do/ /zla ba'i dus su bud med rgan mo gos nag mo gon pa dang
244b4(rgyud 'grel): phrad do/ /mig dmar gyi dus su ni/ sngags pa gos dmar gon pa'am/ bud med sham du dmar po brtags pa dang phrad do/ /pa ba sangs kyi dus su ni/ btsun pa 'am bud med gos ser po gon pa dang phrad do/ /phur bu'i dus su ni/
244b5(rgyud 'grel): mda' thogs pa'i mi ral pa can dang phrad do/ /spen pa'i dus su ni/ zhar ba dang phrad do/ /lag pa'i dus su rkang pa 'theng ba 'am/ lag pa bab? dang phrad do/ /bza' bdun gyi la nye brtag pa'o/ /gza' rA hu la dang du ba mjug rings ni/
244b6(rgyud 'grel): khams lnga'i rang bzhin/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa drag shul che ba'o/ /dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes bzhi la/ srod la shar nas nub tu rgyu tshes brgyad la srod yol nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu ba'o/ /tshes bcu gnyis
244b7(rgyud 'grel): la byang nas ltong rgyu'o/ /bcu drug la nyi ma phyed na shar lho mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o/ /nyi shu tham pa la nub nas shar du nam phyed na rgyu'o/ /nyi shu bzhi la tho rangs kha shar lho nas nub byang du rgyu'o/ /nyi shu
245a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang na/ byang nas lhor rgyu'o/ /gnam stong la nyi ma nub nas lho nub mtshams nas byang shar mtshams su rgyu'o/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi la srod la nub nas shar du rgyu'o/ /de bzhin du
245a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba lhag ma bcu po la yang sbel mar shes par bya'o/ /las dang bya ba ci byed kyang gza' rgyu ba'o/ /gdong thub du mi bya bar kho dang 'grogs la bya'o/ /zla ba gang yang rung ba la hal khyi rgyu ba ni zla ba gang yang rung ba'i tshes gcig la ni snga dro chu
245a3(rgyud 'grel): tshod lnga la kho gnas pa'o/ /tshes bdun la chu tshod bcu tham pa/ nyin phyed nas kho'i dus so/ /tshes brgyad la nyi ma mdung gang la chu tshod bzhi kho'i dus so/ /tshes bcu bzhi la nyi ma drod nas chu tshod nyi shu kho'i dus so/ /tshes bco lnga la nyi
245a4(rgyud 'grel): ma phyed nas chu tshod drug kho'i dus su/ /tshes bcu drug la srod 'khor nas chu tshod bdun la kho'i dus so/ /nyi shu gnyis la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum kho'i dus so/ /nyi shu gsum la nam phyed nas chu tshod gsum 'das na
245a5(rgyud 'grel): chu tshod lnga kho'i dus so/ /nyi shu dgu la byang drang po nas chu tshod brgyad kho'i dus so/ /gnam stong la nyi ma phyed nas nam phyed du rgyu'o/ /de'i dus su las dang bya ba ci byed kyang/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bas/ de'i phyir na
245a6(rgyud 'grel): las bya ba ci yang mi bya'o/ /hal khyi ni lnga yod do/ hal khyi nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ lnga po de zla ba dkar po dang/ nag po/ stod smad du spel nas rgyu ba'o/ /khyi'i gzugs su yod pa/
245a7(rgyud 'grel): mdug na yang gdong pa yod pa/ kha nas me 'bar ba/ de dang 'phrad par gyur na/ gang gis kyang mi thub cing/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// //rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun
245b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ smin drug ni me'i khams/ snar ma ni chu'i khams/ mgo ni sa'i khams/ lag ni shing gi khams/ nabs so lcags kyi khams so/ rgyal chu'i khams/ skag me'i khams so/ /bdun po de dag ni shar phyogs na gnas so/ /mchu ni sa'i khams
245b2(rgyud 'grel): bre ni chu'i khams/ sbo ni shing gi khams/ me bzhi ni lcags kyi khams/ nag pa me'i khams/ sa ri sa'i khams/ sa ga chu'i khams so/ /de dag bdun po ni lho na gnas so/ /lha mtshams chu'i khams/ snron me'i khams/ snrubs sa'i
245b3(rgyud 'grel): khams/ chu stod shing gi khams/ mchu smad lcags kyi khams/ byi zhun me'i khams/ bro zhun sa'i khams so/ bdun po de dag ni nub kyi phyogs na gnas so/ /mon gru chu'i khams/ mon bre lcags kyi khams/ khrums stod sa'i khams/
245b4(rgyud 'grel): khrums smad shing gi khams/ nam gru me'i khams/ tha skar sa'i khams/ bra nye shing gi khams so/ /bdun po de dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas so/ /skar ma gza' bdun de dag de bzhin de zhes bya ba ni/ gza' de yang bdun bzhir
245b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ste/ bdun bdun pho mo 'brel nas/ bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che zhes bya ba ni/ gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par bskor bas/ 'jig rten gyi mi rnams la bzang ba dang ngan par ston pa ste/ de'i dus tshod
245b6(rgyud 'grel): shes par gyur na/ bzlog par btub pa'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum tshangs pa dag /ces bya ba ni/ zla ba re re la gza' dgu dang/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad tshad pa'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dang mig dmar dang/ pa ba sangs dang/ phur
245b7(rgyud 'grel): bu dang/ spen pa lag pa/ rA hu la du ba mjug rings/ /shar gyi phyogs nas go rim bzhin du rgyu'o/ /skar ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /rA hu la dang du pa mjug rings ni/ tshes grangs mi 'dzin te/ gzhan gyi tshes grangs la gza'
246a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis po thod rgal du rgyu'o/ /'char ba dang ni nub pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi mngon pa'i dbang du bshad pa dang/ nang gsang sngags kyi dbang du bshad pa ni/ shar ba ni 'jig rten khams kyi mi rnams/ skyes pa la ni nyi
246a2(rgyud 'grel): ma shar ba zhes bya'o/ /dper na 'jig rten du nyi ma shar ba bzhin no/ /nub pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi? nas shi ba la nub pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu lugs rnam pa gsum yod do/ /'khor
246a3(rgyud 'grel): lo bzhin du rgyu ba dang/ mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu ba dang/ dbyug gu 'gros kyi rgyu ba gsum yod pa las/ 'khor lo bzhin du rgyu ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri rab la/ zla ba 'khor lo'i 'gros su rgyu pa'o/ /mtshon cha bzhin
246a4(rgyud 'grel): du rgyu ba ni/ nyi ma'i 'gros te thad skar rgyu pa'o/ /dbyug gu'i 'gros ni chu tshod la brtsis te/ gcig por nas gcig len pa dbyug gu'i 'gros so/ /de bzhin du gza' rnams kyang rgyu ba'o/ /de ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas na sna bug
246a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gnyis na rgyu ba'i dbugs ni/ nyin mo dang nub mo rgyu ba'i rgyu skar bzhin no/ /nyin zhag gcig la chu tshod drug cu yod pa la/ dbugs kyang de bzhin du rgyu ba'o/ /'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed ces bya ba ni/ zla ba
246a6(rgyud 'grel): ni tshes stod la 'phel te/ smad la 'grib nas zad de/ dbugs kyang phyir 'gro ba ring ste/ nad du rdub pa ni thung ste/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang zad pa dang 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /de bas
246a7(rgyud 'grel): na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la yang/ tshe yi 'phel 'grib 'byung ngo/ /yang na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams nor 'phel ba dang/ nor 'grib pa yang 'byung ngo/ /zla ba ji bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
246b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'phel 'grib byed do/ /gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul chen po dag ces bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul ni gling bzhi dang ri rab la rgyu ba ste/ gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi rgyu ma bzhin du snang bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na
246b2(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che'o/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ rig sngags rjes su yi rang byos/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten khams na gnas pa'i/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyis kyang/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus
246b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis rjes su yi rangs bas te/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /de dag gi kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
246b4(rgyud 'grel): la khyab ste/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis brjod du mi btub pa/ rgya chen sems can rnams kyis don byed pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas nas 'chad bar gyur na/ gza' dang rgyu skar ngan
246b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang zlog ste/ de rnams kyis srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /tshe phyi ma la yang gza' dang rgyu skar bzang po la skyes nas/ rig sngags 'di dran par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rig
246b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gnas skabs te bco brgyad pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gling chen
246b7(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams yan chad/ man chad kyi lha rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ gling bzhin gnas pa'i lha dang/ 'dod lha rigs drug dang/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'i lha'o/ /de rnams kyi mtshan
247a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni 'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ ming dang gzugs dang/ tshe dang longs spyod dang gnas so/ /'di lta ste ni 'di rnams lta ba'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen rigs
247a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus tshad ni/ rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go/ tshe tshad ni mi lo lnga bcu la/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi zhag gcig/ nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig/ rgyal chen bzhi
247a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad mdza' ni/ lo de ltar brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba yod do/ /mi ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod do/ /nyon mongs pa ni dbang po gnyis sbyor bas tshim pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum
247a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do/ /tshe tshad ni mi rnams kyi lo brgya la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi zhag gcig go/ de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig/
247a5(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mdza' ni/ lo stong thub bo/ /mi lo ltar rtsis pa'i bye ba'i phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang/ bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do/ /bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ /nyon mongs
247a6(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi dang 'dra'o/ /'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags bzhi cha gsum mo/ /tshe tshad ni mi lo nyis rgya la 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi zhag gcig go/ de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu
247a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mdza' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo nyis stong thub po/ mi lo ltar rtsis pa'i bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang/ sa ya bzhi yod do/ /nyon mongs pa ni
247b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud pa tsam gyis bzhi pa'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags gcig go/ tshe tshad ni mi lo bzhi brgya la/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi zhag gcig go/ de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la
247b2(rgyud 'grel): lo gcig go/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mdza' ni/ de ltar brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong thub bo/ /mi lo ltar brtsis na bye ba phrag lnga bcu lnga bdun dang/ lo sa ya drug yod do/ /nyon mongs pa ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam
247b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis tshim mo/ /'phrul dga' i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags gcig dang/ de'i bzhi cha gcig go/ tshe tshad ni mi lo brgyad brgya la/ 'phrul dga' i nyin zhag gcig nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba/
247b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis la lo gcig/ de ltar brtsis pa'i 'phrul dga' i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi mdza' ni/ lha'i lo brgya stong thub mi lo ltar rtsis na/ bye ba phrag gnyis brgya sum cu dang/ lo sa ya phrag bzhi thub po/ /nyon mongs pa ni/ rgad
247b5(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam gyi tshim mo/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis/ tshe tshad ni mi rnams kyi lo stong phrag drug brgya la/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag sum
247b6(rgyud 'grel): cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba gnyis la lo gcig/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi tshe'i mdza' ni/ lo de ltar rtsis lha'i lo khri drug stong thub/ nyon mongs pa ni ltas pa tsam gyis tshim mo/ /mi lo ltar rtsis pa ni bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu
247b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gcig dang/ lo sa ya phrag drug yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad phyed do/ /tshe tshad ni bskal pa phyed do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du 'dod chags med do/ /tshangs pa
248a1(rgyud 'grel): mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad cig/ tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig go/ 'di ni bsam gtan dang po'i lha ste/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha'i nges tshig ni/ gong ma'i tshangs pa chen po'i spyan
248a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar 'og ma'i las dge sdig smrad 'don pas na tshangs pa mdun na 'don zhes bya'o/ /yang na tshangs pa chen po la phan 'dogs pas/ tshangs pa nye phan zhes bya/ yang na tshangs pa chen po la 'khor bas tshangs pa kun 'khor zhes bya'o/ /tshangs pa chen po'i
248a3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad gnyis/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa phyed dang gnyis yod de/ tshangs pa chen po'i nges tshig ni/ 'dod pa khams kyi 'khor ba gyod drin las tshangs pa chen po'o/ /'od chung gi lha rnams dang zhes
248a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad gnyis yod do/ /tshe tshad ni bskal pa gnyis thub bo/ /nges tshig ni gong ma gnyis pas 'od chung bas so/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad bzhi/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa
248a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ nges tshig ni 'og ma la bltos nas lus dang gzhal med khang tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshad ni dpag tshad gnyis yod do/ /'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad brgyad do/ /tshe tshad ni bskal pa
248a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad thub/ nges tshig ni 'og ma gzhan gyi 'od kyang/ 'di'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa'o/ /dge chung gi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad bcu drug/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bcu drug thub/ nges tshig ni bsam
248a7(rgyud 'grel): gtan dang ting nge 'dzin/ don gong ma gnyis pas chung bas na/ dge chung zhes bya'o/ /yang na 'dod pa'i yon tan dang bde ba gnas ris gong ma gnyis ? bas so/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi zas la spyod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni
248b1(rgyud 'grel): lus tshad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis/ tshe tshad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis/ nges tshig ni 'og ma bas gong ma'i rtags chad mi spobs pas ni tshad med dge'o/ /dge rgyas kyis lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi/ tshe tshad
248b2(rgyud 'grel): ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi/ nges tshig ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ma lus par rdzogs par byed pas dge rgyas so/ /'og ma gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin 'dis gsal bar byed pa'o/ sprin med kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad
248b3(rgyud 'grel): drug cu rtsa lnga/ tshe tshad bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga/ /yang na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshad gzungs med par 'od dang/ byin rlabs 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /nges tshigs ni sprin yang med pas so/ /yang na gnas kyi gzhi sprin dang 'dra bas so//
248b4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa nyis rgya lnga bcu/ nges tshig ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa bsgoms pas/ 'bras bu bsod nams chen po skyes la/
248b5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams skyes so /'brus bu tshe ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa lnga brgya/ nges tshig ni bsam gtan dang/ zag pa med pa spel
248b6(rgyud 'grel): mar bsgoms pas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o/ /'du shes med pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi tshad ni gong ma dang 'bra'o/ /tshe tshad ni bskal pa lnga brgya'o/ /nges tshig ni 'du shes de shes pa nang du khyil pas ngan par shes pa skyes te da dung skye ba mang
248b7(rgyud 'grel): po len pa mthong bas/ /bos thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa gtan med pa 'dra snyam nas skur pa btab pas/ dmyal bar ltung ba yod/ kha gcig blo rno bas 'bar te 'gro ba yang yod/ bsam gtan bsgoms pa nod pa yin 
249a1(rgyud 'grel): zer lus 'od che la dran pa mi rgyu/ 'dod na 'du shes med pa'i lha/ gzugs su rags la tshor ba zhan pa'o/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad stong/ tshe tshad kyang bskal ba bzhi stong ngo/ /nges
249a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig ni rtog pa gong ma tsam du mi che'o/ /mi bdud ba'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad dpag tshad nyis stong/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa nyis stong/ nges tshig ni khams gsum gyis bdud pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i
249a3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad ni dpag tshad bzhi stong/ tshe tshad kyang bskal pa bzhi stong thub po/ /nges tshig ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa bsgoms pas/ 'bras bu bde zhing gya nom pas gya nom zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mthong ba'i
249a4(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo/ /tshe tshad kyang bskal pa stong thub po/ /nges tshig ni gnas de na thar pa dang bde ba thob pa ni ma yin/ gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa bgrod pa'i gnas su mthong
249a5(rgyud 'grel): bas/ shin tu mthong zhes bya ba'o/ /'og min gyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus tshad dpag tshad khri drug stong/ tshe tshad bskal pa khri drug stong thub po/ /nges tshig ni gzugs khams bcu bdun gyi bla mar rgyur bas/
249a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og min la bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gsal bas/ 'og min gsal zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad ni mdza' i bskal pa nyi khri thub/ nges tshig ni chos thams cad
249a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' ltar stong pa yin par shes na/ nam mkha' la yang kun tu mdza' yas par ltas nas/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skye mched nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched kyi
249b1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri thub/ nges tshig ni gzugs khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la blta ba nas/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar mdza' yas snyam pa ni rnam par shes pa yin la/ de yang ma zad de/ rnam par shes
249b2(rgyud 'grel): pa de dang 'grogs pa'i 'du shes kyang/ nam mkha' ltar kun tu mdza' yas par brtags nas/ skye mched nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /yod min med min skye mched kyi lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad bskal pa brgyad khri/ nges tshig ni 'og
249b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ltar shes pa bkag nas/ rmongs pa ni ma rung ngo snyam nas/ 'du shes yod pa ma yin te/ shes pa dgags nas med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ni 'du shes cha phra mo tsam la brten pa'i phyir/ yod min med min zhes bya'o/ /ci yang med
249b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ tshe tshad bskal pa drug khri ste/ nges tshig ni 'og ma ltar thos pa thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i rnam pa shes pa nam mkha' ltar mdza' yas pa'i 'du shes ni/ zug ngu'i skyes?
249b5(rgyud 'grel): mched yin par rtogs nas/ 'du shes ji phra bkag nas ni/ 'du shes bcung zad kyang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o/ /skye mched mu bzhi po 'di la lpags pa'i lus ni med nam mkha' mdza' yas dang?
249b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes mdza' yas gnyis la skye mched nye bar blangs pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs cung zad yod do/ /zhes brjod do/ /de dag thams cad la bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi nas
249b7(rgyud 'grel): 'og min gyi bar du/ thams cad kyang rin po che'i gos gon no/ /nyi zer gyi rdul bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin no/ /rdul phra rab bdun la rdul phra mo gcig yin no/ /rdul phra mo bdun la nyi zer rdul gcig go /nyi
250a1(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi rdul bdun la ri bong gi rdul gcig go /ri bong gi rdul bdun la/ lug rdul gcig go /lug rdul bdun la ni/ glang rdul gcig go /glang rdul bdun la sro ma gcig sro ma bdun la a ba ga na gcig /a ba
250a2(rgyud 'grel): ga na bdun la ba ti ka gcig /ba te ka bdun la nas gcig /nas bdun la sor gcig /sor nyi shu rtsa gnyis la khru gang/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kha gcig ni/ gos khru tshad 'di lta bu rtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa gon no/ /kha cig
250a3(rgyud 'grel): khru bcu pa'o/ /lus 'phags po rnams kyi khru nyi shu'o/ /ba lang spyod rnams kyi mi khru bzhi bcu pa/ sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing la byung ba'o/ /gos khru brgyad pa gon no/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas 'og min
250a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bar du ni/ lus ci ran ga'i gon no/ /'dzam bu gling ba'i mi rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du/ pho'i mtshan ma dang mo'i mtshan ma/ yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du/ pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po
250a5(rgyud 'grel): med do/ /'dzam bu gling dang/ lus 'phags dang/ ba lang spyod gsum na/ bag ma gtong ba dang len pa yod do/ /sgra mi snyan pa la ni med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams la yang med do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og
250a6(rgyud 'grel): min gyi bar du gtong ba dang len pa gnyis ka med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gling gsum la shin tu grang ba dang/ tsha ba yod do/ /sgra mi snyan na med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi nas 'og min gyi bar du tsha grang gnyis ga med do/ /'dzam bu gling
250a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la dgun dang dbyid dang/ dbyar dang ston yod pa bzhin du gling gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhi nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du dus bzhi med do/ /ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling
250b1(rgyud 'grel): nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du pha ma yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi lha
250b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la pha ma med do/ /'dzam+bu gling nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la rje dang bran yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du rje dang bran med do/ /'dzam bu gling nas gling gsum na ni/ 'bru dang nor yod/ sgra mi snyan na 'bru ni yod
250b3(rgyud 'grel): nor ni med do/ rgyal chen bzhi nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du 'bru ni med do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du nor yang med 'bru yang med do/ /'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la pha ma 'am bu mo 'am bran po 'am/ rje bo 'am 'bru la
250b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ gling gnyis po la yang yod/ /sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni/ mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la ni/ 'bru ma rtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ sum
250b5(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa gsum nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar du/ 'bru ma rtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du cil yang zhen pa med do/ /gling bzhi pa'i mi rnams la bud med zla mtshan can dang/ sbrum ma dang bu btsa'
250b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams kyi bu tsha lo lnga lon pa tsam/ /lha 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am/ spangs par brdzus te skyes pa'o/ /lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams ni/ bdag gi bu 'am bu mo yin snyam
250b7(rgyud 'grel): du sems dpa' o/ /? bya de dag ni/ 'di dag ni bdag cag gi pa'o/ /ma'o snyam du sems so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams ni/ lo drug lon pa tsam/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi lo bdun lon pa tsam/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi lo brgyad
251a1(rgyud 'grel): lon pa tsam/ 'phrul dga' rnams kyi lo dgu lon pa tsam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi lo bcu lon pa tsam/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am/ spangs par brdzus te skye ba'o/ /lha 'am lha'i bu dag 'di ni
251a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi bu 'am bu mo snyam du sems so/ /khyi'u dang bu mo de dag kyang bdag cag gi pha 'am snyam du sems so/ /tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar du/ thog ma nas lus kyi yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing/
251a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba na yang de kho na bzhin no/ /gzugs med pa rnams la ni/ lus med do/ /de bas de dag la skyes ba yang mi mngon/ 'chi ba yang mi mngon no/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ lha de rnams ni rang gi sa nas steng du 'gro mi nus
251a4(rgyud 'grel): par/ de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang yin no/ /'od dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ 'od de yang yar mi 'gro zhing rang rang khyab nas 'od du gsal ba'o/ /bsod nams che zhing longs spyod che ba zhes bya ba ni/ lha de rnams kyi rang  
251a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi bsod nams kyi longs spyod che chung dang ldan pa'o/ /dbang che zhing 'khor mang po zhes bya ba ni/ lha de rnams kyang bsod nams kyi dbang gis 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du dbang che ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin
251a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnas pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin ni zhe sdang dang ser sna'i dbang gis lha ma yin du grags te/ de med pa ni lha ma yin no/ /de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa'i lha dang lha ma yin rnams gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyis
251a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa/ ma lus rdzogs pa'i sems can gyi don la srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /de lta bu'i
251b1(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gang zag gang gis kyang gus shing rjes su yi rang nas/ lha de rnams kyis bsrung ba skyob par byed par 'gyur te/ tshe phyi ma la yang srung ba'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rig sngags
251b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las lha rnams bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bcu dgu pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje can rnams kyis gsungs so/ /drang srong snying rje chen po
251b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ brtul zhugs kyi dbang gis drang srong nyi ma'i lta ba dang/ tshangs pa'i lta ba dang gnyis yod de/ drang srong chang par lta ba ni nyi ma'i gzhung ngo/ /drang srong rtag par lta ba ni tshangs pa'i gzhung ngo/ /de gnyis
251b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa dang chad par lta ba'i drang srong rnams yi ming zung zhig ces bya'o/ /brtul zhugs grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ de gnyis yang dga' thub kyi dbang gis/ rang gi lus la tshangs par spyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ rang gis dka' thub byas pa'o/
251b5(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ phyi'i rig pa grub pa ste/ phyi'i rig pa de ni mngon par shes pa'o/ /grags pa 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong de rnams la/ 'jig rten gyi khams la grags pa'o/ /yang na
251b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba ni/ de'i dmod mos mes bsregs pa bzhin du thal bar gtang ba'o/ /klung dang ri la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i sems can rnams mi gnas pa'i sa 'am/ 'brus bu rtsa ba shing gi rkogs pa gyon pa'o/ /sha med pa rkeng rus
251b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i cha byad can/ skra ring ba sen mo ring ba/ 'phreng ba dang ring ba spyi'u blugs thogs pa'o/ /smod pa'i mtshon cha can zhes bya ba ni/ rang dgu ba'i dus su legs par smras na/ bzang bar 'gyur te/ ngan par smras pas ngan par
252a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /dka' thub drag pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gzhan ma bzhin du/ srog gcod pa mi byed la/ ma byin par mi len par/ 'dod pa log par mi g.yem zhing/ mi tshangs par mi spyod pa/ brdzun du mi smra
252a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ 'phra ma dang ngag khyal med de/ tshig rtsub mo yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang mi dang klu dang gsum dus gcig tu rgyu nus pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi mngon par shes
252a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /ngag gi mngon par shes pa/ yid kyi mngon par shes pa/ mig gi mngon par shes pa/ rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'o/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod zung zhig ces bya
252a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gser lta bu bzhin du/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong rnams la lta ba'o/ /drang srong chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po g.yon pa phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong
252a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po lha skabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ lnga po de rnams kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba gzi brjid dang ldan te/ bsam gtan bzhi la
252a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /de rnams sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ sngo skya dkar ser dang/ sngon po dang/ ser po'o/ /g.yas rnams na dbyug gu sum pa bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang
252a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing/ rig sngags rjes su dran pa'o/ /drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gnas nas 'jog ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po grog mkhar pa zhes bya ba dang/
252b1(rgyud 'grel): drang srong chen po 'gro skyob kyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'gro skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong de rnams ni bstan bcos la mkhas pa/ gzugs tshad la mkhas pa lnga'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar
252b2(rgyud 'grel): skya dang/ nag po dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ ljang gu dang/ ser po'o/ /g.yas rnams na po ti/ g.yon rnams na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /lnga po de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /drang srong
252b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang/ lnga po de dag kyang 'gog
252b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ tshor ba dang 'du shes rnams spong ba'o/ /drang srong de rnams ni tshangs pa'i gzhung gis rtag par lta ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag
252b5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ thal ba'i mdog dang/ sngon po'o/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis snyoms par bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po bskal ldan
252b6(rgyud 'grel): shing rta zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rgyun zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'dir zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mgo bo zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gshin rje'i ma zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig byed kyi gzhung gis/ rig byed 
252b7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bor byas nas/ rtag par smra ba dang rig byed bzhi ni/ mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang/ snyan dngags kyi rig byed dang/ srid srung gi rig byed dang/ nyams yod kyi rig byed dang/ de bzhin yang bkra shis shing tshe ring ba'o/ /nad med pa
253a1(rgyud 'grel): dmod mos 'dod pa'o/ /de'i sgo nas grol bar 'dod ba'i lta bas so/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ nag po'o/ /g.yas rnams na bum pa spyi'u blugs 'dzin
253a2(rgyud 'grel): cing g.yon rnams na dbyug gu gsum pa bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung
253a3(rgyud 'grel): ngan po'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po bag mnyam zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyi ma'i gzhung gis chang bar lta ba ste/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas
253a4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa g.yas pa yar blangs shing/ g.yon pa sa la btsugs nas nyi ma la lha'o/ /de rnams sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ sngon po dang/ ljang nag go /phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas/ gnam
253a5(rgyud 'grel): la lta ba'o/ /drang srong de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob pa dang/ rig sngags kyi srung ba dang skyob pa dang/ rig sngags kyis bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po yang
253a6(rgyud 'grel): dag 'phags po zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba nis/ tshangs pa'i gzhungs gis rtag par lta ba ste/ bum pa'i rang bzhin
253a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams kyi ku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang/ dmar skya dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po'o/ /phyag gnyis bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las
253b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po bla ma zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po grub 'dzin ces bya ba dang drang srong chen po lta bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gangs can zhes bya ba dang/ zhes
253b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang nag dang/ sngo skya dang/ dkar ser ro/ /phyag gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin la
253b3(rgyud 'grel): snyoms bar zhugs pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gos e ngan zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang chad par lta ba ste/ chos thams cad 'chal par rtogs nas/ ngo bo mi 'dzin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi
253b4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ nag po dang/ thal ba'i mdog go/ g.yas rnams na rtse gsum dang/ g.yon rnams na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ drang srong de rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/
253b5(rgyud 'grel): srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po pen pa zhes bya ba
253b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ drang srong chen po de rnams yang skar ma'i blta ba can te/ blta ba ni bar ma dor gnas shing/ skye ba mi 'dod ba'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ sngo skya dang/ /dmar po'o/ /g.yas
254a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams na dbyug gu gsum/ g.yon rnams na bum pa spyi lugs bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams yang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' par/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces
254a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po dug sel zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pos 'dzin ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po drang srong rwa gcig zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig byed kyi gzhung gis rtag par blta
254a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang nag dang/ ser po dang/ dkar ser dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ nag po'o/ /g.yas rnams na bum pa spyi blugs/ g.yon rnams na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams
254a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /drang srong chen po khyur mid? kyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po dgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'jigs byed ces
254a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po che zhes bya ba ni/ rtag par lta bar gnas pa ste/ bum pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lus bem por 'dod pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ thal ba'i mdog dang/
254a6(rgyud 'grel): mthing ga dang/ nag po'o/ /phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya la snyoms par bzhugs pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba dang skyob par bya'o/ /drang srong 
254a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gau tam ma zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po byis ba rtse zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mis sbyin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ri bo
254b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po srin bu 'dzin zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong bdun po de dag ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bar byas shing/ rtag par blta pa ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar
254b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ ljang gu dang/ ljang nag dang/ dmar skya'o/ /g.yas rnams na phreng ba dang/ dbyug gu gsum bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /drang srong de rnams yang rig sngags rjes su dran zhing/ sems
254b3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /drang srong chen po snying po 'di dag ni/ rig byed rnams byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni sngon
254b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi drang srong chen po ste/ de rnams yang rig byed bzhi 'don zhing/ rig byed de rnams kyi don ni/ bkra shis tshe ring chos sbyin dmod mos su snang ba'o/ rig byed bzhi po ni de'i don la 'don pa'o/ /gsang sngags rnams byed pa zhes bya
254b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni dngos grub thob cing rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa/ gzhan sems can rnams la skyob par byed pa'o/ /dmod pa 'dor ba zhes bya ba ni de'i dmod mo ni gang yang grub pa'o/ /brtul zhugs dran pa zhes bya ba ni dge slong
254b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'dod chags dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ de rnams spangs la bsgoms pa la gtso bor byas pa'o/ /gzi brjid che ba zhes bya ba ni/ drang srong de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis/
254b7(rgyud 'grel): mtho ris khyab pa'o/ /grub pa pha rol gnon pa zhes bya ba ni/ bum pa gang ba dang/ sems bem por grub nas/ de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis gnon pa'o/ /grub pa dag ste zhes bya ste/ de rnams kyis kyang thun mongs gi dngos
255a1(rgyud 'grel): grub thob ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
255a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ dbu la rin po che rdo rjes brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas gsum na dbyug gu gsum dang/ bum pa spyi blugs dang/ po ti'o/ /g.yon
255a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum na rma bya'i sgro dang/ phreng ba dang/ sbrul bsnams pa'o/ /brtul zhugs kyi cha byad can/ zla ba'i gdan la/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags gang zag gi gus par
255a4(rgyud 'grel): byas shing 'chang bar 'gyur na/ drang srong chen po de rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste rig sngags
255a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsang sngags drang srong rnams kyi gnyen po lta'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha ri ha ri la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ drang srong rnams kyi gnas bskabs te nyi shu pa'o// //kun
255a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyi skye dgu'i bdag po gang dag ces bya ba ni/ khams kyi rigs rtag pa// 'gro ba rigs drug gi las kyi me long 'dzin pa'o/
255a7(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba nas/ lha rnams skye ba'i gtsug lag 'dzin cing/ las kyi ri mo bris nas de la gtang ba'i bdag po'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /skye dgu'i bdag bo
255b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ming blta ba'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po za tshul can gyi bu dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po me dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten sa bla na gnas pa ste/ de
255b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga po ni lha'i las kyi me long gi ri mo 'dzin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ nag por gnas pa'o/ /de rnams kyi g.yas na dbyug gu rtse gsum dang/ phreng ba dang/
255b3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa spyi blugs dang/ 'khor lo dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na las kyi me long ri mo bsnams pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs su zhugs pa/ khams gsum tsam la dbang ba/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi
255b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' las mi 'da' bar/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du 'dar dang skye dgu'i bdag po sdu zing sel dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po go byed dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po zin po dang zhes bya ba ni/ skye dgu'i
255b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag po de rnams yang sa stengs kyi las kyi me long 'dzin cing/ mi dang byol song rnams kyi skye ba'i las 'dzin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang/ nag po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar
255b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ g.yas rnams ni 'khor lo dang/ zhags pa dang/ dung dang/ be con dang/ dbyug to'o/ /g.yon rnams las kyi ri mo'i me long bsnams pa'o/ /de ltar bur skye dgu'i bdag po kyang/ sa stengs su dbang mdzad cing/
255b7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod de
256a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni skye dgu'i bdag po de rnams yang sa 'og na gnas shing yi dags dmyal ba'i las kyi me long 'dzin pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ nag po dang/ ljang nag dang/ thal ba'i mdog dang/
256a2(rgyud 'grel): mthing khar gnas pa'o/ /g.yas rnams na/ be con dang/ lcags kyu dang/ dbyug to dang/ zhags pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na las kyi me long gi ri mo bsnams pa'o/ /sa 'og la dbang mdzad cing/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las
256a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' bar/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang khams
256a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bdag por gnas shing/ sems can bzang po ngan gyi las smra ba'o/ /gnas ba dang 'gro ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs bsrung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ 'ong ba da ltar dang 'das pa rnams kyi mngon par
256a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che zhing dbang che ba rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ngo bo ni zhal gcig
256a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog nag mo spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po dbu la rdo rjes brgyan pa/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad sprul gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na be con dang 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis na
256a7(rgyud 'grel): rma bya'i sgro dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang/ 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag gang gis gus par gyur na/ skye dgu'i
256b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag po de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob bar 'gyur ro/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags skye dgu'i bdag po'i gnyen po blta bar bya'o//
256b2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ hi ri hi ri la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las khams gsum gyi mnga' bdag skye dgu'i bdag po chen po rnams kyi gnas skabs te/ nyi shu gcig ba'o// //kun dga' 
256b3(rgyud 'grel): bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /khyod kyis dug chen po rnams kyis ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug rnams pa gsum ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams su grags shing gzhan
256b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mi thub pa/ thun mongs gi dug ces bya ba sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /'gro ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ sbyor ba dang gsum mo/ /dug de gsum ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste/ sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed
256b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum blta ba'o/ /aN+Da rA zhes bya ba ni/ sgo nga las byung ba'i dug yin te/ sprul la sogs pa'i sems can las byung ba'o/ /kha rlangs kyi dug dang/ mche ba'i dug ge/ paN+Da rI ma
256b6(rgyud 'grel): klu'i dug bsam pa'i dug go/ mthong ba'i dang gnyis so/ /ka rA la ni/ klu'i dug reg pa'i dug go/ 'dzin pa'i dug go/ ke yu rA ni bum pa'i dug yin te/ de ni reg pa'i dug go /b+hu'u taM ga ma ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi mthong ba'i
256b7(rgyud 'grel): dug yin te/ de yang dug bzhi gnas pa'o/ /b+hu'u ta pa ti ni/ mi ma yin gyi dug yin te/ de yang mthong ba'i dang reg pa dang/ bsams pa las byung ba'i dug go/ pin+tu pa ti ni/ thigs pa'i dug nyin te/ de yang bsams pa dang
257a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba las byung ba/ klu'i dug phol mig go /si ri pa ti ni/ de yang klu'i dug yin te/ rmu chu'i nad do/ /te dza pa ti ni/ klu'i dug me spal gyi nad yin no/ /ya sho pa ti ni/ de yang klu'i nad yin te/ 'dze'i bye brag
257a2(rgyud 'grel): po/ /yang sho gra pa ta ni/ sa bdag gi dug yin te/ 'bras kyi nad do/ ta ra Da ni/ de ni sa bdag gi rigs g.ya' ba' o/ /ta ra Da ni/ sa bdag gi rigs sha kra'i nad do/ /ta ra Da ni/ 'brum bu'o/ /tu tu rA ni lhog pa'i nad do/ /d+ha na tA
257a3(rgyud 'grel): hA ha rA ni/ mche ba la sogs pa las byung ba sems can dug gi so'i dug go /ha la ha la ni/ 'jig rten drag po'i dug yin te/ sems can nang gi dug go /me la hA la gra ni/ sbyor ba'i dug go /pA la ni/ 'bras bu las byung ba'o//
257a4(rgyud 'grel): gu ha ni gsang ba'i dug go /bsang ba'i dug ni dam tshig las byung ba'o/ /tsa rI ni/ brtan pa ste mi 'gyur ba'o/ /dan+tu ra ni/ btsan dug go /i ri kirtsi ka ni/ rtsa ba'i dug go /kaM bA ni/ blta ba'i dug go /sha staM du ri ni/ log pa'i dug
257a5(rgyud 'grel): go /bi pu li ni/ sprin gyi dug go /na ku la ni/ sre mod las byung ba'o/ /ki rI sbi ni/ phyi ba'i dug go /ta ra taM ga riSh+Ta ni/ srin bu ki ti'i dug go /a mra ma ti ni/ sbrul nag po'i dug go /dza bu ma ti ni/ sha drug go /ma d+hu ma ti ni/ bdud
257a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi las byung ba'o/ /ka ma le ni/ mthong ba'i dug go /bi ma le ni/ phye ma'i dug go /kun+d+ra le ni/ rtsa ba'i dug go /a ha du hi ni/ sdig pa mang po'i dug go /a Di na Di ni/ sdig pa dmar po'i dug go /bu ge bu ge ni/ sa dug go /
257a7(rgyud 'grel): bat+sa na b+he ni/ spre'u de ba'i dug go /mahA ga ri ni/ nag po brtsegs pa'i dug go /du lam de ni/ rtsa ba nag po'i dug go /su la b+he ni zhes bya ba ni/ rin po che'i dbyig dug go /swAhA ni dug bcom pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes
257b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' stsal ba'o/ /'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten la grags pa phyi'i dug ces bya'o/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig /
257b2(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug dang nang gi dug 'joms nus pa'o/ /rig pa'i rang bzhin rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas na/ dug nad thams cad kyi mi tshugs shing/ dug nad de rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang
257b3(rgyud 'grel): skyob par byed pa'o/ /sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad thams cad la sba ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug de rnams las bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad de'i 'jigs pa las bzung ba'o/ /yongs su
257b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i 'jigs pa las thar ba'o/ /zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad de dag thams cad zhi ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad bcom nas bde ba'o/ /'chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug can
257b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis 'chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i mthong ba'i dug gi mtshon cha spangs pa'o/ /dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug 'ong ba rnams spong ba'o/ /dug gsod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ yod pa yang med par
257b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ nad de mi'i tshugs shing/ tshe ring ba'o/ /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig ces bya ba ni/ phun sum tshogs shing nad rnams dang bral ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/
257b7(rgyud 'grel): dug gi ming bstan pa'i gnas skabs te/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba'o/ /khyod kyis shing ljon pa chen po rnams kyi ming
258a1(rgyud 'grel): zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi shing ljon pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi shing rnams blta ba'o/ /shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang/ shing
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po khyab nas zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po ser po
258a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po mya ngan tshangs zhes bya ba ni/ shing ljon pa chen po sna ldan byed ces bya ba ni/ shing ljon pa chen po de yang rim pa bzhin du/ shar dang/ shar lho dang lho nub dang/ nub dang nub byang dang/
258a4(rgyud 'grel): byang dang byang shar dang/ de bzhin du zhing skyong la yang rim pa bzhin du shar nas bskor te/ glang po che'i gdong can dang/ ra'i gdong can dang/ ma he'i gdong can dang/ yi dags kyi gdong can dang/ chu srin gyi gdong can
258a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sha ba'i gdong can dang/ rta'i gdong can dang/ glang gi gdong can dang/ g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang/ rtse gcig dang/ be con dang/ ral gri dang/ sbrul zhags dang/ ba dan dang/ bum pa dang/ rtse gsum mo/ /g.yon
258a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams na bsdigs mdzub dang zhags pa'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog kyang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ dmar nag dang/ dkar po dang/ dung ka dang/ ser po dang/ mthing ka'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags
258a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar srung ba dang skyob par byed do/ /shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po ba'i ba zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po tsu te zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po dzam+bu
258b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po a 'bras zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po tA la zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po tsan dan zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ shing ljon pa chen mo de rnams kyang rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas te/ de yang rim
258b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du gnas te/ rgya mtsho'i shar dang/ shar lho dang lho dang lho nub dang nub dang/ nub byang dang byang dang/ byang shar dang/ de rnams la gnas pa'i shing skyong rnams ni/ rim pa bzhin du/ khA gdong can dang/ khyi'i gdong can dang/ 'ug pa'i
258b3(rgyud 'grel): gdong can dang/ phag pa'i gzod ba can dang/ seng ge'i gdong can dang/ stag gi gdong can dang/ spyang ki gdong can dang/ bya'i gdong can no/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ ljang gu dang mthing ka dang/ dmar
258b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ thal ba'i mdog can dang/ mthing ka'o/ /de rnams kyi phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas rnams na gri gug /g.yon rnams na thod pa/ bsnams pa'o/ /shing de rnams kyang shin tu g.yon pa/ yal ga rgyas pa/ de bzhin du lo ma dang ldan pa'o//
