258b5(rgyud 'grel): shing ljon pa de dag dang/ gzhan dag lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang/ zhes bya ba ni/ shing de la sogs pa gzhan la yang/ lta'i gdon la sogs pa 'byung po stong phrag brgyad cu rnams gnas pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
258b6(rgyud 'grel): bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /ces bya ba ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams thugs rje che ba ni/ de dag dang ldan pa'i rig sngags la gang zag gang gi gus par byas
258b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ zhing skyong de rnams kyis kyang/ srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o/ /sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ shing ljon pa chen po bshad pa'i gnas skabs te nyi shu
259a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gnyen po/
259a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya/ chos rnams kyi phyag rgya gsum la grags pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
259a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'o/ /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun rnams blta ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni bskal pa dang po'i dus su yang dag
259a4(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing sems can gyi don la gsungs shing/ phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang
259a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa gnyis pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis kyang/ sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang bzhin gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /yang dag
259a6(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa gsum pa'i dus su/ sems can gyi don la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis kyang/
259a7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jigs gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa bzhi pa'i dus su yang/ sems can gyis don la
259b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis kyang/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa lnga pa'i dus su
259b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis kyang/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bskal
259b3(rgyud 'grel): pa drug pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang/ sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas drug po de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ mngon pa dang 'dul ba
259b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i tshas bstan cing/ sems can rnams 'dul ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dus tha ma 'di la sems can gyi mtshan lnga'i
259b5(rgyud 'grel): dus su/ de bzhin du tshe lo brgya nyi shu tham pa la/ yul mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ rdo rje'i gdan la/ de dge slong sa ri mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i don dang/ sems can
259b6(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges rjes su yi rang ba/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/
259b7(rgyud 'grel): kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa/ chos rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i sgo nas bstan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku la brgyan pa/ sems can gyi don
260a1(rgyud 'grel): la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi don la khyab pa'o/ /seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ dge slong msa ri'i don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags ky rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub
260a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas yang bskal pa 'di'i phyi ma yang dus bzang po la/ tshe lo stong sems can rnams kyis thub pa/ gser gyi sa gzhi'i yid bzhin
260a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi nor bu la spyod pa/ sems can rnams la las bya mi dgos pa/ chos kyang mtshan nyid dang mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba mngon pa gsum gyis 'dul ba'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs
260a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi bud kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po/ de rnams la dbang
260a5(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ba/ des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang spyi bo'i gtsug du bzhag nas/ rjes su yi rang zhing de'i yon tan smra ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes
260a6(rgyud 'grel): su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams la dbang mdzad pa/ lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi rgyal po lha ma yin rnams 'dul ba/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang spyi gtsug du bzhag nas/ rjes su yi rang ste/ rig sngags
260a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi yon tan smra ba'o/ /rgyal po tsho nwa bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bzhi'i mi'i mgon mdzad pa'i chos kyi rgyal khris mdzad pa/ bzhi po de dag gis kyang spyi bo'i gtsug du bzhag nas/ gus par rjes
260b1(rgyud 'grel): su yi rang zhing smra ba'o/ /dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi shar phyogs na mnga' mdzad cing/ dri za rnams kyi rgyal po ste/ des kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi
260b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi lho phyogs la mnga' mdzad cing/ grul bum rnams kyi rgyal po ste/ rgyal po des kyang gus par rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang
260b3(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi nub phyogs na mnga' mdzad pa/ klu rnams kyi dbang po klu'i rgyal po des kyang/ rig sngags la gus par byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras
260b4(rgyud 'grel): shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi byang ngos na mnga' mdzad pa/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi rgyal po/ des kyang gus par byas pa'o/ /dri za'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang/
260b5(rgyud 'grel): ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod de/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la yang/ sde dpon de dag dang ldan te/ de
260b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang sa ba'o/ /klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang la yang sde dpon de dag dang ldan te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o//
260b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu de yang/ sde dpon de dag dang ldan te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lnga
261a1(rgyud 'grel): cen dang/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang/ gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma dang gnyis kyi bu 'phrog ma'i bu lnga
261a2(rgyud 'grel): brgya ste/ de rnams kyang gzi brjid dang stobs dang ldan te/ kha dog dang grags pa dang ldan pa de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyis rgyal mo la gus par byas shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ ser po dang/ g.yas na dbyug
261a3(rgyud 'grel): to dang/ me long bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang/ utpa la bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la gus par byas shing/ de sems can gyi don la byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
261a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi yang nas yang du rjes su yi rang pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa bgegs rig stong phrag brgyad cu kyang/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas rjes su yi
261a5(rgyud 'grel): rangs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /lha'i gdon dang/ klu'i gdon dang/ rlung lha'i gdon dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ nam mkha' i lding gi gdon dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rgol par mi 'gyur
261a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ rig sngags la rjes su yi rang zhing bka' las mi 'da' bar/ de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ sngon po dang/ ser po'o/ /phyag rnams na rdo rje dang/ sbrul zhags dang/ ral gri dang/ ba
261a7(rgyud 'grel): ngan dang/ sbrul bsnams pa'o/ klu'i gdon ni/ ro smad sbrul du 'dug go lha ma yin gyi gdon ni khro bor gnas pa/ nam mkha' lding gi gdon ni bya'i gzugs so/ /gzhan yang lha'i cha byad du yod pa'o/ /dri za'i gdon dang/ mi'i
261b1(rgyud 'grel): ci'i gdon dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ srin po'i gdon dang/ yi dags kyi gdon dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ste/ de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ sngo
261b2(rgyud 'grel): skya dang/ nag po dang/ dmar po dang/ thal ba'i mdog go/ de rnams kyi phyag mtshan ni/ pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ cha lang dang/ bum pa dang/ ral gri dang/ thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /mi 'am ci dang/ lto phye ni/ rta'i mgo dang/ sbrul gyi mgo dang/
261b3(rgyud 'grel): yi dags kyi gdon ni/ sha za rnams skam zhing 'jigs pa'i cha byad do/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po ni/ khro bor gnas so/ /dri za'i gdon ni lha'i cha byad do/ /sha za'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ srul
261b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la rjes su yi rang zhing/ bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog ni/ dmar nag gi mdog dang/ sngo skya dang/ mthing
261b5(rgyud 'grel): ka dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po'o/ /phyag rnams na/ sbrul zhags dang/ thod pa dang/ dbyug to dang/ zhags pa dang/ phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gdon ni phyi ba dang/ byi ba dang/ pha wang dang/ phag dang/ yang phag pa dang ngo/ /skem byed kyi
261b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang/ smyo byed kyi gdon dang/ grib gnon gyi gdon dang/ brjed byed gyi gdon dang gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de la sogs pa gdon de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' pa'o/ /de rnams kyi kha dog
261b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ mthing kha dang/ ljang gu dang/ thal ba'o/ /de rnams kyi phyag na/ rgyu zhags dang/ snying dang/ thod pa dang/ gri gug dang/ dbyug to dang ngo/ /de rnams kyi gdod pa ni/ khyi dang spyang ki dang/ pho rog dang/ ra'i
262a1(rgyud 'grel): gdong can no/ /gdon thams cad kyi 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po de rnams kyis kyang/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'gal bar mi nus pa'o/ /gzi brjid
262a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog pa rnams dang zas su mngal za ba rnams dang/ zas su srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang/ zas su sha za ba rnams dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su zhag za ba rnams dang/ zas su
262a3(rgyud 'grel): tshil za ba rnams dang/ zas su rkang za ba rnams dang/ zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de yang zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo la 'tshe bar mi
262a4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gzugs ni/ dreng mo'i gzugs dang/ khyi'i gzugs dang/ seng ge'i gzugs dang/ stag gi gzugs dang/ spyang ku'i gzugs dang/ sre mo'i gzugs dang/ byi la'i gzugs dang/ 'phyi ba'i gzugs
262a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ra'i gzugs dang/ lug gi gzugs dang ngo/ /zas su dri za ba rnams dang/ zas su me tog za ba rnams dang/ zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang/ zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang/ zas su bsreg bya za ba rnams dang/ zas su
262a6(rgyud 'grel): rnag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su phyis sa za ba rnams dang/ zas su cin 'thung ba rnams dang/ /zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang/ zas su ngar? snabs za ba rnams dang/ zas su snabs za ba rnams
262a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang/ zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang/ zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang/ zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa thung ba rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi snang
262b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ mi srun pa rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' bar mi nus pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gzugs kyang/ ma he dang/ glang po che dang/ glang dang/ rnga mo dang/ sha ba dang/ bong bu dang/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ rma bya dang/ khrung khrung dang/
262b2(rgyud 'grel): de po dang/ kye ka dang/ bya rgod dang/ bya rkang ka'i gzugs so/ /de rnams ni shin tu mi srun pa mgo ma rnyan gyi gzugs su yod pa dang/ 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ zas su za de ba rnams kyis kyang/ rig sngags kyi gnod par mi
262b3(rgyud 'grel): nus shing/ rig sngags la gus par byas pa'o/ /gshed byed la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ las bcu bzhi yod de/ nyes pa de rnams kyis rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis nyes pa mi nus pa'o/ /rim nyin gcig pa dang zhes bya ba/ la sogs
262b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rims kyi nad mi gcig pa bco lnga yod de/ rig sngags kyi nus pas/ rims de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /rlung las gyur pa dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rlung las nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o/ /mkhris pa las nad bzhi brgya rtsa
262b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi ste/ de gsum 'dus nas 'dul pa'i nad do/ /de gnyis gnyis dang ldan pas na ldan pa'o/ /de lta bu'i nad 'jigs pa can gyis kyang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'ong bar
262b6(rgyud 'grel): mi nus so/ /rims nad thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rims kyi nad de rnams kyis kyang/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing/ nad de rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /glad pa na ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs
262b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gsum gyis/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad na ba ste/ nad de yang bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi yod de/ nad de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /shu pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/
263a1(rgyud 'grel): sa bdag gi nad rigs mi gcig pa bco brgyad yin te/ shu ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis mi tshugs pa'o/ /dug nad
263a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ phyi'i dug dang nang gi dug drug go /dug de rnams kyi mi tshugs so/ /sdang ba thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ las kyi rnam par smin pas/ sems can rnams kyis sdang bas te/ de'i 'jigs pa
263a3(rgyud 'grel): las thar ba'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa brgyad do/ /yams kyi nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ yams nad thams cad de ni 'go ba'i nad yin te/ nad des kyang
263a4(rgyud 'grel): mi tshugs pa'o/ /'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dgra bo rnams dang/ nye ba la sogs pa 'thab pa de rnams kyi 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /gnod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dang/ rgyal po la sogs
263a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdon pas mi tshugs pa'o/ /nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ nad de rkyen de rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal
263a6(rgyud 'grel): mo rma bya chen mo las/ phan yon tan bstan pa'i gnas skabs te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /gang zhig gis rig
263a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas sam zhes bya ba ni/ 'di la gus par byas nas 'chang ba dang/ bsgom pa dang/ rgya cher spel ba dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ sngags kyi tshig gcig gnyis brjod pa dang/
263b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rgya cher bri ba dang/ bsung ba bris nas btags na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la 'gal bar byas na/ lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du
263b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis/ de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur sems can ma rungs bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i gang zag
263b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang/ gshur zhes bya ba la thug pa'i bar gyis gsang sngags kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu pa'i
263b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang nga'i 'byor pa thal bar log par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang bsrung ba'i bye brag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta pa'o/ /dar??
263b5(rgyud 'grel): po sa ni brtag par bya/ gnyis pa sa blang cho ga bshad/ gsum pa sa ni yongs bzung ba/ bzhi pa sa ni spyong bar byed/ lnga pa sa ni byin brlabs bya/ /drug pa sa ni gdul bar bya/ /de dag ni sa'i cho ga'i bye brag go de yang rig
263b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi snying po dang/ sa'i sngags kyis byin brlabs bya'o/ /sa gzhi bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ dri dang rnam lnga bsres pa'i chus/ /dkyil 'khor la ni byug par bya/ /sta gon la sogs cho ga ni/ mngon du 'gro ba
263b7(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /sngon 'gro cho ga yang dag shes/ bcu gsum mam ni yang na dgu/ /lnga dang gcig las gang yin pa/ bum pa'i mtshan nyid brtag par bya/ gser ram dngul lam zangs
264a1(rgyud 'grel): las byas/ rdza la sogs pa gang yod la/ /gsus pa che la mgrin pa rid?/ /mchu 'phyang nag por ri med/ /de bzhin mtshan dang ldan pa la/ rig pa'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ rma bya'i sgro dang/ rigs lnga'i mtshan/ /de
264a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni yang dag bri/ /gu gul a ga ru la sogs/ /dung pas yang ni bdug par bya/ dri chu dang ni chu rnams kyis/ bum pa la ni yang dag dgang/ /mar ram zho 'am sbrang rtsi 'am/ bu ram ka ra 'o ma dang/ /de rnams kyis ni dgang
264a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /mu tig mu men byi ru dang/ gser dang dngul ni gzhug par bya/ /'bras sam til lam ma sha 'am/ gro 'am nas sam yang dag blug /mtshan ma legs pa'i bum pa la/ /dar mar ras sam ma nyams pas/ /bum
264a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgul ni yang dag bcings/ /tsandan dang ni gur kum dang/ glang rtsi'i chu dang ga bur dang/ du ru ka ni bri lnga ldan/ /des ni bum pa dgang bar bya/ /bal po shing dang u duM par 'bar ta dpal shing kha de'i shing/ byang chub
264a5(rgyud 'grel): shing ni sna lngas ni/ /de'i lo mas mdzes par brgyan/ /dar dang rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ni/ /rin chen phreng dang me tog phreng/ /bkra shis brgyad dang me long dang/ bum pa la ni yang dag brgyan/ /rdo rje slob dpon yang dag gis/
264a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sems dang ye shes sems/ /bum pa la ni yang dag gzhug rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /shes rab dang ni snying rje ldan/ /bri ba'i las la mkhas pa dang/ mi khengs gshis ni bzang ba dang/ dam tshig la sogs
264a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dang/ gus par sangs rgyas dkon mchog gsum/ /sems can mnyam pa nyid bsgom pa/ slob ma dag ni skyong byed pa/ /slob dpon la ni de dang ldan/ slob dpon dge slong lta bu la/ /tshul khrims yang dag srung byed
264b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus ldan/ /lus ni legs par khrus byas nas/ tsan dan la sogs chu la bkru/ de bzhin lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid kyis rdo rje yang dag bkru/ /de bzhin rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ dang po'i la la yang dag
264b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug bum pa lhag ma'i cho ga dang/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid brtag pa'o/ /ras sam dar ram skud pa ni/ /rgyal po bu mo rje'u rigs ni/ /de bzhin bram ze'i bu mo la/ /de la sogs pa gzhan dag yang/ /lo grangs brgyad ni
264b3(rgyud 'grel): lon pa la/ /thig skud yang dag sgril bar bya/ /oM badzra su tra hUM phaT/ zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /slob dpon shar lta slob ma nub/ de bzhin slob dpon byang du ste/ slob ma lho phyogs lta ba ste/ /rim bzhin shar
264b4(rgyud 'grel): lho nub byang dang/ /byang shar mtshams dang lho nub dang/ nam mkha' i thig ni gdab par bya/ oM badzra re khe hUM phaT swAhA/ dkyil 'khor sa gzhi bzang po la/ /thig ni yang dag gdab par bya/ /thig ni cha chen bcu drug gdab//
264b5(rgyud 'grel): de yi logs la sum cu gnyis/ /dbus kyi cha chen dang po la/ pad+ma'i lte bar shes par bya/ /gnyis pa'i cha ni pad+mar grags/ /phyi rim cha ni bzhi cha la/ /mu khyud rdo rje ra bar shes/ lhag ma'i cha ni sum cha dang/ /de phyir phyed dang ldan pa la/
264b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i cha ni yang dag yin/ de phyir phyed na cha yod pa/ /nang gi lha rnams shes par bya/ cha chen lnga po snang ba ni/ nang gi lha rnams yang dag yin/ /de phyir cha gnyis yod pa la/ /nang gi sgo ni yang dag shes/ /phyi rim cha ni dgu nang pa/
264b7(rgyud 'grel): bar gyi lha rnams yin pa ste/ bcu dang bcu gcig snang ba ni/ bar ma'i sgor ni yang dag shes/ /bcu gnyis snang ba'i cha chen la/ /phyi'i lha rnams yin pa la/ /de phyir cha chen phye dang gsum/ /phyi'i sgor ni yang dag grags/ /de phyir phyed
265a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis yod pa/ /rta babs su ni shes par bya/ /de phyir pad+ma rdo rje dang/ /me ri mkhas pas phyi nas btsal zhes gsungs so/ cha chen gcig sgor shes pa/ de yi logs ni sum pa dag/ de yi logs ni cha chung gcig
265a2(rgyud 'grel): de yi phyi rim cha chen la/ /sum cha gcig ni nang gi cha/ /sum cha gnyis ni ka bar shes/ /rin chen pany+tsa ra ga gang/ /da ru skad dang gsum po ni/ /cha chung gsum ni mnyam par bya/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams dra ba dang/ /de gnyis cha ni mnyam
265a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /cha ni sum cha gnyis gnyis te/ nang dang phyi dang sgo ru yang/ /mkhas pas de bzhin shes par bya/ /thig gi cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /rin chen dngul dang baiDUrya/ /gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang/ de bzhin in+d+ra nI la dang/ de bzhin rigs
265a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i ngo bo 'di/ /de ni rin chen phye mar grags/ /rig sngags snying po rigs lnga 'am/ /de yi sngags kyi byin brlabs bya/ /oM traM h+ri khaM hUM/ oM ma hA ma yU rA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de yis mtshon rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dbus
265a5(rgyud 'grel): su pad+ma'i lte ba la/ zla ba'i gdan ni shes par bya/ /de stengs rin chen de bzhin rigs/ rig sngags rma bya der gnas pa/ shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ byang gi phyogs dang rim bzhin du/ dmar po ser po dmar po dang/ /ser po de ni
265a6(rgyud 'grel): byang na gnas/ /pad+ma bzhi po de bzhin shes/ shar lho dang ni nub byang dang/ /mthing ka'i mdog tu shes par bya/ lho nub byang shar mtshams su ni/ ljang gu in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ rin chen rdo rje'i rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin rin chen rin chen rigs/ /rin
265a7(rgyud 'grel): chen pad+ma rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin rin chen las kyi rigs/ shar phyogs rim pa de bzhin du/ lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya/ /me tog spos dang dri dang ni/ mar me dang ni bzhi po dang/ /shar lho mtshams nas dgod bar bya/ /phyi rim mu khyud ra
265b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /rdo rje ra bar shes par bya /de phyir 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/ /bzhi po rtsibs ni phyogs dang thun/ /zur gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi ni/ /phyogs bzhir phyed phyed snang ba'o/ /de phyir mu khyud zlum po la/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor bar bya/ /nyi ma zla ba
265b2(rgyud 'grel): gza' chen dgu/ /shar la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod par bya/ /de phyir lha rnams grub bzhi ni/ /kha dog dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lha rnams zur bzhir gnas pa ni/ /pi wang gling bu gar mkhan ma//
265b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin glu ma shes par bya/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs/ /lha rnams sgo dang de bzhin du/ /dngul dang gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang/ /de bzhin in+d+ra nI lar shes par bya/ /lha rnams sgo dang bzhi po la/ /sgyu skar rim bzhin shes par bya/ /gru
265b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra na bzhis rnam par brgyan/ /pany+dza rA ga lnga po la/ /dkar dang nag dang ser dang ni/ /dmar dang ljang gu lnga snang ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo/ /'od ni snang ba lngar shes so/ /'dod pa'i rin chen pa?
265b5(rgyud 'grel): gu dang/ /'dod chags dang ni ser sna dang/ /phrag dog da ru khar ni rnams par grags/ /twa ra na bzhi snang ba ni/ /mdzes mtshon du ni shes par bya/ /phyi dang nang dang bar sgo dang/ /nang sgo ji bzhin mkhas pas shes/ /mu tig dra ba dra phyed dang
265b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsig pa'i logs la brgyan par bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ri dags dang/ /rta babs stong du gnas pa'o/ /gdug dang ba dan rgyal mtshan dang/ /gzhal yas khang gi steng na gnas/ /mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste/ /gzhal yas khang du
265b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grags/ /dkyil 'khor lha dgod cing mtshon dkye ba'i rim pa'o// //bar sgo la ni gnas pa'i lha/ /phyogs skyong bcu ru shes par bya/ /sgo ba bzhi la gnas pa ni/ /rgyal po bzhir ni rab tu grags/ /phyi rol
266a1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams sgo dang ni/ /sngar bshad klu rgyal rigs brgyad gnas/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor lha bkod rim bzhin shes/ /bkra shis mtshan dang bkra shis rdzas/ /bkra shis brtags dang
266a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa nges/ /phyi nang bar sgo rim pa gsum/ /de yi 'gram la dgod par bya/ /bsrung ba yan lag brgyad dang ni/ /gtor ma'i rim pa gzhan las shes/ /dam tshig sems dang ye shes sems/ /rims bzhin dkyil 'khor lha la
266a3(rgyud 'grel): thim/ /arga la sogs pU dza rnams/ /rims bzhin mkhas pas dbul bar bya/ /mdo dang bzlas pa sgom pa gsum/ /thun mtshams gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /mdo ni rgyun mi 'chad 'don pa/ de bzhin cho ga byas nas su/ /sdug bsngal
266a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /rims dang nang rnams byung ba dang/ /mdze dang phol mig de bzhin te/ /gzhan yang nad rnams thams cad kun/ /bsgyur ba'i tshul la sogs pa kun/ /las dang shes bya bag chags kun/ /'byung po la sogs
266a5(rgyud 'grel): na ba dang/ /gang dag sdig pa byed pa dang/ /sdig pa thams cad 'dis 'joms so/ /gal te de las 'gal 'gyur na/ /sngar bshad rdo rje snying po sogs/ de rnams kyis ni chad pa gcod de/ /rig sngags 'di ni yang dag grags/ /sdug
266a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad 'joms byed pa/ /'di yi yon tan yin par grags/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs rim pa'o// //skud pa btags pa zhes bya ba ni/ /srung pa'i rim pa yin te/ de yang ras sam dar ram de la sogs
266a7(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yang rung/ /mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor la/ /lus rdo rjer bsrung bar bya'o/ /yang na ras sam dar ram shing shun la sogs pa la/ /gur kum dang 'gi wang gis ras sam shing shun la bri ba'o/ /'khor lo rim pa bcu gnyis
266b1(rgyud 'grel): bris la// //cha gnyis la pad+ma'i ra ba dang/ /'khor lo bri'o/ /de phyi rim cha gnyis la/ /rin chen rdo rje dang phyag mtshan gyis dgod par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi snying po lnga la/ 'khor lo rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /'khor lo de
266b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bris nas lus la gdags so /de bzhin du btags par gyur na/ nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang/ sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ dkyil 'khor dang srung ba byed
266b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas skabs te/ nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bsad par 'dod pa'i sems can yang/ snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur
266b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ chad pa de las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas gcad pa'i rig pas ni/ gzhu tsog pas so zhes bya ba ni/ chad pas gcad par 'dod pa'i sems ni/ sems de dang mi ldan te/ chad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhu tshogs pa'i
266b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa ni/ brgyad bkag pas so zhes bya ba ni/ sems can kha cig gnod pa skyel bar 'dod de/ gzhan gyis bkag nas gnod ba skyel bar mi nus so/ /brgyad bka' ba' i rigs pa
266b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dam bcas pa'i rigs pas so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i nus pas/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang bral te/ gnod par byed pa rnams bkag ste/ dam bca' ba pa'i rigs pas ni spu zing zhes byed pas so/ /zhes bya
266b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rig sngags kyi nus pa nges kyang/ dam bshig nas so sor gnas pa'o/ /spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni/ de bzhin du thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ so sor gnas pa de ni/ dngos por mi gnas shing zhig par
267a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i chad pa nor dang srog las thar ro/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa rnams kyis kyang rku ba'i
267a2(rgyud 'grel): sems btang ba de yang/ sems la mi 'jog cing 'jigs ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i me'i 'jigs pa de yang rig sngags 'di 'chang bar 'gyur na/ 'jigs pa de
267a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ blo bur gyi nad chus 'jigs bar yang mi 'gyur te/ gru dang rab la myur du rgal ba'o/ /de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/ zhes bya ba ni/ dug gsum
267a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi tshugs shing rdo rje'i phung po lta bu'o/ /mtshon gyis ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khrug pa'i dbus su bsdad na yang/ mtshon rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ de bzhin du glo bur gyi mtshon gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /bde bar gnyis
267a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ chags che ba dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa rnams log pa ste/ nyal ba na yang bde ba las sad pa na yang bde ba'o/ /bde ba dang/ gnod
267a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ltar dang tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin te/ nam skyes pa'i dus su yang 'jigs pa de dang bral zhing/ bde bar gnas pa'o/ /phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags
267a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spod gtong gtang ba dang/ sngags dang gshin rje'i sngags kyi nus pa dang/ sngon spyod dkyil sogs pa btang ba rnams 'joms pa'o/ /dgra choms bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dgra bo sdang ba rnams 'joms te/ de'i 'jigs
267b1(rgyud 'grel): pas mi tshugs shing/ dgra rnams dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /smras pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ de'i yon tan gyis nus pas rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas shing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen nams/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ sa bcu'i byang
267b2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' thob cing/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /yang na 'di'i zil gyis thams cad gnon pa'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs ba dang/ da ltar gyi rkyen gyi 'jigs pa dang/ de la
267b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar ba'o/ /bde bar yun du yang 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad med ba tshe ring pa bza' ba dang btung ba nus shing/ mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang
267b4(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa bzhag pa ste/ da ltar byas pa da ltar ma ba spyangs nas sang phod smen ldang ba'o/ /dper na gang
267b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zhe na/ dgra thu po'i bu lus pa bzhin du'o/ /de yang las rnams smin pa'i mdo las kyang/ gsungs pa za ga pa bzhag pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang/ mi tshugs shing rang gi las kyi rnam par las byung
267b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /las rnam par 'joms pa'i mdo las shes par bya'o/ /ngas kyang smras pa skyes ma thag tu rtogs bar snang/ skyes nas lo bcu lon pa na/ gzhan gyis bzung zhing sdug bsngal thob/ /de grol rgya mtsho'i nang nas shing/ /'di ni yang sdug bsngal
267b7(rgyud 'grel): thob/ /de bzhin las kyi smin pa ni/ /mi 'gyur mi srid brtan ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ ha cang char che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe
268a1(rgyud 'grel): klag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ni sngar ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byas nas/ ri'i rtse mo 'am chu mig gi 'gram 'am/ mtsho'i 'gro la sogs par klag par gyur na/ char chungs na char 'bebs shing
268a2(rgyud 'grel): char ches na char bcod bar 'gyur ro/ /des na klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di klag pa tsam gyis/ de na gnas pa'i klu rnams dga' ba/ klu de rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang
268a3(rgyud 'grel): bral bar 'gyur ro/ /char chen ni gcod par byed/ char bkon na ni 'bebs so zhes bya ba ni de na gnas pa'i klu rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na/ dus dus su char 'bebs shing dus dus su lo tog smin pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor der
268a4(rgyud 'grel): mu ges mi tshugs so/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam ba ji srid bar 'char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ char che ba yang mi 'byung la/ ha cang char chud bar yang
268a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur te/ de bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus par byas par gyur na/ dngos grub gang yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi
268a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par bcangs pa 'am/ bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ chos
268a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la tshar brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ tshar lnga drug gam gcig gam/ rgyun mi 'chad par 'don na/ de dang de'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas par gyur na yang/ tshe 'di la yang bde bar 'gyur
268b1(rgyud 'grel): te tshe phyi ma la yang bde'o/ /de bas na chos 'di la mi 'chang ba 'am 'phro cod par mi bya ste/ yi ge gcig yang ma nor bar gri ba dang/ klog par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ba'o
268b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid kyis gus par bzung zhing gzhan rnams la rgya cher spel ba'o/ /kun dga' bos bzung ba'i rig sngags ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang
268b3(rgyud 'grel): gu las kyis rigs la gtogs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can dbu la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa'o/ /yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum
268b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa srung ba'i/ rig sngags 'dis kyang sdud pa? dang
268b5(rgyud 'grel): skyob par 'gyur ro/ /tadya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po blta ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ya baM ti la sogs pa'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ zhes bya
268b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ 'dod pa'i dbang gis zhe sdang skyes so/ /zhe sdang drag po des 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug tu mthong ngo/ /de ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin te/ ma rig pa des 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las mi thar ba'o/ /'khor ba 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
268b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ yang du yang du 'khor bar lhung ste/ byol song yi dag dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lo/ /de gsum la yang phyi'i dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /de bas na 'jig rten gyi dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa/ 
269a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan phyi'i dug gsum ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ rig sngags 'dis kyang nges par bcom mo/ /nang gi 'jig rten dug gsum
269a2(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhan gyis mjoms mi nus so/ /rang rang gi 'od gsal gyi ye shes kyis/ rang rang las byung ba'i gti mug gi rang bzhin dug gsum bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ zhes bya ba
269a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'jig rten las grags pa'i dug ni/ gsum yin te/ dug gsum po des sdug bsngal drag po myong bar byed pa'o/ /bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/ chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug gsum po ni rig sngags
269a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos kyang bcom ste/ nang gi dug gsum ni rang rang gis gzhom pa ma yin pa/ gzhan gyis gzhon mi nus pa/ de bas na nang gi dug ces bya'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /'di dag 'jig rten
269a5(rgyud 'grel): dug gsum ste/ zhes bya ba ni nang gi dug gsum ni/ bltas na mi snang ste/ spyad na 'bras bu 'byung zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po/ 'dod chags kyis zhe sdang zhe sdang gis gti mug /gti mug gse ser sna/ ser snas phra dog go /
269a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'bras bu ngan song gsum du yang nas yang du 'gro ba'o/ /de bas na nang gi dug gsum spang par bya'o/ /bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/ /dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dug ni 'gro ba
269a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi 'gro ba sbyor ba dang gsum yin te/ 'gro ba ni bsam pa mthong ba ni/ reg pa kha rlangs so/ /mi 'gro ba ni btsan dug bong dug bdug la sogs pa'o/ /byed pa'i dug ni sbrang rtsi dang mar las byung ba bzhin du/ sbyor ba las
269b1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'o/ /dug de gsum po ni/ 'jig rten phyi'i dug gsum ste/ de'i dug ni dge 'dun gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom pa'o/ /nang gi dug gsum ni/ gzhan gyis 'joms mi nus shing/ rang rang gi ye shes kyis 'joms pa'o/ /nang gi ye shes
269b2(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo/ /bla ma'i gdams ngag gis bcom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang/ dgra bcom rnams kyi grags pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i
269b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzi brjid dang stobs kyis dug bcom mo/ /de bzhin du shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'i stobs dang gzi brjid kyis dug bcom pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi gzi brjid kyi zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang
269b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa ste/ phye ba phrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag gi /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /ngas ni bde legs 'gyur bar bya zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
269b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges dge slong sa ri'i don la/ /stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi don la bde bar byas pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' 
269b6(rgyud 'grel): stsal ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/ sdod pa'i dug dang/ 'gro ba'i dug dang/ byed pa'i dug gsum bcom zhing de bzhin du nang gi dug gsum bcom pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
269b7(rgyud 'grel): mo las/ nang gi dug gsum bshad pa'i gnas skabs te/ nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //dge slong sa ri dge bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bkas/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ dge slong sa
270a1(rgyud 'grel): ri mche ba'i dug gis zin pa bde ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri ni mche ba'i dug gis zin cing/ dran pa ma rnyed par yod pa lus kyang
270a2(rgyud 'grel): kha dog 'gyur zhing kha nas dbug kyang mi thon pa/ kha nas spu ba 'dzag pa/ lus rengs shing mig dkar log gis song ba mthong nas/ snying rje skyes nas sangs rgyas la dris ba ste/ de'i thabs bsrung ba'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas la
270a3(rgyud 'grel): bde legs phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas zhes bya ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i rig sngag kyi gsang sngags/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa bzhin du lus ngag yid kyis bzung ba'o/ /bcom ldan
270a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dga' ba'i sems byas nas sangs rgyas kyi bka' las nyan nas/ dge slong sa ri'i don du rkang ba phyir bor te/ dge slong sa ri ga la ?
270a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dge slong sa rig la ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ yul mnyan yod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge 'dun gyi bsro khang bgyi ba'i slad du shing gshegs pas
270a6(rgyud 'grel): shing rus pa'i sa bon dge slong sa ri nad kyis thabs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang ba bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ thog ma dang tha ma dang da ltar med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rig sngags kyi
270a7(rgyud 'grel): gtso mor gyur pa/ thugs rje can gyi rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la klu'i kha slangs kyi dug las byung ba mche ba'i dug kyi chad pa spang ba'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug las bskyabs te/ bzhan bar chad byung ba la
270b1(rgyud 'grel): yang bskyab pa'o/ /yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi bzung ba las phral te/ dug des mi tshugs pa'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug dang gzhan gyi 'jigs pa rnams dang phral te bskyang ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur
270b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug nad de las zhi ba ste/ de'i nad kun bor nas lus kyi na tsha med par bde ba'o/ /chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug gi chad pa spang ba'o/ /mtshon cha spang pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi mtshon cha spang ba'o/ /
270b3(rgyud 'grel): dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba'i dug gzhil ba'o/ /dug gsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug byung ba gsad pas/ dug gzhan 'ong bar mi nus pa'o/ /mtshams gcad ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis
270b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi bar chong byung ba las bsrung ba'o/ /sa bcing ba byas te zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du bzhi yang bsrung ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis/ dge slong sa ri la
270b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du bsrung ba'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pas zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri la/ dug gi nad las bde bar byas pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri nad de las sos so/ /zhes bya ba ni/
270b6(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ril/ dug gi nad kyi rkyen byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ kun dga' bo'i las bde ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga
270b7(rgyud 'grel): la ba der song ste/ phyin nas zhes bya ba ni/ de gnyis ni lus ngag yid bde ba/ sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi byed pa la/ ye shes dang gzi brjid yang de bzhin te/ chos de'i nus pas sems can thams cad la bde ba'o/ /de'i phyi nas
271a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ gus par byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom
271a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i lo rgyus ni/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul nas/ kun dga' bo dang dge slong sa ri gnyis/ bcom ldan
271a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi mdun du 'khod pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ dge slong sa ri sbrul nag pos/ zin pa'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri bde ba'i de nas so/ /bcom
271a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la kun dga' bo la yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi dang sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o//
271a5(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam zhes bya ba ni/ sde snod bzhi'i rang bzhin/ kun brtags rnam par dag pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ ma man+t+ra'i rang bzhin sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gzi brjid stobs dang mthu dang
271a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ste/ nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ sems can rnams la gnyis su med par don byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsungs pa de la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi mtshan nyid de gsungs pa/ mgu
271a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems kyis lus ngag yid kyis sangs rgyas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos zhu ba
271b1(rgyud 'grel): phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i nus pa gang zhig yod ces pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/
271b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skam yang srid ces bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho ni thar pa med cing rgya che ba ste/ de yang me bdun gyi dus su bskams te/ de yang rtag pa med pa'o/ /sa ni nam mkha' la 'phar
271b3(rgyud 'grel): yang srid ces bya ba ni/ bskal pa chen po'i dus su/ bskal pa'i mes sa rnams bsregs pa'o/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma ni/ sa la lhung yang srid ces bya ba ni/ da ltar nyi ma dang zla ba snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i dus su yang nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis med bsregs nas/ nyi
271b4(rgyud 'grel): zla gnyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /klung ni rgyun nas ldog kyang srid kyi zhes bya ba ni/ rkyen gyi rang bzhin gyis klung de yang med par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du sa dang rlung dang me dang chu la sogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snang ba 'di yang med pa ste/ sgyu ma
271b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rmi lam lta bu'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni/ gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ da ltar shAkya seng ges bstan
271b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bden pa 'di bstan pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa'i tshig gi de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo de
271b7(rgyud 'grel): lta bas na zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i yon tan ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod du med pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di la zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /'khor bzhi pa
272a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ nye ba'i 'khor dang nang gi 'khor dang phyi'i 'khor rnams so/ /nye ba'i 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /nang gi 'khor ni nyan thos dgra bcom pa nyis brgya
272a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga bcu/ de la sogs pa dge slong ngam dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ phyi'i 'khor ni lha dang mi la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di srung ba dang skyob par byed
272a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mgu nas/ legs so zhes bya ba zhu ba phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas zhes
272a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sdud pa po kun dga' bo bzhi la bka' stsal pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu'o/ /shA ri'i bu la sogs pa/ nyan thos nyis brgya lnga
272a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu'o/ /dge slong dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri la sogs pa/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i dge slong btsam mo/ /dge slong ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma shAkya 'dzin pa
272a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ brgya bco brgyad dang ngo/ /dge bsnyen dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshong dpon mgon med la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen mang po'o/ /dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la/ gus par byas so zhes bya
272a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ rgya cher spel lo/ /rjes su yi rang ngo/ /klog par byas so/ /'chad du gzhug go /mchod par byas so/ /bla mar byas so/ /sgom par byas so/ /de bzhin du de'i yon tan gyis sems can thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang
272b1(rgyud 'grel): ? bral zhing/ bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i chos/ kun dga' bo la gtad nge zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' 
272b2(rgyud 'grel): bo la sogs pa/ nyan thos nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin nyan thos la sogs pa'o/ /lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po la sogs pa/ gzugs khams dang/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams du ma 'dus
272b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mi dang zhes bya ba ni mi'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sogs pa du ma gnas pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ri la sogs pa grangs med par gnas pa'o/ /rlung lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung lha'i rgyal po grangs 'dzin la sogs pa grangs
272b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa du ma gnas pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding dang zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po/ /gser mig can la sogs pa/ nam mkha' lding grangs med pa'o/ /dri za dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa grangs med
272b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mi 'am ci dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa grangs med pa'o/ /lto phye chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto phye'i rgyal po yon tan grangs la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi
272b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ku be ra la sogs pa mang por gnas pa'o/ /srin po dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs pa la sogs pa mang por gnas pa'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khod der 'dus te/ 'khod pa de dag thams cad yi rang ste zhes
272b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gnas te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo la gus par rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
273a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de dag thams cad kyi drung du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden par bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las/ rjes su yi rang
273a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas skabs te/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las brtag pa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i 'bum 'brel rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po las
273a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po a mo g+ha badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA man+t+ra nu d+hA ra ni shu trat sa haM Sha tI kA/ bod skad du/ gsang
273a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag ye shes snang bar ldan/ rtag tu sems can don byed pa/ /de bzhin yon tan
273a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /'jig rten mgon phyag 'tshal nas/ rab rib kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /de yi gti mug sel byed pa/ yang dag bsam la yang dag dgrol/ bdag gis 'bum 'grel bshad par bya/ /'di skad bdag gi
273a6(rgyud 'grel): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces bya ba ni/ sgro skur dang bral ba'o/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bos so/ /grogs med dam zhe na/ nyan thos la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu thos pa'o/ /su la thos  
273a7(rgyud 'grel): na bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /gang thos na rig sngags gyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo 'di thos pa'o/ /sus thos na kun dga' bos thos pa'o/ /dus gcig na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni don gnyis la 'jug ste/ sdud
273b1(rgyud 'grel): pa po shes rab che bar go ba dang/ dam pa'i chos 'byung bar dkon pa'i don to/ /ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ bcom pa ni gzhi bcom bzhi ni dgra ste/ dgra ni bdud bzhi'o/ /bdud bzhi ni/ phung po'i
273b2(rgyud 'grel): nga dung dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang/ 'chi bdag gi bdud dang/ lha'i bu'i bdud do/ /gang gi dus na bcom zhe na/ rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus na'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ skal pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so/ 'das
273b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni mya ngan las pa'o/ /'das pa ni gang gi dus she na/ dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong gi nub mo'o/ /'dam bu'i khrod na gzigs pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su lha dang
273b4(rgyud 'grel): lha ma yin dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyis byas pa'i gzhal yas khang yod de/ phyogs re re la dpag tshad lnga lnga yod pa gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ nang gi ka pa brgyad dang/ phyi'i ki ba brgyad kyis rgyan pa/ sgor de la seng ge gnyis
273b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa ste/ de bzhin du twa ra nas kyang brgyan pa'o/ /ka ba dang/ skar khung dang/ sgo logs dang/ ya them dang/ ma them dang/ sgo 'gram la sogs pa rin po che rnams las byas pa yin te/ ka rten ni ma ra ga ljang gu'o/ /gzhu ni in+d+ra ni'o
273b6(rgyud 'grel): la ste/ ka ba ni gser la byas pa ste/ 'phrin byu ru la sogs pas byas pa'o/ /de bzhin du gdung yang gser las byas pa ste/ phyag la sogs pa ni dngul las byas pa'o/ /rtsig pa ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ phyi lo zlos dang
273b7(rgyud 'grel): nang log gnyis ka ri mo mkhas pas bris pa bzhin du snang ba'o/ /sa gzhi ni rin po che pad+ma rA ga las byas pa ste/ ra ba ni bai DU rya las byas pa'o/ /sgo bzhin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ de yang gser dang/ dngul dang/ inda nI ma/
274a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mar ka dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ bai DUrya dang/ shel dang bdun no/ /seng ge brgyad kyang rgyu shel las byas shing/ gnyA ral la sogs pa ni in+d+ra nI la dang/ byu ru las byas pa'o/ /mig dang kha ni in+d+ra nI la dang pad+ma rA gas
274a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing/ so dang mche ba ni dngul las byas pa'o/ /rgya thibs dang ldan zhing/ rgya phibs kyi rten ni rin po che sna bdun las byas shing sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang ba'o/ /dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pas brgyan zhing/ gdugs dang/ ba dang rgyal
274a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi phyogs phyogs su brgyan cing/ rin po che la sogs pa mang la 'phyang zhing/ dril bu dang/ dril bu g.yer ka dang/ rlung gis btab pas skad sna tshogs 'byung ste/ dper na ro lo mo mkhas pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
274a4(rgyud 'grel): rol mo byas pas skad sna tshogs 'byung ba bzhin no/ /de'i phyogs bzhin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lcags ri gcig gis bskor ba'i nang na skyes mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal re re la yang rdzing bu re re yod pa'o/
274a5(rgyud 'grel): /skyed mos tsha de'i ming yangs dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang kun tu dga' ba dang/ rnam par dga' ba dang/ rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de bzhin du rdzing bu'i ming yang yin no/ /rdzing bu'i 'og ni bai DUrya las byas pas log sogs skal ni rin
274a6(rgyud 'grel): po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /rdzing bu de'i chu yang shel /chags pa bzhin du dangs la gsal ba/ 'thungs na yang pa/ lta na yid du 'ong ba/ tsan dan dang/ ga bur la sogs pa dri dang ldan pa/ rdzing bu de'i nang na rang bzhin gyis
274a7(rgyud 'grel): chu las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs yod de/ de bzhin du kha dog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang puN+Da ri ka chen po dang/ utpa la dang/ utpa la sngon po dang/ ku mu ta dang/ ku mu ta chen po la sogs pa/
274b1(rgyud 'grel): ? tshogs dang ldan zhing/ so so'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lta na mdzes pa'o/ /rdzing bu de'i nang na bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yod de/ khrung khrung dang/ bya ngang pa dkar po dang/ bya ngan pa'i rgyal po dkar po dang/ ngang pa ser po dang/ sa ra sa la sogs pa'i bya'i
274b2(rgyud 'grel): skad sna tshogs 'byung bas mdzes shing mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin du skyed mos tshal gyi nang na yang thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi shing nags tshal yod de/ tsam pa ka'i me tog gi shing dang/ kunda'i me tog gi shing dang/ rdza ti'i me tog gi shing
274b3(rgyud 'grel): dang kak+ko la'i me tog gi shing dang/ klu'i me tog gi shing dang/ a ru ra'i shing dang/ ba ru ra'i shing dang/ skyu ru ra'i shing dang thal dang ta la chen po'i shing dang/ tsan dan gyi shing la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis shing sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de'i
274b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog dang 'bras bus kyang sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /skyes mos tshol dang/ rdzing bu la yang/ dge slong ngam/ /dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ lha dang mi rnams kyis
274b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang sgom zhing/ tshogs sogs pa'i sa dang/ de na gnas pa'i byis pa rnams kyang zhe sdang med cing chos dang mthun par gnas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khris ya dang bcas pa yod de/ rdo rje sa la pad+ma
274b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i sa ya sna bdun dang bcas pa/ rgyan rnams bzhi ta ra na dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje rin po che'i sna bzhi bya khyung gi twa ra na dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i mu tig dang/ byu ru dang/ mu men la sogs pas gser gyi
274b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu la 'phra byas shing/ klu'i zhags pa bya khyung twa ra nas khar bcug pa'o/ /ri dags sha ra ni ni rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa ste/ mdzes shing lta na sdug pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu shang shang na ra na yin te/ rdo rje rin po che sna bzhi las
275a1(rgyud 'grel): byas shing g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mdzes par brgyan pa'o/ /chu srin twa ra na rdo rje rin po che sna bdun las byas shing/ 'jug ma pa tra sna tshogs su 'khyil zhing lta na sdug pa'o/ /rdo rje seng ge'i pad+ma chen po'i khri ni/ mnan na nem
275a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ bzhag na tho ba/ reg na 'jam pa/ lta na mdzes pa'o/ /gzhal yas dang/ seng ge'i khri de ni rang bzhin du yod cing sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du gdung gdung g.yogs dang/ bla re dang rdo rje rin po che'i
275a3(rgyud 'grel): mu tig gi phreng ba'i 'dra bas brgyan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i rigs mi gcig pa brgya stong 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas shing/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mthu chen por thog pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par
275a4(rgyud 'grel): thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par sprul pa dang/ cho 'phrul kun tu ston pa dang/ sems kyi skad cig thad cig yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan
275a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid du mnyam zhing rgya che bar zab pa dang/ spobs pa dang/ cho 'phru dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sbyin gyi mchod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang/ gzugs
275a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbang dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang sa dang/ pha rol phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang
275a7(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ dben pa dang/ yongs su byas pa'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag go byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ rdo rje gtum po dang/ rdo
275b1(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' dang/ lag na rdo rje mda' gzhu dang/ rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rdo rje'i rgyan dang/ rdo rje'i 'od dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ kun tu gzigs pa dang/ rdo rje dpal dang/ pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ zhal rnam par
275b2(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs pa'i rdo rje dang/ pad+ma snying po dang/ pad+ma'i spyad dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang thabs gcig go /nyan thos chen po rab tu
275b3(rgyud 'grel): mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang/ cho 'phrul bsam kyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen
275b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad dri dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsregs pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i ba gang po dang/
275b5(rgyud 'grel): /tshe dang ldan pa ka bi na dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa maung+gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang
275b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa 'od srungs chen po/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang/ de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ /dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang mi
275b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'khor du ma 'dus pa'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu rdzogs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub chen po'i?
276a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sa mnyes pa shin tu yongs su bzung/ spyi bo gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi mthong bdud kyi las thams cad las ni nges par rgyal/ de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa ni thugs
276a2(rgyud 'grel): su chud/ spyan lnga ni mngal rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ldan/ bdung dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ bdag las ni 'phags/
276a3(rgyud 'grel): khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med pa'i sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang/ btson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang
276a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang/ thabs dang stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bka' pa spyad pas/ mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku mdzes
276a5(rgyud 'grel): shing/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ga dang
276a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ /tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge gdon
276a7(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang/ tshig 'dru zang po/ /ma 'dris pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas dang/ 'khor phun sum
276b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i skabs de/ gnas skabs dang po'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam cig ci yang ma
276b2(rgyud 'grel): smras par/ smin mtshams nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'od zer gyi dra ba 'phros te/ de bzhin du yang nas yang du spros nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su khyab ste/ slar lo gnas 'od zer gyi dra ba da smin mtshams
276b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du thim pa de nas kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ skor ba lan gsum byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha da sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom
276b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dra ba 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/ don med par 'od zer gyi dra ba mi 'gyed na zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi nang na/ ma rungs
276b5(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa/ lha'i gdon dang/ klu'i gdon dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang/ rlung lha'i gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ me 'am ci'i gdon dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ sbyin
276b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ yi dags kyi gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ sprul po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'i gdon dang/ rjed byed kyi gdon dang/ /smyo byed kyi gdon dang/ grib gnod gyi gdon dang/ gnon po'i
276b7(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang/ de la sogs pa mkha' 'gro dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang ma rungs par byed pa gzhan gyi srogs 'phrog par byed pa dang/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang/ zas su sha za ba rnam dang/ gzhan yang ma rungs par byed pa'i
277a1(rgyud 'grel): yi dags dang/ 'byung po rnams kyis kyang yul der phyin nas yams kyi nad dang/ rims dang/ tsha ba dang/ 'dus pa dang/ rlung dang/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ shu ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ mdze dang/ phol mig dang/ ltog pa dang/
277a2(rgyud 'grel): 'brum bu dang/ sha bkra dang/ 'bras dang/ me dpal dang/ de la sogs pa'i/ nad thams cad 'byung ste/ yul der mu ge dang/ klu'i tshad pas kyang mi tshugs te/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi chos thams cad dar zhing/ chos kyi gzi brjid 'phrog cing
277a3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi nus pa yang med par gyur to/ /de bzhin du mi nad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ grong khyer yangs pa can du ma rungs pa thams cad byung ste/ 'jigs su rung ba byung nas sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byas so/ /de'i phyir na 'od zer gyi dra ba
277a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to zhes gsungs so/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der dong
277a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer ni dpag tshad brgya lnga cu yod pa/ dbyibs legs pa/ lta na mdzes pa/ phyogs bzhi'i srad bar nas/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs la sogs pas brgyan pa/ tshong dus mi
277a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad yod pa/ de bzhin du 'dod pa dang/ 'dod par byed pa rnams kyi nyo ba dang/ len pa dang/ rab gcig gis bskor zhing/ sman gyi shing dang/ me tog gi shing sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing/ de bzhin du skyang mos tshal
277a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdzing bu bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor ba'o/ /rdzing bu dang/ skyed mos tshal de dag la thang las skyes pa dang/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog dang/ tshogs dang/ bya rigs mi gcig pa sna tshogs dang/ ri dags kyi tshogs rnams yod
277b1(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu'i grong khyer gyi nang na 'gro ba sems can gyi don la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /btsun pa de ltar bgyi zhes gsol nas zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ sems can thams
277b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi don mdzad pa la bka' stsal pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to zhes bya ba ni/ /grong khyer yangs pa can gyi don la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
277b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ snying rje la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma nor bar bskor ro/ /de'i phyir na kun dga' bos kyang legs par gsan pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa de nas so/ /bcom
277b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das yul bri? rdzir? yul rgyu zhing gshegs zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su sems can thams cad 'dus pa'i sa/ de bzhin du 'byung po rnams kyang 'du ba'i sa yin no/ /gser gyi sa gzhi la rin po che sna  
277b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rlan/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po thams cad 'dul ba'i sa yin no/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub
277b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ lha la sogs pa 'khor rnam bzhi dang bcas nas/ grong khyer yangs pa can du zhabs kyis bcags so/ /de nas gcad ma'i lha dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i me tog bzang pos sil mar bkram
277b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ spos dang/ dri dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la dbul zhing/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sa nas kyang lha'i dar la
278a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas bting nas/ lha'i me tog manda ra ba dang/ manda da ra ba chen po la sogs pa me tog gi char 'bebs so/ /de bzhin du grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas so//
278a2(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa'i grong gyi a mra bsrung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi grong gyi dbus na sems can thams cad 'du ba'i gnas a 'bras kyi shing gis bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal dang/ rdzing bu dang/ wa chu 'dren pa'i sa
278a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje'i khri 'am/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das a 'bra'i tshal na bzhugs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/
278a4(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi don la gdon ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir na/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la/ phyi nas sgo'i thems pa la rkang pa zhon te zhes bya ba ni/
278a5(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su yul lha'i thog tu dpa' bo'i dus su rkang pa g.yas par bzhag la/ seng ge'i sgra sgrags la/ khyu mchog dam bcas shing gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo yams kyi nad dang
278a6(rgyud 'grel): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /gsang sngags tshigs su bcad pa smras pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag dang/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros
278a7(rgyud 'grel): shig ces bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nad thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ mtshon pa ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags
278b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'dzin ma'o/ /rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs so/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po/ /khams ni me'i khams/ skye mched ni ro'i skye mched do/ /rig sngags de'i sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis
278b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o sku mdog dkar mo/ /g.yas ser ba/ g.yon dmar ba spyan gsum pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /phyag
278b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i 'og ma gnyis mnyam gzhag go /g.yas pa'i gsum pa na ral gri bzhi ba na rdo rje lnga pa na 'khor lo/ /drug pas mchod sbyin no/ /g.yon pa'i gsum pa ni rin po/
278b4(rgyud 'grel): che'i steng na rdo rje'o/ /bzhi pa na pad+ma/ lnga pa na bum pa'i steng na rdo rje/ drug pa na lcags kyu/ maM gi yig 'brus sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'o/ /rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dbu la brgyan pa ni ye shes lnga rnam par/
278b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'o/ /spyan gsum ni sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhal gsum ni ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par dag pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag bcu gnyis ni rten
278b6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa ni mi shigs pa rdo rje'i gdan rnam par dag pa'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od ni thabs shes rab zung du 'brel ba'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa ni sangs
278b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang sems can gnyis su med pa'o/ /mnyam gzhag ni/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'o/ /ral gri ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje ni stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /'khor lo ni 'khor ba bcad pa'o/ /mchod
279a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin ni byin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje dang rin po che ni thabs shes rab rnam par dag pa'o/ /pad+ma ni rigs rnam par dag pa'o/ /bum pa dang rdo rje ni nang gi dug dang phyi'i dug rnam par dag pa'o/ /lcags kyu ni ma rig pa'i sems
279a2(rgyud 'grel): can rnams yar la 'dren pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rig sngags tshigs su bcad pa smras shing/ ma rig pa thams cad bcom ste/ mun pa'i nags tshal gsal bar byed cing/ rig sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa smras pa'o/ /bi sa ra bi sa ra
279a3(rgyud 'grel): bi sa ra ta la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten pa thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
279a4(rgyud 'grel): la sprul pa'i skus khyab cing/ sems can gyi don la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa bka' stsal pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni/ bye ba khrag khrig brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'das pa'i
279a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyang rjes su yi rang ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bas de bzhin no/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong gis kyang/ sku'i sgo nas ches bstan te/
279a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa rang bzhin gyi ngo bor gnas pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten nas yang dag bar song ba dang/ yang dag par zhugs pa dang phyir
279a7(rgyud 'grel): mi ldog pa dang/ lan cig phyir ldog pa rnams yin te/ de'i bsgoms pa ni dbugs 'byung ba dang/ dbugs rdub pa rnams yin te/ sems dran pa med cing bum pa gang ba bzhin du 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyis lus bom po'i rang bzhin
279b1(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin yin te/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma de'i ngo bo nyid kyis kyang bsams pa'o/ /nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ ngag gi sgo nas bstan pa'i chos 'di rtags mngon du byas
279b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ de bzhin du mi rtag pa bsgoms te/ lta ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dzin cing/ de bzhin du ngo bo nyid 'dzin pas kyang/ rig sngags kyi lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin no/ /bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/
279b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems pa rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams yin te de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing phyag 'tshal te/ phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob dang
279b4(rgyud 'grel): don dam pa gnyis yin te/ kun rdzob kyang log pa'i rgyu ma mi dmigs pa dang/ yang dag pa'i sgyu ma'i don byed nus pa gnyis so/ /don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing dmigs pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa sdig pa dang/ dge ba dang/ bral ba/
279b5(rgyud 'grel): yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas yin no/ /tshangs bas bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan dang po dang/ gnyis ba dang/ gsum pa yin te/ tshangs par spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin cing lus bem por
279b6(rgyud 'grel): gtang nas/ mi dmigs pa bsgoms te/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi ngo bo yin no/ /tshangs par so sor bsam pa zhes bya ba ni tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams
279b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras bu dang/ bsam gtan bzhi'i lha rnams yin te/ tshangs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems bkag nas bem por gnas te/ mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin tu gnas so/ /de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gnas pa yin no//
280a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum tsam la dbang mdzad de/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas sems can la dbang mdzad de/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam gnas yin no/ /dbang pas bsam
280a2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la dbang mdzad pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin nam ngo bo nyid kyis thob pa'o/ /lhas bsams pa zhes bya ba ni rigs bzhi dang rigs/
280a3(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyi rnam pa yin te/ 'dod pa thams cad la spyod cing bde bar gnas te/ de yang rig sngags kyi bde bar gnas pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ thag zar yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad
280a4(rgyud 'grel): cing byang chub kyi sems bskyed de/ khams gsum tsam la dbang mdzad cing/ lha rnams kyis kyang mi thub cing rig sngags grub pa'o/ /lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin rnams ni zhe sdang skyes shing
280a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyi brtsod pa ni rig sngags kyi stobs kyis rtsod pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin sgra gcan 'dzin rnams yin te/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin nus shing/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba la stobs dang
280a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ 'jig rten pas thub pa tsam med de/ de yang rig sngags kyi stobs kyis byas pa'o/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang dge 'dun la dga' ba rnams yin te/ de'i stobs dang/ gzi
280a7(rgyud 'grel): brjid dang ldan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi lam nas yin no/ /gzhan yang 'byung po rnams kyis rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' mi nus so/ /gal te bka' las 'da' bar gyur na/ mgo bo a dze ga bzhin du tshal pa tshal pa brgyar
280b1(rgyud 'grel): gas te/ ltog pa dang sha bkra dang/ 'bras rnams kyi nad kyis btab cing/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni yang nas yang du klag cing/ phyir rbad par bya'o/ /de yang bi sa ra ta la sogs pa smras
280b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyi bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal nas sprul te/ de yang zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ /khro mo spyan gsum pa/ dbu bkra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/
280b3(rgyud 'grel): kha gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ yan lag sprul gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang ba/ /g.yas bskum pas/ klu gtum po'i rigs mnan pa/ phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dbyug tho can bsnams pa/ /g.yon na zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub
280b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams te/ bdug pa tham cad rlag par byed cing/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mtshan cing/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags so/ /me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing/ dbang ni lce la byas pa'o/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing/ nam mkha' 
280b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du thams cad la khyab pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni muM tsa ta la sogs pa'o/ /yams kyi nad phyir song zhig ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs par byed pa'i gdon dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ gong du bshad pa'i nad rnams phyir bskrad cing/
280b6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'dug par mi tshugs shing gnod byed rnams phyir 'byung ba'o/ /phyir bskrad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ /nirga ta la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma gshegs shing zhes bya ba ni/
280b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lha chen ni shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa/ yams kyi nad dang/ rims kyi nad la sogs pas mi tshugs te/ gzhan yang ma rungs par byed pa/ sdig pa'i sems
281a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa dang/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ 'tshe bar byed pa'i 'byung po dang/ nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/ /lha chen po'i tshogs
281a2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'byung po'i tshogs yin te/ de yang phan gnod byed pa'i phyir na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis phyin te/ gnod byed ni gang zhe na/ lha chen po'i 'khor bgegs rnams kyi bdag po 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan gyi mtshams
281a3(rgyud 'grel): na gnas pa'o/ /skyer mi ster zhing ma'i mngal gnod par byed pa ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /ri dags rgyal dang skyem byed dang/ brjed byed dang ni gu tshur can/ nam gru srul po/ je mi ka/ 'dod pa can dang mar dga' byed/ bzhin rgyal can dang
281a4(rgyud 'grel): gnya' lag can/ /bya gzugs mi 'chad 'joms pa mo/ /ma ma dang/ de rnams 'byung po gnod byed pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni/ byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed/ /gzhan yang gang gis mi mthong ba/ de rnams /
281a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po sa la rgyu/ /lha'i lha ni gnyis yod do/ /'jig rten dang ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /'jig rten pa ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin no/ /de yang shar gyi phyogs
281a6(rgyud 'grel): na gnas te/ phan pa dang/ gnod pa byed cing gnas pa'o/ /gnod byed ni dbang phyug chen pa biSh+Nu dang/ b+h+riM gi ri ti dga' byed dbang/ gzhon nu smin drug tshogs kyi bdag/ stobs dbyangs legs ldan de bzhin no/ /de rnams shar phyogs
281a7(rgyud 'grel): phan par byed pa dang/ 'tshe bar byed pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bla ma ni gnyis te/ yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas dang/ dpa' ba bzang yin no/ /de yang 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bla ma'o/ /gnod par byed pa dang
281b1(rgyud 'grel): phan par byed pa dang/ lo legs par byed pa dang/ lo nyes par byed pa rnams ni/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang/ phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ spen pa dang ni lag dang ni/ sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'jug rings dang/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi de bzhin du/ bzang ba
281b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ngan pa dang/ tshes grangs 'dzin cing/ bkra shis pa dang/ mi shis par byed pa'o/ /dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yin te/ de yang shar phyogs dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang
281b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su khod cing gnod par byed pa rnams ni phyir khyed cig ces pa'o/ /rgyal po bzhi phags skyes bo dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ lus ngan po rnams yin te/ de'i 'khor ni/ dri za nor bu bzang dang/ dri za gdab bzang dang
281b4(rgyud 'grel): dri za me tog dang/ 'dor ru rnams yin te/ grul bum gtum mo dang/ nyes gtum mo dang/ grul bum rgan mo dang/ khyab 'jug len dang/ grul bum zhes rgan mo rnams yin no/ /klu'i rgya mtsho dang/ rgya mtsho'i bu dang/ dug med dang mtsho
