281b5(rgyud 'grel): chen rnams so/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la ba dang/ chu lha dang ni skye dgu'i bdag/ bar d+hA dza dbang ldan dang/ tsan dan 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang/ mgrin ngan dang ni 'gul nyes dang/ pa Di dang ni nor bu spyod/ gra rab nyer lngar ri mnyam dang/
281b6(rgyud 'grel): gser can gang po sen te ba/ g.yon can nor 'dzin ba lang spyod/ 'brog gnas ma yin rgyal po dang/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog tshogs lnga ser/ /mgrin bzang rin chen 'khor bcas dang/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /'bras bu gsum pa mgu
281b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ /lcags mdung rin po ma ldan dang/ /gnod sbyin ded dpon de rnams kyis/ /byang phyogs na ni gnas pa'o/ /dbang ldan dang bcas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang/ tshangs chen
282a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams yin te/ de dag kyang steng na gnas pa'o/ /dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yin te/ lha'i bu dbang ldan dang/ dbang chen dang/ dbang grags
282a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams yin no/ /byang shar mtshams na gnas pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ /'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang/ byed pa'i bdag po yin te/ lha dang lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye
282a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi dang/ dud 'gro'i 'gro ba mtho ris dang/ dmyal ba dang/ bzang ba dang/ ngan pa'i phyogs shes shing/ khams gsum gyi bya ba shes pa'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang/ a tre ya dang/ me dang nyi ma
282a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi dang/ bzang po la sogs pa yin te/ de dag gis kyang mngon pa shes pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ me dang/ bden bral dang/ rlung dang/ gshin rje dang/ me'i 'khor rnams ni/ me zhi dang ni
282a5(rgyud 'grel): nag pa dang/ yang dag shes dang mdun bdar dang/ gya gyu gyur ming a gur dang/ g.yo 'dod dang ni shar lho gnas/ laM ga mgrin bcu me dang/ bum pa mgrin sna bum sna dang/ gzigs shing gsod byed la sogs lho nub mtshams na
282a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas sum rtse dang ni rab shim dang/ lha min he ruM ke ru dang/ kun tu sna tshogs la sogs nub byang mtshams na gnas rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang ni/ /nam gru dang ni nag po dang/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud sogs dang/ /lho'i phyogs na gnas
282a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyang 'od zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha ris drug dang/ gzugs khams kyi lha ris bco brgyad kyang/ /dad pa
282b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes nas byung ste/ gnod sbyin rnams song cig ces pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag kyang/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'od ste zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' i lding dang/ rlung lha
282b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ brjed byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ grib gnon dang/ gnod byed dang/ gnon pa rnams
282b3(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ gzhan yang mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ lo thog za ba rnams yod de/ la sogs pa 'byung po'i rigs mi cig pa stong phrag nyi shu yod de/ de rnams kyang dad pa skyes nas 'od bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'od
282b4(rgyud 'grel): gis zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rigs kyis kyang gnod pa byas te/ des mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'don par bya'o/ /rig sngags ni ni rga ts+tsha ta la sogs pa'o/ /myur du byer zhig ces bya ba ni snying rje'i sems dang
282b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa dang/ sna ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams so sor song zhig/ bzang ba dang/ ngan pa ma 'grogs shing/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos ngan byed rnams mgo tshal pa tshal bar 'gas shing/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'o/ /khyed cag la
282b6(rgyud 'grel): gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gzhan yang srog 'phrog par 'dod pa dang/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan zhing/ drag shul byed 'dod pa ste/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i mtshan nyid/ dum
282b7(rgyud 'grel): bu dum bur brlag cing/ rig sngags kyi mes thal bar btang ba'o/ /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing/ nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag khyed cag ces bya ba ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ chos skyong
283a1(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams yin te/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin ded dpon chen po la sogs pas kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i gzi brjid dang/ stobs kyis srung zhing skyob pa'o/ /lus la
283a2(rgyud 'grel): yang 'jug par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sku dang gsungs dang/ thugs rnams srung ste/ sku srung ba ni/ tshon skud sna tshogs la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad por zhing lus la btags pa'o/ /yang na ngar ram/ shing shun nam/ grog la 'gi hang
283a3(rgyud 'grel): ngam gur kum la sogs pas bris na/ gzhan ngan byed thams cad dang/ glo bur gyi sdig pas mi tshugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyi bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
283a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas shAkya thub pa'i thugs ka nas sprul te/ gzi brjid dang ldan zhing/ stobs che ba/ nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du/ grags pa yang de bzhin no/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ cung zad khro bo/ zhal
283a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag mo/ spyan gsum pa/ zhabs phyed khyil du bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon sdig mdzub dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rgyan thams
283a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad grol bar byed pa'i rig sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ su mu su mu la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par
283a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ spyi bo gtsug nas sprul te/ rig sngags sku'i rang bzhin zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar po/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lngas dbu la brgyan pa/ spyan
283b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa phyag g.yas na 'khor lo/ g.yon pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od dang bcas shing/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan par lhag pa/ dgongs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ris
283b2(rgyud 'grel): drug gi sems can la dgongs te/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa gsod pa dang/ sreg pa dang/ rdeg pa dang/ dum bur btub pa dang/ tshig pa dang/ rengs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ yongs su thar
283b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal ni/ bya dang lce sbyang la sogs pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis/ de lta bu'i 'gro ba las thar bar byas shing/ gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /yi dags
283b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sdug bsngal ni btung ba dang bzang ba med pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ mthong ma thag tu zhe sdang gis gcig la gcig phrag dog byed cing 'thab rtsod byed pa'o/ /de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis btung ba dang bza' ba
283b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'o/ /lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal ni/ phrag dog gis spyod pa zhe sdang gi sems skyes te ser sna'i rang bzhin gyis 'dod pa la ma mthun nas/ de yang g.yul 'gyed pa'i sdug bsngal lo/ /de'i
283b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i spung gis 'joms pa'o/ /lha'i sdug bsngal ni/ 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal yin te/ byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bzad pa dang/ lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang de'i
283b7(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba'i pho ba tshor te/ dper na sngon gyi dus su lha'i bu dga' byed ces bya ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum nas mar la ltung ba tshor te/ gar 'pho ba tshor zhes na yul ba ra Na sir phag pa'i phrug gur skye bar tshor ro/ /de tshor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi
284a1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bu de yang du zhing/ lha'i me tog gaM lha'i rdzas la sogs pa la lta zhing yang nas yang du sdug bsngal skye'o/ /lus las kyang bri ma 'byung ste/ me tog de kun yang skams so/ /lha'i grog po rnams kyis bor te/ 'od kyang med do
284a2(rgyud 'grel): zhag bdun bar du lha'i longs spyod bor nas/ mi gtsang ba za'o snyam nas yang du sdug bsngal dran zhing du'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skyed mos tshal du rtse mo la 'ongs pas/ skad mi nyan pa thos te/ de nas de'i rtsar phyin nas de dag lha'i bu
284a3(rgyud 'grel): de la dris pa dang/ lha'i bus smras pa/ lha'i lha zhag bdun pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/ grong khyer ba ra NA sir bdag zhag bdun na phag pa'i phrug gur skye'o zhes smras so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dga' ba khyod kyis/ sangs
284a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba gyis shig/ des phan par 'ong ste/ gzhan gyi thabs ni med do zhes gsungs so/ /lha'i bu des de'i gdam ngag thos pa dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba nyin mtshan med du byas pa dang/ zhag
284a5(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyi nang par gnas gtsang ma'i lhar skyes so/ /lha'i longs spyod dang ldan zhing lha'i bu gser 'od ces bya bar skyes so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skyes mos tshal du lha'i longs spyod la 'ongs te/ lha'i bu de dran nas lha'i spyan?
284a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'dzam+bu'i gling du bltas pas/ der yang ma mthong ngo/ /dmyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ yi dags dang/ gzhan yang mi'i yul shar lus 'phags po dang/ ba lang spyod dang/ sgra mi snyan du bltas pa dang/ de rnams su yang ma
284a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ngo/ /de nas rang gi yul dang lha ma yin dang/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha'i yul dang/ ri bdun gyi lha la sogs pa rnams su bltas te/ de rnams na yang ma mthong ngo/ /de nas de rnams su yang nas yang du bltas kyang ma
284b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ste/ de ngo mtshar che bas/ lho'i 'dzam bu gling gis dbus su/ /grong khyer mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge bzhugs te/ de'i tshe lha'i dbang
284b2(rgyud 'grel): po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i me tog dang/ lha'i spos dang/ lha rdzas kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu dga' 
284b3(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba 'chi 'pho nas phag pa'i phrug gur skyer 'gro ba'i dus su/ ngas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin te/ de'i byin brlabs kyis gar skyes cha med pas/ bdag gis dbang tshad la bltas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
284b4(rgyud 'grel): ko'u shi ka khyod kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ khyod kyis longs spyod pa'i mtho ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gser 'od ces bya bar skyes so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rdzas kyi mchod pa yang nas yang du byas
284b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ yid ches shing ngo mtshar che bar yang nas yang du skyabs su 'gro bar byas so/ /de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal mos lha'i 'chi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal yang 'joms pa'o/ /mi'i sdug bsngal ni/ skye ba dang/ rgas pa dang/ na ba
284b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma'i gzi brjid dang/ stobs kyis/ 'di 'chang ba tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/
284b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rig drug gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'joms pa'i phyir na/ thugs rjes bskyab pa zhes bya'o/ /byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can la bu gcig pa lta bur byas nas/ de
285a1(rgyud 'grel): la bsnyen bkur byed cing/ 'tshe ba'i sems mi skye zhing/ khams gsum gyi sems can la de lta bu'i sems bzhag cing byams pa ste/ de bzhin du 'khor ba la gnas pa'i sems can la snying rjes khyab ste/ de'i 'dod
285a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems nye bar bzhag pa snying rje'o/ /dga' ba la gnas pa/ gtang snyoms la gnas pa'o/ /gshegs kyis zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la dga' ba ste/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can yar la thun pa dang/ mun pa mun nag bcom pas dga' 
285a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang/ bsgom zhing sems can thams cad la khyab par med pas na/ btang snyoms so/ /ye shes kyi mchog dang/ chos nyid kyi lha thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag pa'i ting nge
285a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rdo rje lta bu yin te/ gang la yod ces na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lta bu'o/ /de'i ye shes ni rig pa'i lha rnams yin te/ rig pa'i lha rnams ni gang zhe na/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang/ rma bya chen mo dang/ bsil
285a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshal dang/ so sor 'brang ma dang/ gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma rnams yin no/ /mtshon pa ni ye shes rnams yin no/ /mtshon byed ni rigs pa'i lha mo rnams so/ /so so'i ye shes ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes dang/ mnyam
285a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o/ /rigs ni rdo rje'i dang/ rin po che dang/ las dang/ de bzhin gshegs
285a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ pad+ma'i rigs so/ /phung po'i rnams shes dang/ tshor pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ gzugs dang/ 'du shes so/ /khams ni nam mkha' dang/ chu dang/ rlung dang/ sa dang/ me'o/ /skye mched ni/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lus dang mig
285b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lce'i rang bzhin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/ /zhal gsum gsum/ phyag drug drug/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ zhabs g.yas
285b2(rgyud 'grel): bskum pa/ g.yos brkyang ba/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i stan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'o/ /zhal rnams ni khro ba dang sgeg pa dang/ 'dzum pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ cung zad khro ba'o/ /sku mdog ni nag po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dkar po dang/
285b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o/ /g.yas pa'i zhal rnams ni/ dkar po dang/ mthing ka dang/ dkar ba'o/ /g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ni/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ mthing ga'o/ /dang po'i phyag gnyis na/ rdo rje 'dzin cing/ g.yon
285b4(rgyud 'grel): pa na dril bu dkur brten pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri ste gsum pa na mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis na/ sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste/ gsum pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du
285b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ste/ tshes nyid ni stong pa nyid do/ /lha mo ni dngos po'i rang bzhin thabs so/ /'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su
285b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ma 'di/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag mo/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig gis khams gsum tsam yang 'dar bar byed de/ 'byung po rnams kyi mi tshugs so/ /'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba grub ste/ gsang
285b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi tshig 'di grub na yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ tshe 'di la yang bkra shis te/ phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gang bsgrub par 'dod pa yang 'grub ste/
286a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs te the tshom med do/ /gang la ser sna rnams chags pa/ /rnam com dri ma sel mdzad cing zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal spang shing 'tshe bar mi byed pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes shar nas dri ma de
286a2(rgyud 'grel): yang spong byed pa/ gang yang grub ste the tshom med/ thugs bzhi gnod pa mi mnga' ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal spangs shing 'che bar mi byed pa ste/ de'i sems nye bar bzhag na/ rig sngags 'di ni 'grub ste/
286a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i sems med pas na/ phun sum tshogs shing bkra shis 'di 'grub bo/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud byed cing/ zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa yang dag par bstan pa ste/ mun pa mun nag la ye shes kyi mar
286a4(rgyud 'grel): me bstan pa'o/ mtho ris thar pa'i lam 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyis bsrungs pa 'di la ser sna la sogs pa gang yang med do/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di ni bstan pas na/ grub par
286a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ gnyis pa'i sems spangs shing gzhi dad pa'i sems kyis 'dir ni bkra shis te/ the tshom med do/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis bsten/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos
286a6(rgyud 'grel): pa skyes na/ byams pa dang/ snying rje sems ni rtag tu bzhag pa ste/ rig sngags 'di la gzhi dad pa bskyed na/ 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa'o/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
286a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdug bsngal 'di bor la dge ba'i sems ni yongs su bzung la/ bde ba yang dag thob ste/ gnyis pa'i sems ni mi 'dzin pa/ bkra shis 'di ni yang dag par thob pa'o/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di
286b1(rgyud 'grel): dag kun zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sems can la/ de'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ snying rjes ni thams cad la khyab ste/ mun pa'i mun nag bcom pa'o/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs nges/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba
286b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs drug ni mnyam par bzhag ste/ byams pa'i stobs kyi skyob pa'i sems gzhag nas/ rtag tu sems can la snying rje'i sems dang ldan na/ tshe 'di la bkra shis par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi rten
286b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cing/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba ni ma rig pa ste/ 'khor bar byed pa ni gti mug gis 'khor te/ gti mug gi steng du ser snas bcings te/ ser sna'i steng du zhe sdang byung ngo/ /zhe sdang la 'dod chags 'khor ro/ /de'i gting la ma rig pa'i snying rje skye
286b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ des na 'khor bar 'khor ba zhes btags pa'o/ /de rten pa gcod par byed pa ni/ rig pa ste/ rig pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so/ /ye shes de ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid yin te/ des 'khor ba rnams
286b5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'o/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du de la mnyen zhing grub pa ste/ gzhan la snying rje yang dag pa skye ste/ tshe 'di la bkra shis par 'gyur te/ yang dag par
286b6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'o/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba 'di la/ chos la the tshom med de/ lus dang ngag dang/ yid kyi the tshom med pa'i sems
286b7(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhag par gyur na/ chos kyi rtsa ba yang dag par thob pa'o/ /gsum gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ brdzun dang/ phra ma dang/ ngag 'khyal pa dang/ tshig tsub pa dang/ gzhan gyi
287a1(rgyud 'grel): rna bar mi snyan pa'i ngag mi smra ba'o/ /yang na ngag 'khyal pa spangs shing/ gzhan la dga' ba'i gtam byin te/ mi dge ba spangs shing dge ba 'di byas na/ tshe 'di la yang bkra shis par 'gyur/ dpa' bo chen po gang skyes
287a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ phun sum tshogs don 'byor 'gyur cing zhes bya ba ni/ bdud dang/ bdud kyis ris bcoms pa la/ chos skyong ba la ni dpa' ba' i sems dang/ brtson 'grus ni yang dag par skye ste/ de bzhin du/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/
287a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ de la de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ rig pa 'di yang 'grub ste/ don 'grub cing 'di la the tsom med
287a4(rgyud 'grel): de/ gang yang bkra shis 'di las 'byung ngo/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags 'tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i chos kyis nyams su myong ba thob pas na/ sa rnams thams cad g.yo zhing 'dar te/ de'i gzi brjid
287a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro// //sems can thams cad dga' ba ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags
287a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjes su 'dzin ma 'di sgrubs na/ dga' ba smos ci dgos te/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /bkra shis shing chos grub par 'gyur ba ste/ tshe 'di dang/ phyi ma la yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub snying por/ gang dag gis/ ma dag
287a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams drug g.yos gyur cing zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'dar ba ste/ de yang 'di grub pas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pas na/ sa ni de bzhin du g.yo ba'i phyir ro/ /bdud yid mi bder
287b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sa gzhi la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ /gti mug dang/ 'khor bar 'khor ba rnams yid mi dga' ste/ de yang de'i nus pas/ mi dga' ba rnams
287b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi bkra shis shing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i bden pa bdar te/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan bdun bskor
287b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ de yang gsum du 'dus te/ sku'i bden pa dang/ gsung gi bden pa dang/ thugs kyi bden pa dang/ de bzhin du 'dus pa'i ng bo la yin te/ de yang 'phags pa rnams kyi lam yin no/ /de yang bden pas na bkra shis par 'gyur te/ the
287b4(rgyud 'grel): tshom med do/ /'di la gang yang grub ba'o/ /thub pa'i mnyan pa gang byung des/ khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i chos yin te/ chos ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab ste/ 'di yis gzi
287b5(rgyud 'grel): brjid gang byed pa ni/ bkra shis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /yis 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing/ zhes bya ba ni/ lta ba mi cig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod de/ de rnams kyang/ rtag par
287b6(rgyud 'grel): lta ba dang/ chad par lta ba la ba sdu'o/ /de rnams gang du yang mi gnas shing/ chos kyi rang bzhin gsal la bzhag pa'o/ /de yis de 'dul bar byed pas na/ mu stegs kyi chos kyang pham par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kun ? du
287b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i nus pa dang/ gzi brjid kyi chos kyi nyams myong yang dag par skyes te/ de yis de kun 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gzi brjid kyis 'dir ni/ bkris
288a1(rgyud 'grel): shis shing phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin ltar bcas bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can la/ 'khor ba'i
288a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'i bde ba chen po skye bar byed pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mar me phye zhing bkra shis par byed de/ yang dag pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'o/ /de bzhin du lha'i sems can rnams kyang bkra shis
288a3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur te/ lha rnams kyis ltung ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /'byung po kun kyang bde legs ni/ khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ ltung ba med pas sems can la 'tshe ba med de/ 'di'i nus pas 'tshe bar mi
288a4(rgyud 'grel): byed cing/ rtag tu bza' ba dang/ btung ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bza' ba la lcags kyi thu lum du mthong ba rnams dang/ btung ba la zangs kyi khu bar mthong ba rnams dang/ de dag gis kyang rtag tu mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro//
288a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang/ lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis yin te/ bsod nams kyi tshogs ni shAkya thub pa bzhin du/ sngon gyi smon
288a6(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi stobs kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs ni ngo bo dang bral zhing/ ngag gi brjod du med pa'o/ /de gnyis gzi brjid kyis kyang/ bkra shis shing bde ba ste/ 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das
288a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no/ /khyed rnams 'dod don gang yin pa/ don de de ring grub gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis/ dngos grub thams cad grub ste/ lha dang/ mi
288b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams kyang 'di las don grub pa'o/ /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog ces bya ba ni/ mi dang bya dang lha dang 'byung po rkang gnyis pa la sogs pa ste/ 'dir ni bkra shis shing sdug
288b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal dang dbral ba'o/ /rkang bzhi ni/ byol song gi rigs las gyur pa dang/ yi dags dang 'byung po dang/ lha rnams yin te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ de bzhin du bkra shis pa'o/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'di
288b3(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang bde legs shog /ces bya ba ni/ gang yang lha dang mi dang/ 'byung po la sogs pa 'gro ba'i/ dus su yang bkra shis te/ phyir ldog pa'i dus su yang bkra shis pa'i phyir ro/ /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ nyi ma'i
288b4(rgyud 'grel): gung la bde legs shog ces bya ba ni/ nad rnams med cing sdug bsngal dang bral ba ste/ rmi lam ngan pa ste/ ltas ngan pa dang rnams min mthong zhing/ srog dang mi 'bral bar bde zhing bkra shis te/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /khyed chag
288b5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyang bkra shis shing bde ba ste/ rig sngags 'di yang grub pa'o/ /sdig pa
288b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang bral zhing/ sngon gyi dus dang/ da ltar dang/ shes pa dang/ mi shes pa 'joms pa'o/ /sems can kun dang srog chags kun ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dang/
288b7(rgyud 'grel): srog chags bde bar 'gyur zhing/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi sems can yang de bzhin no/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ 'byung
289a1(rgyud 'grel): po ni sngon gyi las kyis deb cung zad kyang med pa dang/ bde ba bag tsam yod pa dang/ mchod par 'os pa ste/ de bzhin du khyed cag kun kyang/ sems can mi gtogs te/ de bzhin du rab 'bring tha ma gsum gnas te/ de kun
289a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang bkris shing bde bar gnas te/ yang dag pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ 'di la nad rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ nad rnams thams cad
289a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom zhing/ bde ba 'ba' zhig la gnas te/ yang na bde ba yang dang yang du thob pa'o/ /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ sngon du byas pa dang/ da ltar byas pa'i sdig pa ci byas kyang/ 'dir ni mthol lo
289a4(rgyud 'grel): bshags so/ /zhes bya ba ni 'gyur po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing/ sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos 'di la yang byon zhing/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed
289a5(rgyud 'grel): do/ de bzhin du gang dang gang la gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ byams pa dang/
289a6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms la 'god pa ste/ gzhan dang byang chub kyi snying po dang/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du/ shel bzhin du gsal ba ste/ bag chags dang shes bya'i dri mas ma gos pa/ yang
289a7(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'dis gsungs pa/ gang dang gang du yang 'jig rten gyi khams la spyod cing dar bar shog cig ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'o/ /grong khyer yangs pa can la/
289b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i gnas skabs te/ gnyis pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can la 'jug pa'i de nas so/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan dang po'i lha rnams dang bcas
289b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams byung ste/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa mdun na'ang na dang/ tshangs la nye phan dang/ tshangs pa chen po dang bzhi'o/ /de ni bsam gtan dang po'o/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i lha rnams byung ste/ 'od chung dang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang
289b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo/ /de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang byung ste/ dge chung dang/ tshad med dge dang/ dge rgyas so/ /de ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyang gnas te/ sprin med dang/
289b4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che ba'o/ /de gsum ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o/ /de yang de'i gnas su 'du shes med pa'i lha gnas so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyang byung ste/ de yang mi mchi ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ shin tu
289b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dang/ 'og min dang lnga'o/ /de yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la gtogs te/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
289b6(rgyud 'grel): pas dbu byas shing phyogs gcig tu bsdad pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ sum cu
289b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshol mnga' 'dzin dang/ gnya' shing 'dzin dang/ phreng thogs kyi lha rnams
290a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha dang/ /shar phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ lho phyogs kyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang/ nub phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang/ byang
290a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi rgyal po lus ngan po la sogs pas dbu mdzad pa dang/ thabs gcig tu'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po dang/ zla ba dang/ chu lha la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang/ thabs
290a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig cu'o/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ zhes bya ba ni/ rnga rtsen dang/ 'phrog ma'i bu dga' byed la sogs pa brgya dang ngo/ /'phrog ma'i mdza' rtag
290a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la sogs pa brgya dang ngo/ /'phrog ma'i dbu dbu ma/ khyab 'jug len la sogs pa brgya dang ngo/ /'phrog ma'i bu gang ba dang 'og la sogs pa brgya dang ngo/ /'phrog ma'i bu skye dgu dag la sogs pa brgya ste lnga brgya dang
290a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa thabs gcig go /nag po dang/ nag mo dang/ grul bum dang/ dung la sogs pa so so'i 'khor dang bcas te/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi a 'bras kyi tshal na so so'i kha dog bstan cing rdzu 'phrul yang de bzhin no/ /bcom
290a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ lan gsum du bskor ba bya ba nas/ lha so so'i mchod rdzas bla na med pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i mdun
290a7(rgyud 'grel): du thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'o/ /phyogs gcig la bod? ste zhes bya ba ni/ so sor mi smra zhing mgrin pa gcig gis smas pa'o/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po yin
290b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ stong spyi phud kyi bdag po 'khor de rnams kyi dbu byas shing bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gus par byas shing/ /bcom ldan 'das
290b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdun du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis phyogs gcig tu smos te/ phyogs gcig tu skad cig tu tshangs pas smras pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyi
290b3(rgyud 'grel): khams dang/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ bgegs kyi bdag po rnams yin te/ de bzhin bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so zhes pa'o/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi pa stong/ bsam
290b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan gsum pa stong/ bsam gtan gnyis pa stong/ bsam gtan dang po stong/ de bzhin du so sor bsgrang ba stong stong brtsi ste/ de ni gzugs kyi khams kyi rtsi lugs so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong/ 'thab bral stong/ sum cu rtsa gsum
290b5(rgyud 'grel): stong/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi stong rim pa bzhin du lha'i ris drug ni 'dod pa'i khams la de bzhin du stong stong brtsi bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ri rab kyang yin te/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ skar ma la sogs pa'o/ /shar gyi lus 'phags stong/
290b6(rgyud 'grel): lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong/ nub kyi ba lang spyod stong/ byang gi sgra mi snyan stong/ de bzhin du tsha ba'i dmyal ba dang/ grangs pa'i dmyal ba dang/ dung 'gro dang/ yi dags rnams yin te/ de ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi stong rtsi lugs so/ /gzugs med
290b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi khams kyang de bzhin du yin no/ /dbang phyug chen po la dbang bgyid pa lags te zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi khams la dbang mdzad pa'o/ /yang na de ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yin te/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen
291a1(rgyud 'grel): po dbang sdud mdzad pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'tshal na/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ tshangs pas dbu mdzad cing lha dang/ 'byung po rnams kyis kyang phan par byed pa dang/ gnod par
291a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i des tshigs bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdang tshig zhus pa'o/ /srung bar bgyid ces pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /yongs su skyob par bgyid/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so zhes
291a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni bkra shis shing/ sems can thams cad la bde bar gnas par byas pa'o/ /btsun pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs shing/ tshul khrims la sogs pa srungs te/ sems can thams cad kyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o/
291a4(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba ni/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pas ma gos te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi gos shing/ lus dang ngag dang/ yid bde ba ste/ de bzhin du gti mug dang/ zhe
291a5(rgyud 'grel): sdang dang/ 'dod chags dang/ ser sna dang/ phrag dog rnams kyis mi tshugs shing bde bar gshegs te/ lus pa med pas na bde bar gshegs pa ste/ chos rang bzhin ni dngos po med cing rnyeg pa med pa ste/ rang bzhin med cing/
291a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag chad gnyis dang bral te/ brjod pas kyang mi khyab pa ste/ nam mkha' bzhin du sems can thams cad la khyab pas na/ dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams
291a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom bskal pa dang ldan pa ste/ ri rab la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di stong stong brtse ste/ de ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yin no/ /de bzhin du nyis
291b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur du rtsis pa ni stong bar ma'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ de de'i sum 'gyur du brtsis pa ni stong gsum mo/ /chen po ni sems can thams cad bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ni/ mnyam por
291b2(rgyud 'grel): gzigs shing mnyam por brten te/ dge sdig la sogs pa gnas shing sems can gnas pa'o/ /de la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ sems can ris mi gcig pa'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /yang na sems can gyi don la
291b3(rgyud 'grel): der dbang mdzad de/ theg pa sna tshogs bstan cing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o/ /de ni tshangs pa'i tshigs go /bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na/ zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms bsgom zhing
291b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su zhes bya ba ni/ sprul pa'i skus kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis kyang/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa
291b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad pa lags na zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu la yang 'gro ba yang srung ste/ mtho ris kyi lam bstan pa'o/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ 'jig rten dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi
291b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba dang/ ngan song gsum las than par byed pa'o/ /mi dge ba bcu la 'gro ba yang bzung ste/ de las bzlog nas dge ba bcu las 'jug pa'o/ /dper na shing skam po 'gugs te/ khengs pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyis 'gugs pa bzhin du
291b7(rgyud 'grel): khengs pa khro bo'i rigs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid kyis kyang 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /yang na zhi ba ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi byin brlabs kyis zhi bar byed pa'o/ /sdug bsngal dang bral zhing/ bde ba la
292a1(rgyud 'grel): bkod de/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o/ /yang na 'jig rten gyi khams lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid bde zhing phun sum tshogs te/ yi dags rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /mdzad lags na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan
292a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das la tshangs pas yang nas yang du zhus pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ lan gcig sngon du zhugs te/ lan gnyis pa ni/ da ltar zhus te/ phyi ma yang zhus pa'o/ /lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum du/ tshangs pa rnams
292a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi yang dang yang du zhes pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ de nas ni tshangs pas smras pa'i de nas so/ /sems can rnams la dmigs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
292a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma zhal nas byung lte/ maM gi yi ge'i rang bzhin las nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'phros pas/ /'gro ba ris drug gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral ba dang/
292a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa/ ngo bo dang bral zhing gang gis brjod du med pa de ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas byung ngo/ /zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dmar mo//
292a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu'i cha byad can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu can dang bcas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ba/ rgyab ser po'o/ /phyag dang po'aM g.yas g.yon gnyis na chos kyi rgyal po'i
292a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyi byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa g.yas pa'i tha mas mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yon pas skyabs sbyin gyi phyag
292b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /zhabs pad+mar skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ shes rab kyi ngo bo ni so sor tog pa'i ye shes thabs kyi ngo bo yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /'du shes kyi phung por pad+ma gsung gi rigs me'i khams ro'i skye mched do/ /pad+ma dang/ zla ba'i
292b2(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs pa 'di? nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor dang bcas shing/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dang bcas nas byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung zhing sems can gyi
292b3(rgyud 'grel): don la tshangs pa la sogs pas zhus pa la ting nge 'dzin gnang pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnang ba de nas so/ /mi mjed kyi bdag pa tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung pas gnas pa rig nas/ de nyid
292b4(rgyud 'grel): du mi snang bar ? to zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs pas mngon par shes pas ting nge 'dzin gyis gnad par shes so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni tshangs pas mngon par shes pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ? zhes
292b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang/ gzhan yang dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen pa dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ de la sogs pa mi dang/ lha dang lha ma yin dang/ 'byung po mang po
292b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba'i 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ges bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams kyi lha gnas rigs bcu bdun dang ngo/ /lha'i ?
292b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams sum cu rtsa gsum nas yang la bsgrangs pa lnga dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnam dang bcas pa/
293a1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas mar la bsgrangs ba dang lha ma yin dang/ gser gyi ri bdun phreng thogs kyi lha rnams la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu rnams dang thabs gcig go/ rgyal po bzhi ni ri rab kyi lcog la gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po nyi
293a2(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa brgyad dang/ 'brog ma bu dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa drug dpon re re dang bcas pa stong phrag brgyad cu lha'i gdon la sogs pa re re yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o/ /de rnams dang
293a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs gcig tu'o/ /dag la ba der 'ongs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag pos nga la 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags kyi tshig smras so zhes pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po
293a4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la lan gcig lan gnyis/ lan gsum zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bshad pa'o/ /mnga' mdzad pa lags te zhes bya ba ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
293a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bzheng nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pas yang nas yang du zhus pa'i tshig dge slong rnams la smras pa/ lan gsum zhus pa'o zhes smras pa'o/ /bde legs su
293a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes gsol to/ /zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don la sprul pa dang/ bde legs su gyur cig ces pa'o/ /dge slong ngag ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo zhes bya ba ni/
293a7(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems can don la/ skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rig sngags 'bros pas 'gro ba rigs drug gi don mdzad pa'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas cang mi gsung bas
293b1(rgyud 'grel): gnang bar rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i de nas te/ de mngon par shes nas tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang/ de rig par shes pa'o/ /dge slong dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su
293b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa 'di zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi nges tshig smras te/ rigs ni shes rab ste/ sngags ni thabs so/ /rgyal mo ni bdud rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ 'khor ba rnams 'joms pa'o gsang ba ni stong pa nyid yin te/ khyab che ba
293b3(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang gis kyang smra bar mi nus te/ ngo bo rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mi dmigs pa ste gsang ba'o/ /sngags ni skyob pa/ srung ba/ ma man+t+ra'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma lta bu/ chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma
293b4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
293b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang sngags ni thams cad la khyab ste sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin
293b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o/ rjes su 'dzin pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyas btab ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ lha dang/ mi la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin te/ de'i ye shes kyi lam gyis/ thun
293b7(rgyud 'grel): mong dang/ thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni/
294a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gaM gA glung gi bye ma snyed kyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mar me mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o/ /rjes su yi rang ste 'di'i lam nas sangs rgyas pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
294a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsungs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ ma 'ongs pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das byams pa la sogs pa yin te/ de bzhin du de'i lam nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob  
294a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /da ltar byung na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar rang nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'di'i tshe 'di la sems can gyi don la/ shAkya seng ges kyang gsungs shing
294a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang ste/ 'di'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pas rig sngags zhu ba'i gnas skabs te gsum pa'o/ /rig sngags
294a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi nges tshig gi rtags dang po rdzogs so// //de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar zhugs pas gsungs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ zhes
294a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di zung zhig ces gsungs nas/ kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gtang pa'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/ /gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'di
294a7(rgyud 'grel): zung zhig ces bya ba ni sku gsum gyi rang bzhin la sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig gis/ ma rig pa'i mun pa gsal te/ srid pa gsum yang 'joms pa/ sku gsung thug kyis bzung nas/ /sems can
294b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi don mdzad do zhes pa'o/ /chongs shig lhogs shig/ shod cig /kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ nga'i bka' las ma 'das par byas shing/ sems can gyi don la nga mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ gsungs shig rjes su yi rang
294b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing sems can thams cad la ston cig ces bya ba'o/ /yang na da ltar khyod kyis de ltar bzung nas sems can gyi don la tshig bzung bar gyis shig ces pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsung
294b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ ngan song gsum 'joms pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa/ 'khor ba nas log pa dang/ sdug
294b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bde bar reg par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ med pa yod par byed de/ yod pa rnams kyang med par byed pa'o/ /bkra mi shis pa bkra shis
294b5(rgyud 'grel): par te/ brjed pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed de/ shes rab chung ba rnams kyang shes rab dang ldan pa/ 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi 'jigs pa'o/ /tshe thung ba rnams kyang tshe ring bar byed de/ nad thams cad 'joms shing/ mi bde ba yang bde bar byed
294b6(rgyud 'grel): de/ ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis/ dge ba dang/ chos byed du mi gter ba'i gdon rnams 'joms shing/ tshig tu brjod pa tsam gyis kyang/ lha dang/ lha khang dang/ khyim dang/ po ti dang/ glegs bam dang/ lugs sku la sogs pa rab tu gnas
294b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'khor bzhi la sogs pa la bar chod med cing bde bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'di'i tshig ni/ pad+ma'i rigs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed mi rig sngags
295a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'o/ /phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /sa'i khams ni mig gi skye mched/ ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum/ sku mdog dkar po/ zhal gsum
295a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag drug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas mthing ka g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ ral gri dang/ be con dang/ 'khor lo rnams so/ /g.yon pa gsum na rin po che dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu rnams so//
295a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pas pad+ma'i steng na/ zla ba'i mtshan nyid nyi me'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig 'di lta ste/ u bu d+he/ ni bu d+he zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom
295a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal to/ /yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags stobs dang/ mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgyar gnas pas kyang/ 'di nas bsrungs na/ bskyab pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur
295a5(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhan du yang dag par gsung bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so/ zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par
295a6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ kun skyob dang/ log par dang sel dang gser thub dang/ 'od srungs rnams yin te/ de la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brgya phrag gi gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'o/ ma 'ongs pa'i
295a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rin chen zla ba dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ chos 'byung ba dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ zhal
295b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gzigs pa'i utpa la dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la sogs pas dbu mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas te/ de rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba na yang/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
295b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba ris drug gi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ mi bde bde bar byed pa'i phyir da ltar byang chub sgrub pa'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa gsungs pa'o/ /des
295b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can rnams bsrung bar byas ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad dang/ bdag ces bya ba srung bar
295b4(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing gus par byed pa gang yin pa la/ tshe 'di la yang srung ste/ de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang yin no/ /mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni/ mi nad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ ma rungs pa'i nad byung na/ yul 'khor mtshams gcad par bya ste/
295b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi phur pa la bris nas/ phyogs mtshams su btags te/ dbus su gcig gdab po/ /tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing/ rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang dag par bzhes te/ de bzhin du phyogs mtshams
295b6(rgyud 'grel): su gang ba'i bum pa bzhag nas/ chu de yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas gtor bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas nas/ phyugs nad dang/ mi nad dang/ ma rungs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon du byung ba rnams kyang
295b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'byung ste/ phyi nas 'ong ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun can mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba ni/ ring na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad du mtshams bcad do/ /gal te phyed tshun chad do/ /tha ma la rang gi yul
296a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tsam mo/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa'i rdzas dang/ sngags kyis kyang mtshams gcad par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams
296a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ yul de bkra shis par 'gyur te/ nad rnams kyis mi tshugs shing/ lo legs te ser ba la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi
296a3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i rigs ma/ mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /phung po ni tshor ba'i phung po/ /chu'i khams sna'i skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ sku
296a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser mo/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhal g.yas dkar po g.yon dmar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ bar ma na rin po che/ tha ma na be con no/ /g.yon pa'i bar ma na/ dgra sta/
296a5(rgyud 'grel): tha man zhags pa'o/ zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ gzhon nu'i cha byad can la/ sgeg mo'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ sa mu tsa/ pi nu? ?
296a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' po zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang/ mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor mtshams gcod pa dang/
296a7(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams bcom pa dang/ 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar du yang/ yongs su khyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa gang yang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma yang bde ba thobs cing yang dag
296b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa nyi ma phyag mtshan dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ rgya
296b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya'i gaM gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang
296b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad
296b4(rgyud 'grel): do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing yang dag par gsungs pa'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i lam
296b5(rgyud 'grel): nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing/ gus pas mchod par bya ste/ tshangs pas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags
296b6(rgyud 'grel): chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di bzung na ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob ste/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/
296b7(rgyud 'grel): smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de bzhin du 'di yi lam nas sa bcu'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /ji ltar bstan pa dang ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du shes sam/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin du bstan te/
297a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyi mi khyab cing/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bzhin du sems can la khyab pa'o/ /nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la yang ma lus par chos kyi khyab pa'o/ /ye shes kyi spyan gyi rnam par gzigs
297a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ de ltas pa'i phyir na shes par grags pa'o/ /mthong ngam las byed pa'i de la ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar/ srung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes med
297a3(rgyud 'grel): par ye shes thob cing/ dper na mun pa'i nang me mar btang ba bzhin du bstan te/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing 'jig rten 'di la yang bsrung zhing skyob ste/ shing ljon pa la nyi ma shar ba'i dus su sems can der song ba rnams bsil bar byed de/
297a4(rgyud 'grel): ji srid ma shi'i bar du/ nad dang 'bral zhing dpal dang ldan te/ mya ngan la sogs pa bor zhing bde ba la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang chos 'di dran zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
297a5(rgyud 'grel): stsal ba'o/ /'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ mar me mdzad dang/ byams pa dang/ shAkya thub pa la sogs pas kyang gsungs te/ rjes su yi rang zhing rig
297a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ 'di 'dzin par byed pa gang yang
297a7(rgyud 'grel): rung ba la/ srung zhing yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas yang de bzhin te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni gong du
297b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa bzhin du/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs yin te/ sems can de yang ma shi'i bar du bde zhing/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams bcad do zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs ba'i gdon rnams yi ge la bris la mnan par bya ste/ de'i steng du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i
297b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'di bris la bum pa chen po byas te/ rab tu gnas pa byas nas/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bris nas/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo la btags te/ de mthong ba tsam gyis kyang gden sa dug pa can rnams kyis 'od mi nus so/ /ring na rgyang grags
297b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig ste/ bar ma la rgyang grags phyed/ thung ba la yul 'khor tsam mo/ /shar phyogs mtshams gcad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du phyogs mtshams la rig sngags bris pa mchod rten gyi rtse mor gdags par bya'o//
297b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byas na 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi lam dang/ lam ma yin pa na gnas pa bzhi yod de zhes
297b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i lam ni yul 'khor srung gis lam nas gnas pa dang/ 'phags skyes po'i lam nas gnas pa dang/ spyan mi bzang gi lam nas gnas pa dang/ lus ngan po'i lam nas gnas pa dang/ de bzhi yang/ sku mdog dkar
297b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu ste/ de bzhin du phyag mtshan ni/ 'khor lo dang/ dbyug thod dang/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang/ ral gri ste/ de yang phyag g.yas pa rnams na rim pa bzhin du'o/ /pi wang dang rin po che ste/ pad+ma dang bum
297b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams ni/ phyag g.yon pa rnams na bsnams pa'o/ /glang po che dang/ rus sbal dang/ chu srin dang/ seng ge rnams yin te/ de rnams kyi don zhes bya'o/ /yang na rgyal po bzhi'i lam ni/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis srung ba'o/ /lam
298a1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams kyi bu yin te/ de bzhis kyang rgyal bran dang/ 'khor ba la sogs pa bskul zhing/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas so/ /de dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ shar dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/
298a2(rgyud 'grel): byang dang rnams gnod pa skyel te/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu yang de bzhi la 'dus pa'o/ /de ni 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan dang/ kun shes dang/ gang po dang/ dga' ba'i dpal rnams te/ zhes bya ba ni/ nag po dang/ ljang nag dang/
298a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar nag dang/ thal ba'i mdog rnams yin te/ de'i gzugs kyang rim pa bzhin du bshad de/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ spre'u dang/ byi la'o/ /phyag mtshan yang/ gtun shing dang/ 'byug tho dang/ mdung dang/ ral gri'o/ /de ni g.yas
298a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams yin te/ g.yon pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon pa de yang gzugs ji bzhin du zhon pa yang de bzhin no/ /gang de dag gi mi shes pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i sngags
298a5(rgyud 'grel): 'don cing/ de ngo bos 'dzin par shes na/ rgyal po rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i 'khor gyis nad btab pa bzhin du/ de rnams kyis kyang nad pha la nad kyis btab pa'o/ /rgyal
298a6(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi 'khor dang/ g.yog rnams kyis kyang mi nus pa'o/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi chom rkun rnams kyang mi 'byung ste/ gal
298a7(rgyud 'grel): te 'od bar gyur na/ nor mi rnyed cing long par 'gyur ro/ /me'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bsrung ba'i gzi brjid kyis grong tsam la yang mi tshugs so/ /chu'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i nang na rdzings chen po la
298b1(rgyud 'grel): yod par gyur na/ ga ra btang na yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang/ mi rgod la sogs pa yin te/ de'i nyes pas kyang 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ste/ mi rgod kyi nang du 'gro yang mi choms so/ /ya na de kun dang phrad par
298b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni lha'i gdon rnams yin te/ de la sogs pa gdon phran tshegs ngan byed la sogs pa yod de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ba'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba
298b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsungs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i bu pho lag myur zhes bya ba/ grong khyer khor yug tu ces bya ba na gnas pa yod de zhes bya ba ni/ stobs che zhing gzi brjid che ba/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon/ sems
298b4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa/ sku mdog mthing nag /zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa ste/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje be con 'dzin cing/ g.yon pa na sdig mdzub dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin du grong khyer yang rin po che sna bdun las
298b5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang po 'du zhing nges sde dpon mdzad pa'o/ gang de'i ming shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin de rnams 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams kyis kyang de la
298b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar byas so/ /de srung bar byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang/ rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa'i dam las ma 'das na/ grogs byed cing/ dpal dang ldan par byed do/ /yongs su skyob par byed/ yongs su 'dzin par byed/ chad pa bzlog par
298b7(rgyud 'grel): byed/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar byed ces bya ba ni/ phun sum tshogs par byed de/ de'i byin brlabs kyis/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa'i las thob cing/ nad thams cad las thar zhing/ bkra shis par gnas ba'o/ /ming 'di zhes bya
299a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje'i bu po lag myur las lo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du byas te/ bu de yang gnod sbyin la bcol bar gyur na/ byis pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs te/ gzhan rnams
299a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ci smos te/ tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang/ dus ma yin pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral zhing/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol ba 'debs so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rjes su mthun pa'i gtor ma dang/ spos dang/ zhal
299a3(rgyud 'grel): zas la sogs pa/ mngar gsum dkar gsum la sogs pa byin nas gsol ba yang nas yang du gsol lo/ /de bzhin byas nas mngon sum du skad cig mas 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs
299a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bkas/ gang ming 'di zhes bya ba skabs tshol ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams ni sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te/ ma 'ongs
299a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni byams pa la sogs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o da ltar yod pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa yin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'di la sus gus par byas na/ 'di 'cha?
299a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ klog pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa byas na/ sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang byin gyis rlabs shing/ nad rnams med cing bde bar 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis kyang glags tshol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ming 'di zhes
299a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad dang/ gang zag bdag rnams yin te/ glags lta ba'i gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am yi dags sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum 'am/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po rnams kyis bdag la glags rnyed
299b1(rgyud 'grel): par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la gnod par byed 'dod pa'i yi dags rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'di srung bas mi tshugs te/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon bzhin mi sdug pa/ bsam gyis mi byab pa/ bsam pa ngan pa de rnams kyis kyang
299b2(rgyud 'grel): mi tshugs shing sems can thams cad dang/ gang zag de la gnod par mi byed de/ de bzhin du srin po dang/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po rnams kyis kyang gnod par mi byed do/ /glags tshol bas kyang glags mi
299b3(rgyud 'grel): rnyed do/ /bdag dang klan ka rnyed par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad la klan ka ci smos te/ rtsar nye bar yang mi nus so/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ sems can gyi don
299b4(rgyud 'grel): la yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bcu bzhi yod do zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang/ kha dog dang ldan pa ste/ lha dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la rtsod par nus pa sha stag go /de dag ni byang
299b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' yum gyis lhums na bzhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir yin zhe na/ rig sngags 'di'i lam nas yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur te/ bslab
299b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ slob pa yod pa de yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu yin te/ dang po ma rig pa'i mun pas bkab nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ de yang de bsal nas/ rin po che shel bzhin du phyi nang med bar gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dang/ sangs rgyas
299b7(rgyud 'grel): la yang gnyis su med cing so so ma yin te/ sems can gyis sangs rgyas grub pa yang byang chub kyi sems yod pas 'grub ste/ sems can la yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes grags so/ /'o na sems med pa'i bem po rnams sangs rgyas te/ de'i
300a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi ngan sems can dang/ sangs rgyas gnyis su med pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i lhums na bzhugs pa la srung ba zhes bya'o/ /bltams pa'i tshe yang srung/ bltams zin pa'i 'og tu yang srung zhes
300a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ skye ba'i bar yang bde ba ste/ skyes nas kyang bde ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus par byed na/ tshe ring zhing gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sku 'khrungs na yang srung ste zhes bya ba ni/ tshe la bar chod med cing/ 'chib
300a3(rgyud 'grel): la ma thug gi bar du bde byas shing srung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu bzhi gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni de'i sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan ni nag mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dkar mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ dmar ser dang/ dkar
300a4(rgyud 'grel): ser dang/ ljang nag dang/ mthing nag dang/ thal ba'i mdog dang/ dkar po/ dmar po/ ser po'o/ /phyag mtshan ni 'khor lo dang/ gshol dang/ /tun shing dang/ mdung dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ shak+ti dang/ to ma ra dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/
300a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum dang/ rdo rje dang/ kha? TwAM ga dang/ ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /bcu bzhi ni 'di sha stag go /'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ stobs ldan ma la sogs pa'o/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ ming gong du bstan te/ rus shes pa de la
300a6(rgyud 'grel): ni de dag srung bar byed ces bya ba ni/ sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan dang/ mtshan nyid shes pa'o/ /yongs su skyob par byed la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ nad med cing bde ba ste/ /bar chod kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba
300a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rig sngags kyi tshig bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsungs pa'o/ /srin so chen mo brgyad yod do zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan pa ste/ longs spyod dang ldan zhing/ lha dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'khrug pa la yang
300b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsod par nus pa'o/ /de dag ni/ skyes pa dang/ bud med gnyid log kyang rung/ gnyid ma log kyang rung ste/ gzi brjid 'phrog par byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la 'tsho bar byed cing/ klags tshol te/ sdang ba'i sems dang/ drag shul gyi sems dang/ sdig
300b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dang ldan zhing/ srog gcod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs bstan pa dang/ kha dog ni/ ljang nag dang/ sngon po dang/ nag khra dang/ stag ris dang/ mthing ka dang/ nag po dang/
300b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar nag dang/ thal ba'i mdog dang/ dbyibs ni/ khyi dang/ wa dang/ spyang gu dang/ stag dang/ phag dang/ 'ug pa dang/ pho rog dang/ ra dang ngo/ /phyag mtshan ni/ ro dang/ thal ba dang/ zhags pa dang/ sprul gyi zhags pa dang/ me 'gal dang/ hom khud
300b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ snying dang/ thod pa'o/ /'di dag ni mi srun zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ brgyad pa'i grangs dang/ mi bstan te/ de ni ra la sogs pa'o/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de la
300b5(rgyud 'grel): ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i stobs dang/ gzi brjid dang/ mthu rnams kyis kyang srungs te/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing srungs te/ 'on kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis ming rus shes
300b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o/ /de dag srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pas ni/ gnod par mi nus shing/ bde ba la bkod de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can rnams la/ sdig can rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi byed cing/ nad thams cad dang
300b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bral bar byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dang yang du bstan pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo bdun yod de zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing/
301a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ldan te/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la yang rtsod par nus pa'o/ /de dag ni khrag gi dri ma nam na dpag tshad lnga brgyad rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gang na yod pa'i sha khrag tshong ga de bzhin du skad cig
301a2(rgyud 'grel): mas len nus te/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs bstan te/ de'i kha dog ni/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ sngon mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ nag mo dang/
301a3(rgyud 'grel): mthing ka ste/ gzugs ni khro bo dang ldan pa ste/ skra ser po gyen du 'bar zhing/ drag po'i tshul du yod de/ zhags pa 'dzin pa sha stag go /'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ bdun pa'i grangs dang/ ming bstan pa ste/ gzi brjid mchog dang zhes bya ba
301a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o// //gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ sring mo bdun gyi ming dang/ rus ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi shes par 'gyur te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyis dka' 
301a5(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da' o/ /zhes srung bar byed zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rig sngags stobs kyis/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ phyugs rnams kyang 'phel te/ de bzhin du bum pa rnams kyang yin no/ /nad med cing 'byung po rnams kyi 'tshe ba yang
301a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung ngo/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/ /sring mo chen mo nag mo zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang sgul nus pa ste/ de'i
301a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs dang/ kha dog la sogs pa ni/ ming dang mthun te/ phyag mtshan ni/ gri gug dang/ thod pa bsnams shing/ ral pa ring po gcig tu 'khyil ba yod do/ /mi srung zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /bu stong
301b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ ma bzhin du bu rnams kyang yin te/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing zas 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ laM ka'i lho phyogs na rgya mtsho'i 'gram na tshal zhig na gnas pa'o/ /mtshan gcig gis dpag
301b2(rgyud 'grel): tshad brgyad khrir phyin pa zhig yod do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sha dang/ khrag yod pa'i sar gnas nas kyang tshor nas/ bslangs nas khyer nus pa ste/ de bzhin du sha dang/ khrag gi phyir sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /sha khrag 'thung shing srog
301b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog pa'o/ /gang de'i ming shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de la ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ ming dang rus shes par 'gyur te/ de'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de rnams kyis
301b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang gnod mi nus shing/ 'thab rtsod yod na nam yang rgyal bar byed cing grogs kyang byed pa'o/ /de bsrung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'tshe bar mi nus shing snying rje dang ldan te/ gang
301b5(rgyud 'grel): gi yang sdug bsngal dang 'bral zhing bde bar byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/ /srin mo chen mo lnga zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ kha dog dang
301b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing grags pa che ba/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing/ snying rje che ba ste/ skad cig mas 'dzam bu'i gling du/ sems can gyi don la skor nus pa'o/ /gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang/ lhan cig 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams srung
301b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing skyob pa yod de zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos sras kyi chos rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la srung ba dang/ skyob par byed de/ sems can gyi don la gnas shing/ gzhan sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la mi
302a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug cing/ sems can gyi don 'ba' zhig la gnas pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni/ gtso bor gyur pa lnga yin te/ de dag gi kha dog dang/ dbyibs ni/ kha dog legs shing 'dzum bstan pa ste/ rtag tu
302a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar gnas pa'o/ /de'i sku mdog ni/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ sngo bsangs dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /phyag mtshan ni/ 'khor lo dang/ dung dang/ dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum dang/ ral gri dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ zhes
302a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ lnga po 'di dag la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin yin te/ rtag tu myos dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi jo bo ni de rnams yin no/ /gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de la ni zhes
302a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ ming dang/ rus kyang shes te/ rig sngags kyi mthus/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' o/ /de dag srung bar byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sems can de yang bde bar gnas
302a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ nad med cing/ de rnams kyis rtag tu skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gzhin du lo mi rtag pa ma yin te/ de la bcol bar 'gyur na tshe ring zhing nad med de/ gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os pa'o/ /bdag gi
302a6(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir srin mo/ /lnga po gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang bcas pa de dag la gsol lo zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad 'di la bcol bar byas na/ gang yang sdug bsngal dang
302a7(rgyud 'grel): bral zhing bde bar gnas so/ /gsol ba 'debs so zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis kyang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo de dag dang/ gnod sbyin de rnams la gus par byas
302b1(rgyud 'grel): shing mchod par bya'o/ /'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas/ ming 'di zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa ni mar me mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa rnams yin te/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni
302b2(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pas rig sngags kyi bka' 'di gsungs shing/ sems can gang zag rnams la bsrung shing skyob pa'o/ /bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'khor ba bcom zhing
302b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'god pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs yin te/ mtshon pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po/ khams ni me'i
302b4(rgyud 'grel): khams/ skye mched ni ro/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ /zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon mthing ka/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na bsnams
302b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ ral gri dang/ pad+ma dang/ dung bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na zhags pa dang/ lcag kyu dang/ rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang pa/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas shing/ cung zad khro bo'i
302b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ pi mu ku te/ bi mu ku ta/ ba te la sogs pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang sems can gyi don la/ bcom ldan kyis bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang
302b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin te/ rdo rje lta bus khyab cing/ srung ba dang/ skyob pa yang yin no/ /'di lta bu'i rig sngags kyis kyang phyogs mtshams thams cad du khyab pa'o/
303a1(rgyud 'grel): gang la srung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa nyid du ltas shing srung ba'o/ /sba ba byas pa dang zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags cho ga du gsang ba ste/ 'jig rten khams kyi sems can thams cad gsang
303a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bsrung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi gzhan gyis mi tshor zhing sangs rgyas pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba byas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ngan song gsum nas bton nas mtho rigs su btang ste/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug
303a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal las bskyab pa'i phyir na/ bskyabs pa zhes bya ste/ mtho ris su btang nas na bzung ba'o/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ chos 'di'i nyams myong gis zhi ba ste/ ji ltar zla ba bzhin du sems can rnams zhi bar byas
303a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ chos 'di'i don rtogs pas sems can lus ngag zhi ba'o/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bde bar gnas pa'o/ /chad par bzlog par byas pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i chad pa dang/ bdud bzhi
303a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi chad pa ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid 'dis gang gi chad pa yang 'ong bar mi nus so/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs kyi
303a6(rgyud 'grel): khams dang/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang bcas pa/ rnams kyi 'byung po rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su skad cig mas rgyu ba stong phrag bcu brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa drug /de'i g.yog dang bcas pa yang de bzhin te/ de dag kyang
303a7(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba'o/ /glags lta ba dang/ glags tshol ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la bar chod nas/ dge ba byed pa yang mi byed pa'i glags dang/ mi 'jigs
303b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yod pa 'jigs par byas te/ phyug po de yang ltogs por btang ba/ mi na ba na ba'i glags dang/ dga' ba mi dga' bar byed pa'i glags dang/ mthun pa rnams par du bcad nas so sor byas te/ sdom pa srung ba mi srung bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan par byed
303b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gti mug la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams khong du zhugs shing/ sred pa dang/ 'dod chags la dga' zhing/ zhe sdang la gnas te/ 'thab rtsod la dga' bar byed pa'i glags dang/ tshe ring ba thung bar byas te/ dge ba byed pa la rtag tu bar chod byed
303b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rnams 'di yin te/ klan ka ko ba dang/ glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi glags tshol ba'i skabs kyang mi rnyed pa'o/ /yang na glags tshol ba rnams kyis rnyed pa 'am/ bgegs kyis rigs lta bu 'am/ ma
303b4(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ srin mo 'am/ bu 'am/ nye ba la sogs par skyes nas glags tshol te/ de'i glags kyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /glags rnyed pa'am/ /klan ka rnyed pa'i sems can gang nas yang med la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su
303b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid rtogs na glags mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'o/ /ngo bo nyid gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med cing bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgoms te/ a las gnas shing ngo bo nyid bral ba'o//
303b6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu ba lta bur bsgoms te/ de bzhin du mas khyab pa'o/ /tra sprul sku ste/ sems can gyi don la gnas pa'o/ /de lta bur sems kyis rtogs na glags kyang ga la rnyed de/ rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /ngas yang
303b7(rgyud 'grel): dag par ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi lta ba 'di rtogs na de rnams kyis glags kyang mi rnyed cing/ gnod pa yang gang yang skyel ba med do/ /rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de gang yang ma grub pa'o/ /yang na
304a1(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i 'byung po rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bzhi pa'o// //las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni/
304a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon bsags pa'i las dang/ sngon du mtshams med pa lnga byas na/ sngon du bshags dgos te/ sngon du bshags par ma gyur na/ las kyi rnam par smin pa de yang shing tog bzhin du smin par 'gyur ro/ /smin pa'i 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ khyi dung dkar po
304a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bram ze'i rigs su skyes nas kyang nga rgyal chen po'i las kyi rnam par smin pas byol song gi nang na khyi dung dkar por skye pa'o/ /mchod sbyin byas pa'i phyir na/ 'bras kyi thug pa khar sder du blugs nas za zhing/ nga rgyal che zhing khri la bsdad pa'o/ /dung
304a4(rgyud 'grel): gi mdog tu gyur pa ni sngon bram ze lus bsrungs shing/ khrims bsrungs pa'i phyir ro/ /'di'i nges tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang shams thabs bsnams/ /lhung bzed bsnams te/ mnyan yod du
304a5(rgyud 'grel): bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas thar chags su mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes te/ to'u de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de'i tshe to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso'i khyim na ras gos ni ka bting ba'i khri'i stong
