304a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ khye dung zhes bya ba 'dug ste/ khar gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la 'bras can dang/ sha bsres pa'i khrus ma 'thung ba las/ khye dung gis bcom ldan 'das sgo drung na bzhugs pa mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang 'a 'u zhes zug go /de nas bcom
304a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi khye dung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyi dung khyod kyi zhes bya ba las/ 'a 'u zhes zug par gyur na/ des kyang ma dul lam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ khye dung khros 'khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yid ma rangs nas/ ras nas/
304b1(rgyud 'grel): ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri las babs te/ khri'i 'og na stor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug go /de'i tshe to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso bya ba zhig gi phyi rol tu byung ba las/ de nas to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos slar logs pa dang/ to'u de'i bu bram
304b2(rgyud 'grel): ze'i khye'u bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ khyi dung 'og na stor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug pa mthong ngo/ /mthong nas kyang nang mi la smras pa/ khyed kyis khye dung 'di la ci zhig smras/ jo bo bdag cag gis kyang/ khyi dung la ci yang ma smras so/ /de ltar lags mo
304b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dge sbyong gau ta ma ma byon par gyur te/ /khye dung gi dge sbyong gau ta ma sgo drung na zhugs par mthong ngo/ /mthong nas kyang 'a 'u zhes zug pa dang/ dge sbyong gau ta mas/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyi dung khyod kye zhes bya ba las/ 'a 'u zhes zug
304b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur na/ des kyang ma dul lam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ khyi dung khros 'khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yi dam rangs nas/ ras go ni ka bting ba'i khri las babs te/ khri'i 'og na tor khung gi shing gi wal 'dug go /de nas bram ze'i bu
304b5(rgyud 'grel): ne tso khros 'khrugs tshig bzos te/ yid ma rangs nas/ mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyis kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du me'i 'khor
304b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis to'u de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis to'u de yi bu bram ze'i
304b7(rgyud 'grel): khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa de lta legs so/ /gal te te'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso 'di'i 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na ni/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu/ dper na mda' sde'u ka ma 'phangs pa bzhin
305a1(rgyud 'grel): du/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di nga la sems rab tu khros pa'i phyir ro/ /sems rab tu khros pa'i rgyus/ de ltar na 'di nas sems can kha cig/ lus zhig nas
305a2(rgyud 'grel): shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di na gang zag kha cig ni/ /rab tu sems khros gyur gzigs nas/ /ston pa
305a3(rgyud 'grel): dge slong tshogs rnams la/ don de nyid ni lung bstan to/ /kye ma go ba mi 'di ni/ /da ni 'chi ba'i dus byed na/ /de yi sems ni khros pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye/ /de bzhin gshegs la sems khros pa/ /de yi rgyus ni sems can
305a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /dper na mda' ni 'phangs pa bzhin/ /de ltar ngan 'gror 'gor bar 'gyur/ de nas to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu/ mngon du kun dga' bar bya ba dang/
305a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam/ rnam pa mang por byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ to'u de yi bu bram ze'u khye'u ne tso phyogs gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gau ta ma khyod bdag gi
305a6(rgyud 'grel): khyim du byon tam bram ze'i bu phyin to/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis bdag gi khyi dung la/ ci zhig ma gsungs sam/ bram ze'i khye'u nga 'dir snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
305a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir zhugs te/ /mthar gyis mnyan yod du bsod snyoms blangs nas/ khyod kyis khyim ga la ba der song te phyin pa nas/ /sgo drung na 'dug pa dang/ de'i tshe khyi dung ras go ni ka ba
305b1(rgyud 'grel): btang ba'i khri'i steng na 'dug cing/ khar zhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la 'bras can dang/ sha bsres pa'i khrus ma 'thung ba las/ khyi dung gis nga sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ste mthong nas kyang zug pa dang/ ngas de la smras pa dang/ khyi dung khyod kyis zhes bya ba las le'u
305b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes zug par gyur na/ des kyang ma dul lam zhes skad smras pa dang/ khyi dung khrod khrugs tshig pa zos te/ yi ma rangs nas/ ras go ni ka bting ba'i khris las babs te/ khri'i 'og tu tor khung gi shing gi wa la 'dug go/ gau ta ma khyod kyis khyi dung tshe snga ma
305b3(rgyud 'grel): la bdag gi cir mchi mkhyen tam/ bram ze'i khye'u la rog 'dug la nga la don 'di ma 'dri shig/ khyod kun tu gnod sems su gyur pa dang/ mi bzod pa dang/ sems mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du to'u de yi bu bram
305b4(rgyud 'grel): ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis khyi dung tshe snga ma la bdag gi cir mchi mkhyen tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du/ to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso la 'di
305b5(rgyud 'grel): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze'i khye'u kha dog la/ nga la don 'di ma dri shig/ khyod kun tu gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang/ mi bzod pa dang/ sems mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo/ /bram ze'i khye'u khyod lan gsum gyi bar du don 'di
305b6(rgyud 'grel): la nges par ma mthong bas/ de'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig dang bshad do/ /bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyi pha to'u de ya gang yin pa de lus zhig nas/ dman pa'i khyi'u skye gnas su skyes so/ /kye gau ta
305b7(rgyud 'grel): ma bdag gi pha to'u de yang ni/ mchod sbyin bgyis pa/ sbyin sreg bgyis ga mchod sdong sgreng ba lags na/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gyur/ de ni lus zhig nas/ nges par tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bzang por skyes bar 'gyur ro//
306a1(rgyud 'grel): bram ze'i khyi'u khyod kyi pha to'u de yang ni/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal de nyid kyis dman pa khye'u skye gnas su skyes so/ /bram ze'i khye'u gal te/ dus smras pa yid mi ches na/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod de'i phyir rang gi khyim du song la phyin pa dang
306a2(rgyud 'grel): khyi dung la 'di skad du/ gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga yi pha to'u de gyur pa lta na/ ras go ni ka ba'i khri la 'dug shig ces smros shig /khri la 'dug pa dang/ tshig 'di skad du gal te khyi dung khyod/ tshe snga ma la nga'i pha to'u de yar gyur pa lta na/ khar
306a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la/ 'bras chan dang/ sha bsres pa'i khrud ma 'thung shig ces smros shig/ 'thung na de la tshig 'di skad du gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha to'u de yang gyur pa lta na/ khyod 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bdag dbang ba gang yod
306a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ngal ma bstan pa de'i ston cig ces smros shig dang ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas to'u de ye bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ rang gi khyim ga la bder song ste/ phyin pa dang/ khyi dang
306a5(rgyud 'grel): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha to'u de yar gyur pa lta na/ ras go ni ka bting pa'i khri la'ang 'dug cig /khri la 'dug nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyi dur khyod tshe snga ma la de'i pha to'u de ?
306a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa lta mkhar gzhong rdo ba'i khar blangs pa la/ 'bras chan dang/ sha bsres pa'i khrud ma 'thung shig/ 'thungs nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyi dung khyod tshe snga ma la nga'i pha to'u de yar gyur pa lta na/ khyod 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/
306a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag dbang bgang yod pa nga la ma bstan pa de ston cing/ /de nas khyi dung ras bo ni ka pi tang ba'i khri la babs te/ gnas khyim rnying pa zhig yod pa ga la bder song ste phyin pa dang/ khri'i rkang pa bzhi'i gnas su rkang lag gi sder mos brus so/
306b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus na snas snom mo/ /to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ de nas gser dngul brdungs me dang/ sil lcags zangs bzhi dang/ dbus na gser gyi khar ba dang/ ril brnyed do/ /de nas to'u de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos gser de sbas nas/ dga' mgu zhing dbu
306b2(rgyud 'grel): tu dga' ste/ rangs nas dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes te/ mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ngo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs te/ bcom ldan kyis
306b3(rgyud 'grel): to'u do'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nad kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyi to'u de yi bya/ bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa de ltar lags
306b4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /gal te to'u yi bu bram ze'i khyi'u ne tso de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na ni/ dper na mnga' to'u ku ma 'phangs pa bzhin du de 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar de nga la sems
306b5(rgyud 'grel): dad par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag sems dang pa'i rgyus de ltar 'di ni sems can kha cig/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyis 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe
306b6(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dzin gang zag kha cig na/ /rab tu sems dang gyur gzig nas/ ston par dge slong tshogs rnams la/ /don de nyid ni lung stan to/ /kye ma bso ba mi 'di ni/ nga ni 'chi ba'i dus byed na/ /de yi
306b7(rgyud 'grel): sems ni dad pa'i phyir/ lha rnams nang du skye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs la sems dad pa/ /de yi rgyus ni sems can rnams/ /dper na mda' ni 'phangs pa bzhin/ /de ltar bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ de nas to'u
307a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gal bder song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon tu kun dga' bar bya ba dang/ yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam rnam pa mang po byas nas/
307a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ to'u de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze'i khye'u ci/ ngas ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du gyur tam/ kye gau ta ma med de/ ji ltar
307a3(rgyud 'grel): go tam khyod kyis/ khyi dur lung bstan pa de de bzhin no/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes kyang gsungs pa/ rnam par smin pa'i las de yang/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las/ ngan song dang ni mtho'i sa dang/ 'jig rten rang gi spyod pa ste/ dper na ?
307a4(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes pa/ nags la me yi 'jigs pa na/ de bor sdong bu chu las skyes/ /der skyes rgyun gyi lhags pas tshig/ //mi 'gul las kyi rnam smin no/ /gang gis kyang ni thub mi 'gyur/ de yang gsungs pa'o/ rig sngags kyi
307a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i/ las kyi rnam par smin pa bshad pa'i gnas skabs te lnga pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa bshad pa'i de nas so/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'o sangs
307a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa yin te/ de yang
307a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis gsung ngo/ /da ltar yod pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ste/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa
307b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis kyang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed cing mi ma yin gyis 'tshe bar yang mi nus te/ mtho ris kyis lam bstan cing lnga dag pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/ /mi'am mi ma yin pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa
307b2(rgyud 'grel): ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis srung bar byed de/ de rnams kyang gzi brjid che ba/ stobs che ba/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba ste lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod la yang rtsod par gnas pa'o
307b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du de rnams kyis kyang srung bar byed do/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba srung bar bya'o/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gdon de rnams kyis snying rje che zhing srung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya
307b4(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa ni/ bde bar gnas shing nad rnams thams cad 'joms te/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i las la 'grub cing/ phun sum tshogs shing rigs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis zhes bya ba
307b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ ngan sems yod pa rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ dge ba'i sems dang ldan zhing/ sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa'o/ /sdang bar sems pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis sngags
307b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ming zhes bya ba yang med de/ de rnams kyang snying rje skye zhing sems can la gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /myos par byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gal te sdang ba'i sems dang/ gnod pa'i sems dang/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan
307b7(rgyud 'grel): par gyur na/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams kyis gtor zhing/ rang sems mi gnas shing myos par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu myos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/ /rengs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi sngags
308a1(rgyud 'grel): btang ba dang/ rang gi ma rungs par byed pa rnams rengs par phyed pa'o/ /gzhan gyi sngags zlog par byed pa ni/ li? ga bris la ni gats+tsha ta la sogs pa'i sngags bris la mnan par bya'o/ /gzhan ma rungs pa 'dul bar yang
308a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no/ /li ka'i bye brag gis dbye bar bya'o/ /rmugs pa dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ sems dang/ lce bzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin byas te/ tha ma la pi sa ra ta/ pi sa ra ta la sogs pas bskor zhing lam rgya gram la gnas
308a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ gzhan gyi rbod gtong dang/ sngags dang/ ro langs dang/ dug dang/ dug sbyar ma dang/ gzhan gyis bsam pa ngan pa btang ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ni zhes
308a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa'i dam pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ gzhan rnams kyis kyang thub par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du yang thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyang de
308a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang/ 'khor ba nas kyang thar par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma bram ze mya ngan 'das/ 'jig rten dag na sred las rgal/ zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa khyod kyis kyang thab mo'i don 'di la gnas pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa
308a6(rgyud 'grel): bor zhi mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /gzugs dang bsgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya rnams bor te/ de bzhin du ma rig pa la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams spangs te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dra ba bsgral nas/ mya ngan 'das te/
308a7(rgyud 'grel): de bas na sred las brgal zhes bya'o/ /khon dang 'jigs pa kun spangs pa/ ring mo zhig nas bzod mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba dang sdig pa rnams kyis mi gos te/ bdud bzhi'i 'jig pa dang/ 'khor ba ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang/
308b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang 'jigs pa thams cad dang bra te/ 'khor ba'i grong khyer zhig nas yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong ngo/ de'i ngo bo gang zhe na/ srid pa ma yin 'das pa de bzhin no/ da ltar yod pa la de bzhin ma yin te/ sdun na ni phyi'am dbus
308b2(rgyud 'grel): ma yin/ de bzhin yang dag don de yin/ /de bas na ring mo zhig nas bzod mthong ngo/ /zhes bya'o/ /bzod pa dka' thub mchog ste bzod pa na/ mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsungs/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad
308b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzod pa bsgom zhing mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa ste/ sdug bsngal bor zhing/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa dang/ bor nas yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ /rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod
308b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ gzhan la 'tshe ba dge spyod ma yin no zhes bya ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ bla ma'am/ pha ma 'am/ gzhan yang de la sogs pa la 'tshe ba ni/ dge ba gang byas kyang thar par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig dang ldan pas yang
308b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ btsal bar byas pa yod pas na/ zhes bya ba ni rang gis spun nas mthong ste/ 'jig rten pas de mthong ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pas de yang mi mthong ba'o/ /mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/ /sdig pa dag ni yongs su spang/ zhes
308b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mar me bltam ste/ 'khor ba'i mun pa bsal nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mthong ste/ de mthong ba'i dran pas na/ mkhas pas 'khor ba spangs pa'o/ /da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs sangs rgyas
308b7(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa'i 'od srungs nas sangs rgyas ra bas bdun la sogs pa ste/ da ltar yod pa shAkya seng ge'o/ /ma 'ongs pa yang de bzhin du byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /thams cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal
309a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun la skyabs su mchi/ zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bdag dang sems can rnams kyis kyang sdig pa bshad pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal te/ 'jigs pa thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir
309a2(rgyud 'grel): na skyabs su mchi'o/ /'jig rten dgra bcom bder gshegs pa la/ /zla ba skyabs su mchi lags kyis zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing/ /mun pa mun nag gsal bar bya ste/ chos kyi nyams myong gi bdud rtsis/ sems can rnams
309a3(rgyud 'grel): la 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ thugs rje che zhing bdud rtsi snang ba rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams/ zla ba thar mdzed sgra gcan las zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul
309a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skus khyab ste/ rig sngags 'di'i chos nyid kyi nyams myong gis ma rig ba'i mun pa/ zla bas bsal ba bzhin du bsal te/ de yang chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /sgra gcan zla ba mun sel ba/ /nam mkha' dag
309a5(rgyud 'grel): la 'od byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten khams la grags pa dang ldan pa zla ba yin te/ zla ba des kyang mun pa bsal cing bsal bar byas so/ /de bzhin du rig sngags kyi chos kyi nyams myong gis ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal te
309a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba 'joms so zhes bya ba sgra gcan zhes bya ba'o/ /lam mer 'dug la dkar ba dang/ rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos nyid gzhan gyis mi gos te/ gzhan gyis ma byas pa rang gis rang
309a7(rgyud 'grel): bsal te/ rnam par dag cing dngos po med de/ dngos pos kyang ngo bo nyid dang 'bral lo/ /de lta bu'i 'od kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa'o/ /bar snang dag la ma bzung bar/ skye dgu'i sgron me myur du thong zhes bya ba ni/
309b1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa dge ba skye zhing mi bya ste/ gang yang dge ba dag la gnas ba ste/ de bzhin du byas par gyur na mtho ris myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan de/ /lus kyang rdul zhing skrag gyur la zhes bya ba ni sdig pa byed par 'gyur na dmyal
309b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems ni sregs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sdig pa spang par bya ste/ sdig pa'i ming yang mi bya'o/ /nad pa bzhin du bstan pa yin/ /zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed ces bya ba ni/ dper na sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba 'dzin pa bzhin du/ ma rig pa'i
309b3(rgyud 'grel): mun pas sems can 'dzin pa'o/ /zla ba sgra gcan gyis gter pa bzhin du/ rig sngags kyi chos kyi nyams myongs/ ma rig pa'i mun pas kyang btang ba'o/ /ci'i phyir na sgra gcan khyod lus kyang rdul zhing skrag gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par srid
309b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las kyis skrag par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis kyang thar bar byang ba'o/ /nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis/ /rings bar zla ba gtong bar byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid des/ zla ba sgra gcan gyis bzung ba btang ba ste//
309b5(rgyud 'grel): nad pa de yang sman bzang po sos par byas te/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad bde bar gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas tshigs gcad 'di brjod pas/ /gal te zla ba ma btang na zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba bzung ba
309b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du myur du ma btang na gza' de yang nyes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin bum rungs pa'i don rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das na mgo tshal pa tshal par 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi mgo ni tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ gson
309b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang/ mi dang/ 'byur po la sogs pa rnams kyang/ rig sngags kyi dam tshig las 'das par gyur na/ nad rnams thams cad 'byung zhing 'chi ba'i dus su mgo tshal par 'gas te/ shi nas kyang
310a1(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mo yin pas gang gis kyang/ mi phan par 'gyur ro/ /kye ma bde ba gzigs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba rmad ces bya ba ni/ smig rgyu dang/ sgyu ma
310a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rmi lam dang/ chu bur dang/ sbu ba dang/ chu shing dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang brgyad do/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa yang de
310a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /de kun yang yod par shes sam/ med par shes pa 'ang ma yin te/ med ba yang ma yin/ gnyis ka yang ma yin no/ /sgyu ma tsam du gnas te/ de yang sems can gyi don la gnas pa'o/ /de bas na sangs rgyas kyi
310a4(rgyud 'grel): chos rmad du med pa ste/ skyon rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa'o/ /de dag gis tshig ni tshigs su bcad/ /brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gang zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis ni/ sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba stong pa bzhin du/ nad
310a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang btang ba ste/ bden pa'i tshig 'dis kyang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ 'jig rten du sems can brjed ngas pa med pa'i chos can 'byung ba ni zhes
310a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyang brjed ngas pa yin te/ dang po ma rig par byung ba ma rig pa las 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo/ /rnam par shes pas ming dang gzugs/ /
310a7(rgyud 'grel): ming dang gzugs kyi skye mched drug /skye mched drug gis srid pa/ srid pas reg pa/ reg pas sred pa/ sred pas skye ba/ skye bas len pa/ len pas rga shi de ni 'jig rten gyi chos can brjed ngas pa ste/ de las de
310b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bar nyon mongs skye bar byed pa'o/ /rjed par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can ni/ ma rig pas rga shi 'gag pa'o/ /rga shis len pa 'gag go /len pas skye ba 'gag go /skyes pas sred pa 'gag go /sred pas rag pa 'gag go/ /rag pas srid pa
310b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag go /srid pas skye mchen dug 'gag go /skyes mched drug gi ming dang gzugs 'gag go /ming dang gzugs kyis rnam par shes pa 'gag go /'du byed kyis ma rig pa 'gag go /de 'gag pas na skye ba ste/ rig pa shar pa de ni brjed
310b3(rgyud 'grel): ngas pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni tshig kyang mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig gis yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing/ /rig sngags 'di yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus su yang dag par
310b4(rgyud 'grel): smra bas smra ba yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rkyen med par nga mi smra ste/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags 'di yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas
310b5(rgyud 'grel): smras pa'o/ /gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la/ phan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ tshul khrims ma dag par byed pa dang/ sdom pa med par sdom pa la 'jug pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig 'di dag gis sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang na rig sngags
310b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis sdom pa srung bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'o/ /bden pa'i tshig bden pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
310b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis yang dag par gsungs pa'i/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /gzhan yang tshig de dag gis bya ba byed pa'i don dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags
311a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo'i tshig 'dis gang yang 'grub ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyang 'grub pa'o/ /phan pa dang/ bde ba yang 'dis byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis kyang/ gang yang
311a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gi sdug bsngal yang 'dis 'joms par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad mtho ris 'dren pa la mthu che bar rig pa'i dam pa'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i rigs ni/ mtshan ma ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags
311a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo bdag nyid do/ /phung po rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ khams ni nam mkha' i khams so/ /skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched do/ /de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal
311a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing ka/ zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na/ pad+ma dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra
311a5(rgyud 'grel): sta zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa ti ma ti la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags
311a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i bden pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i gnas skabs te drug pa'o// //kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la yang/ bka' stsal pa'o/ /sa
311a7(rgyud 'grel): bon gyi rtsa ba bcu dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bon gyi rtsa ba bcu ni/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol
311b1(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa dang bcu'o/ /de ni sa bon bcu zhes bya'o/ /sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yod do zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa bzhin du sa bcu'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ de yang rab tu dga' ba dang/ dri ma med pa dang 'od byed pa dang/ 'od
311b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba dang/ shin tu sbyang dka' ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa dang/ ring du song ba dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ legs pa'i blo gros dang/ chos kyi srin dang bcu'o/ /de bas na sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das
311b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis smras pa yi/ /tshig de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs par 'gyur ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i 'bras bu dang/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' i lam rnams ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su
311b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ma la brten cing/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'o/ /ston par 'gyur ba yang yod de zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob cing/ sa bcu dang/ de'i lam gyis bcu gcig thob pa'o/ /de dag bstan
311b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di la zhugs pa'i mi rnams kyi khar brjod na zhes bya ba ni/ bstan pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bstan pa ste/ de la zhugs par gyur na gang yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang/ srin po rnams kyang bran bzhin du las byed
311b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ ? lam nas byang chub thob ste/ khams gsum gyi gtso bor 'gyur zhing/ de rnams kyang dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnams
311b7(rgyud 'grel): la 'jig rten gyi ming gis mchog dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang gzhan med de/ sa'i 'bras bu thob pa yang rang bzhin du gnas shing/ rig sngags nyid kyang logs na med do/ /de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu yang
312a1(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ 'jig rten pa dang/ sangs rgyas gnyis su med cing/ gnyis su yang byar med do/ /de pas bden pa'i tshig dge sbyong rnams kyi nang dge sbyong skyed de ba zhes bya ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la gtogs
312a2(rgyud 'grel): na bde ba chen po thob ste/ bde ba'i nang na yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i lam spyod cing/ de bzhin
312a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ bdud bzhi rnams kyi mi thub cing dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa nyid bsgom zhing/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang 'bral zhing/ yang
312a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /mi skrag mi 'bros pa'i 'jigs pa med cing zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po yang med cing/ ngo bo yang gang na gnas pa med do/ /de yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa la mi gnas te de bzhin du 'jigs
312a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang spangs shing/ sdig pa dang dge ba la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /'jig pa dang 'jigs par byed pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa ni sems yin te/ 'jigs par byed pa ni/ rnam par rtog pa'o/ /'jigs pa spangs
312a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rang gi sems kyi rtogs pa yang dag pa'i ye shes yin te/ de yang sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bsam te bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom byas na/ bsam pa'i
312a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu de thob cing/ sems nyid kyis ni gang yang 'grub/ /'jigs pa dang 'jigs par spangs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /'jigs par byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin nyon mongs
312b1(rgyud 'grel): la yin te/ spangs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing/ gnyug ma'i rang bzhin shes pa'o/ /skyi bung zhes byed pa med pa'o/ /zhes yang dag par smra bar smras pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin nyon
312b2(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa shas che zhing/ de la zhal lta byed par 'gyur ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ de rnams 'joms shing yang nas yang du 'joms par byed pa'o/ /dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bdud rnams
312b3(rgyud 'grel): ni dge ba byed pa'i dus su bar du gcod de/ de'i dus su yang ming bar byed pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
312b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos kyang ldan pas/ gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med cing bde ba ste/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang
312b5(rgyud 'grel): gis/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang zhes bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i chos kyi bden pas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang/ tshul khrims
312b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa rnams tshul khrims thob ste/ skus 'dul gsung gis 'dul te/ de 'dul pa'i phyir na brtul zhugs zhes bya'o/ /dka' thub dang/ tshangs bar spyod pa la gang ci yang rung ba de dag gis nang na ni zhes bya ba ni/ bka' des kyang
312b7(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod de/ sems can nyon mongs pa rnams la sdom par mi gnas pa sdom par gnas shing/ rig sngags kyi bden pa 'dis kyang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing/ sdig pa thams cad 
313a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang spong? bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi bden pa 'dis kyang 'phags pa'i tshul khrims mi thob pa thob par byas te/ sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs
313a2(rgyud 'grel): shing tshul khrims la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la 'phags pas na 'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba ni la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang/ rig sngags
313a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bden pas/ gang zag dad pa can dang/ sems can thams cad las tshe 'di la bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs shing/ phyi ma la yang de bzhin te/ phyin ci ma log pa'i rig sngags kyi phyag rgya thob cing/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam
313a4(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug pa'o/ /gnas brtan rgyal po'i 'u thu bo dang/ 'dra bar rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnas la dbang byas shing gzhan dge slong rnams la dbang med do/ /de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir na thu bo zhes bya'o/ /tshangs par
313a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa/ mngon par spyad pa rnams kyi mchog/ 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa zad pa/ tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can gyi don byed pa/ skad cig mas kyang mngon par shes pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sha stag go /dge
313a6(rgyud 'grel): slong kun shes kau di n+ya dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpar skyes tsam na/ srin po kau di n+ya lnga yod de/ de'i dus su yang chu med cing/ sgoms nad yod pa la byang chub sems dpa' des kyang tha chung
313a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis btang nas/ kau di n+ya lnga la byin nas 'thung ngu bcug ste/ da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi nyams myong gis khams gsum tsam yang kun tu shes nas dge slong dgra bcom thob pa'o/ /'dod pa nyung ba sbyangs pa'i ba
313b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan la gnas pa dang/ chos shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srungs chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don gyis zhing/ snying rje chen po dang/ byams pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ theg pa chung ngu na gye sgo nas 'od srungs chen po yin te/ 'dir dgra
313b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa thob cing/ sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /shes rab che ba dang/ spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rigs pa sbyangs shing/ blo dang ldan te nyon mongs pa bcom zhing nyan thos kyi gtso bor gyur cing/ sems
313b3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don byas pa'o/ /mi'i ming nas kyang bos pa'i phyir na shA radwa ti'i bu zhes bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog/ shA ri'i bu dang/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dang/ mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog/ maung+gal gyi bu chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab re re la
313b4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa bzhag cing/ bdun bdun la 'gong nus te de bzhin du yang mthu dang ldan pa/ bram ze'i rigs su skyes nas chos kyi nga Trgyal dang ldan pa'o/ de yang ma'i ming nas btags pa'o/ /lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma 'gags pa dang/ zhes
313b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ mthong ba la ni ma 'gags pa yin te/ khams gsum gyi bya ba thams cad dus gcig tu mthong ba'o/ /mthong ba la 'gags pa med pa'i phyir na ma 'gags pa'o/ mang du thos pa rnams kyis mchog kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba na/
313b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ma lus par thos te/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos la sogs pa ni/ kun dga' bo la gtang ba'o/ /sems can thams cad dga' ba'i phyir ni kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/ /'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi
313b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog nye bar 'khor dang zhes bya ba ni/ sku dang gsungs dang/ thugs thul bas 'dul ba 'dzin pa ste/ de 'dul ba'i phyir na nye bar 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog byams pa'i bu gang po dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can
314a1(rgyud 'grel): la mi 'dzin ngag nas smra ba thogs pa med de/ ma'i ming nas bos pa'i phyir na byams pa'i bu gang po zhes pa'o/ /bslab pa la gus pa rnams kyi mchog sgra gcan zin dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa bcom pa thob ste/
314a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su skyes pa'i phyir sgra gcan zin zhes bya'o/ /mal ca dang stan sko ba rnams kyi mchog gyad nor bu dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang dgra bcom pa rnams la gus bar byas na tshogs gsog par bya'o/ /seng ge sgra sgrogs
314a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi mchog ba ra d+hwa? dza bsod snyoms lan dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs med cing khams gsum tsam la yang sgra sgrogs te/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod snyoms bslangs pas 'phel ba'i phyir na/ bsod snyoms len zhes
314a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /khyim pa dad pa skyem pa rnams kyi mchog/ nag po 'char ka dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig rnams rig par 'jug ste/ khams gsum gyi sems can rnams ma lus par/ ma dad pa dad pa'i phyir na nag po 'char ka zhes bya'o/ /lha dang
314a5(rgyud 'grel): mis mchod pa rnams kyi mchog legs mthong bden pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang khams gsum tsam yang dad par bya ste/ dad pa des kyang yang dag bar mchod par 'os pa/ de rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir na legs mthong
314a6(rgyud 'grel): gi bden pa zhes bya'o/ /bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi bden pa dang/ nyan thos dgra bcom pa rnams kyi yon tan
314a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi nges tshig dang/ gang zag dang/ sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing/ nad thams cad dang 'bral ba'o/ /yongs su bskyabs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ de rnams kyi bden pa dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing/ rig
314b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rgyal po 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis de rnams kyi 'jigs pa med cing/ bde ba la gnas te kun kyang bde ba'o/ /bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can zhes
314b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges thugs rje can gyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i bden pa dang/ chos kyi bden pa dang/ nyan thos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyis
314b3(rgyud 'grel): bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa med pa 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rigs mi gcig rnams la bden pa des bde bar byas shing/ sdug
314b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ sems can de rnams kyang byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya gam gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten pa 'od srung nas 'das
314b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bdun la sogs pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas kyang rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab cing bden pa bka' stsal
314b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig nges ming 'di zhes bya bsrung bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas de rnams kyi bden pa dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos kyi bden pa dang/ bden pa de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la bde bar
314b7(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyang bde ba la bkod de/ nams kye ba'i dus su phun sum tshogs par skye
315a1(rgyud 'grel): chos 'di dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa dang/ bden ba'i tshig gang gis shes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa ste/ de rnams kyi
315a2(rgyud 'grel): yang gang dang gang 'dod pa 'grub pa'o/ /'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ji snyed yod pa de dag gang gi nang na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mchog ces bya ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'du byed kyi ma rig pa bkag ste ma rig pas rga ba'i
315a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bkag nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs pa'i ming yang med de/ des na nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral zhing/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ bag chags kyi sgribs pas ma gos pa'o/ /bden pa dang/ bde ba'i
315a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba srung bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rig sngags dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yin te/ bden pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' o/ /bden pa'i tshig ni rig sngags kyi
315a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo nyid do/ /gang zag dang sems can rnams la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bsrung bar byas pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab ba dan zhes bya ba la sogs ba ni/ bde ba la gnas shing ??
315a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tshe phyi ma rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang bral zhing/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshig gis gang 'grub cing/ rig sngags
315a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo thob pa'o/ /tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ mang po 'am/ 'khor ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos
315b1(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa dang/ lha dang bram ze dang/ rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshogs pa'i bden pas kyang bde bar gnas pa'o/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i
315b2(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i tshig smras pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' tshogs 'dus pa dang/ de'i bden pas bde legs kyi bkra shis ste/ dgra'i tshogs rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal khams dang/ yul
315b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ram zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bden pa'i tshig de dag gis kyang yul 'khor rnams la srung ste/ mi nad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ nad du ma rung ba 'dre gdon zhugs pa dang/ de la sogs pa nad thams cad 'byung ba de med
315b4(rgyud 'grel): cing brlag par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du zhing la gnod pa dang sad pa dang ser ba dang/ 'bru dang/ 'brum bu dang/ btsa' dang/ ne tso dang/ ri bong dang/ ri dags dang/ byi ba la sogs pa zhing la gnod pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang
315b5(rgyud 'grel): mi tshugs shing sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o/ /nad pa 'di la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ cho ga dang/ bsrung ba gnyis kyi srung ste/ srung ba ni gang zhe na/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ dal gyi cho gas bsrung ba'o/
315b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis 'dir bshad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po sa gzhi la/ ba yi rnam lnga byugs pa ste/ chu dang lci ba sar bsres pa/ /lci ba dang ni sa yi sngags chu dang ri mo'i sngags kyis ni/ maN+Dal legs par phyug par
315b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /tshon ni sna tshogs legs bris la/ /dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid du bri/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi twa ra bzhi dra ba phyed kyis mdzes pa la/ /mu tig phreng bcas rnams par brgyan/ rin chen lnga yi gzhal yas khang/ mdzes pa
316a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni mkhas pas bri/ /dang po nam mkha' rlung chags pa/ /me dang chu dang sa chags te/ /de bzhin ri rab rtse mo la/ /pad+ma'i steng du rgya gram ste/ 'og dang steng dang logs rnams su/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gur du bsam/ /de phyir rdo rje'i
316a2(rgyud 'grel): dra ba la/ /rlung dang me sa'i yul du 'khyam/ /phyi rgya kho ra khor yug dang/ /de rtsar mda'i dra ba 'bar/ /de phyir 'og dang steng dang ni/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams su me yis bskor/ /'og ni rdo rje sa gzhi ste/ de steng rdo rje bla res brgyan/ de 'og rdo rje
316a3(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi la/ gzhal yas khang gis dbus su shes/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ste/ /phyir ni 'khor rtsibs brgyad do/ /de phyir lha rnams zlum bu ste/ gza' dang rgyu skar gnas pa'o/ /phyi rol lha rnams glu bzhi la/ /phyogs skyong
316a4(rgyud 'grel): yang ni der gnas so/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi sgo bzhi dang po la/ /rgyal po bzhi yang der bzhugs so/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /ye shes lha mo lnga yang bzhugs/ /mtshams bzhi pad+ma stong pa la/ /mchod
316a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo bzhi gnas so/ /dbus su lte ba zla ba'i gdan/ /gsang sngags 'dzin ma der bzhugs so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs so/ /rig sngags bum pa lnga bo ste/ mtshams ma ldan zhing nag po med/ rtsa ba yangs pa mchu
316a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba/ /dbyibs ni legs shing lto ba che/ /de lta bu'i mtshan ldan la/ /a ka ru 'am gu gul bdug par bya/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru lnga dang/ dri lnga sman lnga de bzhin te/ 'bras bu can gyi shing lnga yi/ /lo mas kha la
316a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang snying po lnga/ /de bzhin mgul chings gdugs kyis brgyan/ /rim bzhin dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /yan lag dang ni gtor ma dang/ bdag gis 'dir ni ma bshad de/ /gzhan la ltos la shes
316b1(rgyud 'grel): par gyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon dge slong gis/ /kha zas dkar po brten nas su/ /cho ga yang dag bsam par gyis/ /khengs pa med cing nga rgyal spangs/ /nyon mongs shas ni mi che zhing/ /byams pa snying rje dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms la ni yang dag 'jug/ yi
316b2(rgyud 'grel): ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /dgug pa bzhugs bcing ba dang/ /ye shes lta ni dgyes par 'gyur/ /sro ma mkhan la sogs bsangs gtor bya/ bsnyen pa cho ga yang dag bzung/ /mchod stod la sogs byas nas su/ thun gtor la sogs gtang bar bya/ /phyogs
316b3(rgyud 'grel): skyong bcu dang rgyal po dang/ gza' dang skar ma 'byung po rnams/ /rjes mthun gtor ma byin nas su/ /de la mchod pa bstod pa bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /nad pa yul 'khor yang dag bsrung/ /sems can la ni snying rje'i phyir/ /rim
316b4(rgyud 'grel): gro'i cho ga yang dag bshad/ /de ni dkyil 'khor byed pa'i bya thabs so/ /'khor lo rim pa bcu bris la/ /sngar bshad las kyi snying po dgod/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i ra ba la/ /phyag mtshan phyag rgya dgod pa ni/ /mnyam gzhag byang chub
316b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang ni/ /chos 'chad skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin dang/ sa gnon chos sbyin phyag skor ba/ /bum rten rdo rje rin chen dang/ /ral gri'i steng na rdo rje dang/ /de bzhin pad+ma de bzhin no/ /'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje dang/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas
316b6(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /pad+ma'i steng na phyag mtshan gnas/ sdong bu dar gyis bcings pa la/ /rgyas par yang ni bri bar bya/ /'khor lo gnyis pa zlum po la/ /pad+ma rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bde bar gsang sngags yi ge dgod par bya/ /de nad gsum po mu khyud la/ /sngar
316b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad sngags kyis bskor ba bya/ de nad mu khyud gcig bu la/ /'khor lo'i rim pa de bzhin shes/ /'khor lo'i nang du mu khyud de/ /sngar bshad sngags ni bri bar bya/ /de yi nang na 'khor lo la pad+ma'i ra ba shes pa'o/ /'khor lo lte
317a1(rgyud 'grel): bar mu khyud dang/ /snying po yi ni sngags bzhin no/ lte sngags yi ge bri ba ste/ blo dang ldan pas bri bar bya/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /srung pa'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i gnas
317a2(rgyud 'grel): skabs te bdun pa'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi bden pa dang/ srung ba de rnams kyis kyang/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral
317a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ bde bar gnas te/ srung ba des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa 'dis lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing/ bden par
317a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing 'jigs pa med par gnas pa'o/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i byis pa'i gdon rnams yin te/ ma'i mngal nas 'dzin cing/ skyes nas lo bcu gnyis bar du 'dzin pa'o/ de'i phyir
317a5(rgyud 'grel): na sems can la gzi sbyin 'phrog pa yin te/ bden pa de yis bde bar gnas shing/ mngal na yang 'di lta ste/ skyes nas kyang bde pa'o/ lo bcu gnyis nas kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/ bden pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
317a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi bden pas bde bar gnas te the tshom med do/ /gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa
317a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams yin te/ 'das pa rnams ni mar me mdzad la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ mi 'ongs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du byams pa la sogs pa'o/ da ltar yod pa'i shAkya thub pas kyang bdud bzhi
317b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom pas ston par byas pa'o/ ngas 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags ni phung po'i bdud de/ zhe sdang ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud do/ /gti mug ni 'chi bdag gi bdud yin te/ de 'joms pa ni
317b2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bu'i bdud do/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdud bzhi bcom zhing/ 'khor ba ma lus par bcom zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom nas/ sems
317b3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don la/ sprul pa'i skus khyab nas chos ston pa'o/ /bshad pa dang/ brjod pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan nas/ sku mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ de yang sems can gyi don la yin no/ bden pa dang/ bden pa'i
317b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi zad par gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin du de'i bden pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur zhing/ nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ nad med par gyur cig /zhi bar gyur cig/
317b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis/ nad thams cad bcom par byas te/ gdon thams cad brlag bar byas nas/ rlung dang/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ 'dus pa dang/ ldan pa
317b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i nad rigs mi gcig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bcom nas/ nad pa rnams bde bar gnas bar byed pa'o/ /bden pa ni 'di yis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'bras bu thub pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal
317b7(rgyud 'grel): mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i/ bden pa'i tshig gis nad pa gso ba'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i tshig 'di bka' stsal
318a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ /btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba gsol to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bos thugs su chud nas/ gro ga 'am/ shing shun nam/ ras la bris nas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags
318a2(rgyud 'grel): te zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sems can thams cad dang/ yangs pa can gyi sems can rnams kyi/ mi nad dang/ phyugs nad dang/
318a3(rgyud 'grel): mu ge dang/ chos rnams kyang bshad du ming btub cing/ ma rungs pa 'byung po rnams kyis khyer ba'i phyir ro/ /sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su yul lha'i them pa la mnan nas
318a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi nga rgyal byas nas/ rgyal mtshan lag na thogs nas/ seng ge'i sgra sgrags so/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang/ tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhal nas/ nyi ma'i stong
318a5(rgyud 'grel): phrag brgya shar ba bzhin du/ 'od gzer re res rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma khro ba'i tshul gyis bsam mi khyab pa 'phros te/ grong khyer yangs pa can du zhugs pa'i lha 'dra rnams de'i 'od zer gyi khro
318a6(rgyud 'grel): bos lha 'dre rnams phyir phyung ste/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mos mi thegs pas gzugs sna tshogs ston cing bros so/ /rigs sngags kyi tshig ni bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de'i sngags yungs kar bsres pa phyogs bzhir/
318a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor bas lha 'dre thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /mi rgats+tsha ta ni rgats+tsha ta la sogs pa'i sngags kyis/ seng ldeng gi me phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir sbar la mtshams bzhi nas blangs la/ /yungs kar dang/ skye tshe dang/ shing tsher ma/
318b1(rgyud 'grel): can bsres? pa/ me'i nang du gtor ro/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi nas chu gtor/ /de na bzhugs pa'i 'gyur po rnams kyi mi tshugs shing/ phyir 'byung ngo/ su ma su la sogs pa'i sngags kyis srung skud sna lnga bsngags shing mdud pa bor te de bsrung
318b2(rgyud 'grel): bar byas na nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing/ 'byung po rnams kyang 'phros so/ /su mu ru su mu ru/ zhes bya ba'i sngags ni rig sngags kyi snying po bstan no/ /de yang pad+ma'i rigs kyi lam mo rigs so/ /mtshon pa na bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/
318b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du byed kyi phung po ste/ khams ni drung gi khams so/ /skye mched ni lus kyi skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lnga'i/ bu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum pa sku mdog ljang gu/
318b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba'o/ /phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje rgya gram dang/ skyabs sbyin no/ /g.yon gsum na bsnams pa ni/ 'khor lo dang/ zhags pa dang/ rdo rje'o/ /zhabs g.yas
318b5(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'dzum pa'i zhal dang ldan par bzhugs so/ /rig sngags kyi rigs ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ su mu ru su mu ru la sogs pa'o/ /de dag sngags rnams grub
318b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin brlabs dang/ rig sngags gsang sngags rnams kyi byin brlabs dang/ rnam par dag pa 'di 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs
318b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ da ltar yod pa rnams kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi chos kyis bden pas/ grong khyer yangs pa can srung zhing skyob pa dang/ sba ba dang zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
319a1(rgyud 'grel): nas zhes bya ba ni/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma bka' stsal lo zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la sogs
319a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dang ngo/ /nyan thos kyang de bzhin no shA ri'i bu la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ngo/ /gzhan yang dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen pha 'am/ dge snyen ma la sogs pa mang po dang thabs
319a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang thabs gcig go /lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/
319a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin mang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ngo/ /dri zar bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i
319a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po zur phung lnga pa g.yog du ma dang bcas pa dang/ 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang po/ 'jig rten yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi'o//
319a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ dge slong pha dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen pha dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin la sogs
319a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'o/ /grong khyer yangs pa can na zhugs pa'i 'byung po rnams phyir btang ba'i gnas skabs te dgu pa'o// //pad+ma'i rigs lnga bstan pa'i brtag pa ste/ gnyis pa rdzogs so//
319b1(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'brel/ /slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum
319b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grel/ /paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras/ paN+Di ta don yod rdo rjes/ jo mo sgrol mas zhabs kyis bcags pa/ /tshangs pa'i 'byung gnas/ rdo lung dgon par rab 'gyur ro/ /'di bskyur bsod nams gang thob pas/ /de yis mkhas
319b3(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum du ni/ /gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma yis/ dngos grub go 'phang myur du shog/ //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA shI ta ba ti bi dya rA dza su traM ta sa ha ra Sha TI kA nA me/ bod skad du/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo /
319b4(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'brel zhes bya ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bsil ba'i tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bder gshegs yang dag rdzogs pa'i sku/ /skyon gyis ma gos yongs rdzogs pa/ /gzhan yang sems can don mdzad de/ /thub
319b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo sde 'di/ /yang dag bsams la ston byed ba/ /rab rib kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /bdag gis bsams la yang dag bshad/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni/ 'di skad
319b6(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ sgro skur dang bral ba'o/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bos so/ /grogs med dam zhe na/ nyan thos la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu thos pa'o/ /su la thos na/ bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /gang thos na bsil ba'i tshal
319b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdo 'di thos pa'o/ /sus thos na kun dga' bos thos pa'o/ /dus gcig na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni don gnyis la 'jug ste/ /sdud pa po shes rab che bar go ba dang/ dam pa'i chos 'byung ba dkon pa'i don to/ /ston pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das so//
320a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ bcom pa ni bzhi bcom/ bzhi ni dgra'o/ /dgra ni bdud bzhi'o/ /bdud bzhi ni phung po'i bdud dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang/ 'chi bdag gi bdud dang/ lha'i bu'i bdud bzhi'o/ /gang gi dus na
320a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom zhes na/ rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus so/ /ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa dang ldan pas na/ bcom ldan no/ /'das zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'das pa ni gang gi dus she na/ dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong gi nub mo'o//
320a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba ni/ dan+ta ka'i grong khyer dang/ ka liM ka'i grong khyer dang/ ma ga d+ha'i grong khyer dang/ gsum yod pa las/ ma ga d+ha'i grong khyer na drang srong sgom chen zhig yod pa las/ byis pa zhig gis gnod pa byas pas/ drang srong gis
320a4(rgyud 'grel): can? ? bas grong khyer gsum po tshig pas dur khrod gsum du gyur/ de'i tshe lha'i bu sheng las skyes dang/ sheng bu grogs gnyis byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi mi rnams byung ste/ dang po sa'i bcud za/ gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i zhag za/ gsum pa myu gu za/
320a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa 'bras sa lu'i ljan pa za ba la sems can de rnams ma mthun nas/ sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus pa la/ bdag cag gi nang nas sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag
320a6(rgyud 'grel): par lta na sdug pa lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bkos dang/ des bdag cag chad par bcad par bya ba ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags
320a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba rnams la phan 'dogs/ bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las/ de las chos bzhin du/ thog shas sbyin par bya'o zer nas/ de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes pa
320b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/ 'di skad ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog /kho bo cag las chad par gcad par 'os pa rnams la chad pa chod cig/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig/
320b2(rgyud 'grel): kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las/ khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no/ /des de rnams la chad pa gcad par bya ba la ni chad pa gcod/ /phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing/ de la de
320b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las/ chos bzhin du thog shas 'bul te/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur zhing/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang pos bkur pa zhes grags so/
320b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na/ nyams pa las skyob par byed pas/ rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/ /chos kyis mgu bar byed cing/ tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas/ rgyal po
320b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/ /mi rnams bsod nams brtag bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'bras sa lu'i ljang pa bgos so/ /'jag ma'i spyil po la me mi gtang ba'i khrims bcas so/ /de nas dus nam zhig na rgyal po'i btsun mos me shor bas rgyal po
320b6(rgyud 'grel): na re rang gi khrims rang gis bshig tu mi btub pas/ bya rgod phung po'i ri'i nub phyogs su nga'i khyim cig brtsigs shig gsung ngo/ /de nas brtsigs pas/ nyin mo brtsigs pa nub mo zhig pa la/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga bsod nams khyad par du//
320b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa yin pas/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po'i khab yin no bris shig gsungs pas/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po'i khab yin no zhes bris pas/ mi ma yin gyi gnod bzhi'o/ /de nas pho brang bai DUrya dang shel bya bar kyang grags so//
321a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i khab kyi tshang ni gzhan du shes par bya'o/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri zhes bya ba ni/ gzhal yas khang ngo/ /ci'i phyir bzhal yas khang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun bzhugs nas chos gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /bya
321a2(rgyud 'grel): rgod phung po'i ril ni brtsags pa'o/ /ci'i phyir brtsegs she na/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i phyir ro/ /gser dang/ dngul dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ in+d+ra nI la'o/ /ri rab de de bzhin du brgyan pas gzhal yas khang ngo/ /ri rab de'i
321a3(rgyud 'grel): tshad ni 'di lta ste/ mtho ba zlum pa/ gnam 'phangs dang/ rgyar yangs pa/ lo tog thams cad kyis sa 'dzin me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ spos rna ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
321a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang/ cho 'phrul
321a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang
321a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka bi na dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mong+gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed
321a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa lter rgyas 'od srungs dang/ de dag la sogs pa nyan thos rab tu mang po dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge
321b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za la sogs mang po 'dus pa'o/ /thabs gcig tu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad
321b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par 'khrul pa dang/ cho 'phrul chen
321b3(rgyud 'grel): po kun tu ston pa dang/ sems kyis skad cig thad cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang/ spyod pa rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang/ spob pa dang/ cho 'phrul
321b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang/ gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbang dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ byang chub kyis yan
321b5(rgyud 'grel): lag dang/ lam dang/ sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' pa dang/ btang snyoms dang/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ dben pa dang/ yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha/
321b6(rgyud 'grel): stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ nyi ma
321b7(rgyud 'grel): grags pa dang/ zla ba'i grags pa dang/ rdo rje'i snying po dang/ rdo rje grags dang/ 'jam dpal grags dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa
322a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang thabs gcig tu'o/ /bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges 'dir chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs
322a2(rgyud 'grel): par mthar phyin pa dang/ bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sa mnyes pa ni shin tu yongs su gzung rin po che pad+ma'i snying po seng
322a3(rgyud 'grel): ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/ seng ge'i khri ni gang zhe na sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa'i sa na yod pa'o/ /rin po che dang/ rdo rje pad+ma'i khri bya rgod kyi phung po'i rim mdzes pa dang/ rin
322a4(rgyud 'grel): po che dang/ mu tig dang/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil li sil li'i sgra 'byung/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la/ rtsa ba la legs par brten pa/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu
322a5(rgyud 'grel): tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang/ 'dab ma'i rnam rten bcug pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang/ ke ke ru chen po dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ in+d+ra nI la chen po dang/ mdun nas 'od zer chen po
322a6(rgyud 'grel): bar snang la khyab pas kun tu mdzes pa dang/ rin po che dang/ rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa byed pa khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan par
322a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri bya rgod kyi phung po'i rtse mo la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig
322b1(rgyud 'grel): rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shing du rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa
322b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi mthong ba bdud kyi las thams cad las ni nges par rgyal/ de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud/ spyan lnga ni mnga' /
322b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags//
322b4(rgyud 'grel): khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/ /ma rigs pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/
322b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan par mdzes
322b6(rgyud 'grel): shing/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po bsil ba'i tshal gyis/ gnas dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas skabs te dang po'o// //de'i tshe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom
322b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs pa'i tshe'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu la rab tu byung ba/ 'dul ba'i bya ba mang po mi shes pa/ nga rgyal gyi khengs shing sangs rgyas kyi sas/
323a1(rgyud 'grel): yin sems nas chos la ma chud do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i nags na zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ ro dang/ ro langs dang/ lce spyang dang/ stag dang/ sbrul dang/ seng ge dang/ yi
323a2(rgyud 'grel): dags dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po rnams kyis ro la ma mthun zhing/ phar bgrad tshung bgrad byas shing skad rnam pa sna tshogs 'don pa dang/ lce spyang rnams 'thab pa'i skad 'jigs su rung ba dang/ rkeng rus dang/ mgo dang/ lpags pa dang/ lag pa'i
323a3(rgyud 'grel): sor mo dang/ rkang pa'i dum bu dang/ ro'i dum bu dang/ bsal shing la bkyon pa dang/ shing la btags nas mgo mjug bslog pa'i ro dang/ man 'gal lcags skyus phig nas shing la bkal ba'i ro dang/ mtshon gyis dum bur byas
323a4(rgyud 'grel): shing/ kha yo ba dang/ mig yar la bltas shing shi ba dang/ ro mi cig pa sna tshogs kyis khengs te/ dur khrod shar na pa tra'i nags tshal yod de/ nags tshal gyi nang nas lha'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad gnas pa'o/ /lho phyogs na
323a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar rany+dza ka'i nags tshal yod de/ gshin rje dang/ grul bum dang/ mkha' 'gro gnas te/ nub phyogs na la da'i nags tshal yin te/ 'dab chags bya dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ klu'i gdon gnas pa'o/ /byang phyogs ni ? ki
323a6(rgyud 'grel): Ti'i nags tshal yod de/ nags tshal de'i nang na/ gnod sbyin dang/ sha za dang/ gdon ma rungs pa thams cad gnas pa'o/ /shar lho mtshams na tsu ta'i nags tshal yod de/ me lha dang/ brjed byed dang/ smyo byed la sogs pa'i gdon
323a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnas pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams na u dum ba ra'i nags tshal yod de/ de'i nang na srin po'i gdon dang/ ma mo'i gdon la sogs pa'o/ /nub byang gi mtshams na nai gro d+ha'i nags tshal la rlung gi gdon dang/ lha ma yin la
323b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa gnas pa'o/ /byang shar gyi mtshams na ta la'i nags tshal yod de/ de'i nang na dbang ldan gyi gdon dang/ 'byung po thams cad gnas pa'o/ de bzhin du de dag la sogs pa shing sna tshogs kyis khengs shing 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ ro langs
323b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya dang/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rgod dang/ khrung khrung dang/ de bzhin du ka randa la sogs pa yang/ rtag tu 'gyur zhing ro la rgod ste/ gzhan yang bya la sogs pa skad sna tshogs 'don pas 'jigs su rung ste/ sa srin dang/ sa
323b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la sogs pa yang de bzhin te/ dngos grub thob pa dang/ rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs mang po dang/ ro 'i rgod zhing za 'dod pa'i tshogs dang/ dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom pa yang sha stag go /yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ bya dang/ rnal 'byor pa'i
323b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ hi hi dang ha ha dang/ kI li kI li'i sgra sgrogs shing/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na 'byung po rnams gnas so/ /de nas dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal gyi shar phyogs na/ de nas
323b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag tshad ldan/ na len+d+ra'i grong khyer chen po'i/ de'i lho phyogs dpag tshad gnyis na/ grong khyer yangs pa can gnas pa'o/ /de'i nub phyogs dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis na ka laM ka'i grong khyer gnas pa'o/ /de'i byang phyogs na/ dpag tshad gcig
323b6(rgyud 'grel): la bya rgod kyi phung po dang/ rgyal po'i khab gnas pa'o/ /bya rgod phung po dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi bar na rgyang grags gcig go /de bzhin du grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dang/ gzhan yang mang po'o/ /bud shing chen po su'i
323b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs na 'dug go zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal che zhing nyan thos tsam la 'gran te/ /nga yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sras yin sems nas/ thos pa mi byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba mi 'bul zhing/ /rang mthong
324a1(rgyud 'grel): gi nga rgyal gyis/ ngas ni dgra bcom pa grub par bya yi snyam nas dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du phyin to/ /der 'di lta ste zhes pa ni/ bsgom mo snyam nas bsdad pa dang/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis mtshe bar byas so//
324a2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gdon rnams dang lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa/ /de dag thams cad mi bzad cing/ /'jigs pa'i sems kyis nyan byed pa/ /bye ba stong gi lha ngag dang/ /bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang/
324a3(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bu mo bskal chen dang/ /theg bzangs ris dang sgrag can dang/ /lha min bye ba phrag stong dang/ lha min phye ba khrag brgyad dang/ /de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul la/ de bzhin skad kyang sna tshogs 'don
324a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu sgra zin rtsar bsdad nas/ /'tshe bar byas te sdig pa rnams/ lha'i gdon rnams dang lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams kyis kyang/ /'dus tu mi ster zhing drag shul bstan no/ /klu'i gdon rnams dang gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang
324a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas na rgya mtsho dang ? yi rgyal po gzi can dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros dang/ dga' bo nyi dga' gnyis po dang/ rdo rje blo gros pak+Shu dang/ gaM gA 'ga' po sind+hu mtsho/ /bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzangs dang/ rgya
324a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho chen po 'khrugs byed dang/ rigs ni klu ni klu bzhi dang/ sa srin sa bdag za byed dang/ ma rungs byed cing khro ba dang/ dug pa byed cing 'tshe byed dang/ stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi gdon/ bya ba brgya'i klu dag dang/ de yi bu mo
324a7(rgyud 'grel): bskal chen rnams/ /rtag tu sems can gnod par byed/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ /snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba/ /gsus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /stobs po che la sgra yang che/ /mgrin bcu po la mig stong ngo/
324b1(rgyud 'grel): gdon chen mig ni dmar pa rnams/ /'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ /lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang/ /lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs/ /lag na mtshon dang mi lpags thogs/ rdo rje mdud
324b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lag na thogs/ /rab tu grags pa'i gtan brgal nas/ /phyogs kun tu ni grags par byed/ /de yi gnas na 'khod pa yi/ /za ba po ni rtag tu skyangs/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes pa bud med rnams kyang 'dzin/ /sha khrag
324b3(rgyud 'grel): don mor bcas pa la/ /rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /gnod sbyin de dag ma rungs pa/ /sems can rnams la 'tsho bar byed/ /gzhon nu sgra zin bsgom pa la/ /drags shul gyis ni gnang ba byas/ /klu'i gdon dang gnod
324b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi gdon gyis bsgom par mi ster zhing drag shul gyis 'tshe bar byas so zhes bya ba'o/ /srin po'i gdon rnams dang mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ /mi 'am ci dang srin po dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs bstan
324b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang 'bral ba dag tu snang/ /rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas kun tu bkra shis/ /rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing/ /srogs chags rnams la gnod
324b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /mi bzang pa yi dbugs 'byin cing/ /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed pa/ sna tshogs kyis ni gzugs su snang/ /kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs/ /la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/ /bgegs
324b7(rgyud 'grel): ni brgya phrag stong rnams te/ /dbyugs pas bsdigs shing kha drag po/ /mig byung ba la bzhin mi gdug /srin po so naM rno ba dang/ /sna dang rna ba bcas pa dang/ /lce gcad gdon ni gnyer ma can/ /rkang lag dag ni 'khums ba dang/ mgo bo 
325a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'i srin po rnams/ /skabs ni rab tu 'tshol bar byed/ /sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog /mi dag gi ni lus rnams la/ /rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang/ /spu yi bar dang gnang rnams dang/ /de bzhin ma yi kha
325a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams zlums/ /srin po 'am mi ci'i gdon rnams kyis/ 'tshe ba bar du byas pa'o/ /srin po dang mi 'am ci'i gdon gyis/ /gzhon nu sgra can zin la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan zhing/ gnod pa skyel pa'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i
325a3(rgyud 'grel): gdon rnams dang dri za'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye dri za'i gdon rnams kyis/ /snying rje can cing 'tshe byed pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin na/ /gzhon nu de la 'tshe bar byed/ /rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su/ /la las rnga
325a4(rgyud 'grel): zlum dag ni brdungs/ /pi wang gling bu 'khar rnga dang/ /lto 'phye rnams ni sgra 'byin te/ /rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang/ /glu dang gar rnams byas nas su/ /gzhon nu de la 'tshe bar byed/ /lto 'phye'i gdon rnams dang dri za'i gdon
325a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang/ /gzhon du sgra can zin la sgra sna tshogs kyi skad kyis 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yi mdun na 'jug pa yi/ /mi ma yin dang rlung lha'i gdon//
325a6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/ /rkang mngas dang ni rkang gcig pa/ /rkang pa bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis/ /rkang pa bsgreng la spyi gtsugs dang/ /lus mngas mgo bo gcig pa dang/ lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang/ /mig mangs po la lus phyed
325a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mi gcig lto ba bcu gnyis dang/ bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo /lag pa sgrengs la mgo btud dang/ /mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang pa mi ma yin/ /zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyis so/ /zangs kyi mig
325b1(rgyud 'grel): dang zangs kyi lag /zangs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha/ /rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang/ /mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/ /sgur zhar lag pa gsum yod pa/ /mig mi sdug la kha glal ba/ /chu srin dag gi gzugs dang ni/ gzugs mi sdug la kha ra ko /'chu 'changs
325b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang so yon po/ /rab tu sdug pa khro gnyer can/ /gsus po che dang bum sna po/ /rnam 'phyangs pa dang rna ba med/ /lag rings dang ni rna ba ring/ /sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring/ /lus bskams lus ni ring ba dang/ /skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang/ /rkang pa ming pa
325b3(rgyud 'grel): phra ba dang/ /dri nga ba dang bum lto go /yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang/ mi ma yi dang rlung lha de/ mdun la rgyu zhing lus ngan bstan/ /sems can thams cad 'tshe byed ba/ /gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byang/ /mi ma yin gyi gdon dang rlung lha'i gdon rnams
325b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang/ /sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan cing gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byas so/ /yi dags kyi gdon rnams dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ yi dags 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis/ /phyogs bzhi la ni gdon byed ba/ /mig
325b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug gzugs ni bstan nas su/ /drag po'i tshul gyis sgra yang 'byin/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan nas/ /gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/ rnam lto ba la rna bo che/ /gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar/ /mgo bo che la mjug rings po/ /skem bo skur bo bum
325b6(rgyud 'grel): lto bo/ /ri rab rtse mo 'gul nas su/ /me 'dag gi ni char pa 'bebs/ /ljon shing ri rab rdo ba dang/ sprin gyi tshogs gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang/ /'byung po yi dags rnams kyi rdung/ /shin tu mi srun thal mdog 'dra/ /mgal ba chu
325b7(rgyud 'grel): la bcug pa'i mdog/ khrag la dga' zhing sha la dga' / /bzhin mi sdug cing gzugs che ba/ /rkeng rus gzugs ni skra rings po/ /mig yo kha yo mgo gnyis pa/ /skyes pa bud med gnod byas nas/ /gzi brjid 'phrog cing srog
326a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'phrog/ phyogs bzhi dag nas gnod pa po/ /gzhon nu sgra zin 'tshe bar byas/ /yi dags kyi gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis gzhon nu sgra zin la phyogs bzhi nas byas so/ /sha za'i gdon rnams dang grul gum gyi gdon
326a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za grul bum gdon rnams ni/ /stobs dang ldan zhing lus ngan po/ /gsus po che la mgo bo che/ /mig zlum sna ni sbrul 'dra ba/ /la la chu srin sna 'dra ste/ skad cig tsam gyis gang yang khyab/ /sa g.yo byed cing ri rab bsgul
326a3(rgyud 'grel): ma rungs pa ni 'bebs byed pa/ /ke ba che la sgra yang 'byin/ /la la me'i lpags thogs nas su/ /sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed/ /mi yi gzugs la zhugs nas su/ /mdze yi nad rnams gtong ba'i bdag/ de bzhin phran tshegs
326a4(rgyud 'grel): nang gtor ba/ /sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed/ /mi yi gzugs la zhugs nas su/ /mdze yi nad rnams gtong ba'i bdag/ de bzhin phran tshegs nad gtod ba/ /sems can rnams la gnod par byed/ /grul bum rnga bram rnams kyi sgra//
326a5(rgyud 'grel): /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/ /ming po che la bud bu'i sgra/ /nag po sngon po ser po dang/ /dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang/ khab 'dra'i sbu dang ral gri'i skra/ /dmar po khrag gi bskus pa rnams/ /mi ro dag ni khyer nas su/ /za bzhin du ni
326a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyug/ so gnon lag pa dmar po dang/ /mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang/ /lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang/ mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis/ /snyim pa shin tu gang ba dang/ byin pa dag ni za bzhin du/ /mer mer po dang srog chags
326a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis ? rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ rkeng rus kyi ni lus kyis su/ /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /khrag gi rab tu gang ba yis/ /mi yi lpags pa thogs nas su/ /mi zad dug gis kun bskus te/ /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug/
326b1(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang/ khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dag du 'khrug par byed/ /sha za grul bum gdon rnams ni/ gzhon nu de la gnod par byed/ /sha za grul bum gdon rnams kyis/ /rnam
326b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs kyi nad btab la/ /rnam par 'tshe bar byas so/ /gzig rnams dang/ bya rog rnams dang/ 'ug pa rnams dang/ grog sbur dang sdig pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ /rnam par 'khrul zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/ /ma he ba
326b3(rgyud 'grel): lang bong bu dang/ glang po che'i gzugs 'dra dang dom dang gzig dang sbyang ku dang/ khyi dang wa dang ra? dag dang/ byi la byi ba spre'u gzugs/ /bse dang phag dang dred mo dang/ /nya dang rul sbal dag gi gzugs/ /kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/ /pwa dang 'ug
326b4(rgyud 'grel): pa khu yug dang/ /bya rog khra dang nya ming can/ /rma bya dang pa thi ba dang/ khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang/ /kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su/ /gdon rnams la ni mi yis mthong/ /'dab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis kyang/ /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /kha cig
326b5(rgyud 'grel): mi yi mgo can la/ /lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang bral ba dag tu snang/ sa dang bar snang phyogs dag tu/ /khengs nas sems can byung ba ste/ /gzhon nus lus la rnam par za/ /bsdad pa gang dang gang
326b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams su/ /sems can rnams kyis 'dug mi ster/ /bar snang tshogs nas byung nas su/ /gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byas/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du 'dug mi ster zhing/ lus la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /gzhan
326b7(rgyud 'grel): yang mi dang mi ma yin gyi sems can rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ /zhags pa ral gri 'dzin rnams dang/ /mda' gzhu mdung rnams thogs nas su/ /skra 'dzings skra mdud spyi gtsug tu/ /khro bo'i tshul du bstan pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du mi ston
327a1(rgyud 'grel): to/ /mi rgod mang po der byung nas/ /bsdigs shing tshogs par byed pa ste/ /khrid pa'i tshul ni bstan nas su/ mtshon gyi gdengs zhing bsdigs par byed/ /sems can thams cad gnod byed pa/ mi rgod de rnams sdig pa can/ lha dang
