327a2(rgyud 'grel): klu dang dri za dang/ /gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/ /nyin gsum pa'i smyo byed dang/ de bzhin du ni rig dags dang/ /'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa/ /gnod sbyin srin bo ma rungs rnams/ /'dir ni 'khod de gzhon nu la/ drag shul gyis ni gnod byed do/
327a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang bya rog 'ug pa dang/ /bya gag bya la sogs pa yis/ /bar snang dag la 'tshe bar byas/ /gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams/ /'dir ni 'khod de gzhon nu la/ /drag shul gyis ni gnod byed do/ /gzhan yang bya rog 'ug
327a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bya gag bya la sogs pa yis/ /bar snang dag la 'tshe bar byed/ /gdon rnams de rnams dag gis ni/ /log par bstan nas 'tshe byed pa/ /bud med dag dang skyes ba dang/ /de bzhin bu pho bu mo dang/ /mngal na gnas pa 'ang
327a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par byed/ /dud 'gro'i skyes gnas gtogs pa 'ang 'tshe/ /skar ma dag dang nyi zla dag /gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid/ /lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang/ /me tog sman dang zas skom dang/ /mi rnams kyi ni dpal
327a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog cing/ /mthong po rnams ni dma' bar byed/ /'jig rten dag na rmongs pa'i rnams/ /dmag dang 'thab mo sha gnyer dang/ tshig gam bzhig gam gsad bya ba/ /de kun 'byung po'i rnam par bsgyur/ /steng cing gtong bar byed
327a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /log par byed cing dgod par bgyed/ /'jigs par byed cing lta bar bgyis/ /dgrar 'gyur pa yang ston par bgyid/ /sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ /nyal bdag la gnod par bgyid/ /sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing//
327b1(rgyud 'grel): mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid/ /mdza' bo gnyen gshes gzugs dag tu/ dga' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid/ /bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod par spyod par dga' bar bgyid/ /nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs
327b2(rgyud 'grel): su gda' bar bgyid/ /rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/ /de la gnod par byed par gda' / /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyir/ rnam par sbal nas ljon shing dang/ mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda' / skyes
327b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhon nu gzugs mdzes pas/ /'bar zhing shing rta sgra yang 'byin/ /gnad rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/ /grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyis/ /sgo yang gdon chen de dag 'byed/ /srog dang lus kyang blangs
327b4(rgyud 'grel): bgyid shing/ /lam ngan kun tu bskor bar bgyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams/ /lus lan bar gnas par ston/ /nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang/
327b5(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag /thams cad log par de dag ston/ /de bzhin log par bstan byed pa/ /'jig rten la ni 'jigs par byed/ /'tshe ba sgra zin gzhon nu la/ /phyin ci log cing gnod par
327b6(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /gzhon nu sgra can zin la gnod pa de rnams kyis/ /zhe sdang byas shing 'tshe bar byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la na shin tu gtses so zhes bya ba ni/ /dug lnga khong du shar bas zhe sdang byas shing nga rgyal che ba dang/ ma shes
327b7(rgyud 'grel): par shes par smra ba/ ma mnyan par mnyan par smra ba/ /rang gi rigs pas smras zhing gzhan la bston pa/ bla ma la mi zhu zhing/ rang rig gis bstan pa dang/ bla ma'i rig pa bzhag cing/ rang rig smra ba dang/ lus dang bka' la mi ston cing/ rang
328a1(rgyud 'grel): gi nga rgyal gyis rang bzo byas pa dang/ tshe phyi ma la mnar med du skye ste/ tshe 'di la yang gdon de rnams kyis 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzhon nu sgra can zin yang/ skad sna tshogs 'byin cing gzugs sna
328a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ston cing gdon rnams kyis phar then tshur then byas shing rang gi lus la rang dbang med do/ /gzhon nu sgra gcan zin de 'jigs par byed bcing 'dar te/ lus la yang na tshas thebs te/ bcom ldan 'das dran zhing skang sna tshogs 'byin
328a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo/ /chos la skyabs su gsol lo/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su gsol lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang/ gdon rnams kyi lan cig bzhag go/
328a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ma thag tu bsil ba'i tshal nas bros te/ bros ma thag tu gdon rnams kyis ded pa dang/ gzhon nu sgra can zin mdog shor zhing/ ba spu yang gyen la log ste/ hag zad cing 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo/ /rig sngags
328a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gdon gyis zin pa'i gnas skabs te/ gnyis pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyi zin pa'i de nas so/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/ bya rgod gyi
328a6(rgyud 'grel): phung po'i rig la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhes bya ba ni/ gdon thams cad kyis 'tshe bar byas pas/ 'jigs shing mdog kyang shor ste/ ba spu rnams gyen du log cing/ g.yangs ste phar lta tshur lta
328a7(rgyud 'grel): byas shing/ gdon rnams kyis phyir 'brang ngo/ /sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bya ba ni/ bag chags dang shes bya'i dri ma thams cad 'joms pa sems can thams cad gyi don mdzad pa/
328b1(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid kyi ye shes khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ces pa rdo rje'i seng ge pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs te/ bya rgod phung po'i rig zhal yas khang gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang/
328b2(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen pha dang/ lha dang mi dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i spyan sngar 'jigs shing lus po thams cad bdar ba dang kha nas dbugs kyang 'thon te/ /bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra
328b3(rgyud 'grel): gcan zin gdon gyis btab pa'i 'jigs pas bcom ldan 'das la gus par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus te/ mchi ma blags so zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyis btab pa'i yul gyis/ kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing dbyar gyi char bzhin
328b4(rgyud 'grel): du gdong gi mchi ma mi thub po/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhu nu sgra gcan zin yul che ba de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sems dang
328b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ sngon gyi bya ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi lo rgyus thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don la tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la bka' stsal pa'i/ /zhes sgra gcan 'dzin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun du 'dug nas mchi ma klog ces
328b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad skad cig mas thugs su chud nas/ des tshig gi gtam dris pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la smras pa'o//
328b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar des tshig gi gtam smras shing zhus pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i
329a1(rgyud 'grel): tshal nags na zhes bya ba ni/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ham dang rgyal po'i khab dang/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi bar na dpa tshad gcig yod de/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i lho phyogs na ro thams cad bskul ba'i sa/ rnam rtog gsum bcom
329a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /rnam rtog gsum dang/ bsil ba'i tshal na nges tshig gang gi phyir zhe na/ bsil ba'i tshal de yang/ 'jigs pa'i sgra'i rnam par rtog ba byung ste/ sems can thams cad mnyam ba nyid sgom zhing/ byams pa'i stobs
329a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /rnam par rtog pa de spangs pas 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin de mi 'byung ngo/ /ngo tsha'i rnam par rtog pa ni yi dags dang/ ro yang gcer bur gnas te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can yang mi rtag
329a4(rgyud 'grel): ste de'i ngo bor bzhag nas 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ma lta bu yin te/ de'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo tsha ba'i rnam rtogs dang bral ba'o/ /skyug bro ba'i rnam rtog ni dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal de la yang 'byung ste/ ro'i rnam pa mi gcig pa dang
329a5(rgyud 'grel): sha dang khrag dang klang pa la sogs pas khengs pa'i sa gzhi yin te/ de bzhin du rang gi lus la rnag dang mchis ma dang rgyu ma dang gci ba la sogs pa yang 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mi rtag cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /bsil ba'i
329a6(rgyud 'grel): tshal ni rnam par rtog pa gsung dang bral zhing/ yang dag pa'i ye shes de nas de byung ste/ dngos grub thams cad kyi sa gzhi/ byang chub thob pa'i lam/ sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa/ sems can
329a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dug gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa dang 'bral bar byed pas na bsil ba'i tshal yin te/ de bzhin du lus ngag yid zhi bar byed bas na/ bsil ba'i tshal yin zhes/ yang na bsil ba'i tshal ni rnam par rtogs ba
329b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro/ /bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis na zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga'i rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal dang zhes sdang byas te/ de bzhin du gti mug kyang shes cha zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la mi zhu zhing bdag dgra bcom pa thob par bya snyam
329b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bsil ba'i tshal du mchis so/ /zhes smras so/ /der zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil pa'i tshal gyis dbus su bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad myong ba zhes pa'o/ /lha'i gdon rnams dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin
329b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi gdon yang gzugs sna tshogs ston cing/ lha'i 'khor pho dang lha'i 'khor mo sna tshogs pa bya ba stong gi lha dang/ bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang/ de bzhin du lha ma yin gyis kyang 'tsho bar byas so/ /zhes ba'o/ /klu'i gdon rnams dang gnod sbyin gyi
329b4(rgyud 'grel): gdon rnams dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i nad thams cad gtong zhing/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs sna tshogs bstan te/ de bzhin du bye ba stong gi klu dang/ bye ba stong gi gnod sbyin dang bye ba phrag brgya'i klu'i g.yog dang thabs gcig tu 'tshe bar byas so//
329b5(rgyud 'grel): srin po'i gdon rnams dang/ mi 'am ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha khrag la dga' zhing/ gdon de gnyis ni dpon g.yog dang bcas shing/ bya ba stong dang bya ba brag brgya'i gdon rnams kyis kyang bdag la 'tsho gar byas so/ /zhes pa'o/
329b6(rgyud 'grel): dri za'i gdon rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gru len zhing bro rdung zhing sgra sna tshogs ston te/ gdon de gnyis ni bye ba phrag brgya 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa byung ste/ de bzhin du bdag la gnod pa/ /
329b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyal zhes bya ba'o/ /mi'i gdon rnams dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang na/ gzugs dang sgra sna tshogs byas shing byung ba ste/ de bzhin du g.yog dang 'khor mang po 'dus shing sgom
330a1(rgyud 'grel): du mi ster ba'o/ /yi dags kyi gdon rnams dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de gnyis kyang bzhin mi sdug cing/ mdun du ltar byung ste/ gzugs sna tshogs ston cing sgra sna tshogs ston pa'o/ /sha
330a2(rgyud 'grel): za'i gdon rnams dang/ grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gsus pa che la mgo che ba mang po 'dus nas byung ste/ gdon de rnams kyis kyang phyogs bzhi nas 'tshe bar byas pa'o/ /gzig rnams dang bya rog rnams dang 'ug pa/
330a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang grog bur rnams dang sdig sbrul rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang lus la 'tshe bar byas shing/ bdag la na che byung ngo zhes pa'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams
330a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ bdag shin tu gtses pa lags mod kyi zhes bya ba ni/ mi rgod mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ gzhan yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la sdug bsngal thams cad myong zhing 'tshe bar byas so
330a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan zin gyis smras ba'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don dmigs la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i
330a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra sgregs pa'o/ /sgra gcan zin khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni/ gti mug gi rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal dang/ phrag dog byas ted yang khyod kyis ma byed cig ces rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal be con
330a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags ni chos sku ste/ bsil ba'i tshal ni lung sku'o/ /tshal ni sprul sku ste/ be con ni chang ba thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa stong ba ste/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing brjod du
330b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o/ /sngags ni ma man+d+ra ste skyob pa dang bscang? ba'o/ /de yang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /bsil ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin/ yong pa yang min med yang min/ gnyis ka yang ma yin no/ /tshal ni sprul
330b2(rgyud 'grel): sku ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la dus cig du nam mkha' khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /be con gyi lha'i gdon rnams kyi chad pa dang 'jig rten 'di'i rgyal po dang/ rkun mo dang chu dang me la sogs pa'i chad pa dang
330b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang gshin rje dang 'khor ba nas 'bral te/ de sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bas na be con zhes bya ba'o/ /yang na bsil ba'i tshal ni lus ngag yid zhi bar byas te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed
330b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gzungs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba ni/ gzungs ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gzungs te/ de yang dag par bzung zhing/ stong pa nyid la sems bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /'khor
330b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sar 'khor ba'o/ /dge slong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dgra gcan zin gyi
330b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ dge slong ma lnga brgya la sogs pa'o/ /dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po ma skyes sgra dang/ btsun mo la sogs pa'o/ /bsrung ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ spa ba dang/ yun ring po'i
330b7(rgyud 'grel): don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang bar gyur na /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing bde ba thob pa'o/ /lha dang mis kyang de bzhin zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ gzugs
331a1(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi lha dang 'dod khams kyi lha dang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gus par byed pa'i mi rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'di zung zhig ces pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid gang zhe na/ shes rab dang thabs yin
331a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'dir ni shes rab kyi ngo bo las/ thabs kyi ngo bor mi snang ngo zhes pa'o/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa ni/ mtshon pa dag ni ye shes te/ mtshon byed rig sngags rgyal mo la/ /phyag mtshan sku mdog bstan pa de/ /thabs
331a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mtshon pa ni shes rab bo/ /rig sngags nyid bsgom pa ni/ thabs kyi ngo bo nyid yin te/ de yang mtshon par byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir na thabs cad shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/ /de'i phyag
331a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang sku mdog ni gang zhe na/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan can/ spyan gsum pa zhal g.yas dkar po/ /g.yon dmar ba lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa phyag
331a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i gsum na/ ral gri dang/ skyabs sbyin dang rin po chen stong na rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa gsum na/ bum pa'i steng na rdo rje dang/ zhags pa dang lcags kyu'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i
331a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ba ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid las kyi rigs rlung gi khams/ lus kyi skye mched traM gi yig 'bru las ye shes lnga 'bros sems can thams cad kyi don byas
331a7(rgyud 'grel): so/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshig ni las kyi snying po ste/ 'di lta ste/ oM gA baM gA bAM ga la so gas pa'o/ /rgyal po dbang po dang zhes bya ba ni/ brgya byin yin te/ zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa sku
331b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser po/ /spyan gsum pa la dpral ba'i mig phyed las yod pa/ lha'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang mnga' o?/ /gson pa gnyis na gdugs dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal
331b2(rgyud 'grel): po gshin rje dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog nag po khro bo'i tshul du bstan pa dbu la sgra thor tshugs can g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang be con 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'o
331b3(rgyud 'grel): ma he la zhon pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ste/ sku mdog dkar po go cha gyon pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ g.yas pa na ral gri g.yon pa na ri bong gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rnga mo dkar po'i shing rta la zhon
331b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rgyal po chu la dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal cig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po sgrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na pad+ma dmar po ste/ 'og ma rin po che'o/ /g.yon pa dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa 'og ma na bum
331b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa ste/ /chu srin la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po dang nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa/ g.yas na ral gri g.yon pa na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o//
331b6(rgyud 'grel): shing rta dang bcas shing nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o/ /rgyal po rlung lha dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog sngo skya phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ba dan dang lcags kyu bsnams pa g.yon pa gnyis na rlung 'khyil ba dang bam
331b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams shing sha pa la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po gzi can dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste/ sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags 'dzin cing/ g.yon na a 'bras 'dzin cing kun ber la zhen pa'o/ /rgyal
332a1(rgyud 'grel): po sems shing bya ba ni/ dpa' ba sangs yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas na bum pa spyi blugs g.yon pa phreng ba bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po gshin rje'i dbyug
332a2(rgyud 'grel): to can zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar nag phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ ral gri dang tho ba bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na/ zhags pa dang sdig mdzub mdzad cing/ ro langs la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po me'i dbyug tho can
332a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ me lha'i dbang po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gcig dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa me 'bar ba dang phred pa bsnams pa skyes pa zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po dbyug rdo
332a4(rgyud 'grel): can dang zhes bya ba ni mig dmar yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po khro bo/ /g.yas na dbyug to mig can 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa na mi mgo sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o/ /ra dmar po la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po rgyal ba zhes
332a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni slen? pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas na po ti bsnams pa/ g.yon bum pa bsnams pa/ phrag gi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba ni/ phung bu yin te/ zhal gcig
332a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog mthing nag phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu bsnams shing glang po la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lag ba yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang nag phyag
332a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na ral gri g.yon na sdig 'dzub rus sbal la zhon pa/ rgyal po rnam par gzigs dang zhes zhes bya ba ni/ rA hUM la yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag po ro smad med pa phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na zla ba dang nyi ma bsnams
332b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po 'byung po zhes bya ba ni/ dbang ldan yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ thal ba'i mdog can spyan gsum pa phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gsum dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa/ g.yon ba gnyis na phreng
332b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ a 'bras bsnam pa glang la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal po yul 'khor srung bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhig sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na 'khor lo dang mchod rten bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o//
332b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog mthing ka/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ dbyug tho dang tho ba bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis na rin po che dang rtse gsum bsnams pa pad+ma'i
332b4(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi la/ sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma/ gnyis pa dgra sta g.yon dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa gnyis pa dung bsnams pa/
332b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po lus ngan po zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri/ 'og ma na dbyug to/ g.yon pa na ne le/ 'og ma na bum pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la
332b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal po mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ser po/ spyan gsum pa phyag g.yas na dbyug tho gsum/ 'og ma mchod sbyin g.yon dang po na 'phreng ba/ 'og ma na bum pa spyi blugs/
332b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi rgyal po 'jig rten la thugs brtse bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rnams yin te/ de yang chos sku dang
333a1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ sprul sku yin te/ 'dir yang sprul sku'i rang bzhin ni thugs rje che zhing sems can gyi don la bshad de/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/
333a2(rgyud 'grel): sa gnon gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rab tu byung ba'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dus gcig tu sems can gyi don la snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad la srung du gsol/ srung du
333a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa 'chang ba gang yin pa de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang srung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang de
333a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ yongs su bskyal ba dang yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur pa dang chad pa spang pa dang tshon cha spang ba dang dug bsad pa dang dug gzhil ba dang mtshams bcad pa dang sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol
333a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la gus par byas nas/ 'chang ba dang klog pa dang sgom pa la sogs pa byas te/ de bzhin du de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bar bya'o zhes pa'o/ /rig sngags
333a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gang zhe na/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ste/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /gzhi bstan pa ni
333a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par thar pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ste/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa/ zhal bzhi bstan pa ni rnam par
333b1(rgyud 'grel): thar ba'i sgo bzhi'i dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan ni/ gti mug la sogs pa dug lnga bcom nas/ ye shes lnga shar ba'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /spyan gsum dang ldan pa ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis mun pa mun nag bcom nas 'khor ba thams cad
333b2(rgyud 'grel): las thar bar byed pa'o/ /zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po bstan pa ni/ mngon spyod dang zhi ba dang dbang dang rgyas pa'i las bzhi bstan pa'o/ /khro bo dang/ zhi khro ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ sgegs pa dang/ rgod pa ni sems can mi gcig
333b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /sku mdog nag po ni byams pa chen po ldan pa'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag par dag pa'o/ /phyag brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam par
333b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'o/ /g.yas dang po na ral gri ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin blo dman pa rnams la blo 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /'og ma na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa ni/ sems can ma rig pa'i las las thar bar byed pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma na dgra sta bsnams pa
333b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'khor ba rnams la gcod par byed pa'o/ /tha ma na mnga' bsnams pa ni/ thabs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i dang po na zhags pa bsnams pa ni/ 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems can 'dren pa'o/ /de'i 'og mas 'khor lo bsnams
333b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ gti mug la sogs pa'i dug lnga gcod pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma na rtse gsum bsnams pa ni/ srid pa gsum 'joms par byed pa'o/ /tha ma na gzhu bsnams pa ni/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa
333b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ bdud bzhi rnam par bcom pa'i brda'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ chos de'i nyams myong 'khor ba thams cad las thar ba'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi bya ba bstan nas/ khro bo'i tshul du sems can ma
334a1(rgyud 'grel): rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bA la bA ti tsa ra ma ti la sogs pa'o/ /sgra gcan be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba ni/ gdon thams cad las thar bar
334a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ chad pa thams cad 'joms pa/ lam thams cad las kyang thar ba ste/ rig sngags 'di ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ mthu che zhing dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rig sngags 'di bzung na sdug
334a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed pa'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di skud pa las btags sam zhes bya ba ni/ skud pa sngon po bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo lo brgyad nas bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar gyis
334a4(rgyud 'grel): gos gtsang ma gon zhing khrus legs par byas te/ kha zas bzang po la brten cing kha lho phyogs su bstan la bkal bar bya'o/ /rig sngags re re la mdud pa re re bor te/ rig sngags dang mdud pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/ /de bzhin
334a5(rgyud 'grel): du byas nas/ gdon thams cad las thar ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /mgul lam lus sam lag pa la brtags na zhes bya ba ni/ gro ga 'am/ shing shun nam/ ras sam/ ngar la sogs pa la bris
334a6(rgyud 'grel): nas mgul du btags te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo 'am/ rnga la sogs pa la btags pas kyang/ thos pa tsam gyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam yang bsrung ngo/ /kun nas dpag tshad brgya kho
334a7(rgyud 'grel): ra yug tu zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi yul du 'gro na yang rang gi yul gyi srung ba byas pas kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rig sngags 'di mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ /thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o//
334b1(rgyud 'grel): dri 'am me tog rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung bzhin du mchod par byas te cho gar byas te/ bzung? bar byas te/ 'chang ba la sogs pa gus par byas na/ de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya rnams kyis de spang? bar
334b2(rgyud 'grel): byas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma rnams la yang srung bar byed de/ 'di'i lam las yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o/ /de la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di
334b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob cing/ da ltar yang chad pa la sogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi ni rgyal po dang/ rkun po dang/ mi rgod dang gnyen po shes la sogs pas lto phye?
334b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chad pa dang gzhan yang 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral ba'o/ /mi ma yin pa rnams ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ chu dang me'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/ /mtshon dang dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ g.yul 'byed pa dang
334b5(rgyud 'grel): glo bur du 'thab pa ste/ des mi tshugs shing dug rnam pa gsum gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /nad dang rims rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze las gyur pa la sogs pa dang/ bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung dang ldan pa dang/ 'dus pa la sogs pa'i nad do/ /rims
334b6(rgyud 'grel): drag po dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi 'dus pa yin te/ de bzhin du rlung shas che zhing gzhu bzhin du gug ste/ mda' btang ba bzhin du rengs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi sbod gtong btang ba dang/ 'jig
334b7(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi rigs pa spang ba dang/ de bzhin du gsang sngags gshin rje dang/ ma mo dang/ 'jig rten gyi ngan sngags kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /ro langs dang/ khro dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ rigs pa mkhan pos ro langs bsgrubs nas btang te/ de yang de'i
335a1(rgyud 'grel): khro dug gis kyang mi tshugs so/ /me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams yin te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs so/ /rig sngags dang gsang
335a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang/ sbyor bas legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ bri nyes dang smra nyes dang/ bsgom nyes pa dang gtam nyes pa dang tshul nyes pa dang de la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad ni/ rig sngags 'di'i
335a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis nyes pa thams cad kyang gso bar byas pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di'i gsang sngags kyi tshig tsam gyis bar chod byed pa'o/ /gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par byed/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed
335a4(rgyud 'grel): do/ /gzhan yang dngos grub nyams par gyur na/ rig sngags 'dis 'grub par 'gyur te/ thob pa rnams gzhan la ma gtang ste/ glo bur gyi bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang 'jig
335a5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi skyon rnams yin te/ de'i 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis sbyor ba'i sngags btang te/ des kyang mi tshugs shing bar chod dang 'bral ba'o/ /nad dang mya
335a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan dang bgegs rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi brgya brgyad cu'i nad rnams dang mya ngan gyis mi phog cing/ bgegs kyi rigs stong phrag bcu las thar pa'o/ /'thab pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni phra ma dang bcugs
335a7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'thabs rtsod kyi rgyud rnams rna bas mi thos shing/ bde ba dang dge ba'i gtam thos te/ 'thab rtsod dang nyag nyog gi sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o/ /gdon thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ sgom pa la bsgom du ma ster ba
335b1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba dang dge ba byed pa de rnams kyang bgegs rigs te/ de rnams kyis mi tshugs shing/ rigs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi tshugs pa'o/ /gdon gang gis mi gtong ba de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags
335b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis srung ba dang 'chang ba dang sgom pa dang/ kha don byed pa la sogs pa la gnod par byed na/ rig sngags kyis dmod mos/ mgo tshal pa tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /srog dang bral zhing dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje
335b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba la bar chod byed pa dang/ gzhan yang
335b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i sgo nas dge ba las bar chod byed na/ phyag na rdo rje gzi brjid kyis dum bur byas shing/ dngos po mi snang bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang lcags kyi 'khor los spu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phur? bar byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags
335b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam las 'das shing/ gdon rnams kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byas te/ de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po bzhi rnams kyis kyang lcags kyi 'khor lo me lce 'bar bas dum bu dum bur byas shing/ chad pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gnod
335b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyis 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi thob po zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i gdon des shi ba ni rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas shi ste/ gal te 'byung po'i
335b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs su skyes na lcang lo can gyi pho brang du mi tshud do/ sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa'o/ /rgyal po dang mi rgod dang me dang chu dang mtshon dang 'brog dang dgon pa dang/ mya
336a1(rgyud 'grel): ngan du song ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis chad pa thams cad gcod bar byed pa ste/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang bsgoms shig yid la zung zhig mchod par gyis shig kha ton du bya zhing sems can
336a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la phan par gyis shig ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du byas na de dang de'i 'jigs pa dang 'bral ba'o/ /yang na bdud bzhis mi tshugs te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig pa 'di lan gcig
336a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni da ltar byas pa ni yang 'dag ste/ sngon du byas pa yang 'dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du mthu che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang 'bral bar byed pa'o//
336a4(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan zin gyi rkyen gyi sems can gyi don la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags 'di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu
336a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis/ chad pa thams cad 'joms pa/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
336a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams khams bsam gyis mi khyab cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o/ /gsung ba gsungs bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung ste/ de bzhin du da ltar bzhugs
336a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal rjes su yi rang 'di'i lam gyis 'bras bu grub pa'o/ /grub mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba ni/ thun mong gi dngos grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ thun mong gi dngos grub kyang
336b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub ste/ thun mong ma yin pa yang de bzhin no/ /thun mong gi dngos grub ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sa la spyod ba dang/ nam mkha' la spyod pa dang sa'i 'og nas spyod pa'o/ /de la sogs pa phra mo'i dngos grub kyang yod de/ de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon
336b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod la sogs pa'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni/ sa la spyod pa la sogs pa ni mgo mnyam ste/ nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa bzhin du 'khor ba bor zhing srid pa ma yin 'das pa yang ma yin te/ da ltar yod pa yang ma
336b3(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /de'i dngos grub thob pa'i phyir na mchog tu grub pa'o/ /gzhan gyis mi thob pa ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi thub ste/ de bzhin du gdon la sogs pas kyang mi thub pa'o/ /lha dang klu dang dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang ?
336b4(rgyud 'grel): lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye la sogs pas bstod pas zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di la rtag tu rjes su yi rang ste/ mchod par byas shing rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da' o/ /'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su ??
336b5(rgyud 'grel): ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i sems yod pa rnams kyang rig sngags kyi srung ba yod par gyur nas/ gzhan yang de'i rtsar bsdad nas/ de rnams kyang song bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing rjes su yi rang
336b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang/ rig sngags 'di lus la btags par byas so/ /yid la bzung zhing
336b7(rgyud 'grel): kha ton du byas so/ /bsgoms par byas so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi go cha gon nas gti mug la sogs pa dug lnga bor te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par dur khrod bsil pa'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba'i nang du song ngo/ /sems can 
337a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba'o/ /nad med pa dang 'jigs pa med par gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon rnams dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang/ klu'i gdon rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams
337a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ srin po'i gdon rnams dang/ mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang/ dri za'i gdon rnams dang/ mi ma yin gyi don rnams dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang/ yi dags kyi don rnams dang/ 'byung po'i gdon rnams
337a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sha za'i gdon rnams dang/ grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang/ gzig rnams dang bya rog rnams dang 'ug pa rnams dang/ grog spur rnams dang/ sdig sprul rnams dang/ gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin gyi sems can rnams kyis kyang/
337a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la gus par byas te/ phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod par byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin yang dgra bcom pa yang dag pa thob cing/ zag pa zad pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ cho 'phrul ston nus pa'o/ /bkra
337a5(rgyud 'grel): shis te/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam du 'jug pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis gdon 'dul ba'i gnas skabs te/ gsum pa'o// //rig sngags kyi snying po
337a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa dang po rdzogs so// //de nas rgyal po chen po lus ngan po dang/ yul 'khor srung dang mig mi bzang dang/ 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ dri
337a7(rgyud 'grel): za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang grul bum gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa/ de bzhin du bu dang yang bcas pa'o/ /blon po dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas mngag? gzhug pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas
337b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yog 'khor dang bcas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ grul bum dang/ klu stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ thabs gcig tu ste/ de bzhin du chung ma dang/ bu dang bu mo dang/ tsha bo dang yang tsha bo la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu'o/ /kha dog 'phags pa
337b2(rgyud 'grel): dag nam phyed na lhags nas/ gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri nas/ sems can gyi don la 'khor bzhi po dag dang bcas shing 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang
337b3(rgyud 'grel): du phyin nas bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyang so so rang rang gi gzi brjid dang mthu dang kha dog dang stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dang bcas shing dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal la kha bltas pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyi kha dog dang mthus
337b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od chen po snang bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi kha dog ma yin te/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'khor dang bcas pa'i gzi brjid kyi so so rang rang gi rang bzhin mthu'i kha dog ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
337b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang/ dge snyen pha dang dge snyen ma dang/ lha dang mi dang/ 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
337b6(rgyud 'grel): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar te/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ 'khor de dag rnams dang/ bcas shing bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas so so rang rang gi me tog dang spos la sogs pas/
337b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la lus ngag yid gsum gyis gus par byas nas/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing/ de rnams kyang thabs
338a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu 'khod pa'o/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang dbyangs cig skad cig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das la gus par  
338a2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa/ ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos sku dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang ba/
338a3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ dang ngo/ /mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan zhing/ sems can gyi don la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o/ /sprul pa'i
338a4(rgyud 'grel): sku de yang dpa' ba dang zhing bdud bzhi bcom pa la stobs dang ldan te/ bag chags dang shes bya'i sgrib pas mgos shing/ nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing 'khor ba'i ming yang med do/ /de bzhin nyid du ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
338a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal zhing 'dud pa'o/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis gang khyen pa/ de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong sems can gyi don la thug la bzung ba/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la
338a6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig mas khyab pa/ sems can lta ba mi gcig pa rnams la so so rang rang gi chos ston pa ste/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la 'jig rten dag gis mi 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po chen po
338a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/ lan dang po 'dul ba ni/ chos sku'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i sku ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la 'bul ba'o/ /lan gnyis pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang
338b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi gyi ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'bul ba'o/ /sems can don la rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang ldan te/ stong gsum la skad cig mas sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
338b2(rgyud 'grel): sku la bstod pa'o/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer ser nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang/ 'obs rim pa bdun gyi bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo
338b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phar lcags las byas shing/ sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu grags par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' 
338b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan nas rgyu ma chen po'i mngal du zhugs te de skyes nas rab tu gyur nas ma ga d+ha'i dbus su rdo rje gdan la yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bdud la sogs pa bcom zhing/ de rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral te/ de lta
338b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rang bzhin du shAkya'i bu sangs rgyas te/ gau ta ma'i rigs su skyes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng+ge la phyag 'tshal bstod cing 'dud do zhes bya ba'o/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal
338b6(rgyud 'grel): to zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas mkhyen pa/ lha rnams kyis ci smos zhes te/ rgya mtsho'i nang na nor yod pa bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'o/ /de nas zhes
338b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis bstod pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ngar zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul dang spro lags sam/
339a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bde bar gnas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bde lags sam/ snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ nyam nga ba ma mchis saM
339a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi po rnams kyis bar du mchod dam/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum po ma shor ram zhes bya ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la/ gnod pa mi mnga' lags sam zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa bdud bzhi'i rigs kyis 'byung
339a3(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyi chos la bar chod ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ chos la bar chod byed cing/ sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa rnams yin te/ yid mi bde bar byed pa yang de rnams
339a4(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ lus lan tsha drag pos thebs par byed pa yang de yin no/ /sems can mngal na 'tshe ba ni/ mi'i khong du zhugs nas/ mer mer po dang/ nur nur po rnams kyang 'chags su mi ster te/ gal te chags nas kyang mal na tsha drag pos thebs?
339a5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'chi ba dang shi ro dang skyes nas shi ba dang/ der ma nus na glags gar rnyed pa'i dus su gnod pa skyel pa'o/ /mngal du zhugs pa'i dus du yang gzi brjid 'phrog cing/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed pa'o//
339a6(rgyud 'grel): chung pa la 'jug ni/ ba spu'i rtse mo brgya stong tsam gnas zhes bya ba'o/ /che ba ni ri rab pas kyang che ste/ stobs gtang na ri rag kyang 'gul lo/ /rgyu ba'i dus khams gsum skad cig mas rgyu'o/ /de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis gnod
339a7(rgyud 'grel): par ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /rims drag po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nad bzhi brgya brgyad cu de las 'du ba yis te/ nad de rnams kyis kyang mi mnga' 'am zhes pa'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems dpa' dang
339b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rkun mo dang mi rgod dang rgyal po la sogs pa yin te/ mi dang mi ma yin pa ni ma rungs pa'i sdig can gyi rigs sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams so/ /de rnams kyang gnod pa ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba
339b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bzhis snyun gsol ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las snyun gsol ba ni lan bka' stsal  
339b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag nga la ni thams cad yod de zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ de'i nang du rin po che sna tshogs zad mi shes pa yod pa bzhin du nga la yang de bzhin no/ /yul dang yang sprod 'tsho ba dang yang ldan lus kyang bden kyang med/
339b4(rgyud 'grel): nyam nga ba yang med do zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin te/ dang po phung po'i bdud bcom pa ste/ gnyis pa nyon mongs pa'o/ /de bzhin du gsum pa 'chi bdag gis bdud bcom pa ste/ bzhi pa lta'i
339b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i bdud bcom pa'o/ /de bas nyam ming zhes bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag nga'i lus la ni gnod pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku la smos ci dgos te/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa la?
339b6(rgyud 'grel): tshugs so/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas rnams la gnod pa skyel bar 'dod pas kyang gnod pa skyel ba'i skabs ma rnyed cing/ gnod pa rnams kyang mi snang ba'o/ /gal
339b7(rgyud 'grel): te gzhan gyi sems la dad pa skyes par gyur na/ 'jig rten 'di la sdug bsngal drag pos thebs cing shi nas kyang mda''phangs pa bzhin du dmyal bar 'gro'o/ /dmyal ba nas kyang ngan song nas ngan song du mi thar te/ thar ba'i dus
340a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi 'ong ngo/ /de bas na bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang/ nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang/ pha ma la sogs pa la yang gnod par mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir na gnod par byed par sems dpa' yang dag par ma mthong ngo zhes
340a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi khyed kyis 'khor rnams de'i 'khor la gnod par byed par sems so zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par bltas pas ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gnod
340a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya bar sems so/ /de sems ma thag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal/ /gnas smra ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po
340a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
340a5(rgyud 'grel): cag gsol pa mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sems bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas srung ba dang sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang zhi ba dang bde legs kyi tshig ni bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /de'i slad du
340a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bskur bgyi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa'i sems ni ci mchis
340a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ zhes bya ba dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar 'dod cing/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis grags pa thos pa dang/ srung ba dang bde bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das nyid la gus par byas shing/ zhu ba
340b1(rgyud 'grel): dbul pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhen zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa dang/ rig sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing nad med de/ ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad bcom zhing yang dag pa'i byang chub
340b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lam la 'jug pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon po dang bas mdza' i gnas lam 'di dag na/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na ro langs dang ro dang lce spyang la sogs pa dang/ bya'i tshogs mang po 'dus
340b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa/ khyi dang lce spyang 'tha' pa'i sgras 'jigs su rung ste/ de bzhin du ro langs dang yi dags kyang skad 'don zhing 'jigs su rung ste/ de bas na mdza' i gnas lam zhes rtags pa'o/ /shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs/ 
340b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sa bzhi de dag nas pa'i gdon rnams ni shin tu mi srun zhing ro la dpa' ste/ gson pa'i sha khrag la dga' zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de/ gzugs sna tshogs ston cing gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang skad sna tshogs 'don zhing
340b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs la 'jigs par byed pa dang/ gdon rigs mi gcig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas shing 'jigs rten gyi khams na sems can la gdon pa'o/ /rims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa
340b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi de rims de dag la 'dus ste/ nad de rnams kyang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis btang zhing sems can rnams la/ gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /mi dang mi ma lags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa gzhi der mi rgod la sogs pa rgyu ba
340b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /gzhan yang rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang mi dang mi ma yin pa ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ma nus pa'o zhes bya ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
341a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de la gnas lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil pa'i tshal la sbyor zhing de la gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
341a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni/ srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la btson par gnas so/ /zhes bya ba ni de ltar bar chod kyi rkyen bzlog pa dang/ tshe phyi ma'i don la byang chub kyi lam bsgom pa dang/ de ltar mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin bsgom ste/ nyan thos de
341a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang rig sngags yid la byed pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dang ba'i sems dang ldan zhing cung zad cig mchis par bas so zhes
341a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gzhan yang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal thong ma thag tu dge ba'i sems la brtson zhing sems can gzhan rnams la yang sdang ba dang sdig pa'i sems dang mi ldan zhing byams pa
341a5(rgyud 'grel): dang snying rje la brtson zhing chos kyi sems dang ldan ste/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /de'i yon tan gyis ni chung zad gcig mchis pas so zhes bya ba'o/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan 'di la pha ma dang pa'i
341a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan pa ni/ ches mang lags te zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang dag sems can rnams ni dge ba las mi brtson zhing sdig la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa'i sems dang sdang ba'i sems dang gcig gis gcig la 'tshe bar
341a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan zhing chos la rtsom pa nyung ste de ci'i phyir zhe na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa bal tu skye ste/ phal cher sems can des rnams ni mtho ris su 'gro ba nyung zhing ngan song gsum du skye ba'o/ /de bas
342b1(rgyud 'grel): na 'byung po yi dags kyi lus thob nas kyang gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan par skye ba'o/ /de dag ni zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon dang 'byung po rnams glags btsal zhing/ dge ba dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la bar chod byas nas
342b2(rgyud 'grel): mtho ris thob tu mi ster ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa/ rnams la gnod par byed par sems lags te zhes bya ba ni/ phung po la gnod par byas nas rlung dang mkhris
342b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bad kan dang 'dus pa'i nad btang zhing dge ba'i sbyor ba de yang mi nus par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po 'dus pa'o/ /sems la gnod par byed cing mi dga' bar byed pa ste/ bsgom snying mi 'dod cing logs par byed pa'i
342b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan pa mang po yod pa'o/ /bsgom pa'i dus su srog la zhugs shing 'chi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po sha stag yod pa'o/ /bsgom pa'i dus su ltas ngan pa dang rmi lam ngan pa bstan cing phal cher dngos por
342b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung zhing bsgom du mi ster ba ste/ bsgom pa'i gang zag la 'jigs par byas shing/ nam sgom pa'i dus su bar chod byed cing bsgom du mi ster ba'o/ /de bas na gdon de dag gis gnod par bgyid pa lags te zhes bya ba'o/ /rig sngags
342b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po la /gdon gyis glags btsal ba'i gnas skabs te bzhi pa'o// //de dgag pa'i slad du zhes bya ba ni don ma rungs pa rnams dang sdig can
342b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi rigs dang sa dang bar snang dngos 'og la rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ de phrag nyi shu rtsa drug go /de bzhin du g.yog dang chung ma dang bu dang bu mo la yang yin no/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams dad par
343a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams mi dad de sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyis byin gyi brlabs kyis dad par byed pa'o/ /dad pa rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyi bzhin nas
343a2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa'i sems ni yang nas yang du dad pa skyes pa ste/ de 'ong bar mi byed pa'i sems ni brtan par mi byed pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni sngar gnod par byed 'dod pa'i sems dang sdang bar 'dod pa'i sems de
343a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur na/ 'khor bzhi po de dag dang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar gnas par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsgom pa dang nyan pa la yang bar chod med cing de bzhin du
343a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba la bar chod med cing de rnams la bde bar bgyi bas na bde ba'o/ /ma lus par shin tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma lus par 'joms te/ de 'joms
343a5(rgyud 'grel): na/ de bar du gcod pa'i bgegs kyang smos cing dgos te/ shes bya bde bag chags kyi dri mas mi dgos pa'o/ /bsil ba tshel gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i ?
343a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal rnams kyis gsungs pa thabs shes rab gnyis su med de/ de'i chos kyis nyams myong gis/ zla ba sems can rnams la bsil bar byed pa bzhin du des kyang sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o/ /rig sngags des kyang 'jig
343a7(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams thams cad la nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /mi ma yin pa sdang sems can/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can rnams la phan
343b1(rgyud 'grel): par bgyid pas mi ma yin gdon dang/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang sdig pa'i sems med cing srog gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang srog mi
343b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod cing/ bstan pa yang bsrung bar byed pa'o/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya/ rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis ma dad pa dang dad par byas pa ste/ dad pa rnams
343b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang spong bar mi byed pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang sems la zung zhig ces bya'o/ /mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang/ /mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rlag par byed pas nam do ste/ dge
343b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba 'dod pas na 'do'o/ /yang na sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang chos kyi nges tshig dang/ dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad de nas byung zhing bshad de de gsal bar bshad pas mdo zhes bya'o/ /chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' 
343b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi don thob pas na thob pa ste/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis don gyis 'jigs pa med cing gnod pa yang mi mnga' ste/ sems can rnams la pha na par byed pa'o/ /gnod
343b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin min po klu rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa thams cad de rnams kyis byed de/ sdig pa yang de rnams kyis byed pa/ sems can la gnod par byed cing za ba dang 'thung ba tshol ba'o/ /? ? mi
343b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod gang yang rung/ /de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos/ ma lus pa thams cad brlag par byed cing thal bar btang ste/ ma dad pa rnams kyang snang bar mi byed do/ /lha dang lha
344a1(rgyud 'grel): min rlung lha dang/ ma mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yis/ /zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang/ phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa dang/ dam tshig la gnas pa'i lho mo rnams yin te/ de
344a2(rgyud 'grel): yang ye shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi lha mo rnams so/ /gzhal med khangs mdzes de dag ni/ me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal yas khang la gnas te/ ye shes pa yang de bzhin
344a3(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ so so rang rang gi 'od zer gyi snang bas nam mkha' la mdzes par snang ba'o/ /nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra bar/ rin chen las byas shin tu snang/ zhes bya ba ni/ mun pa mun nag gi nang na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches mi snang ste/ de
344a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du nyi ma zla bas gsal bar byas shing rin po che mthong ngo/ /de bzhin du glo bur gyi skyon nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bkag cing bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdam ngag bstan pas ye shes de snang ba'o/ /bsod nams byas pa dag gis
344a5(rgyud 'grel): gang/ rab sdang gdon rnams rnam par spangs/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin de'i dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gnod par byed pa dang sdig pa bsags pa thams cad des de'i 'joms par byed pa'o/ /mi la gnod byed gang
344a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i/ 'byung po grul bum srin po dang/ /zhes bya ba ni khams gsum tsam yang skad cig gis khyab ste/ la la bza' rgyu yod cing mchod par 'os te/ la la sems can rnams kyis kyang sdang zhing dmod mos dmod pa'o/ /de 'byung
344a7(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyis kyang mi'i sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/ /yi dags srul po de dag gis/ /rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste/ zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes sdig can de dag gis mi mthong
344b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ zhing de dag rnams kyang bde bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid ldan pa'i gdon lha rnams kyis/ /grong khyer du yang mi 'gro'o/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams te/ sems can la gnod par mi byed cing/ byams
344b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang snying rjes 'tsho ba'o/ /de rnams kyis gzi brjid kyis ma rung ba'i gdon rnams kyang rtsar 'gro bar mi nus shing/ gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung po chen po 'du ba na/ der yang de dag 'dur mi 'bad/ zhes bya ba ni/ /sems can la gnod par byed par
344b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po de kun yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang ci smos te/ de 'di ba'i phyi rol yang mi thob cing/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos bde bar mi gnas pa'o/ /stan nams yang na chu yang rung/ /zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin
344b4(rgyud 'grel): de la dam las 'das pa rnams 'thung ba dang/ za ba ci smos te/ 'thung ba'i skom yang zangs kyi chur mthong ngo/ /bza' ba'i zas kyang lcags kyi tho lum 'bar bar mthong/ /lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du/ /nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur/ /zhes
344b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lcang lo can gyi pho brang du sdig can 'byung po gnod byed rnams dang/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung zhing pho brang nang du gtam yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ 'byung po gang zhig
344b6(rgyud 'grel): mi nyan pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni/ yul 'khor bsrung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ spyan mi bzang dang/ lus ngan po rnams yin te/ de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mo dang rgyal
344b7(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi'i tshad pas/ 'byung mo de rnams bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i kha nas khrag dron dag/ /myur du rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pa myur du nad kyi thebs te/ kha nas khrag drong
345a1(rgyud 'grel): skyug cing srog gi dus la bab ste/ mda''phangs pa bzhin du myur du dmyal bar skyes so/ /de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas/ phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi brlag yas rol nas ma rungs pa'i
345a2(rgyud 'grel): nad 'byung po/ de ci'i phyir 'byung zhe na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang/ sems can la gnod par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing/ gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nad de rnams kyis btab na 'chi
345a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ tshe phyi ma ngan song gsum du skye zhing/ 'byung po'i lus blangs par gyur kyang/ gzhan rnams kyis bsnyen du ming tub cing de bas kyang sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi/ mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa/ zhes
345a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po ste/ brgya byin dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ me lha dang/ srin po dang/ rlung lha dang/ dbang ldan dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang/ tshangs pa dang/ sa bdag dang ngo/ /de rnams kyis kyang chad par gsungs
345a5(rgyud 'grel): so/ /yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba ni/ thabs la mkhas pa/ sems can la snying rje che ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ de rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i bka' gsungs pa'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad la
345a6(rgyud 'grel): de la'o/ /mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas zhes bya ba ni/ sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ me'i char 'bab pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'byung po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ za ba dang/ skom med cing rig sngags kyang dmod mos 'chi
345a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su mgo tshal bar gas nas 'chi'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ gnod sbyin gang dag ma nyan pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu la sogs pas gsungs te/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das
345b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bka' ma nyan par gyur na/ de rnams kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o/ /'byung po srin po gang yod pa/ ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'gyur po de rnams ni gcig la gcig gis/ phrag dog gis
345b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan sems skye ste/ de'i ngan pa kyang yang nas yang du ngan pa'o/ /lcags las kyang pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /mtshon cha spu gri so 'dra bas/ zhes bya ba ni/ de yis de ngan pa rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das te/ mtshon cha lta bu'i las kyi sku
345b3(rgyud 'grel): gris yang nas yang du bcod cing sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o/ /gnod sbyin de dag brlag par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das pa dang/ rig sngags kyi bka' i
345b4(rgyud 'grel): dmod mos brlag par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang/ dpal dang ldan pa ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /go cha sra zhing mtshon rno ba//
345b5(rgyud 'grel): stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag/ ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa la ni de dag dang 'khod par byas nas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs nas phyogs phyogs su bsdad pa'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul
345b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsrung/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du grul bum gyi rgyal po 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mgo mi
345b7(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang yin no/ /go cha go na zhing mtshon sna tshogs pa stobs
344a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa sha stag go /de dgeg? 'khod pa yi/ gnyen bskor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bzhi nas bu dang 'khor g.yog dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang phyogs phyogs nas srung
344a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing gnas pa'o/ /seng+ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs/ mi sdug pa dang 'gro zhing rgyu/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang 'dul bar byed pa'i rgyal po rnams ni seng+ge dang stag gi mgo can du gnas pa'o/ /skad cig mas stong
344a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu zhing 'khor bar gnas pa'o/ /glang chen gzugs dang rta'i gzugs/ /kha cig ma he'i gzugs can te/ zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ skad cig mas ri rab rtse mo dang/ bar snang dang sa steng dang sa
344a4(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu dus gcig tu rgyu ba'o/ /dred mo dang ni ba yi gzugs/ /lugs dang spyang ku phag rgod rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul zhing sems can rnams la bstan pa'o/ /sna ba 'phyang dang
344a5(rgyud 'grel): rna bo che/ rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ glang po che bzhin du rna ba 'phyang ba ste/ rna ba gcig pus byas shing/ lus po thams cad khebs pa ste/ /de bzhin du gzugs bstan zhing sems can rnams la gnod par
344a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /skad cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa/ /sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed/ ces bya ba ni/ bum pa'i nang du skad smras pa bzhin du sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas shing 'jigs par byed de/ bar chod
344a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang/ gnod par byed pa'i dus sa g.yo zhing skad sna tshogs 'don par byed pa'o/ /bong bu dang ni rnga mo che/ cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod/ /ces bya ba ni/ mi'i lus la rnga mo bong bu'i mgo bo dang/ gzhan yang sems
344b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi gzugs su sprul nas gzugs dngos su bstan pa dang/ rmi lam du bstan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po stobs po che/ /de dag phan tshun 'du ba ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du stobs dang ldan pas 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang/ rgyal po chen po
344b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis 'dul zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung pa'o/ /lha'i shing rta bcas pa yis/ /nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha thogs shing spung dang bcas shing 'gro ba ste/ de bzhin du bar snang dang sa 'og
344b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sa steng la rgyu ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dag gis bdag po yang/ /mi rnams la ni bde legs byed/ /ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing/ gnod sbyin 'khor yog stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
344b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bdag po ste/ rnam thos kyi bu de yang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing/ snying rje la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du rig sngags la mchod par byed cing gus par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs las/ las kyi rigs  
344b5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin te/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum zhal gsum phyag drug pa
344b6(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /zhal mthing ka/ g.yon dmar ba ste/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ ral gri dang rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /g.yon pa gnyis na/ skyabs sbyin dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /phyag 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gyis mda'
344b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'gengs pa ste/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas skum/ g.yon bskyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing bzhad pa'i chul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags
345a1(rgyud 'grel): ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ b+ha ga hu mu le b+ha ga hu mu le zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnams thos bu/ /mi la zhon pa sde bcas pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa
345a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyi lus 'dar zhing 'jigs par gnas te/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /'di smras nas ni tshub ma langs/ de bzhin ri yang g.yos par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal
345a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis rlung tshub sna tshogs 'byung ste/ sa ni lan drug tu g.yos shing/ dril bu'i skad bzhin du rings par snang ngo/ /rgyal po chen po rnams thos bu'i/ /rin chen shing rta bcas pa na zhes bya ba ste/ byang ngos kyi rgyal po
345a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams thos kyi bu de yang gzugs sna tshogs bstan cing/ rin po che'i gdan la zhugs nas/ skad sna tshogs smra ba'o/ /lha dang mi yi sgra skad sgrag/ rgyal po chen po mchis pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi'i gzugs su sprul zhing rdzu
345a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul chen po stan te/ skad sna tshogs kyang de bzhin du smras pa'o/ /dngos po rnams kyang 'bar 'gyur ro/ /srin po 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags kyi dmod mo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi
345a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rnam thos kyi rgyal po'i bu'i stobs kyis kyang/ ma rungs pa'i srin po 'byung po rnams kyang dngos po rnams ni skrag par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mdun na rgyug par bgyid/ /mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid de
345a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong zhing 'jigs par byed cing/ phyir 'gro ba'o/ /'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid/ /che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing/ rmi lam nyams pa la yang
345b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bstan cing/ 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs te rtag tu sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/ /drag cing mthon na mi sdug la/ spu yang ring la sen mo ring/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug cing lus dang gdong pa khra bor gnas te/ khab dang 'dra ba'i spus ni lus la khengs
345b2(rgyud 'grel): shing de bzhin du sder mo yang mtshon dang 'dra ba'o/ /lag na ral gri tho ba thogs/ sems? ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams ni khrag khrug la dga' zhing phra mo byed pa la dga' ba ste/ de bzhin du khrag khrug byed pa'i sha khrag
345b3(rgyud 'grel): la dga' zhing 'jigs pa'i ral gri dang 'jigs pa'i zangs kyi sa rnams kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /sna che rnga mo rtag gi 'dra/ drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po 'di rnams kyis kyang/ sna tshogs kyi gzugs
345b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan cing/ mi'i lus la mgo gcig pa bstan cing bud med kyi mngal khrag la dga' zhing byis pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/ /yan lag ma tshang phyed tshal lus/ /mig ser lus kyang shin tu ser/ /zhes bya ba ni/ la la mgo bo
345b5(rgyud 'grel): med cing brang la gdong pa yod pa ste/ la la lag pa gcig med cing/ mgo la gnas pa'o/ /tshan cig la yang rkang pa gcig med cing/ lte ba nas res snang res mi snang bar byed de/ la la phyed gzugs su snang zhing sems can rnams
345b6(rgyud 'grel): skrag par byed pa'o/ /dri ma can la lus skem pa/ /skra rdzes lcags kyi mchu can la/ zhes bya ba ni keng rus la lpags pas g.yogs pa dang 'dra bar yod de/ /de la dreg pa chags shing
345b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi sdug pa ste/ khab kyi rtse mo tsam gyi mchu la gsus pa yang ri tsam mo/ /de rta bu'i lus la skra bzangs brdzes pa'o/ /mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid/ /rna ba gzhu 'dra stobs po che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'thab mo la sbyor te
346a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la gcig 'dzugs shing/ 'khrug pa dpung dang bcas pa byas te/ de la mtshon cha tshab che bar 'bebs pas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'o/ /rna ba gzhu 'dra ba yod cing bzhin mi sdug pa yin te/ de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams
346a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang sems can rnams la drag por gnod pa'o/ /sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u'i gzugs/ /phag gi gzugs can lto bo che zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i lus la mgo brnyan mi gcig pa ste/ rtag tu ltas dang rmi lam la yang de'i gzugs bstan pa/ /rnam par
346a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa skyes par byed pa'o/ /de skyes pa dang nad drag pos tshugs te/ nad kyis srog dang 'bral byed pa'o/ /mgo bo che la lag ring ba/ /rna 'phyang po la nu ma 'phyang/ zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan gcig 'dre mo'i gzugs yod de/ dpag tshad
346a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya'i bar nas kyang 'tshe bar byas shing sha khrag len nus te/ bzhin mi sdug cing lag pa ring ba'i rbar mos 'debs pa'o/ /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yis/ /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni rgyal
346a5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/ stobs che zhing mi srun te/ khams gsum tsam la 'gyur zhing dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gnas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/ /de dag ma ni lam log can/ zhes bya ba ni/ de

346a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /g.yog 'khor de dag lan cig tu/ /bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dag lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu 'khod cing gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o//
346b1(rgyud 'grel): gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed do/ /chos dang ldan zhing snying rje skye ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o/ /drag cing rgod
346b2(rgyud 'grel): la gtum pa dang/ /lto bo che la skra ring ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de lta bu'i tshan cig byung ste/ sdig la mi 'dzem zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa drag po'i tshul bstan nas/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir 'gyu ba'o/ /mi rnams dang ni
346b3(rgyud 'grel): ri dags dang/ bya rnams gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ tshan cig grong ngam grong khyer du phyin cing mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ tshan cig ni ri dags la sogs pa'i sems can la 'tshe bar

346b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed cing ma'i mngal nas zhugs nas/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams so/ /sna dang rna ba bcas pa dang/ chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ tshan cig kyang sna dang rna ba bcas pa'i gzugs su byas nas/ sems can 'tshe bar byas te/
346b6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis kyang mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs nas ma rungs pa thams cad byed pa'o/ /gzhan rnams kyis kyang de'i 'bras bu sna dang rna ba dang/ rkang pa dang/ lag pa gcod pa'i chad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'byung po rnams kyis skyon byas pa
346b7(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang/ lus kyang skur la gnyen ma gdong/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams tshan cig gis kyang sems can rnams la rmi lam dang/ ltas dang/ dngos por mthong par byas te/ de'i rtogs pas nad sna tshogs btang
347a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing sems can gyi srog 'phrog pa'o/ /de rnams ni ltas ngan gyi 'byung po rnams yin no/ /mig la me 'bar rkang phyed ba/ /mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ nags tshal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri dang/ lung stong
347a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa ste/ sems can mi rnams kyis mthong bar gyur na ngo sped pa ste/ 'byung po des sems can mthong na nyin mo gnod mi nus shing/ mtshan mo'i rigs la cis kyang phan pa med cing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /phel ka che la rgod bag can/
347a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid/ ces bya ba ni/ phel ka che zhing mtshan rnams rgyu ba ste/ pho mo nyal ba'i dus su mnyan nas glags rnyed par gyur na lus la 'jug ste/ bdud kyi rigs su skyes nas pha? ma? rnams skrag par byed pa'o/ /de
347a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'byung po rnams kyis bskor te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar bsdad pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba phrag
347a5(rgyud 'grel): stong rnams/ /de dag ma ni skul ma lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de dag kun kyang dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na gnas shing/ rgyal po rnams thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/ de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'khod pa'o/ /g.yog
347a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de dag ni lhan gcig tu/ /bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dpon g.yog de rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo
347a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi dmod mos 'tshe bar mi
347b1(rgyud 'grel): nus pa'o/ /bdag cag gis ni gnas 'di ni/ /shing rta zhes bgyi srin po mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ lho nub kyi mtshams na lam ka na gnas pas srin po'i tshogs mang po 'byung ste/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la gnod par byed cing 'gru gu'i nad
347b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams gtong ba'o/ /de la bu mo stobs ldan pa/ stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyad mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo'i tshogs kyang de rnams byung ste/ stobs dang ldan zhing rang gi kha dog tu snang ba de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod
347b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag bdag gi g.yag lags te/ de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yog du ma dang bcas nas mchis te/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/
347b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten bla ma'i spyan snga ru/ /sems can rnams la snying rje dang ldan zhing 'tshe bar mi byed de/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis
347b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /bdag cag gis ni gnas rnams na/ mgrin rings shes ba'i srin mo mchis zhes bya ba ni/ laM ka mgrin chu'i rigs mgo bcu gcig yod pa 'jigs su rung ba rnams 'byung pa
347b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /srin mo shin tu gnas pa dag/ srin mo nag po zhes bgyid ba zhes bya ba ni/ dpal lha mo dang/ 'khor g.yog yin te/ srin mo ral pa gcig pa rnams/ /'khor g.yog du ma dang bcas pa byung ste/ de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
347b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan snga ru'o/ /srin mo rab gnag rnams mchis te/ /de dag gau ta ma mthun par lta/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na zang gling zhes bya ba ni/ yul na gnas te/ de bas kyang gnag pa lnga brgya yod do/ /de rnams kyis kyang sems can 
348a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'tshe bar byas shing/ bud med du brdzus nas gnod pa skyel ba'o/ /sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che/ /de dag sa steng gnas pa lta/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nor rgyun ma'i 'khor g.yog yin te/ de yang ldang ma mo dang/ kun tu bzang mo dang
348a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od ldan ma la sogs pa yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing/ phan pa sha stag ste/ sa la gnas shing sa la bdag byed pa'o/ /g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni/ yongs su bskor te 'dir mchis
348a3(rgyud 'grel): lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ srin po dang/ srin mo dang/ sa bdag mo la sogs pa 'khor g.yog du ma dang thabs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/ /de dag kun dang lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du/
348a4(rgyud 'grel): mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang/ sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can la gnod par mi byed cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu 'khod pa'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/
348a5(rgyud 'grel): chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug la bdag cag sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing spyan sngar mchis pa'o/ /bdag gi mdun na
348a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyug pa yi/ yi dags gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngan po'i spyan sngar rgyug pa'i ma rungs pa 'byed pa la dga' ba'i 'khor chen cig yod de/ sdig la dga' zhing snying la mi sdug pa sha stag go/
348a7(rgyud 'grel): lus chen shugs kyang drag pa ste/ /so yang che la lto bo che/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten g.yo bar nus shing yud tsam gyis gang la yang khyab ste/ gzi brjid che zhing rbad pa la dga' ste/ de'i gzugs kyis sems can la gnod par
348b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /rna 'phyang 'jigs pa chen po ste/ slo ma sna la rab tu 'phyang/ /zhes bya ba ni glags btsal te dam tshig nyams pa la smad cing gnod pa che bar byas pa ste/ de rnams kyis kyang chad pa bcod cing drags shul bstan pa'o/ /yan lag drug po so brtan
348b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gur kum mdog can tho ba 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mgo bo drug phyag drug /rkang pa drug de bzhin du sprul pa ste/ mdog mdzes pa ste/ mche ba gtsigs shing so gtsigs shing sems can rnams la ston par byed pa'o/ /so yang rtsub
348b3(rgyud 'grel): cing rno ba dang/ mdung mthung gsal zhing 'jigs par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod pa byed pa'i dus su ni mtshon cha sna tshogs bstan te/ so rno zhing sems can smad pa la dga' ba'o/ /glang chen mgo dang bum rna can/ mgo seng ge
348b4(rgyud 'grel): stag dang 'dra/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs par sprul zhing sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste/ de rnams mi srun zhing gnod par byed pa la dga' ba'o/ /lcags kyi so can lcags kyi sgra/ gdon rnams rnam par
348b5(rgyud 'grel): ? bgyid pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon gyi so dang khab kyi skra ste/ de bzhin du lus po'i ba spu rnams kyang yin no/ /nang la nang 'thab 'dod cing sems can gyi lus la zhugs nas kyang de bzhin no/ /lag na lcags kyi gtum bu
