348b6(rgyud 'grel): thogs/ /lag na lcags kyi thob thogs /zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyang 'thab pa'i dus su de bzhin te/ de'i tshul gyis bstan bcing sems can la 'thab rtsod rdod par byed pa'o/ /so rnon lag pa ring ba ste/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs
348b7(rgyud 'grel): can lcags kyi mchu/ zhes bya ba ni/ za ba'i dus su so rno ba/ gnod par byed pa lag pa ring ba/ yang na lag pa ring ba ni phyogs gcig nas bsdad nas dpag tshad brgyar bslebs pa'o/ /drag po'i tshul du bstan cing mtshon
349a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mchu dang ldan pa'o/ /mgo bo che la skra g.yengs pa/ nag cing mig ser sna zhon pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yan lag phra zhing bong thung ba ste /mgo bo che la bzhin mi sdug ste/ sol ba'i mdog la mig la me 'bar ba ste/ sna
349a2(rgyud 'grel): med cing sug sug byed pa de'i gzugs kyis gnod par byed pa'o/ /bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar ba/ mig gcig pa dang lto bo che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bum pa 'dra ba'i lba ba gsum yod pa ste/ de'i lus la mig dmar ba'o/ /mig gcig sbrul
349a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mgo can te/ stobs dang ldan zhing sa bdag gis gzugs su gnas pa'o/ /mchu 'chang po dang lag gcig pa/ /rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa// zhes bya ba ni/ chu srin gyi mchu dang ldan pa/ lus la lag pa gcig med cing 'jigs su rung ba ste/ la
349a4(rgyud 'grel): la yang rkang pa re re yod cing gnyis gnyis 'grogs nas 'gro ba'o/ /gzhan yang khro bo'i tshul du yod pa la rkang pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /kha med kha gnyis drag po ste/ mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid/ ces bya ba ni/
349a5(rgyud 'grel): khab kyi kha la gsus po che ste/ kha yang kha ltag khung na yang kha yod pas kha gnyis pa ste/ de bzhin du mi rnams la yang gnod ba ste/ drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed pa'o/ /lag na khar ba dbyug pa thogs/ /mdung rtse gsum pa drag cing 'jigs
349a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams la ni/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing mi rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du 'tshe ba drag po byed pa'o/ /skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste/ gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa
349a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed de/ de bzhin du gdon sna tshogs kyis nad sna tshogs btang nas 'tshe bar byed pa'o/ /skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid/ /sems kyang 'khrul par byed pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni nad kyis
349b1(rgyud 'grel): thebs? shing lab lob smrar 'jug pa ste/ yang na sems can de smyos par byas nas sems gtor ? kha'i kha bden smra ba'o/ /smyo bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid/ /de nas gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ gdon gyis btab pa de ni 'bog ste
349b2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyang gtor de bzhin du dag kyang med do/ /lus de yang nyon mongs shing dpal dang mi ldan te/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'o/ /de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste/ stobs po che la brten par bka' / /zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du 'jig
349b3(rgyud 'grel): rten gyis khams thams cad la sems can gyis sems can la gzod par byas te/ 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa'i phyir na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i chal la brten pa'o/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi bo/ /rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyab
349b4(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lus ngan po'i mdun du rgyug ste/ de dag 'jigs par skyobs gsol ba'o/ /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngan po dang thabs bcing
349b5(rgyud 'grel): tu/ /sangs rgyas gal ba der 'khod de/ gus par bskyed nas thabs gcig tu 'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag rnams/ /de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor g.yog bdag cag sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
349b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ gus bar byas nas rig sngags la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom pa la dpa' bo ste/ de bzhin du mun pa nu na nag gsal te/ 'jig rten
349b7(rgyud 'grel): las 'das nas sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ bdag cag gis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed de/ rig sngags bdag gis gzungs bar bya/ /sa ga lnga rtsen zla ba dang/ /seng+ge sde dang rab gnon dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnod
350a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sde don nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de rnams kyi ming grangs ni gsangs sngags la pa chen dang la sogs pa'o/ /rig pa stobs chen nor bu dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags chen dang/ pa la la sogs pa'i bar nas
350a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis de yang stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi rtsod pa las rtsod par nus te/ gnod sbyin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi/
350a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa bsrung zhing/ rig sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /'jog po nag po chen po dang/ la ba can dang rje'u gnyis/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po klu rigs bzhi yin te/ de dag kyang sa dang chu la gnas shing bstan pa bsrung ba'o/ /klu
350a4(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyal po sa srung bu/ /yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing kha dog dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing 'jigs pa med cing/ /gnod par mi byed pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding
350a5(rgyud 'grel): ni shugs chen bar?/ 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can yin te/ 'dab chags bya la gzugs che zhing/ stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /bya yi shugs kyis mchi bgyid cing/ rgya
350a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho kun tu 'khrug bar bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ sems can des klu'i sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed de de yang de dag rnams kyis kyang/ 'tshe bar byed pa'i rgyu la gnas pa'o/ /lha dang lha min dri za rnams 'jigs
350a7(rgyud 'grel): bgyid pa dang dge ba 'ang rung/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phan byed dang gnod byed gnyis nus te/ de rnams kyis kyang/ phan par byed pa dang/ gnod par byed pa la gnas pa'o/ /ma dang pha dang dad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'dir mchis
350b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ zhes bya ba ni/ chos la gnas pa dang mi gnas pa gnyis/ /sdig la 'dzem pa dang mi 'dzem pa gnyis yin te/ de dag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig
350b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa bcom pa la dpa' ba/ nyon mongs pas mi tshugs shing thugs rje dang ldan pa ste/ gdon de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi mthus chos dang ldan par gnas pa'o/ /'phrog ma zhes bya ba gnod sbyin no/ /'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo/ /zhes
350b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rang gi bu tsha ni snying du sdug ste/ gzhan gyi bu tsha rnams 'jigs par byed cing/ gnod byed nus pa ste/ des kyang byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o/ /de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams/ /'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can
350b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni 'phrog ma'i bu ste/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par byed cing mngal nas rlag par byed de/ ma dang bu rnams kyang srog 'phrog pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te/ de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes par ni
350b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang/ 'phrog ma dang bcas pa 'khor g.yog du ma gnas te/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs gcig tu gnas
350b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams bcom zhing/ de bzhin du de bcom pa la dpa' bo zhes bya ste/ sdig dang/ dge ba dang 'bral zhing sangs rgyas ba'o/ /bdag cag gis
350b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang chos dang mthun par dge pa la gnas te/ sems can la snying rje bya zhing spyan sngar mchis pa'o/ /ma ga d+ha na thams cad mthong/ /ka shi na ni pad+ma 'chang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'jig rten gsum la rdzu 'phrul gyis mthong ste/ stobs
351a1(rgyud 'grel): de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin ni rgya gar gyi dbus su'o/ /yul go shi ka nas pad+ma 'chang nas te/ pad+ma bzhin du spyan yod pa'i phyir na pad+ma 'chang ba'o/ /yangs pa can na rgyal mchog gnas/ /kyang yul na ni grags 'dzin
351a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+hA na gnod sbyin rgyal mchog gnas te/ de bzhin du gyad yul na yang de dang 'dra bar gnas pa ste/ stobs che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyal po'i khab na kun b+hi ra/ ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste/ zhes bya
351a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ ri bo rgyal po'i khab kyi dad dbon ni gnod sbyin chen po kuM b+hi ra la sogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du ser gyi mi yul na grags pa dang ldan pa grags pa'o/ /ta ma la ni 'byor pa gnas/ /mi thi la dang kun tu rgyal/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mi thi la dang ta ma la
351a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs yin te/ gnod sbyin chen po dang kun tu rgyal gnas pa'o/ /ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon mchog/ ces bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo brgyad yin te/ de yang 'di dag gis ming ni
351a5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang/ keng rus can dang/ tshangs chen ma dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ gzhon nu mo dang/ rnam rgyal mo dang/ drag mo dang/ khyab 'jug mo dang brgyad do/ /de rnams ni 'jig rten gyi mar gyur cing mi srun gnod sbyin rnams
351a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag mo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen mo skal ba che/ /stobs chen de dag thams cad ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas 'jig rten khams la 'gyu ste/ kha dog ldan zhing gtor ma rnams len par byed pa'o/ /gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod pas
351a7(rgyud 'grel): 'os shing gtor ma len du gtad pa'o/ /yi dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi dad pa ma yin pa lnga nas kyang dad pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing rig sngags kyi chos?
351b1(rgyud 'grel): la gus bar byas te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang/ dge 'dun la rjes su yi rang zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang/ rgyal bo chen po stobs chen gyis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams tho kyi bu yang stobs dang ldan te/ de dag kyang
351b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang du 'du zhing/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bstan la/ /mi rnams la ni snying brtse slad ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid la brten sa nas/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs
351b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams la 'jigs par mi byed cing/ snying rje skye ba'o/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dags dang/ sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad las ?
351b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdon rnams bzlog par byed cing/ de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o/ /mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi/ /srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyid/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ?
351b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dam pa rbod gtong dang/ /rig pa dang sngags dang/ de rnams bzlog pa ste/ de bzhin du 'byung po dang/ yi dags la sogs pa bzlog par byed pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rnams thos bu/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/
351b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der rgyal po chen po rnams thos bus/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa'o/ /khon dang 'jigs kun 'das pa/ /rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba/ /zhes bya
351b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni shes bya'i dri ma dang/ bag chags kyi dri ma mi gnas shing/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa dam pa'i dam pa'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par
352a1(rgyud 'grel): lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang mdzad cing/ bgegs thams cad bcom pa ste/ de bcom pas na/ dpa' bo zhes bya ba'o/ /gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /khyod la lha dang/ grul bum dang/
352a2(rgyud 'grel): bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten pa'i stong spyi phud kyi bdag po yin te/ yang na bram ze phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dbang po de la phyag
352a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal skyabs su mchi zhes bya ba'o/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang/ /bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nas ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs bstan pa/ sna tshogs kyi lta ba yod pa/ /gnod byed dang phan byed gnyis yod pa/ sdig pa dang/
352a4(rgyud 'grel): dge ba byed pa sha stag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mang por 'dus pa'o/ /khor khor yug yongs bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi sa gzhi la/ gnod sbyin 'byung
352a5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs phyogs nas bskor zhing thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni rgyal
352a6(rgyud 'grel): po rnams thos kyi bus kyang gnod sbyin chen po 'khor g.yog dang bcas shing byang phyogs na bsrung bar bgyid pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye bskor du/ /gnod sbyin rgyu ba smyo byed dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gza'
352a7(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyu skar dang/ bcas shing bzhin sdug pa dang/ /mi sdug pa rnams kyis bskor te/ 'byung bo mang po spyan sngar 'dus pa'o/ /brjed byed dang mi 'am ci/ /skems byed pa ni rims drag dang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur du nad
352b1(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba dang/ glo bur du bar chod byed pa 'di rnams yin te/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa 'di rnams kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin rims rnams zhag bzhi pa/ de dag bdag gi bzlog par bgyi/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi phyag
352b2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ rims nad la sogs pa nad rigs mi cig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlog par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil pa'i tshal gyi/ 'byung po mang po rigs brtag pa'i gnas skabs
352b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ drug pa'o// //bsil ba'i tshal gyi rig sngags zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /gzugs
352b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung po ste/ khams ni sa'i khams so/ /skye mched ni mig ste/ rang bzhin ni ye shes lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal g.yas ??
352b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang 'khor lo/ /g.yon pa gnyis na dgra sta dang rtse gsum/ /'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon bskyang pa/ pad+ma dang/ zla ba'i?
352b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la gzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u ha haM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong
352b7(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags kyi byin brlabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ste/ byang phyogs skyong zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/
353a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la don byed cing/ /rnam thos kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin du 'byung po rnams kyis kyang skyabs su mchi zhes bya'o/ /de la bdag kyang phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams
353a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
353a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo ste/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ shes bya dang bag chags kyi sgrib pa 'joms shing/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par rtogs pa grol zhing/ rgyal ba rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas so/ /'jig rten
353a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi 'jigs skyob pa khyod la 'dud do/ /zhes bya'o/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing nges par bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing/ sems can
353a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis bdag kyang sems can la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos kyi bu'i tshig gi de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srungs/ /thal sbyar 'dug
353a6(rgyud 'grel): ste smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal po dri za' thams cad la dbang mdzad pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa'o/ /chos kyi rgyal po 'di
353a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig rten la bshad nas sku mya ngan las 'das te/ chos de'i 'od zer 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la khyab ste/ de bzhin
353b1(rgyud 'grel): du de sangs rgyas shing snying rje che la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad spangs shing bdud rnams btul ba ste/ de bzhin du 'khor
353b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mun nag sel zhing sangs rgyas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis dag cag dri za rnams ni sems can rnams la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
353b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes de ni bdag cag rnams kyis mi shes te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba/ skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /zhes bya
353b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa dang/ sdug pa rnams dri za srin pos mang po 'dus pa'o/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal la/ srin po'i
353b5(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'jig rten mgon po la'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung/ shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/
353b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung zhing/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ste/ rig sngags 'dis chad ba'i gang zag la shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid cing sems can gyi don byed pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor
353b7(rgyud 'grel): du/ srin po rnams dang sha za dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing de rnams kyis kyang skyong bar byed pa'o/ /dri za dang ni rlung lha rnams/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ zhes bya ba
354a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang/ rbod gtong dang rig pa dang/ sngags dang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bzlog cing rig sngags la gus par byed pa ste/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs
354a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rin chen rigs/ /mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /ye shes snga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
354a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ /phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che/ g.yon pa gnyis na pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mnga' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas
354a4(rgyud 'grel): bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing/ sgeg pa'i tshul ru bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i Ta mi Te la sogs rgyal po
354a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong par gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ shar phyogs su skyong ba ste/ rig sngags 'di la bka' stsal cing/ sems can don la skyong ba'o/ /srin po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ shar phyogs na gnod par
354a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ste rnams ni/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams shar phyogs nas byung ba bzlogs pa'o/ /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul
354a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor srung la skyabs su mchis te/ shar phyogs kyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal ba ste/
354b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom drug ldan/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing
354b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bcom ste/ de lnga dang bral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyis kun nas kun tu 'jigs pa bcom ste/ de yang 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcom pa'o/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ chos bzhin mthun
354b3(rgyud 'grel): par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid bstan te/ de'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom ste/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas chos la mthun pa byas shing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o/ /de nas
354b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor srung gi tshig gi de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos kyang stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ??
354b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon po skyabs mdzad pa/ 'jig rten kun la phan par mdzad/ /ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul ba'i skus khyab ste/
354b6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams la byams pa dang snying rje gzigs nas sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs rnams bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ sku
354b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas pa de'i chos bzhin grul bum bdag cag gis mchis te/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /grul bum yi dags srul po rnams/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/
355a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ lho phyogs na/ grul bum gdon rigs mi gcig pa 'byung ste/ srun pa dang mi srun pa sha stag mang po 'dus pa'o/ /kho ra khor yug yongs su skor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khor gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs phyogs na/
355a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la gus pas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /lho phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags
355a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' las mi 'da' ste/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba'i de la lho phyogs skyong bar byed pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog /ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bar
355a4(rgyud 'grel): du gcod cing gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ drag shul gyis ni gnod par byed pa'o/ /grul bum yi dags srul po rnams/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyid/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis
355a5(rgyud 'grel): grul bum gyi gdon bzlog pha dang rbod gtong dang/ sngags dang/ rig pa rnams bzlog ste/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i rig pas bzlog pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi pad+ma'i rigs so/ /rig
355a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di'i mtshon pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste/ khams ni me'i khams so/ /skye mched ni lce ste/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu
355a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan can spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ /phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang pad+ma/ g.yon pa gnyis na lcags kyu dang zhags pa/ /'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi
355b1(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la zhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa ste/ cung zad khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta
355b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ A le a le le la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig gis rig sngags 'dzin pa'i
355b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zag dang sems can thams cad la rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos rig sngags kyi dam las mi 'da' bar srung ba'o/ /grul bum dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos ? lho phyogs skyong zhing nad thams cad 'dzoms
355b4(rgyud 'grel): shing grul bum la sogs pa'i yi dags bzlog par byed cing/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i gang zag la skyong bar byed pa'o/ /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags/ skyes po lho
355b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong bar mchis te/ de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid
355b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom zhing sangs rgyas te/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la snying rjes khyab ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i
355b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul zhing 'jig rten gyi bya ba bor nas mun pa'i mun nag sel te/ de lta bu'i 'khor ba bzhag nas sangs rgyas te/ lus ngag yid yang 
356a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de'i ye shes kyis kun nas kun tu nyon mongs pa rnams la sprul pa'i skus 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab ste/ de rnams kyis 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed cing 'khor ba'i 'jigs
356a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ phyin ci ma log pa ye shes thob cing/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
356a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la 'dud pa ste/ bdag cag grul bum gyi rigs la sogs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags
356a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes po'i tshig gis de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste/ smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang bstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
356a5(rgyud 'grel): sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /mun par gyur ba'i 'jig rten la/ bcom ldan lam rnams ston mdzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis ye shes de yang nus te/ de'i ye shes
356a6(rgyud 'grel): brtan par byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bstan pa'o/ /gau ta ma dpa' 'o khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom pas na dpa' bo ste/ de bcom zhing ye
356a7(rgyud 'grel): shes thob pa ste/ bdag cag klu rnams kyang sems can gyi don byed cing snying rje la gnas pa'o/ /'jig rten dag ni nyi zla 'dra/ /rin chen snying po stobs po che/ zhes bya ba ni/ rang gis ye shes shar te/ de'i ye shes kyang thams cad la khyab pa'o//
356b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du nyi zla yang rang gi 'od zer gyis snang ba'o/ /de'i 'od zer thob cing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de yang/ 'jig rten gyi khams so/ /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa
356b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang/ klu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa nub phyogs nas mang po 'dus te/ de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te
356b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyur lags/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyis kyang/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
356b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang/ /nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis rgyal po
356b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po mig mi bzang gis kyang klu'i gdon srung ba'i don du/ nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid do/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nyen 'khor du/ /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la pa der rgyal po mig mi
356b6(rgyud 'grel): bzang dang/ srin po'i gdon dang/ sa bdag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid do/ /zhes pa'o/ /lha min dbang po stobs po che/ de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyid/ /zhes bya
356b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ sa bdag gi gdon la sogs pa/ gsang ba po dang klu rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos gnod par byed pa'i sems pa'i/ don dang/ rbod gtong dang/ gzhan gyis rig pa dang/ de rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang de rnams bzlog
357a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rdo rje/ ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi rdo rje'i rigs ma ste/ mtshon pa ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/
357a2(rgyud 'grel): khams ni nam mkha' i khams so/ /skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched do/ /rang bzhin ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing ka/ zhal
357a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dkar pa/ g.yon dmar ba phyag g.yas gnyis na/ ral gri dang rdo rje/ g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang rdo rje rgya gram/ de'i 'og ma gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs
357a4(rgyud 'grel): shing nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ Ta ka ge Ta ka ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan
357a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis kyang/ nub phyogs skyong zhing sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /klu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ klu'i gdon rnams kyis kyang nad sna tshogs gtang
357a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing sems can rnams la gnod pa skyel zhing srogs gcod pa ste/ de'i gzi brjid 'phrog 'dod pa dang/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po spyan mi bzang gis de rnams 'joms par byed pa'o/ /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu
357a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ nub phyogs kyi rgyal po spyan mi bgrang dang/ yang dag thabs gcig tu gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi rtsod par nus pa de rnams
357b1(rgyud 'grel): la yang bdag gis skyabs su mchis/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i gdon dang/ gsang ba po rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi po bcom zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
357b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab cing thugs rje'i spyan gyis lta ba'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya ba ni/
357b3(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa de nyid spangs pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdzogs pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad spangs nas sangs rgyas pa'o/ gau ta ma yang dag cag gis kyang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
357b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang dang gdon de rnams kyis kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi tshig gis de nas so/ /rgyal po chen
357b5(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rungs pa dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang du yul 'khor srungs dang/ 'phags skyes bo dang/ spyan mi bzang
357b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lus ngan po dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bcom ldan 'das la bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'da' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po
357b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas yang nas yang du phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gros mthun pa dang/ tshig mthun pa dang/ skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po de dag gis dbyangs
358a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba ni tshig go /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyal po chen
358a2(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi srung ba ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin du 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba shAkya thub pas gsungs te/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang
358a3(rgyud 'grel): snyoms dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med cing/ 'khor ba bcom pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang yid dam du bzung ba'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa la sogs so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
358a4(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen nam/ gzhan yang lha dang/ mi dang de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ srung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su zhi ba dang/ mtshams
358a5(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa dang/ dug bsad pa dang/ dug zhi ba dang/ chad pa bcod pa dang/ bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi mthus ma rungs
358a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'byung po rnams dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ gzhan gyi rbod stong btang ba dang/ rig pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams bzlog pa'o/ /de yang rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis bzlog pa'o//
358a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhi po rnams la bsrung ba dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bde bar gnas shing yang dag pa'i ye shes thob ste/ gal te 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur na/ rig pa 'di dang mi 'bral zhing nam skye ba'i dus su dran par 'gyur
358b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang de bzhin du bsrung ba dang/ skyob pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
358b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ byams pa dang snying rje dang/ btang snyoms kyis khyab pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi don la rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag /rig sngags kyi
358b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po bzung zin no zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlabs nas rig sngags 'dzin du bcugs pa dang/ dran par byed pa dang/ rig sngags kyi tshig rgyal po chen po bzhi'i zhal nas smra bar bgyid pa'o//
358b4(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po ngas yongs su bzung zin no zhes bya ba ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di dag gis thugs la bzung ste/ de bzhin du gsum pa dang skus kyang yin no/ /de bas na
358b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bzungs ngo zhes bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi la yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o/ /gzhan yang ngas kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rjes su yi rang pa'i zhes bya
358b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas rjes su yi rang zhing 'di gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang gsungs par 'gyur te/ de yang byams pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
358b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs par 'gyur ba'o/ /da ltar bdag gis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo brjod kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas brjod do zhes bya ba ni/
359a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gzhan gyi dri mas ma gos pa ste/ rang bzhin med cing rnam par dag pa/ srid pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa med cing nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ de lta bu'i rig pa nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bzung
359a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de ltar 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi don 'di rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bzung nas 'khor ba na 'khyams nas yod pa nyon mongs pa rnams la
359a3(rgyud 'grel): ston par bgyid do zhes bya ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mnyan to zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i tshogs 'di ni ngo bor dang bral zhing rang bzhin med de/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi tshig ni mnyan to/ zhes bya ba'o/ /rig
359a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi las kyi rigs lnga bshad pa'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi la gtad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rin po che g.yas pas na bza' chos
359a5(rgyud 'grel): gos phye nas/ 'byung po'i tshogs de dag la bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje seng+ge'i pad+ma chen po'i khri la rdo rje skyil krung du ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa bshig nas/ skyab sbyin gyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o/ /chos gos de phyi ba'i rgyu
359a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ni/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shing/ 'byung po rnams rlag par byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir na chos gos phyi ba zhes bya ba'o/ /rin po che'i phyag gis skyabs sbyin
359a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du yod de/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi nyams myong sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs rnams la mi 'jigs pa bstan pa'o/ /sor mo re re la yang
359b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ 'od zer de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /ye shes lnga ni phung po lnga ste/ phung po lnga ni rigs lnga/ rigs lnga ni khams lnga/ khams lnga po de lnga stong pa nyid du bsam mo/ /de lta bu'i phyag rgya 'byung po
359b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ston pa'o/ /bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa'o/ /des 'di bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes ngo bo nyid nas dag pa ste/ dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa/ dag
359b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di yin zhes bya bar brjod par mi nus so/ /rig sngags kyi phyag rgya'i phyag rgya bstan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la dbye bar zhes bya ba ni/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgya de'i rnam thos kyi bu la bstan te/ de yang rgyal po bzhi'i gtso
359b4(rgyud 'grel): bo nas yin no/ /thams cad la go bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyis gos par byed pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyas par bshad pa'i
359b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas hUM gi yi ge las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros te/ 'od zer sna tshogs
359b6(rgyud 'grel): de yang 'gro ba rigs drug gi don byas te/ 'od sna tshogs de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i hUM la thim mo/ /hUM de'i yi ges bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal rdo rje'i rigs su snang
359b7(rgyud 'grel): la 'phros pa'o/ /de'i thugs ka nas kyang hUM gi yi ge las 'od zer sna tshogs snang ba'o/ /rig sngags de ni zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag mo/ /khro mo'o/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ thod pa lnga yis dbu
360a1(rgyud 'grel): la brgyan pa/ dbu la rdo rje'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal g.yas dmar po g.yon ljang gu/ rgyab dmar po'o/ /zhal bzhi yang mche ba gtsigs pa khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad ni
360a2(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po'i g.yas g.yon gyis rdo rje snying khar 'dzin cing/ g.yon gyi dril bu dkur brten cing gnas pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dbu steng du mdzad pa'o/
360a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gsum na rdo rje/ bzhi pa na ral gri/ lnga pa na 'khor lo/ g.yon pa gsum na rin po che/ bzhi pa na zhags pa/ lnga pa na lcags kyu/ de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /thabs shes rab ngo
360a4(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid du bzhugs ba rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa/ chos kyi dbyings gyi ye shes te/ de yang sgyu ma lta bu me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes
360a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtshon pa ni ye shes lnga yin te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/ /phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /khams ni nam mkha' i khams/ skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched/ zhabs phyed skyil du
360a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing/ klu pho mo dang/ gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan zhing/ ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sreg pa'o/ /rig sngags kyis
360a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'dir bstan pa ste/ gang bstan ce na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bstan pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /hi li hi li b+hi sa ni la sogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
360b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal pa na/ zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis gzi brjid dang/ stobs dang/ dpa' pas 'di'i sngags bshad ma thag tu sa g.yo ba dang/ sgra chen po byung ba'o/ /sa ni kun tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni/ rnam
360b2(rgyud 'grel): pa drug tu g.yos/ ji bzhin du g.yos she na sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ bldegs rab tu ldegs/ kun tu rab tu ldegs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem
360b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig ste/ ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o/ /de nas ni kun tu g.yos zhes bya ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi gzi brjid
360b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ sa des kyang mi theg cing g.yos pa'o/ /'byung po thams cad ni rab tu 'dar nas zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig smra bar mi nus shing/ lus kyang 'thoms nas ba spu yang gyen du log ste/ 'jigs par byas nas 'bros pa'i tshul du bstan to/
360b5(rgyud 'grel): kye ma kye hud kye ma sdug bsngal sgra chen po byung ngo/ /zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu 'jigs nas 'byung po rnams rlag par byed do/ /snyam nas skad chen po gton to/ /yang nas yang du skad ngan chen po gton to/ /srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras te/
360b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang bcas shing/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /'di ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ sems can kun la thugs rtse ba/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam nas kyang sangs rgyas te/ de
360b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon du tshogs bsags te/ tshogs bsags pa de yang/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi/ /rig sngags
361a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad/ /ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang bcom zhing thal bar rlog pa ste/ de lta bu'i gzi brjid che ba'i rig sngags ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'o/
361a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po/ /sems can kun la thugs rtse ba shes bya ba ni/ de nas ni mtshams sbyor ba'i de nas so/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan te/ de yang sems can rigs mi cig pas theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can
361a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ byams pa dang snying rjes khyab pa'o/ /gnod sbyin srin bu dri za dang/ /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can las kyi 'bras bu mi cig pas/ 'byung po'i lus su gzhan la gnod pa'i sems dang ldan par skyes te/ de
361a4(rgyud 'grel): yang yi dags dang/ byol song gi lus su skyes pa'o/ /'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog/ grul bum yi dags srul po dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rgyu ba dang sems can phrad par gyur na/ gti mug dang zhe sdang yod pas/ sems can rnams la gzi
361a5(rgyud 'grel): brjid 'phrog ste/ snying rje'i sems dang mi ldan pa'o/ /lha min gshed byed ro langs dang/ brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams la bza' ba med cing skom pa'i sbyin pa ma btang zhing khro ba ste/ la la yang mchod rdzas la sogs
361a6(rgyud 'grel): pa za bar yod pa ni/ sbyin pa gtong zhing khro bar byas pa'o/ /skem byed dang ni rims drag dang/ de bzhin bram ze srin bu dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan la grags pa 'dod pas/ sems can gyi srog gcod cing/ sbyin pa zad pa med pa btang ste/
361a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'bras bus kyang srin po la sogs par skye zhing snying rje med pa'o/ /smyo byed rims nad zhag gsum pa/ /de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dang/ 'byung po ma yin pa/ rims de dag kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms
361b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ gzhan yang nad rlung dang/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa bzhi brgya brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yang 'joms pa'o/ /skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te/ phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rig sngags
361b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzi brjid mthong bas 'jigs shing skrag pa ste/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la ni thugs rje'i phyir/ /rig sngags 'di ni brjod par mdzad/ ces bya ba ni/ de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes te/ de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i
361b3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis sems can la 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang las kyis 'bras bus skyes te/ de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la mnyam pa nyid du khyab ste/ de yang rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/ ye shes
361b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /thabs kyi ngo bo nyid ni rig sngags so/ /de'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /khams ni sa'i khams te/ skye mched ni mig gis skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan/
361b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ zhal g.yas mthing ka/ g.yon ljang gu/ rgyab dmar pa'o/ /dbu la 'khor los brgyan pa'o/ /zhi ba'i gzugs
361b6(rgyud 'grel): can ma'o/ /phyag g.yas dang po na/ snying khar rdo rje brten cing/ g.yon dril bu dku la brten pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dgra lta'o/ /de bzhin du g.yon pa gsum na/ zhags pa dang/ rtse gsum dang/ dung ?
361b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs cing/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags bsil ba'i 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rig
362a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig go /ti ri ma khA/ ti ta kha kha kA Ta ma Ti la sogs pa'o/ /gsang sngags chen mo'i rig sngags chen mo 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang
362a2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags las 'gal bar byed par gyur na/ tshe 'di la yang sdug bsngal drag po thob cing/ phyi ma la yang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gi chos la yang dag par rtogs shing ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' la mi
362a3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kun mkhyen lus zhig ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das shing rig sngags la smra bar gyur na/ mgo po
362a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lus tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing/ ar dza ga'i manyNar bzhin du 'gas te/ tshe 'di la yang nad kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor
362a5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gro ba re zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni/ shi 'phos ma thag tu mda''phangs pa bzhin du/ mnar med sreg ste/ gal te dmyal ba de nas 'phos na yang dmyal ba
362a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rgyas par bshad pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor
362a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs la mkhas pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gnyen po/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/ sems can rnams la khyad par 'phags
362b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di thos pa'o/ /skrag cing spangs te/ mi dga' las kyi bud zhes byed nas/ thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mdog shor zhing ba spu rnams kyang gyen du log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dad
362b2(rgyud 'grel): pa skyes nas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang tshig mthun pa dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po de rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/ /skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la
362b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /sdang ba'i 'byung po zad bgyid pa/ /rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs/ sems can rnams
362b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnod par byed pa rnams/ /rig sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/ /dngos po med cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /mi yi 'jig rten bden
362b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyid pa'i/ /rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal/ /zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di 'chang ba rnams bsrung ba dang/ spa ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur zhing/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/ /de la
362b6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags 'di lags te/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ zhes bya ba ni/ sha za dang/ yi dags dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing mi dmigs pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gis kyang
362b7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags legs par gsungs shing legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrungs te/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab
363a1(rgyud 'grel): ma bral ba'o/ /mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal lo/ /rims ni rin po che'i rigs te/ phung po ni tshor ba'o/ /khams ni chu'i khams te/ skye mched ni sna'i skye mched do/ /ye shes
363a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas dkar mo/ g.yon mthing ka/ rgyab dmar po'o/ /phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ser mo /phyag g.yas
363a3(rgyud 'grel): pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa rnams ni ral gri dang/ rin po che dang/ mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa rnams na zhags
363a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs shing/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/ lo bcu gnyis pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing/ sgeg pa'i tshul dang
363a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags gzhan gyis mi thubs pa ni/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u hu ha la ku li dzi ba/ la sogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'di bzung bar gsol zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang/
363a6(rgyud 'grel): rbod gtong dang/ gzhan gyi rig pa dang/ ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po rnams/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang/ stobs kyis bzlog par byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi ngo bo 'di yang stong pa nyid yin te/ thabs dang shes rab
363a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi ngo bo ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig sngags nyid do/ /de yang thabs dang/ shes rab gnyis su med cing/ mtshon pa dang mtshon byed yang gnyis su med do rig sngags
363b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i rigs ni ? tshigs te/ phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o/ /khams ni me'i khams te/ skye mched ni lce'i skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ni rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad
363b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog dmar mo/ /phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje snying khar brten pa/ g.yon pa dang pos dril bu dkur brten pa'o/ /g.yas gnyis na ral gri/ gsum pa na pad+ma/ g.yon gnyis pa na dgra sta dang/ gsum pa na rtse gsum mo/ /de'i 'og ma
363b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs shing/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing/ nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan te/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ka/ rgyab ser po/ bzhad pa'i
363b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags pad+ma'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i li i li la sogs pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ lo gcig gi sngon du yang
363b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar byed par 'gyur/ srung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ mtshams gcod pa dang/ dug zhi ba dang/ dug bsad pa/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing/ rig sngags dngos su skyabs par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad
363b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa dang/ don thams cad sgrub pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ sdig can gyi rigs ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang mi 'ong ste/ gal te 'ong bar gyur na/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bya
363b7(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad grub cing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bar du gcod pa'i de nas so/ /gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ de dang de ma slebs pa'i mtshams su 'byung 
364a1(rgyud 'grel): po de rnams kyis kyang bar du chod bar byas te/ rig sngags 'di byung ba tsam gyis kyang/ bar du gcod par mi nus pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos
364a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di chad pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ nor bu rin po che lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bsrung ba/ sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos nas/ skrag cing ?
364a3(rgyud 'grel): la mi dga' ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ khyad par du 'phags shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang yin te/ ma rungs pa rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ngan song gsum nas 'byin pa'i
364a4(rgyud 'grel): gzungs 'di yang dag pa'o/ /skyi bur zhes byed nas/ sa la 'dzul/ kun tu 'dzul kun tu rab tu 'dzul bar byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang/ dmod mos sdig can gyi rigs 'byung po rnams/ de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas
364a5(rgyud 'grel): ma tshugs pas skad ngan grags te/ de rnams kyang sa la 'dzul zhing bying bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong bar mi gnas shing so so rang rang bros so/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams 'jigs pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gzhi
364a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer sprul nas zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams rdzu 'phrul sa la 'dzul du mi ster zhing/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i sa gzhir snang ba'o/ /de dag phyogs bzhir rgyug go
364a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can 'byung po bdud kyi rigs de rnams ni/ sa la 'dzul ma nus shing phyogs phyogs su bros te hag zad do/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams bros pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i
364b1(rgyud 'grel): phung po mngon par sprul to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang/ phyogs mtshams thams cad du me sna tshogs sprul zhing/ sdig can de rnams 'gror mi ster ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshig
364b2(rgyud 'grel): spal ba'i de nas so/ /de dag nam mkha' la rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la rgyug ste/ phyogs mtshams bzhi la 'dzul pa med cing nam mkha' la rgyug pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' la bros pa'i gnas so/
364b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi nam mkha' gser du sprul to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' i phyogs na/ rdo rje'i gser gyi sa gzhir byin gyis brlabs te/ sdig can de rnams kyang 'gro dbang med cing sdug bsngal ba'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni/ sdug pa'i de nas
364b4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /'jig rten skyong rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu lha dang/ dri zas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la 'phags nas/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan
364b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sdad ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la srog 'phrog pa'i sems dang ldan pa sha stag/ sdig can gyi rigs 'byung po de rnams 'gro mi rnyed cing mar log nas/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu la skyabs
364b6(rgyud 'grel): su tshol pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin bu nas gnod pa byed pa'i bar rnams gzhon pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dpa' zhing gzi brjid che ba ste stobs dang ldan zhing/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o/ /sems can thams cad
364b7(rgyud 'grel): la snying brtse ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi don du byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ btang snyoms kyis khyab ste/ de lta bu'i thugs rjes khyab nas/ byad dang ro langs dang/ dug dang dug
365a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor dang/ dug 'thung ba dang/ gzhan gyi rig pa dang/ sngags dang/ rbod gtong dang/ /'jig rten gyi ma mo dang/ ngan sngags sbyor ba dang/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams la sogs pa rig sngags kyi
365a2(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid 'joms pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams bsrung ba dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ de bzhin du bdud kyi rigs 'byung po la sogs pa bcom zhing/ bar chod med cing bde bar gnas te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral
365a3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o/ /rig sngags 'di brjod do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gzhan gyis ma bcom par gnyug ma ste/ phyogs dang bral zhing rang bzhin med pa de lta bu'i ye shes brjod pa'o/ /de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo las kyi rigs ni las thams cad
365a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byed pa/ las kyis don thams cad 'joms pa las thams cad grub/ sna tshogs kyi rigs su snang ba'o/ /de yang rig sngags kyi mtshon pa ni/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /mtshon byed ni rig sngags bdag nyid do/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi
365a5(rgyud 'grel): phung po'o/ /khams ni rlung gi khams so/ /skyes mched ni lus kyi skye mched do/ /ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ljang nag/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon dmar
365a6(rgyud 'grel): po/ rgyab ser po/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje gdengs pa/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ gsum pa na rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /g.yon dang po na dril bu/ gnyis pa zhags pa/ gsum 'khor lo'o/ /'og ma'i phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu
365a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gengs shing/ zhabs g.yas pa pus mo btsugs pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin 'byung po rnams mnan pa'o/ /pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od ldan pa'o/ /yan lag cthams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ khro bo
365b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs so/ /rig sngags kyi gsang sngags las kyi snying pos ni/ las thams cad 'grub cing bdud thams cad 'dul te/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gi ma gi ma la sogs
365b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar gyur cig /ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi byin brlabs kyi gang zag rig sngags la gus pa dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ de la bsrung ba dang/ skyong bar byed cing/ rig
365b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi chos kyi bsten pa bsrung ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lta'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /nor thams cad gzhan gyi don du byin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa ste/ de lta bu'i
365b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan pa/ nor lha lta bu byung ba'o/ /de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal po rnams dang/ 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te??
365b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnams las rnam par rgyal zhing dgra rnams kyang ma lus te/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing/ sangs rgyas pa ste/ de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das la/ bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ kun
365b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom zhing/ dpa' ba ste/ sku gsung thugs rdzogs par byas pas na rdzogs pa ste/ dug gsum dang bral zhing/ sangs rgyas pa'o/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas rkang
365b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mchog/ shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ sngon bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus su tshogs rdzogs te/ de ltar ma lus par sems can thams cad rdzogs par 'dod nas/ theg pa sna tshogs dang/ thabs sna tshogs bstan pa ste/
366a1(rgyud 'grel): rkang gnyis kyi tshogs kyis dam pa/ phyi nang gi tshogs la mkhas pa/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad la byams pas khyab pa'o/ /de lta bu'i thub pa chen po la 'dud pa'o/ /gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa de ni lha rnams ma
366a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal to/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes ni rgya tsho lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang de bzhin no/ /de lta bu'i ye shes zhes ba ni/ lha ci smos te/ rang nyid kyis rang gi rig pa yang mi shes pa'o/ /rang gi rig pa'i ci'i phyir ma shes na/ rang la
366a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i ma rig pas ma shes pa'o/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par bdud bzhi bcom ste/ de 'dul bas na dpa' bo ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan ba la yang dag par 'dud de//
366a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing mchis pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang/ srin bu dang/ dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams mi 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ ma rung pa'i sdig can 'byung po
366a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang/ sems can rnams la gnod pa byas nas/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mgo bo a tsa kar ma dza ri'i rdog pa bzhin du tshal bar 'gas pa'o/ /gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du ?
366a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa mi 'chang ba'i gong du/ sdig can ma rungs pa rnams kyis gzung bar gyur na/ de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du rig pa 'chang ste/ de'i chos bzhin du gang zag dang sems can la bsrung bar byas te/ myur du ma thon na nyes
366a7(rgyud 'grel): la chen por 'gyur ro/ /de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang/ nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa sdig can gtum po'i rigs 'byung po rnams ni nad drag po mdze dang/ phol mig dang/
366b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dang lhog pa dang/ sha kra dang me sbal dang chu bur dang/ 'brum bu dang/ lus thams cad rul zhing g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad kyi thebs shing srog dang 'bral te/ shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med du skye ba'o/ /de'i rkyen gyis mgo dang snying tshal pa rgyar
366b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gas par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag ji bzhin du gnod par byed bzhin te sdig can de yang sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ nad chen pos btab pa'o/ /de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma byung ba dang brlag pa dang/ mdza' med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba
366b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'byung ste/ gar yang 'gros med cing lcang lo can gyi pho brang yang mi thob ste/ de'i lus kyang zhig cing rul bar 'gyur ro/ /'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa
366b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'di gdon pa dang sgom ba dang yid la byed pa dang/ gdam ngag byin pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ rjes su yi rang zhing 'chang ba ste/ de dag la gnod
366b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'o/ /yang na rig sngags 'di mnyan nas sems can la 'tshe bar mi bya'o/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la myur du gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ gnod par byed pa rnams gang zag dang sems
366b6(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyi don la myur du thon cig ces bya ba'o/ /yang na rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal myur du thob po zhes bya ba'o/ /gal te myur du ma dongs na 'jigs pa chen po dang/ nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags
366b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' las 'das shing ma btang bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ g.yan pa'i nad la sogs pas myur du thebs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rkyen gyi mgo bo dang snying tshal pa rgyar 'gas par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
367a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos a rdza ri'i gdog pa bzhin du 'gas pa'o/ /de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang/ brlag pa dang mdza' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rig sngags kyi
367a2(rgyud 'grel): dmod mos 'gro sa mi rnyed cing/ de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ shi nas kyang mnar med kyi mes sregs cing/ dmyal ba nas dmyal bar 'khor ro/ /gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/ /nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ zas su
367a3(rgyud 'grel): khrag za dang sha za dang la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa dang/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs pa rgyu zhing ma byed cig ces bya ba'o/ /de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ mdo
367a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad thos nas spang bar gyis/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'di yang yang dag par gsungs te/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang/ rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba ste/
367a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo 'di thob par gyur na/ sems can la gnod par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med par thob pa'o/ /de bas na spang par gyis zhes bya ba'o/ /sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang/ 'byung
367a6(rgyud 'grel): po 'jigs byed srul po rnams/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par byas te/ de yang dam la btags nas gnod par byed pa spangs pa'o/ /de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ /mdo 'di bshad
367a7(rgyud 'grel): pa thos nas thod/ zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs te/ de bzhin rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang dam tshig srung ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sdig can 'byung po de
367b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa'o/ /lha dang lha min rlung lha dang/ dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla/ zhes bya ba ni/ zhe sdang dang gti mug gis sems can thams cad la gnod par byas te/ da yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dam pa thob pa'o/ /'byung
367b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang ni sha za dang/ de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ ser sna dang/ zhe sdang dang/ 'dod chags kyi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas te/ de yang rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas gnod mi nus pa'o/ /kun tu 'khrugs
367b3(rgyud 'grel): shing kun tu g.yos/ /skrag cing kun tu rab tu 'gul/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid dang/ stobs kyis sa lan drug du g.yos te/ de bzhin du ltas chen po bco brgyad byung pa'o/ /kun tu khrugs shing kun tu g.yos pa ni shar
367b4(rgyud 'grel): dma' ste/ nub mtho ba'o/ /nub dma' na shar mtho/ /phyogs phyogs rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /mgo 'khrugs shing phyogs rnams gtor ba'o/ /de bas kyang skrag cing ba kun tu 'gul ba ste/ yun ring zhing drag pa'o/ /gdon dang gnod par
367b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa rnams/ ltung zhing rab tu pham par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi 'byung po rnams ni sems can la gnod par byed pas rang pha ma ste/ sdug bsngal chen po thob cing rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms
367b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sa bzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos/ /sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/ ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa g.yo zhing 'byung po rnams skrag par byed/ sa de yang ?
367b7(rgyud 'grel): cha lang dang dril bu'i skad 'byung ngo/ /kun tu rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya'o/ yi dags dang ni grul bum rnams/ /sdang ba'i gdon ni bzlog byed pa'o/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sems can drag por gnod par byas te/ gzhan gang dag gis kyang mi thub cing de'i 
368a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyen po lta bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur na/ 'jigs pa drag po 'bebs bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnod byed sngar ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ sems can
368a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi srog 'dod pa rnams/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis brlag par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa/ zhes bya ba ni 'byung po byang chub sems dpa' i rigs yod de/ yang dag par rdzogs
368a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ chos dang dge 'dun la dga' zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams skyong bar byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la rjes su
368a4(rgyud 'grel): yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba' o/ /de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas/ /legs par rjes su yi rang ngo/ /zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' i rigs 'byung de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi chos la
368a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' zhing snga nas kyang chos la dad pa yod de/ de ltar dad pa kun tu rab tu skyes nas dga' bas rab tu dga' ste/ chos la mchod pa legs par mchod nas/ de rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ngo/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal
368a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'byung? po dam la btags ba'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o// //de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dam dam la btags pa'i de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi bar snang las babs nas/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang chos la rab
368a7(rgyud 'grel): tu dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das la snga nas kyang dad pa skyes te/ de ltar yang rab tu skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas zhes bya ba ni/ so so rang gi 'od zer yang 'bar te
368b1(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba tshal gyi chos 'di 'dad pa yang nas yang du skyes te/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang de bzhin no/ /de bas na rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang legs lhags pa zhes bya ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
368b2(rgyud 'grel): tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' nas zhabs kyi pad+ma la gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan
368b3(rgyud 'grel): sdang bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gros mthun pa dang tshig mthun pa dang skar mthun par/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas shing
368b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi chos la gus pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen po di ni zhes bya ba ni/ bsrung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ spyod pa dang
368b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi ? snga? kyis bya ba ste/ sdang ba'i sems zhi bar byed pa 'khor ba rnams bcom zhing yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam bstan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyi ba dang/ zhes pa? ? ?
368b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal pa tshan po bzhis rang yang srung zhing ngag gis 'don pa dang/ yid kyis bzung ba dang/ lus kyi bcang bar byas te/ rig sngags 'di yang btags nas kyang/ ngan song gsum du mi 'gro zhing byang chub kyi lam
368b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /'khor bzhi po rnams la srung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong dam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge snyen ma la sogs pa'i sems can rnams yang bsrung ba'i dam pa'o/ /yongs su skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las
369a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang khyad par du 'phags te/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod bar bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lags so/ /zhes bya ba ni ma rung ba bdud kyi rigs rnams kyi
369a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po de yang 'joms shing rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la rig sngags kyi 'dri bar byed pa ste/ de yang 'khor bzhi
369a3(rgyud 'grel): la rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o/ /dge slong dang dge slong ma dang/ dge snyen nam dge snyen ma de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'khor pa'i 'khor bzhi yin te/ rig sngags kyis kyang de dag srung zhing bar chod bsal te rtag tu
369a4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba thob pa'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'dis bzung bar bgyi brjod par bgyi kun chub par gyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di dur khrod chen po yi dags dang 'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po
369a5(rgyud 'grel): mi'i sems can rnams kyi ston pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang 'chang ba dang/ bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bstan nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral
369a6(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhin po dag gis kyang lus ngag yid bzung ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam dge snyen ma dang
369a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi po dag dang sems can thams cad la bsrung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed de/ 'di'i lam nas kyang byang chub kyi tshogs bstan ba'o/ /bdag bsrung ba dang bdag swa ba dang/ gzhan sba ba'i slad du zhes bya
369b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams srung ba ste/ byams pa dang snying rje'i lam nas bdag gis kyang sems can gyi don la bstan par bya zhes bya ba'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang
369b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni/ zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/ chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'i skus khyab pa ste/ de bzhin du 'di la gus pa byas pa'i gang zag ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral
369b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin bu nas gnod par bgyi ba'i bar rnams nyen 'khor yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ gnod par bgyid pa lta ga la sems lags zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing gzi brjid cha ba ste/ dpa' ba stobs che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ dpa' 
369b4(rgyud 'grel): ba stobs che ba zhing sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ gang nag 'di 'chad ba la da lta'i rkyen lta ci smos te/ tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no/ de gang du mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa der yang zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyis rgyal mo
369b5(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal 'di yang grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal? lam/ ljongs la sogs pa la yi ge gcig tsam yang dag par gyur na/ de bzhin du 'byung po 'am/ yi dags la sogs pa gnod par mi 'gyur te/ grong de na gnas pa'i sems can
369b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang khrag khrug dang rtsod pa dang rims drag po'i nad mi 'byung ste/ gzhan gyi dang rgyal po'i chad pa yang mi 'byung ngo/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nyan 'khor du yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/
369b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan de yang lus la btags pa 'am/ yid kyis 'dzin pa 'am ngag du gdon pa 'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am mchod rten gyi rtse mo la btags nas/ de thos pa dang de mthong ba tsam gyis de'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyis rgyang grags kyis
370a1(rgyud 'grel): tshun chad du yang nye bar mi nus so/ /de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/
370a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ sems can gyi don la gsungs pa ste/ gnyis pa'i sems med cing/ nges bar the tshom med do zhes bya ba'o//
370a3(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa'i mdun du bsil ba'i 'tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor bsrung ba dang byad dang ro langs kyi nad kyis btab pa dang bsgoms nyes dang bri nyes
370a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gso ba dang/ bkra mi shis pa bkra shis par byed pa dang/ gzhan yang de la sogs pa thams cad la sngags te/ gzhan yang mkha' la rgyu ba'i yid dags rnams bzlog pa'i cho ga yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /lci ba
370a5(rgyud 'grel): chu dang bsres pa'i sa/ dkyil 'khor yang dag byug par bya/ nad pa'i mdun du yang dag tu/ /de bzhin gzhan yang mkhas pas shes/ /sa tshon lnga ni yang dag tu/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bris/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la//
370a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rim rdo rjer ba ste/ de phyir 'khor lo sna tshogs rtsibs/ de phyir lha rnams zlum por bri/ de yi phyi rim gru bzhil/ lha rnams pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/ /twa ra bzhi yis yang dag brgyan/ /dra ba la sogs brgyan pa
370a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rin chen sna bdun gzhal yas khang/ gdugs dang ba dang de bzhin brgyan mdzes bas yang dag rnams par brgyan/ pad+ma 'khor lo lha rnams dang/ /ye shes lha dang 'jig rten lha gzhan yang gsungs pa de bzhin du/
370b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa'i blo yis shes par bya/ bzhi ba'i dbus su yang dag tu/ /rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bzhag/ lto ba ldir ba rke ba ring/ mchu 'phyangs mtshan ma legs pa la/ /nag por ri rtsa ba spangs/ /de lta bu'i bum pa la/ /gu gul la sogs bdug par bya/
370b2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'bru lnga sman lnga dang/ /dri lnga byang chub shing lnga dang/ /mgul chings dang ni gdugs dang ni/ /me tog phreng dang rin chen phreng/ gzhan yang ji snyed yang dag brgyan/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i bum pa'i gzugs/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bzhag//
370b3(rgyud 'grel): rims nad phyugs nad gang yin pa/ de ni bkra shis la sogs dang/ /dbang bsgyur sbyin bsregs de bzhin te/ /lha dang rab gnas de bzhin shes/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /dkyil chog blo yis yang dag shes/ gro ga shing shun dang sogs
370b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ gur gum 'gri? hang la sogs bri/ /phyi rim mu khyud ra ba la/ /rgyal ba'i mtshan ni yang dag bri/ dar gyi bcings pa'i pad+ma la/ /de steng phyag 'tshan rgyas pa bri/ /ral gri skyabs sbyin rin chen dang/ /rin chen steng du rdo rje gnas/ /zhags pa lcags kyu bum
370b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ de steng rdo rje yang dag gnas/ mtshams bzhi rdo rje rgya grams yin/ /be con dang ni utpal dang/ pad+ma la sogs 'khor lo dang/ gzhan yang phyag mtshan gang yod pa/ /mkhas pas brtag nas bri bar bya/ de nas mu khyud zlum po la/ rdo rje rgya gi
370b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bri/ rdo rje rgya gram bar du ni/ /las kyi snying po yang dag bri/ /phyag mtshan bar du rdo rje rigs kyi yi ge dgod/ /de nas mu khyud gsum po la/ /sngar gsungs las kyi snying po bri/ /de nas mu khyung 'khor lo bri/ /'khor lor gri ba'i yi
370b7(rgyud 'grel): ge ni/ /rig sngags skyed byed yang dag tu/ /hUM dang phaT gyis rnam par brgyan/ de nas mu khyud gsum po la/ /rig sngags snying po yang dag bri/ /de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /yang snying snying po bri bar bya/ /de bzhin mu khyud bskor ba
371a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ gzhan gyi mi thub snying po bri/ /de dbus yi ge gnas pa ni/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi bskyed yid bri/ yi ge'i nang du mkhas pas ni/ yang dag gis ni bri bar bya/ /de bzhin rig sngags 'chang bris la/ /mgul lam phyogs sogs gdags par
371a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de bzhin btags par gyur na ni/ nad dang 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/ /mya ngan la sogs de bzhin du/ /mi rigs thams cad mi tshugs so/ /tshe ring sdug bsngal thams cad med/ /ngan song gsum yang de bzhin no/ /rgyal ba'i bsrung ba yang dag tu/ /nga yis
371a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bshad par gyis/ /rdo rje ri rab gus dang ni/ bla res sa gzhi dra ba dang/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin shes par bya/ /de phyir me ri sna tshogs kyis/ /yang dag gis ni bskor ba'o/ /nad pa'i drung du dkyil 'khor 'di/ /de bzhin yang dag bri bar bya//
371a4(rgyud 'grel): ring bsrel gdung rten lugs ma 'am/ /tsha tsha la sogs mchod rten gang/ /nad pa'i mdun du yang dag mchod/ /rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal gyis gzungs/ /cho ga'i dus su yang dag gdon bar gyis mi chod de bzhin du/ bzlas pa la sogs
