371a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bya/ /phyogs skyong gza' dang rgyu skar dang/ /de bzhin 'byung po la sogs la/ /rjes su mthun par dbul bar bya/ /dri dang me tog spos dang ni/ /ang ka la sogs yang dag dbul/ /de bzhin mkhas pas thun gtor du/ /yang dag gis ni dbul par
371a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /nad pa la sogs khrus byas la/ /rig sngags gtang ba'i cho ga bya/ /dbang skur la sogs gzhan yang mthun/ /de bzhin sdom pa 'bogs pa dang/ gzhan dang la sogs mthun pa ste/ /de bzhin la sogs byas na ni /gang yang las kyang
371a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi/ dkyil 'khor dang bsrung ba bshad pa'i gnas skabs te/ dgu pa'o/ //de myur ba kho nar bde legs dang nad ma mchis pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor
371b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas bsrung ba byas na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /bde bar 'gyur zhing thar bar 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ tshe da lta dang phyi ma la yang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar ba'o//
371b2(rgyud 'grel): mi ma lags pa rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing/ myur du mchi bar 'gyur lags te/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag rnams la 'byung po de rnams grogs mi byed na/ 'byung po de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'thob
371b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/ de ltar don che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/ sems can rnams
371b4(rgyud 'grel): la bde bar rnam par byas shing tshe da ltar dang phyi ma'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam dge snyen ma gang la la sogs pa ni yang nas yang du bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po bzhis zhu ba 'bul ba ste/ de yang
371b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhi'i don la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ grong ngam grong khyad raM grong brdal lam/ de la sogs pa la yod pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad 'bral bar gyur te/ 'chang ba dang zhes
371b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ mgul du btags nas gus par byas par gyur na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i nus pas sdug bsngal thams cad las thal bar 'gyur te/ tshe da lta dang tshe phyi ma de bzhin no/ /brjod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ klog pa dang bsgom pa rjes su yi rang ba de la bshad
371b7(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa/ de la sogs pa byas par gyur na/ de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /kun chub bar bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o/ /yang nan rig pa ni nam mkha' 
372a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du khyab pa ste/ sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o/ /sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i
372a2(rgyud 'grel): tshal 'di ni rjes su yi rang zhing gsung pa'o/ /de dag gi gang zag ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing de bzhin dus gsum du yin no/ /dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge snyen rnams/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gan du mchis nas/
372a3(rgyud 'grel): ming smos par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang/ tshes brgyad dam/ bcu dgu 'am/ nya 'am/ stong la sogs pa la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin
372a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang dad par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang/ 'di la 'chang bar 'gyur na/ dad par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don yang thab
372a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ngam zhes bya ba nas/ dge bsnyen ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi la yang bsil ba tshal gyi mdo 'dis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /che ge mo zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
372a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad do/ /yang na ni gang zag sems can 'di 'chang ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la yang nas yang du zhus pa'o/ /dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin
372a7(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen rnams/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis nas zhes bya ba ni/ sngon du bshad pa bzhin du bsil ba'i chal gyi mdo 'di'i bka' bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po de/ mchod pa byas na/ nad thams cad/
372b1(rgyud 'grel): las thang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du/ gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing/ 'byung po thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du yang/ bsgrags nas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad
372b2(rgyud 'grel): cu rnams kyi mdun du/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bsgrags na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ de rnams kyis kyang grogs byed par
372b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i don thob ste/ mi'i yul du skye bar gyur nas kyang/ chos 'di dang mi 'bral ba'o
372b4(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la rgyal po chen po bzhis yang nas yang du zhu ba phul ba'o/ /dge slong dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sde pa bzhi dang/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa lnga'o/ /sde pa bzhi ni/ phal cher
372b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ phaM yod par smra ba dang/ gnas brtan pa dang/ mang po skur ba'i sde'o/ /mi dge ba bcu ni/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ tshig rtsub mo dang/ dag 'khyal? ba dang/ phra ma'o/ /brnab sems
372b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba'o/ /dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa lnga ni/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ chang dang lnga ste/ bsil ba tshal gyi mdo 'di gton pa tsam gyis kyang/
372b7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi sdom pa nyams kyang/ de'i sdig pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /chang mi btung ba dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin du 'chi ba dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ chang mi 'byung ba ni/ sgog pa dang/ sha dang/ bud med dang la sogs pa bkag pa kri ya'i
373a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhung ngo/ /dran pa ni rig sngags 'di 'dra ba ste/ de 'dra ba tsam gyis kyang zas nyams pa las kyang thar par 'gyur ro/ /shes bzhin du mchis pa ni/ sdig pa'i rang bzhin du mchis pa ni sdig pa'i rang bzhin du shes pa yin te/ de bzhin
373a2(rgyud 'grel): du shes pa'i rang bzhin yang shes pa'o/ /dge dang mi dges mi tshugs shing/ /de dran pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zas rnam pa lnga la 'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis zhus pa'o/ /bu ram dang sbrang rtsi dang/ til
373a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sha dang/ nya sha rnams yongs su spangs par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi zas yin no/ /de yang sdig par 'gyur ba'i zas yin pas/ bu ram ni 'bu rnams kyi zas yin no/ /sbrang rtsi ni bum pa'i zas so/ /til ni srog chags rnams kyi zas so/ /sha
373a4(rgyud 'grel): ni srog bcad pas sdig pas sdig par 'gyur zas so/ /nya sha yang de bzhin no/ /de'i phyir na zas rnam pa lnga yongs su spang ba'o zhes gsungs ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni zas lnga po de sdig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
373a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis zhu ba'i phyir pos pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga po de spangs par gyur na/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs so//
373a6(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni/ bye ba khrag khrig gi bA klung gi bye ma snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ste/ de bzhin du 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams
373a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba ste/ de rnams bka' bden pas sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o/ /de dag gzhom pa'i slad du yi dam 'di bgyi 'tshal lags so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ da ltar gyi shAkya thub pas gsung ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral
373b1(rgyud 'grel): bar byed cing 'khor ba las thar te/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don thob nas/ rig pa'i don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sems can gyi don du yang nas yang du zhu ba'o/ /dge slong dam dge slong ma 'am/
373b2(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad do/ /bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad bsil bar byed pa'o/ /'dzin
373b3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ dad bar byas shing rjes su yid dang bar 'gyur na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ sems can thams cad thar pa thob pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'o/ /bsil pa'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar don
373b4(rgyud 'grel): che ba lags so zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ me long gi gzugs bsnyan bzhin du sgyu mar snang bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can zhes bya ba la sogs
373b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ bdud kyi rigs sdig can/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i lta ba log pa'i rigs/ de rnams kyi don mi 'grub cing the tshom gyis dus su yang 'pham par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir na mdo 'di la dang pa la don che pa'o/ /mi ma lags pa rnams kyi bar mdor
373b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gum pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de la/ chu dang me dang/ rkun ma dang/ choms rkun dang/ seng+ge dang/ glang po che dang/ dug dang/ thog dang/ rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa yin te/ yang na ni mi rig pa'i 'byung po rnams
373b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis rims kyis ? pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa de rnams klag par byed pa'o/ /de ni de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams glags tshol te/ gang zag de gus par gyur na/
374a1(rgyud 'grel): glags? mi rnyed cing bar du gcod bar mi nus so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sems can rnams bsrung ba dang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ snying rje che zhing/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab pa ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal
374a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di chad pa thams cad dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o/ /de nas zhes pa ni/ bsil ba tshal gyi yon tan bshad ba de nas so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad de gsol ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi phan yon rgyal
374a3(rgyud 'grel): po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad de bshad pa'o/ /mi mchog gang zhig mdo 'di dag /yongs su rdzogs pas gsungs pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni/ gling bzhin gnas pa'i 'jig rten 'di gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas shing 'chad ba de dag la bsrung ba gzhan gyi mtshung?
374a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med do/ /bde legs bgyid pa de la ni/ srin po rnams kyang 'tshe mi bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan te/ tshe phyi ma yang ngan song gsum las grol zhing/ de ltar yang dpal dang ldan te/ de de dag 'dzin pa'i gang zag yang dag pa'i byang chub thob
374a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po na yod pa'i bgegs rnams kyis kyang/ 'tshe bar mi nus shing/ srin po rnams kyang lta ci smos pa'o/ /su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag /mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni lha 'am/ mo 'am/ lha ma yin ni/ yi
374a6(rgyud 'grel): dags la sogs pa gang zag 'di la gus par byas pa de la sogs pa'i sems can gzhan la yang/ phan thogs pa ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ kun skyob dang/ log par dang sel dang/ gser thugs dang/ 'od srung rnams kyis
374a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang bsrungs pa'o/ /ma 'ong pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsrung ste/ de yang phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang/ byams pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar yang sems can gyi don la/ rig sngags
374b1(rgyud 'grel): la rjes su yi rang zhing bsrung pa'o/ /yongs su rdzogs shing ma chad par shin tu tshang bar 'chang bgyid pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang/ shes rab la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ de yang de'i 'khor
374b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag pas 'chang ba'o/ /yang na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la gnod sbyin yi dags dang/ 'byung po grul bum srin po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang/ rig sngags
374b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di la rjes su yi rang bstan pa bsrung pa ste/ 'di la tshig gcig kyang smras par 'gyur na/ 'byung po rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ /smyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang/ de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyid/ /ces bya ba ni/ smyo byed kyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod
374b4(rgyud 'grel): de/ de bzhin du klu'i gdon yang yin no/ /de rnams kyis srod tho rangs nams phyed la rgyu zhing/ sems can rnams la tshe bar byed pa ste/ de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing/ sems can rnams la bde bar byed pa'o/ /de la mi la lags dang gdon/ /myur du mgum du 'chi dang 'gyur?
374b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' dang/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mtshe bar byed pa'i 'byung po de rnams mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing/ /'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi ma thag tu mda''phangs pa bzhin du mnar med par skye'o/ /de la
374b6(rgyud 'grel): cis kyang mi tshugs ste/ de la rtse bar yang mi nus zhes bya ba ni u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ shin tu dkon pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang mthu cheb zhing gzi brjid che ste/ 'di'i nus pas gang gis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po yis
374b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod de/ zhes bya ba ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dri za rnams dang/ de bzhin du grul bum dang/ klu dang gnod sbyin rnams so/ /de rnams kyi gdon gyis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus shing phyogs rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
375a1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ de nyid ni mi snang 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du/ bcom ldan 'das la bar tshed byed cing glags lta ba rnams glags mi nyed cing/ /bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas na/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing/ mi snang bar
375a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas zhes pa ni/ tshigs su bcad pa'i de nas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i chen mo 'das te zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i nam la 'das pa'o/ /nam langs nas/ dge
375a3(rgyud 'grel): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni/ rnam rtog gsum dang bral ba'i dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa'o/ /dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das
375a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/ /dge slong dag mdangs gsum dag rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ 'khor rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i
375a5(rgyud 'grel): tshal du 'ongs te/ de dag gis kyang glags tshol ba ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ glags tshol mi nus par gnas pa'o/ /nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi dang 'byung po de rnams kyis/
375a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni rgyal po bzhi dang/ 'byung po thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'khod/
375a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi la bka' stsal zhing/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi don yang dag par
375b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /khyed kyis de dag legs bar rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ des bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /rig pa mthar thug pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o/ /btsun pa de ltar 'tshal
375b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshogs gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi
375b3(rgyud 'grel): rang zhing/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ bsgom pa la sogs pa byas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ chad pa med cing tshig la yang ba/ khyab pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ rig pa phyi nang yang dag par bstan pa/ thabs shes rab
375b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhun nu sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par bka' stsal te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas
375b5(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' bos sdus pa'o/ /dge slong dang zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /dge slong ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa'o/ /dge bsnyen dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sogs pa'o/ /dge bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te zhes
375b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ ma skyes dga' i btsun mo la sogs pa de dag gis kyang rig sngag kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams dang/ /gzhan yang lha dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pas rjes su
375b7(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ba'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyis rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //smon lam stobs kyi grong khyer mu gyen bcas/ /mkhas bar grags pa'i mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras/ skye ba lnga
376a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyar sbyangs ba'i 'bras bu yis/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la ma rmongs shing/ /gsang sngags gdams pa ma lus thugs la mnga' ba can/ /mtshan yang don yod rdo rje zhes par
376a2(rgyud 'grel): grags/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis bod yul dbus su byon/ /smon lam stobs kyis dam pa 'gro lo'i bla mar gyur/ /'dzam gling byang phyogs brag dmar dpal gyi bsam yas su/ /rgyal po khyad par
376a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa khri ba'i gdungs rgyud sras/ lha gcig khyad par 'phags pa lha lcam dar sgron gyis/ /bkra shis phro brang rdo lung dgon pa ru/ /lo paN zhabs nas btags nas dam chos 'di bsgyur ba//
376a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'i bsod nams gang thob bsags pa des/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can kun/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog/ /
376a5(rgyud 'grel): //bkra shis// //sarba mang+gA laM// //
